about: A 33-year-old bachelor who looks like a yakuza, Masaru is actually a friendly and caring person. He runs the shop Yosakoi Masaru and gives Hana and Naru advice concerning yosakoi. He took a romantic interest on Sari during a chance encounter.

name: Tomo Sekiya
about:
Tomo Sekiya is the wife of Naomasa Sekiya and the mother of Naru Sekiya.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Sari Tokiwa
about: Sari is a 25-year-old teacher at Yuihama Middle School. She is also Machi's older sister. She is supposedly irresponsible and selfish, as described by Machi; however, she is very well-liked amongst the student body and is often referred to as just "Sari-chan."

name: Sachiko Yamanoshita
about: Sachiko is a middle school sophomore and is a classmate of Yaya. She is the lead vocalist and guitarist of the band Need Cool Quality.

name: Shouko Hida
about:
Satou's best friend and co-worker who comes from a rich family. Shouko often lies to her mother about staying with Satou to meet with boys.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Asahi Koube
about:
A boy who is searching for the whereabouts of Shio. He's later revealed to be Shio's older brother.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Shio Koube
about:
A estimated 5-7 year old girl who lives with Satou, she cares and loves Satou and enjoys bathing and sleeping with her, she is not allowed outside for any reason as she was told it is dangerous.
She is seen wearing a Light blue sailor suit and skirt.
She is willing to kiss, love and Hug Satou if she experiences a Bitter feeling.
(Source: Happy Sugar Life)

name: Satou Matsuzaka
about:
Satou Matsuzaka learns to love for the first time after meeting Shio Koube and lives with her in a shared apartment. Publically, she tells people that she resides with her aunt in her apartment, and keeps the fact that she lives with Shio a secret.

Satou is a freshman at Makikou High School and primarily works at Cure á Cute, maintaining a kind nature and getting along well with other people in order to sustain her lifestyle with Shio. While she wishes she could spend her time with Shio forever in their apartment, she is aware of the fact that they cannot live on peacefully if she does not work and earn money for food, utilities, etc. Because of this, Satou often has to confront the outside world where people interfere with her relationship due to her past history of accepting anyone who has confessed to her and changing partners every three days. Satou is prone to severe animosity when people disrupt her relationship with their interpretation of "love," and can be easily provoked when it comes to Shio due to her overprotectiveness. She is willing to take any action necessary to eliminate threats to Shio and their "Happy Sugar Life."

(Source: Happy Sugar Life Wiki)

name: Taiyou Mitsuboshi
about:
Taiyou Mitsuboshi is a high school student and is one of Satou's co-workers at Cure á Cute.


(Source: Happy Sugar Life Wiki)

name: Shizuka Kitaumekawa
about: Daichi's wife.

name: Daichi Kitaumekawa
about: A popular teacher at Satou's highschool.

name: Minori Kitaumekawa
about: Daichi's daughter who is in preschool.

name: Yuuna Koube
about:
Shio and Asahi's mother.




(Source: Manga)

name: Satou's Aunt
about: A relative of Satou who had taken full custody of her after her parents died many years ago. Despite her happy and cheery nature, she is deeply insane and has a very warped perception of "love" in which she accepts all forms of desires towards her with disturbing masochistic pleasure. Her deeply twisted views of love are held responsible for making Satō think in a similar way and making her into the deranged psychopath that she is today.

name: Alice Cartelet
name_kanji: アリス・カータレット
about:
Birthday: April 5th
Blood type: A
Height: 139 cm

An English girl who transfers into Shinobu's school and stays at her house. She loves Japanese culture.

Alice is a cute petit girl who is fluent in both English and Japanese (though it is mentioned that during Shinobu's homestay in England, the both of them communicated with each other only using the words, "thank you" and "konnichiwa").

Alice is very close to Shinobu and often tries to catch her attention, even to the point where she would try to one-up herself from Karasuma-sensei so Shinobu could see that Alice's English is better than Karasuma's.

Alice is one of the most level headed people in the group, though she often finds herself embarrassed or in strange situations whenever she tries to win over Shinobu's attention.

Alice has shown slight jealousy towards Karen and even Karasuma-sensei because Karen often pushes herself onto Shinobu and Shinobu admires Karasuma-sensei.

Nevertheless, Alice's more negative feelings are often used in a joking manner within the series rather than a spiteful one.

name: Youko Inokuma
about:
Birthday: August 20
Height: 163cm
Blood type: O

Youko is Shinobu's classmate and also Aya's friend since middle school. Youko often teases Aya, even going as far as telling the group that Aya would never leave her side in middle school because Aya was too shy to do anything alone (though Aya strongly denies this).

While Youko is very energetic, athletic and high spirited, at the same time, she is one of the most level headed people in the group (the other ones being Aya and Alice). 

She has a few younger siblings that she loves to play with. It has been noted by Aya that Youko's little brother's voice sounds almost exactly like Youko's.

name: Aya Komichi
about:
Birthday: September 15
Height: 159cm
Blood type: A

Aya is Shinobu's classmate. She has also been friends with Youko since middle school. Aya is bright and graceful, though at the same time, she is very shy, timid but still occasionally displays tsundere tendencies towards Youko.

Aya usually has troubles reading the atmosphere, which often leads to comedic moments in the series, though despite this, she is still one of the most level headed people in the group.

name: Karen Kujou
about:
Birthdate: December 1
Height: 150cm
Blood type: AB

A half-British, half-Japanese girl who was Alice's friend back in England. She also comes to Japan and enrolls in Shinobu's school.

Karen generally is a very energetic girl (even more so than Youko). She is very outgoing and not afraid to show her emotions. 

Karen has mentioned on multiple occasions that she "really really really loves" Shinobu (大大大好き!), which makes Alice jealous sometimes. She gets along with everybody in her class, even to the point where they would give her lots of food if she ever forgot her lunch. It has been noted that Karen doesn't gain weight despite consuming lots of food.

She calls Aya "Ayaya," because of a small misunderstanding when they first met.

name: Shinobu Oomiya
about:
Birthdate: June 6th
Height: 155cm
Blood type: A

A graceful and air headed 15-year-old girl. She previously stayed over at Alice's home in England, although she herself is rather bad at English and has generally bad grades.

Shinobu has taken a liking to the English language and often tries to find opportunities to act like an English person. She has tried reading English newspapers (though she doesn't, if not, barely understands any of it) and even tried to listen in on Alice and Karen's conversations when they are speaking in English.

name: Grace Cartelet
name_kanji: グレース・カータレット
about: Alice's mother.

name: Kana Higurashi
about: Kana Higurashi is Honoka's childhood friend. They are on the tennis team together.

name: Mitsuki Inokuma
about: Youko's little sister. She and Kouta are twins.

name: Kouta Inokuma
about: Youko's little brother. He and Mitsuki are twins.

name: Sakura Karasuma
about:
Birthday: October 19
Height: 160cm
Blood type: B

Shinobu's English teacher, who is often seen wearing a tracksuit jersey. She is kind, meek and absent-minded. Alice sees her as a rival for Shino's affections. She has two older brothers.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Akari Kuzehashi
about:
Birthday: July 24
Height: 165cm
Blood type: O

Aya, Karen and Shinobu's 2nd year homeroom teacher.

name: Honoka Matsubara
about: Karen's classmate. She and her classmates usually giving some food to Karen during lunch break at school. She is a member of the tennis club.

name: Isami Oomiya
about:
Shinobu's older sister who is a fashion model. She is often worried about Shinobu and the fact that she is very careless and absent-minded but she manages to handle her very well.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Oomiya's Mother
about: Shinobu's mother.

name: Azusa Azuki
about:
Gender: Female
Birthday: June 19
Occupation: Student
Part-time waitress
Part-time constructor
Part-time paper girl

Azusa is a second year high school student, a very popular girl known as an ojou-sama. She is always alone and turns down all confessions of love she receives. She likes animals.

name: Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi
about:
Gender: Female
Age: 15-16
Birthday: January 21
Sign: Aquarius
Blood Type: A
Height: 4'11
Occupation: Student

She meets the main character in the beginning of the manga. She ends up losing her emotion because of the infamous Stony Cat. She helps out Youto find the person who obtained his lost trait, in order to regain her own.

name: Tsukushi Tsutsukakushi
about: Tsukushi is the president of the track and field club. She is also the older sister of Tsukiko. She often bullies Youto, and is the person who made him to be known as Hentai Ouji. She wants to marry her little sister Tsukiko. She is the person who set up the cat statue.

name: Youto Yokodera
about:
Yokodera Youto is the main protagonist of "Hentai Ouji to Warawanai Neko". He is portrayed to secretly be a huge pervert who can't express his inner self truly because his deeds are always misunderstood. He even claims that he joined the athletics club just so he could see girls in shorts.

When hearing some rumors from a childhood friend, he makes a wish onto the infamous 'Stony Cat', of no longer being capable to lie and make excuses in exchange for the belt of a hug pillow he offered. And so, he loses this 'facade'.

After the removal of his facade, Yokodera is troubled as it makes him be painfully honest to others. Later on, he learns that someone will take the missing trait one owned before wishing onto the mysterious cat-like object. He then starts searching for the lost belt he previously had.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mother Azuki
about: Azusa Azuki's mother. A kind-hearted woman who is concerned about her daughter's inability to make friends.

name: Mai Maimaki
about:
Mai is the vice president of the athletics club. She admires Tsukushi and wants to be her successor, therefore making her hostile toward Youto, who is another candidate for the next club president. Despite this, she also has a kind side, as she reluctantly agrees to go on a date with Youto when being demanded to do so by Tsukushi. It is hinted that she is more perverted than Youto.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Morii
about:
Morii and Moriya are Azusa's friends back at middle school. They used to be the one who bullied her, but made up after Yōto manage to get them to apologize. They believe that Yōto and Azusa are a couple.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Moriya
about:
Morii and Moriya are Azusa's friends back at middle school. They used to be the one who bullied her, but made up after Yōto manage to get them to apologize. They believe that Yōto and Azusa are a couple.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Emanuela Pollarola
name_kanji: エマヌエーラ・ポルラローラ
about: Emi knows both Yokodera and Ponta. She came from Italy and enjoys spending time with Yokodera. Like how Azusa frequently uses bizarre analogies to animals, Emi frequently uses strange analogies to plants, such as calling someone a "stupid pumpkin."

name: Ponta
about: Yokodera's best friend.

name: Tsukasa Tsutsukakushi
about: Tsukushi and Tsukiko's mother.

name: Aoi Inuyama
about:
Aoi Inuyama is a young girl from the show Yuru Camp. She is the co-president of The Outdoor Activities Club at her school alongside Chiaki Oogaki. She briefly appeared in "Mount Fuji and Curry Noodles," before officially appearing in "Welcome to the Outdoor Activities Club!"

Aoi has medium-length brown hair, olive-green eyes, and pale skin. She keeps her hair in a ponytail on the side of her head, held by a purple hair bobble.
 
Sometimes she tells some lies that seems like the truth. She is also a good cook.

When camping or outdoors, she wears a large grey-and-white scarf, a light-blue sweater with a dark-blue shirt, a multicolored skirt, and brown boots.

When in school, she wears the typical female uniform (seifuku, 制服). She's currently wearing the winter seifuku. 

She speaks Japanese with the Kansai dialect, although she's from Inuyama.

(source: Yuru Camp Wiki)

name: Nadeshiko Kagamihara
about:
Nadeshiko Kagamihara is a young girl from Nanbucho. She is very cheerful and energetic, but easily forgets things. She also likes to eat a lot.

Nadeshiko has long pink hair which she keeps in twin ponytails on the back of her head (held by white ruffled scrunchies), light blue eyes, and pale skin.

When camping, she wears a plaid pink jacket, a light pink ruffled dress underneath, black leggings, and green-and-white lace-up boots (or, alternatively, dark brown boots that are rolled down) with grey fingerless gloves and an orange scarf.

In school, she wears the typical female uniform (seifuku, 制服). She's currently wearing the winter seifuku.

Her birthday is same as Aoi Inuyama's.

(Source: Yuru Camp Wiki)

name: Chiaki Oogaki
about:
Chiaki Oogaki is a young girl from the show Yuru Camp. She briefly appeared in "Mount Fuji and Curry Noodles," before officially appearing in "Welcome to the Outdoor Activities Club!".

Chiaki has brown eyes, long bluish-purple hair, and pale skin. She wears her hair in twin ponytails on the side of her head with some of her hair falling onto the sides of her face, has very short bangs, and has rectangular wire-frame glasses.

When outdoors and when camping, she wears black leggings, reddish-brown boots, and a large dark-blue coat.

When at school, she wears the typical female uniform (seifuku, 制服). She's currently wearing the winter seifuku.

Her birthday is on August 31st.

(Source: Yuru Camp Wiki)

name: Ena Saitou
about:
Ena Saitou is a young girl from the show Yuru Camp. She first appears in "Welcome to the Outdoor Activities Club!" and owns a dog named Chikuwa.

Ena has blue eyes, short brown hair, and pale skin.

When outdoors or camping, she wears a puffy blue coat and maroon leggings. She also wears white-and-blue ankle-warmers, grey boots, and a white-and-blue scarf with grey gloves and earmuffs.

In school, she wears the typical female uniform (seifuku, 制服). She's currently wearing the winter seifuku.

(Source: Yuru Camp Wiki)

name: Saki Shima
about: Rin's mother.

name: Rin Shima
about:
Rin is a young girl who enjoys camping. She usually camps by herself, until she meets Nadeshiko.

Rin has purple eyes, dark-purple hair, and pale skin.

When camping, she wears brown boots and black leggings, a pinkish dress, and a green sweater underneath a plaid grey shawl. She usually keeps her hair in a bun. Sometimes she also wears a white knit-cap and has her hair loose. In one of the episodes, Ena Saitou tied her bun into a small teddy bear.

(Source: Yuru Camp Wiki)

name: Ryouko Toba
about: Minami's sister.

name: Minami Toba
about:
Minami Toba is a teacher at Motosu High School. She becomes the advisor for the Outdoor Activities Club before the Christmas camping trip.

(Source: Yuru Camp Wiki)

name: Hazuki Katou
about:
Height: 155 cm
Birthday: February 13
Zodiac: Aquarius
Blood type: A
Instrument played: Tuba

Kumiko's classmate. She was in the tennis club in junior high school, and is a beginner in music. She admires the trumpet and joined the brass band club, but ended up playing the tuba. She's a bright and perky mood-maker.


(Source: ANN)

name: Sapphire Kawashima
about:
Birthday: November 3
Zodiac: Scorpio
Height: 148 cm
Blood type: B
Instrument: Contrabass

Kumiko's classmate. At an elite junior high school for young ladies, she learned to play the contrabass. She joined the brass band club to continue to happily play music. She has a positive personality, but worries about her name.

(Source: ANN)

name: Reina Kousaka
about:
Birthday: May 15
Zodiac: Taurus
Height: 158 cm
Blood type: O
Instrument: Trumpet

A first year who graduated from the same junior high school as Kumiko. Influenced by her father, a professional, she has been playing the trumpet since she was little, so she continues in the concert band club at Kitauji High School. She is stoic and has a sense of pride in her trumpet skills, though she still respects her upperclassmen. After their junior high won a gold at a concert band competition, she and Kumiko had a falling-out.


(Source: ANN)

name: Kumiko Oumae
about:
Height: 162 cm
Birthday: August 21
Zodiac: Leo
Blood type: A
Instrument: Euphonium

Kumiko enrolled in Kitauji High School to wear the sailor uniforms she liked and to get a fresh start. Though she was doubtful, she decided to join the concert band club and continue playing the euphonium. She has a habit of immediately saying what she's thinking and changes her mind easily. She had a falling-out with Reina in middle school.


(Source: ANN)

name: Takuya Gotou
about:
He is a second year student who plays the tuba.

Takuya is a tall, young man who wears the standard male Kitauji High School uniform. He has short, spiked, messy, dark brown hair and brown eyes, framed by thick, black glasses.

Most of the times he is quiet, but he can also say something that others think is quite mean, but he doesn't really do it on purpose, as he just says things that are on his mind. Also, despite his rough appearance, Takuya is a very friendly young man, and gives good advise to those younger to him and he likes his tuba. He also says that love and confidence are important.


(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wikia)

name: Sumiko Hirao
about:
Sumiko Hirao is a second year student at Kitauji High School who is an alto saxophone in the Kitauji Concert Band. 

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Lala Hitomi
about:
Lala Hitomi is a minor character in the Hibike! Euphonium series. In the main series, she is a first-year student at Kitauji High School who plays the Horn in F. She is also the member of Monaka team.

As a minor character, she has a very small role in the anime series. Lala is usually seen with other Monaka team members. She and Miru Kishibe seems to have good senpai-kouhai relationship since they appear in the same screen a lot.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wikia)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Junna Inoue
about:
Junna Inoue is a supporting character in Sound! Euphonium series. She is a student at Kitauji High School in the same year as Kumiko Oumae who is a percussionist in the school's concert band. She became the band's percussion section leader during Kumiko's third year.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Nozomi Kasaki
about:
Nozomi is a second year student who used to play flute for the Kitauji High School's Bass Band Club in her first year. She and most of the first year members quit the club due to a conflict between the first year members and then the third year members at that time.

(Source: Hibike Euphonium Wikia)

name: Kohaku Kawashima
about: The younger sister of Midori. Kohaku is often noted how closely she resembles her older sister. Kohaku is a shy and timid girl.

name: Raina Kitamura
about:
The bassoon and oboe section leader at Kitauji High School. Kurumi is a third year student who plays the bassoon but marches with pompoms during parades. She is the tallest female member, and among the tallest in the entire band. Kurumi is often seen with her close friend Mikino Oka, the other third year bassoonist at Kitauji High.

In her appearances throughout the episodes, Kurumi's face often has a serious or passive expression. However, she is shown with a bright smile while marching the parade.

As a side character, she has a very small role in the anime series. While she was present at the section leader meeting in episode 4, she did not voice an opinion. She is shown speaking a line in the background during episode 7.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Michie Matsumoto
about: Kumiko and Hazuki's teacher. She serves as the vice/deputy adviser of the Brass Band.

name: Riko Nagase
about:
A second year student who plays the tuba and is in charge of the tubas in the Brass Band.

Riko is a friendly girl who is polite and respects all people in the school. She can however be serious.

She is Gotou's girlfriend.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Natsuki Nakagawa
about:
A second year student who plays the euphonium. She is rarely seen talking, and it seems like she has an aloof attitude. It is later revealed that the second-years are like this because there aren't many second-years, due to something that happened in the past.

However, Natsuki is normally friendly to everyone, and tends to be mature and calm in most situations. She is also understanding of situations and takes everything quite nicely.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Tsubomi Nakano
about:
A first year who plays the flute in Kitauji High School Band.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Kaori Nakaseko
about:
Birthday: September 3
Zodiac: Virgo
Blood type: A
Instrument played: Trumpet

A third-year high school student who plays trumpet and acts as the trumpet section leader. Kaori is considered to be popular and well liked among the members of the band, and has a soft tone in her voice and a gentle demeanor.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Hideri Noguchi
about: A third-year high school student and the leader of the trombone section of the Brass Band club.

name: Haruka Ogasawara
about:
Birthday: October 28
Zodiac: Scorpio
Blood type: O
Instrument played: Baritone Saxophone

A third-year high school student. She plays the Baritone Saxophone and serves as the school band's director and president as well as the saxophone section leader.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Mamiko Oumae
about: Kumiko's older sister and one of the reasons behind Kumiko's interest in playing brass instruments.

name: Yoriko Saika
about:
A third-year who plays the piccolo and flute in Kitauji High School's band.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Aoi Saitou
about: A third year in the Brass Band, who plays the tenor saxophone.

name: Masako Sakai
about:
Masako Sakai is a first year student at Kitauji High School who is a percussionist in the Kitauji Concert Band. 

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Azusa Sasaki
about:
Height: 157 cm
Blood Type: A
Birthday: March 7 (Pisces)
Instrument: Trombone
School: Rikka High School

Azusa Sasaki is Oumae Kumiko's fellow band-mate when they were is middle school. Now they are friendly rivals as they attend different high schools. 

She is a very friendly girl who cares about her friends and has a quite mature nature. She likes playing instruments and is passionate about music.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Chieri Takahisa
about:
Chieri is a first-year student at Kitauji High School in the main series and a member of the concert band who plays the clarinet, but she switches to playing the E♭ Clarinet in her second year.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wikia)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Noboru Taki
about:
Birthday: August 23
Height: 184 cm
Zodiac: Virgo
Blood type: A

A new music teacher in Kitauji High School and serves as the adviser to the Brass Band club. He is a teacher who is in charge of Class 2-5 (Second years, class 5).

(Source: Hibike Euphonium Wiki)

name: Narai Tanabe
about: He is one of the percussionists of the Kitauji High School Band.

name: Asuka Tanaka
about:
Birthday: December 25
Zodiac: Capricorn
Blood type: AB
Instrument played: Euphonium

A third-year high school student. She is the vice president of the concert band club, and also leads the bass section. Like Kumiko, she plays the euphonium. Her standoffish nature has brushed people off time and again. Her red-rimmed glasses are her trademark.

name: Shuuichi Tsukamoto
about:
Birthday: September 18
Zodiac: Virgo
Blood type: A
Instrument played: Trombone 

A first-year high school student. Kumiko's childhood friend. In middle school, he played the French horn, but in high school, he was assigned to the trombone.

name: Mizore Yoroizuka
about:
Birthday: July 2
Zodiac: Cancer
Height: 154 cm
Blood type: AB
Instrument: Oboe

Mizore is a second year at Kitauji High School. She is the only oboe player in the concert band. Mizore is a very silent and introverted girl, and despite seeming to be hard to interact with, she has friends like Natsuki Nakagawa, Yuuko Yoshikawa, Nozomi Kasaki. She likes practicing the oboe alone outside the classroom, and frequently arrives early to school hours before the start of her classes to practice.




(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wikia)

name: Yuuko Yoshikawa
about:
Height: 156 cm
Birthday: April 15
Zodiac: Aries
Blood type: B
Instrument: Trumpet

A second year trumpet player who admires deeply her senpai, Kaori Nakaseko. She usually looks like a sweet girl, but can be at times very emotional and aggressive.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Kaho Hariya
about:
Kaho is a new first-year student at Kitauji High School. She is a member of the concert band who plays the euphonium in Kumiko's third year

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Kanade Hisaishi
about:
Kanade is a new first-year at Kitauji High School. She joins the band as an euphonium player in Kumiko's second year.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Suzume Kamaya
about:
Suzume is a new first-year student at Kitauji High School. She is a member of the concert band who plays the tuba in Kumiko's third year

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Yayoi Kamiishi
about:
Yayoi is a new first-year student at Kitauji High School. She is a member of the concert band and plays the tuba in Kumiko's third year.

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Ririka Kenzaki
about:
Height: 163cm
Birthday: June 30
Zodiac: Cáncer
Blood type: B
Instrument: Oboe

A first year oboe player in Kitauji Concert Band Club. She is said to look like a gyaru, with light auburn hair and yellow eyes. Ririka has a light and cheerful childlike personality. She tries to build a good relationship with Mizore Yoroizuka. However, according to Kanade Hisaishi, Ririka is aware of her ability to pass off any rude or suspicious behaviour as innocence with her smile. When she needs to sneak up to someone, she coldly calculates to use it. 

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Mayu Kuroe
about: Mayu is a new third-year transfer student at Kitauji High School. She is a member of the concert band that plays the euphonium in Kumiko's third year.

name: Sari Yoshii
about:
Sari is a new first-year student at Kitauji High School. She is a member of the concert band, and plays the clarinet in Kumiko's third year

(Source: Hibike! Euphonium Wiki)

name: Hiro
about:
Height: 155cm
Age 16 (Hidamari Sketch-365) 17 (Hoshimittsu-Honeycomb)

Hiro is a year older than Yuno and Miyako, living directly under Yuno's apartment. Although she tries to be a supportive senpai to the girls, she tends to worry excessively about her weight, causing her to go on diets for periods while occasionally binging on sweets. She met Sae in the first year of High School, and is one of her neighbor's principal sources of support when she's involved with a deadline or other crisis.

name: Miyako
about:
Height: 165cm
Birthday: October 10
Age: 15 (Hidamari Sketch-365), 16 (Hoshimittsu-Honeycomb)

Yuno's classmate and good friend. She's very strange, but a very likable person. She has very good ears and is good at imitating other people. She is notorious for her appetite and love for food.

name: Sae
about:
Height: 167cm
Age 16 (Hidamari Sketch-365) 17 (Hoshimittsu-Honeycomb)

Sae is an upperclassman and good friends with Hiro. In the anime version, she has a younger sister, Chika. 

Her artistic specialtity is fiction writing; she writes fiction professionally under the pseudonym "Aya Tachibana" and enrolled at the school specifically so she could learn how to illustrate her own work. 

Sae, who is tall, athletic, and generally mature, has a playful side that can be at the same time enigmatic and cunning; she has a habit of giving Yuno just enough warning about potential problems for the younger girl to fail to avoid them. 

She also has a fondness for playing detective when faced with such anomalies as Miyako's apartment. She tends to get upset when Miyako refers to her as having masculine qualities. She also gets very uncomfortable when asked about her love life, frequently inventing a history for herself that even cursory examination would show to be absurd, while blushing furiously. 

Sae is also very shy about her feelings towards her friends and especially her sister. She is much more comfortable chiding and scolding her little sister, Chika, whenever she comes to visit. However when she expresses genuine concern for her sister, her face will turn beet-red.

name: Yuno
about:
Height: 144 cm
Birthday: May 5
Age: 15 (Hidamari Sketch-365) 16 (Hoshimittsu-Honeycomb)

Yuno, sometimes called Yunocchi by Miyako, is a young, playful girl and main protagonist of the story. She lives in the Hidamari apartments, along with her close friends and neighbors Miyako, Hiro, and Sae. Her friends think of her as a very nice person. Yuno dreams of being a great artist someday. Although she is a skilled artist overall, she considers painting and drawing her specialties.

name: Chika
about:
Chika is Sae's thirteen-year-old sister. She is more spontaneous and energetic than her older sister. She enjoys cooking and has an infatuation with a Kabuki actor. She has no artistic talent and prefers music and home economics to art. 

She was originally an anime exclusive character until she appeared in the manga in the 7th volume.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kuwahara
about: The school nurse and a very good friend of Yoshinoya and the principal.

name: Natsume
about: Sae's rival from class B.  Despite being rivals, Natsume seems to have a crush on Sae.

name: Ooyasan
about:
The Landlord is the female owner of Hidamari Apartments. She has quite a few masculine characteristics as she often wears baseball cap, goes out for a fishing in her spare time, and is a heavy smoker. Although she has a very laid-back personality, she is often seen very busy doing various part-time jobs.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: The Principal
about:
The Principal at Yamabuki High School, with a stutter and an inability to stop shaking. Is a master gunfighter and ninja. Often scolds Yoshinoya-sensei for lack of satisfactory performance.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Ume
about: Ume is a metapod that lives on the roof of the Hidamari Apartments and represents the manga's author, Ume Aoki. The character does not actually play any significant role in the story. (Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yoshinoya
about:
Height: 158cm
Age: "Eternally 17"

Yoshinoya is Yuno and Miyako's homeroom teacher and art instructor. She is buxom, exuberant, and a cosplay maniac. So much so, in fact, that she will frequently wear incredibly complicated things that are at times truly inappropriate. She has a fondness for modeling for her class, displaying her latest outfits whenever she can, and showing off in general. It is later revealed that Yoshinoya still resides with her parents, and would often be criticized by them for not being mature. When asked her age, she will answer "eternally seventeen". 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Narrator
about: Episode 9

name: Nazuna
about:
Age: 15
Height: 150cm

Nazuna is a freshman who enters Yamabuki High School and moves into the Hidamari Apartments during Yuno and Miyako's second year at the complex. She lives in room 203. She used to live in the neighborhood, but after entering Yamabuki Art High School, her father was transferred somewhere for work, and her mother followed with him.

She befriended the other Hidamari tenants and becomes a close friend of fellow freshman Nori.

She has sandy blonde hair, braids, and large side bangs. She appears very quiet and reserved, but has an inferiority complex. She is not in the art department.

(Source: Hidamari Sketch Wiki, edited)

name: Nori
about:
Age: 15
Height: 160cm

Nori is a resident of Hidamari Apartments Room 103. She has lighter blue hair with pigtails. She is in the art department and likes to play with computers. She is honest and straightforward. She seems to be the most level-headed and normal out of everyone and is usually the one to point out the others' weird ways.

(Source: Hidamari Sketch Wiki, edited)

name: Arisawa
about: A senior while Yuno was a freshman. Arisawa found Yuno's phone when she forgot it at school. When Yuno came to pick it up, they talked for a while, and Arisawa sketched her. Even though they only talked for a short while, their meeting affected Yuno.

name: Mami
about: Yuno and Miyako's class-mate, appears from time to time.

name: Rika Furude
about:
Age: 11
Birthday: August 21 (Leo)
Height: 137 cm (4'6")

Rika is a younger classmate in Keiichi's school, and is in the same grade level as Satoko. Naturally, she is great friends with her, as they live together in the same house. She is revered by the villagers as the heir of the local shrine, and plays the role of a miko in the annual Watanagashi Festival. She has been the head of the Furude house since her parents died, but rarely attends town meetings due to her young age. While she does not speak a lot, she likes to say nonsense words such as "mi~" and "nipa~" and often ends her sentences with "-nano desu," which inflame Rena's passion for cute things. She also likes to describe events using sound effects, such as "The cat was going 'nya nya' and 'scritch scritch'" or saying "Clap! Clap! Clap!" when clapping her hands.


(Source: 07th Expansion Wiki)

name: Satoko Houjou
about:
Birthday: June 24
Height: 137 cm
Age: 11

Satoko is a younger classmate in Keiichi's school. She has a distinctive style of speech, ending all of her sentences with 'wa' which, at times, is grammatically incorrect. In spite of her young age, she is quite clever in setting up traps, and likes to practice on Keiichi. 

Kai: 
Gou: 
She dislikes Japanese pumpkin, and due to her color blindness, she cannot tell the difference between cauliflower and broccoli.

name: Keiichi Maebara
about:
Birthdate: April 13, 1967

Maebara Keiichi is the main protagonist of the first 3 Higurashi Arcs, Onikakushi-hen, Watanagashi-hen, and Tatarigoroshi-hen. He is the son of a famous and extremely wealthy artist, and recently moved to Hinamizawa after an array of unfortunate and awful events in his hometown. As a charismatic, lively attitude, and his talented tongue allow him to quickly fit in the town and make new friends, and also win some club activities. When in need of a weapon, he wields Satoshi's old bat. Keiichi often receives the butt of the jokes in the club's activities from which he was the correct answer to some games they play, to wearing embarrassing costumes whenever he loses punishment games.

Keiichi has brown hair with dark blue eyes and is described as charismatic to others.

During his school days, he wears a red shirt under a white one, black pants, a belt and red shoes. However, during his free days, he wears a black sleeveless shirt under a red vest, green shorts with a blue belt and shoes.

name: Rena Ryuuguu
about:
Age: 13
Birthdate: July 28
Height: 161 cm (5'3")
Hobbies: collecting cute things, obsessing over cute things, treasure hunting
Famous quote: "Friends. Those companions you speak of are only friends during those fun, yet unimportant times. When painful times come, they won't be your ally."

Rena is the main female protagonist of the question arcs and a girl who returned from Ibaraki to Hinamizawa one year ago, she is in the same grade level as Keiichi.

She is very kind and takes care of Keiichi whenever possible, but is also naïve and is usually subject to light teasing by Keiichi, it is hinted later in the series that she loves him. She is distinguished by her obsession with things she perceives as adorable calling them kaaii (かぁいい, a slurred form of kawaii (かわいい), meaning "cute"), which are usually moekko characters or items she finds while scouring the local dump. Generally, these things are not considered cute by others.

She also utters the phrase hau (はぅ) when excited or flustered, and has a habit of repeating phrases at the ends of her sentences, most famously "kana? kana??" (かな? かな??, lit. "I wonder, I wonder?").

Every now and then, she goes treasure hunting in the town's trash heap, searching for "cute" things to collect, and whenever she sees something that grabs her attention, she proclaims, "I wanna take it home!" (お持ち帰り, Omochikaerī) and proceeds to try and do so, becoming virtually unstoppable during these intervals.

When in "Take it Home" mode, she comically becomes stronger and faster. Despite this disarming trait, Rena is shown to be amazingly observant and perceptive about the things around her (in Watanagashi-hen, she was able to deduce that both Rika and Satoko went to the Sonozaki house by looking through the contents of their fridge and a flier).

According to Mion, while Rena might seem cute herself, people should be careful not to anger her as she becomes quite scary when angered.

name: Mion Sonozaki
about:
Age: 14
Birthdate: July 10

Mion is the oldest kid in Keiichi's class. As the elder, she is the class president and everyone looks up to her as the leader. Her social skills are on par with Keiichi, whom she highly respects as a friend and rival (though it is later shown that she has a crush on him).

She acts like a tomboy, and calls herself oji-san (meaning old man), but has a hidden girlish side. She is next in line to be the head of the Sonozaki household, one of the Three Families which holds tremendous influence in Hinamizawa. She is often seen with a holstered airsoft gun, even though she is never seen using it, and was removed in the PS2 adaption of the game; she is, however, very adept in the use of martial arts.

Mion also serves as leader of the after-school club consisting entirely of the main characters. She organizes a variety of strategy-based games for the members to play with penalties for any losers. Penalties usually involve wearing embarrassing or frilly outfits on the way home. Each game she organizes involves bending the general rules or using questionable and crude methods to win such as playing cards with a marked deck or using feminine wiles to discourage opposition.

name: Shion Sonozaki
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: July 10

Shion is Mion's identical twin sister, who currently resides in Okinomiya. In spite of their different personalities, she and Mion often switch places, and it can be difficult to distinguish between them. 


She was sent by the Sonozaki family to a private boarding school, but escaped and returned to live near her hometown, where she lives with Kasai. In spite of all this, she and Mion maintain a close relationship. In most of the arcs, she is at a different school from the other main characters, and therefore appears less frequently.

She works as a waitress at the Angel-Mort restaurant and is the manager's assistant for the Hinamizawa Fighters little league team. She is often seen carrying a taser, and also wears yellow ribbon in her hair. She is also shown to be good with guns, along with Kasai, in Matsuribayashi-hen.

name: Akane's Husband
about: The boss of the yakuza organization. He is Akane's husband and Mion and Shion's father.

name: Mamoru Akasaka
about:
Age: 25
Birthday: August 3, 1957

Mamoru is the main character in Himatsubushi-hen. He is a young police investigator at the Metropolitan Police Department in Tokyo.

name: Rumiko Chie
about: Rumiko is the female teacher of Keiichi's class, who is a parody character of Tsukihime's Ciel-Senpai (permission for her usage was given by Type-Moon). The seiyū for her character in the anime series is the same as the seiyū of Ciel from the Tsukihime anime. Going along with the parody, her favorite food is curry rice, just like Ciel, and will go to great and somewhat scary, lengths to uphold the honor of curry, which is shown in the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei OVA, where she becomes enraged by Keichi's "offense" to curry. On a stronger note, she is seen wielding wooden T's, shapped, and held, in exactly the same fashion as the Black Keys from Tsukihime.

name: Satoshi Houjou
about:
Age: 14-15
Birthday: June 16

Satoshi is the older brother of Satoko Houjou. Although he is currently missing, his past influence is the key to the actions of several characters in Higurashi. Similar to Satoko, he cannot distinguish the difference between cauliflower and broccoli. Because of this, it can be inferred that both Satoshi and Satoko are color-blind. Satoshi is referred to by Satoko as Nii-Nii, a childish form of the Japanese word ani (兄, ani meaning older brother).

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Teppei Houjou
about:
Teppei is Satoko and Satoshi's uncle/foster father. He and his wife were forced to take care of Satoko and Satoshi after the death of their parents, but they abused them. He currently lives in Okinomiya. According to Kasai, he is a pimp and uses his lover Rina to swindle men out of their money.
 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kyousuke Irie
about:
Age: Late 20s to early 30s
Birthday: December 3

Kyosuke is the head doctor of the village clinic. 

Despite his young age and the fact that he has a severe maid fetish, he is highly respected in the community. 

He cheerfully makes house calls and seems to truly care about everyone's health. 

He has (half-jokingly) admitted that he wishes to marry Satoko when she is older, but is not above chasing after Rika when she is wearing one of the uniforms from the restaurant Angel Mort. 

In addition, he is the manager of the village's baseball little league team, the Hinamizawa Fighters.

name: Tatsuyoshi Kasai
about:
Height: 244 cm (8'0'')

Tatsuyoshi is an employee of the Sonozaki family, who looks like a secret agent. He was more active in the past, but has settled down to become Shion's caretaker. 

He somehow knows both Teppei and Rina, and is aware of their lifestyles and badgering tactics. 

In Matsuribayashi-hen, he displays extreme strength and combat experience while raiding the Irie Clinic, frequently subduing members of the Yamainu.

name: Katsuya Kumagai
about: A detective in the Okinomiya police station and Kuraudo Ooishi's subordinate.

name: Aiko Maebara
about:
Maebara Aiko is a character in the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni series, and Maebara Keiichi's mother. She first appears in Onikakushi-hen along with her husband, Maebara Ichirou. She's rarely seen in the anime, but she appears various times throughout the manga adaptations. In the anime, it is a recurring habit that her face is not fully shown.

In Tatarigoroshi-hen, it's revealed by Keiichi that she's very fond of detective novels and reads all kind of crime novels of different writers all over the world (including books by Agatha Christie like And Then There Were None and Murder on the Orient Express). She also wrote a crime novel once and contributed to a crime novel contest. She easily reveals the trick of the perfect crime to Keiichi (not let the "introduction" begin) which helps him to murder Houjou Teppei. As it is told by Ooishi, she graduated in a "humble women's university".

(Source: Higurashi Wiki)

name: Rina Mamiya
about: Rina is a woman who appears in Rena's life in the story Tsumihoroboshi-hen. She is the lover of Teppei Houjou, and together they swindle men out of their money through intimidation and blackmail schemes.

name: Tetsuro Okonogi
about:
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni:


Umineko no Naku Koro ni:
He is the president of a company who has ties with Rudolf's and Hideyoshi's companies. Ange goes to question him about everything he knows of the Rokkenjima murders, despite suspecting that he may betray her. Although he had been hired by the Sumadera family to stall Ange and allow them to take control of her wealth, he proves himself to be Ange's fundamental ally in the end and allows her to escape, hiring Amakusa to protect her. He influences Ange greatly in her battle against Beatrice, particularly his belief that truth can only be obtained through love.

name: Kuraudo Ooishi
about:
Age: Around 55 (the average retirement age in Japan)
Birthday: November 15

Kuraudo Oishi is a veteran police investigator at Okinomiya who has vowed to solve the mystery of the Hinamizawa murders before his retirement, due to personal reasons. Due to his uncouth tactics and the lengths that he goes to in order to solve the mystery, he is looked upon as a nuisance by the villagers. He approaches one of the main characters to become his informant in several arcs, and is sometimes unwittingly responsible for triggering their paranoia. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Akane Sonozaki
about: Daughter to Oryo and mother to the Sonozaki sisters, she leads the Sonozaki family despite being disinherited for marrying an outsider.

name: Oryou Sonozaki
about: Oryou is the grandmother of Mion and Shion as well as the current head of the Sonozaki family. Although usually harsh and vulgar during her dealings with people, she has a bit of a softer side that she rarely lets out.

name: Miyo Takano
about:
Age: Mid 30s
Birthday: June 20

Miyo is a nurse at the village clinic who has a keen interest in Hinamizawa's past and culture, recording all her speculation in notebooks. At times, her storytelling can be very mysterious and chilling—she seems to enjoy putting people on edge.

name: Jirou Tomitake
about:
Age: Late 30s
Birthday: September 14

A photographer who frequently visits the village of Hinamizawa (especially during the Watangashi Festival). 


Not much else is known about his personality.

name: Eua
about:
Eua is a powerful, supernatural being either living in or visiting the kakera world. Her powers are similar to but far stronger than Hanyū's. Just like Hanyū, she can rewind time and grant people the ability to "loop" via the endless number of kakera, but unlike her, Eua can also grant people the ability to retain their complete memories of previous loops. However, she says this ability can only be activated through the person dying, which implies that she not an omnipotent being, unless she was lying and just enjoys attaching that condition.

(Source: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Wiki)

name: Hanyuu
about:
Birthday: August 1

Hanyuu is the mysterious "transfer student" in Matsuribayashi-hen. She has a pair of dark colored horns on her head, one of which is chipped slightly (however, no one seems to notice or mention them, with the exception of Takano, who calls her a "monster"). 

In fact, she has appeared to Rika all her life, but only in Matsuribayashi-hen and Miotsukushi-hen did she gain the power to interact with others, posing as a distant relative of Rika's and given the name "Hanyuu Furude." Like many of the characters, she can be frightening when angered, and with her spirit-like nature, her appearance can change with her mood until she takes a physical form.

She is very meek and often makes the noise "Au au, au au…" when she is nervous or uncomfortable, or sometimes while trying to make a point. She also tends to end her sentences with nano desu (なのです?, lit. "it is so"). 

She dislikes alcohol and kimchi, which Rika imbibes in large amounts as punishment when she finds Hanyuu annoying (as both Hanyuu's and Rika's senses are linked together). She mentions that she is a "being above humans" after being sacrificed to atone for the sin of humans, while both Rika and Takano describe her as a kind of deity. 

Rika refers to her as "Oyashiro" when talking with others (evident from Shion's chat with Rika in Meakashi-hen) but does not personally think of her as Oyashiro; instead, she sees her as a close friend. 

In Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei, Hanyuu tells Rika that she was sacrificed to atone for the sins of the people of the village, and Hanyuu asked Ōka Furude (Hanyuu's own daughter and Rika's ancestor) to kill her and then make the village a better place.

name: Yukikazu Kameda
about:
He's an ace pitcher who belongs to the baseball team of a high school in the prefecture.

His fastball is one of the best in the country, and he is playing a big role in the Koshien Tournament.

(Source: 07th Expansion Wiki)

name: Nomura
about:
Nomura is "helping" Takano in her plan. Once things go bad for Takano,  Nomura mocks her and takes the advantage of the situation.

Nomura is a mysterious woman who represents "Tokyo"; an organization plotting the whole  massacre of Hinamizawa. "Tokyo" members consist of very powerful figures such as governmental and political people. Within this organization, there are three main members who investigate directly in Hinamizawa: Kyousuke Irie, Miyo Takano, and Jirou Tomitake. "Tokyo" has control over a large group of soldiers, known as the Yamainu, whom they lend to Takano.

name: Frederica Bernkastel
nicknames: Bern|Witch of Miracles|Witch of the Fragments|Witch of the Senate
about:
Age: 1000+
Birthday: August 21
Likes: Dried plum black tea, getemono, spicy things
Dislikes: Boredom, 
Famous quote: "When they're alive, you can enjoy watching them struggle. When they're dead, you can enjoy tearing out their guts. Tales are things you get to enjoy twice."

Frederica Bernkastel is known as the Witch of Miracles. It is said that she resides in a world where concepts such as fate and probability can be visualized. Despite this, she has a pretty twisted personality and described herself as the "cruelest witch in the world."

Unlike other witches she has lifeless eyes. She appears to see Beatrice's game to solve her boredom, and unable to stand seeing the player getting tortured by Beatrice's game, she assists the player by giving some hints around the workings of the game. Her "Magic of Miracles" allows her to reset a desperate situation as long as the probability of a favorable situation is not equal to zero (Similar to Hanyuu's power to reset time).

She wants to defeat Beatrice, regardless of the means used for this objective. Throughout Umineko no Naku Koro ni, she maintains an icy and aloof calm in most situations, though by the end of Alliance of the Golden Witch and throughout Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru, she is shown to be just as impish and playfully cruel as Lambdadelta.


(Source: 07th Expansion)

name: Mother Furude
about: Rika's mother.

name: Ouka Furude
about:
Furude Ouka is the daughter of Hanyuu and Furude Riku. Though reluctant, she is the one who performed the Watanagashi ceremony on Hanyuu because Hanyuu felt that if she died, Hinamizawa would calm. She also left the chip on Hanyuu's horn when she tried to kill her. Ouka is the one who most likely started the tale of Oyashiro-sama's curse, possibly to scare the people in revenge for her mother's death.

Rika is the reincarnation of Ouka, which explains why she can only see Hanyuu. The two also look very similar, except with different hair color.

(Source: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni Wikia)

name: Terakomari Gandesblood
name_kanji: テラコマリ・ガンデスブラッド
about:
Birthday: February 18

Terakomari is a shut-in vampire and the main character of this story. She is the second born daughter of the prestigious and powerful Gandesblood family. After living as a shut-in for three years, she was appointed by the Empress to be a the new commander of the Mulnite Imperial Army's 7th Unit of ruffians and criminals. Due to her inability to consume blood, she is left powerless and must hide this fact from her unit to prevent them from rebelling against her.

name: Karen Helvetius
name_kanji: カレン・エルヴェシアス
about:
Empress of the Mulnite Empire.

Hard to read and wanton in nature, she appoints the reclusive Komari as a Crimson Lord. She is very friendly with Komari and seems to like her rather a lot, apparently having gone so far as giving her a kiss while she was sleeping.

(Source: Official website)

name: Villhaze
about: Terakomari's maid. She loves Terakomari so much that she sleeps with her in her bed without permission.

name: Millicent Bluenight
name_kanji: ミリセント・ ブルーナイト

name: Belius Innu Cerberus
name_kanji: ベリウス・イッヌ・ ケルベロ

name: Chaostel Conte
name_kanji: カオステル・ コント

name: Yurin Gandesblood
name_kanji: ユーリン・ガンデスブラッド
about: Terakomari's mother.

name: Johan Helders
name_kanji: ヨハン・ ヘルダース

name: Prohelia Zutazutasuki
name_kanji: プロヘリヤ・ズタズタスキー
about: She's an homage to Tanya von Degurechaff from Youjou Senki. Psycho loli in military gear that flies around with a giant magical sniper rifle. They arrive in the same pose and even have the same voice actress.

name: Taihei Doma
about:
Age: 26
Occupation: Systems Support Worker

Taihei Doma is Umaru's older brother; he has an office job and also does the cooking and cleaning at his apartment which he shares with Umaru. He is also a perfect student (in his past) and the top of the top of onii-chan.

name: Umaru Doma
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: September 26
Blood Type: AB

Umaru is the perfect high school girl who is regarded for her looks, personality, grades, and just about everything; however, when she is at home with her older brother, she dons a hood and acts as a lazy shut-in who loves playing video games, eating junk food, looking at manga/anime, and buying stuff online.

name: Nana Ebina
about: Ebina is Umaru's best friend and classmate; she lives in the same apartment complex as the Domas. She is very shy and self-conscious, especially around Umaru's brother.

name: Nene Ebina
about: Nana's Mother.

name: Kanau Kongou
about: The manager and childhood friend of Taihei and Takeshi. She seems to have a crush on Taihei.

name: Takeshi Motoba
about: Taihei's childhood friend and co-worker. He is also Kirie's elder brother. He is often abused a lot by her.

name: Kirie Motoba
about:
Birthday: March 15

Kirie is a classmate of Umaru and Ebina, who sometimes has a scary appearance. She initially follows Umaru home after she finds her student ID. When she encounters Umaru in her "indoor" form, she is led to believe that she is meeting Umaru's little sister Komaru, and finds her so cute that she wants to serve her and call her Master. She also admires Umaru in her perfect form that she considers Ebina-chan a rival.

name: Sylphinford Tachibana
name_kanji: 橘・シルフィンフォード
about:
Birthday: June 13
Age: 16
Occupation: High School Student
Gender: Female
Hair: Sky Blue
Eyes: Blue

Sylphinford Tachibana is a classmate of Umaru's and her self-proclaimed rival. She even stated that her life's goal is to beat Umaru no matter what it costs. Sylphin is most likely to appear right after a test or midterm has ended to see if she has "beaten" Umaru. This isn't always the case though, Sylphin appears in any competition there is and will definitely appear if Umaru is involved in it. One example is during gym class in which she challenged Umaru to a tennis match in order to finally beat Umaru at something.

name: Alex Tachibana
about: Colleague of Umaru's brother, Taihei Doma, and the elder brother of Tachibana Sylphinford. He also has relatives in Europe, as early on in the series he made a gift of a nodding cat figurine to Taihei Doma from that continent. He is mentioned to show an interest in anime and gaming, and is implied to have interested his younger sister in the two as a result.

name: Kouichirou Ebina
about: A chef and the older brother of Ebina.

name: Hikari Kongou
about:
A shy but incredibly intelligent high school student in the Gifted Youth program and Kanau's younger sister. She calls Taihei her big brother despite them having no family relationship and sometimes visits his and Umaru's apartment for food.



(Source: Wikipedia (edited/expanded))

name: Miki Tachibana
about: Mother of Alex and Sylphin.

name: Chiaki Hagino
about: The landlord of Hitotose Manor, where Hinako lives. Mayuki's classmate and a former member of the Fujimiya High School theatrical club. She's usually quiet but completely changes when she gets on the stage.

name: Mayuki Hiiragi
about: A girl in the year above Hinako. She works at a cafe and is always wearing a maid outfit. She might be small, but she does her best.

name: Yua Nakajima
about:
A tall female teenager with long purple hair and is scared of dark. "Helps" Hinako when she was asked by their teachers.

Sakuragi Hinako's classmate and later her friend. She disliked Hinako because of her lack of confidence when talking to other people and when being in a crowd. But got along together and became friends in later episodes.

Strongly loves Hagino Chiaki and often times wants recognize her abilities unlike Hinako.

name: Kuina Natsukawa
about: Hinako's classmate. She ends up eating her favourite books without realising what she's doing. An absent-minded beauty.

name: Hinako Sakuragi
about:
Birthday : April 30
Height: 160 cm
Weight : 52 kg
Blood Type : A


The protagonist. She's bad at dealing with other people but animals love her, so she used to work as a scarecrow in the countryside. She goes to Tokyo to enter a high-school theatrical club.

name: Ruriko Kuroyanagi
about:
Age: 9

Ruriko Kuroyanagi is a sophisticated young actress and the advisor of the theater club.

Despite her age, Ruriko has a mature attitude, calm personality, and a well-endowed body with huge natural breasts. In addition to her regular dresses, she is also often seen wearing animal pajamas or just a bathrobe.

name: Uncle
about:
A farmer.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Bocchi Hitori
about: Bocchi is a character who suffers from severe social anxiety and is unable to make very many friends because of it. After leaving behind her one friend, Kai, she is prompted with the challenge of making friends with everyone in her new class, so that she and Kai can be reunited and be considered friends once again. She is very shy and is overall quite incompetent and timid. Her name means "alone", which describes her status at the beginning of the show.

name: Aru Honshou
about: Aru Honshou is the vice class representative of Bocchi's class. Her name means "has a true nature" (implying that she is hiding it). She tries to keep a high profile noteworthy of a classroom president by acting confident, mature and competent, but is actually forgetful, clumsy, and a loser.

name: Sotoka Rakita
about: She is obsessed with ninjas. Her hobby is making origami shurikens. She is a foreign student who is described as having perfect features. The Japanese reading of her name means "comes from outside" (soto ka|ra kita).

name: Nako Sunao
about: Nako Sunao is the first person that Bocchi befriends in her classroom. She is frank, direct and often uses inpolite language. Her name means "honest, direct child."

name: Kako Kurai
about: Kako Kurai is Bocchi's rival. She believes she can become strong by not relying on or having friends.

name: Teruyo Oshie
about: Oshie Teruyo is the teacher of Bocchi's class.

name: Kai Yawara
about: She is Bocchi's only friend from elementary school. She breaks ties with Bocchi until she befriend everyone in her classroom. Her name literally means "soft" or "subtle".

name: Kyouko Hori
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: March 25
Height: 163 cm
Weight: 48 kg
Specialty: household chores and studying
School notes: above 90 in almost all exams
Dislikes: stew, blueberries

Hori has a slim figure and has long brown hair. When she is out of school, she dresses casually and ties her hair up in a bun.

Hori is a very energetic person. She is popular and always creates a happy atmosphere around herself. She is a very hardworking person, and even though she has chores around her house to do, she does well in school and scores over 90 in exams.

Her parents are always busy, so in order to take care of her brother, she has to return straight home after school every day and take care of the house.

She's the kind of girl who does not want to show to others her vulnerable side. So sometimes she just does not express her feelings and suffers alone.

She thinks of Miyamura as a very good friend, always helping her and going over to her house to help take care of her brother Souta.

name: Izumi Miyamura
about:
Birthday: April 17, 1999
Height: 169 cm
Weight: <48 kg
Number of piercings: 9 (4 for each ear and 1 on the lip)
Parents: Miyamura, Naozumi (father) and Miyamura, Iori (mother)

In school, he gives off an impression of a quiet, anti-social guy. Usually assumed to be an otaku with good studying capabilities, Miyamura is soon to be viewed as a good friend to both Kyouko and her closest friends. Despite the weather, Miyamura tries to cover up as much as possible in order to hide his tattoos and leaves his long hair loose to cover up his piercings. This image briefly changes once he leaves school, particularly at Kyouko's house. Once he is outside of school, he removes his blazer and necktie and wears his hair up which visibly shows his multiple ear piercings. He also enjoys getting lattes from Starbucks and does not mind wearing short sleeves that show off part of his tattoos. Unlike most characters that wear glasses, Miyamura does very poorly in his studies, only managing to score full marks in P.E and average (or below) in all other classes. Although usually having trouble pronouncing certain Japanese words, he is very good at tongue twisters.

(Source: Horimiya Wiki)

name: Remi Ayasaki
about:
Birthday: 6th June
Height: 158cm

She is like a mascot for the student council and does almost no work. She's also Sengoku Kakeru's girlfriend.

name: Yuriko Hori
about: The mother of Kyouko and Souta. She is very supportive of Hori and Miyamura relationship to the point of prioritizing Miyamura over her husband.

name: Kyousuke Hori
about: Kyousuke is Kyouko's father who is often not home because of work. He is very supportive of Hori and Miyamura being in a relationship to the point of trying to pick out baby names for them.

name: Souta Hori
about:
Kyouko's young brother.

He sees Kyouko as a motherly figure because she has been the one taking care of him since he was born because of the nature of their parents' work.

In the beginning of the story, he is brought back to the Hori household by Izumi after he had fallen down on the street. Since then he has been very affectionate towards Izumi, going as far as calling him a non blood-related brother.

name: Chika Ichijou
about:
Birthday: 26th September
Height: 154cm

name: Tooru Ishikawa
about:
Age: 18
Height: 174 cm
Birthday: October 1

He is a close friend of Izumi Miyamura and is known to have a crush on Kyouko Hori. He attends Katagiri Senior High School. 

At first, he dislikes Miyamura due to his close relationship with Hori. He confessed to her and was immediately rejected.

In time he became a great friend of Miyamura.

name: Shuu Iura
about:
Birthday: February 7, 1999
Height: 172cm
Younger Sister: Motoko Iura
Host of: "Let's try asking Iura-kun!"

 Shuu is a friend of Izumi Miyamura and everyone else he attends the same high school with. He has his own way of thinking and always seems excited. Shuu is energetic, outgoing, and often annoying. He is a colleague from the rest of the main characters. He is much more subdued with his younger sister, Motoko, but still cares about her deeply. Shuu often gives out CDs to his friends to listen to music and enjoys music a lot.

name: Motoko Iura
about:
Birthday: May 14
Height: 150 cm

Shu's younger sister.

name: Sakura Kouno
about:
Age: 18
Height: 163 cm
Birthday: 20th January

She is the vice-president of the student council. She is very competent and often does support work. She is good at cooking and making cookies.

name: Iori Miyamura
about: She is the mother of Izumi.

name: Daiki Mizouchi
about:
Birthday: 24th August
Height: 176cm

name: Yuuna Okuyama
about: Yunna is a classmate of Souta. She bullies him but actually really likes him.

name: Honoka Sawada

Miyamura's neighbor and kouhai.

 

(Source: Horimiya Wiki)

name: Kakeru Sengoku

Birthday: 9th May
Height: 170cm

He is the president of the student council of Katagiri. He is very smart and the best student in the series and is also a childhood friend of Hori. He used to be bullied by Hori.

name: Kouichi Shindou

Age: 18

Miyamura's best friend from middle school and one of the only people who can make Miyamura easily get mad.

Izumi's former bully from junior high.

about:
Birthday: December 28
Height: 168cm

Yanagi is a student from the neighboring class who is in love with Yuki. Aside his good looks and gentlemanly personality, he has poor vision and constantly breaks his glasses or loses his contact lenses.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kayo Yashiro
about:
Height: 176 cm

Caretaker of the Ishikawa household.

name: Shin Yasuda
about: The English teacher and Student Council Supervisor at Katagiri High. Is often ridiculed by both other faculty and male students for wanting a relationship with female students and being a general creep. Despite this, seems to be on pretty friendly terms with his male students.

name: Yuki Yoshikawa
about:
Age: 17
Height: 161 cm
Birthday: July 22

She is a classmate and good friend of Hori. She has the habit of always managing to copy the homework off Hori. She has the tendency to hide her real feelings from people.

name: Takeru Sengoku
about: Kakeru's father who attended high school with Kyouko's parents. He was also student council president like his son.

name: Seita
about:
A 14-year-old boy. Seita is responsible, mature, and tough. Since his dad is away fighting in the war, he is responsible for all the jobs his father would normally take, including caring for his younger sister, Setsuko. Seita's main fault is his pride, which can cause him to make wrong decisions.

(Source: Online Ghibli)

name: Setsuko
about:
A 4-year-old girl. Setsuko completely adores her older brother Seita. She is innocent and cheerful, and at times naïve to the terrors of war around her.

(Source: Online Ghibli)

name: Aunt
about:
Aunt of Setsuko and Seita,
She is hard and rather distant with her sister-in-law's children.

name: Farmer
about: An old farmer who accepted to offer a time his help to Seita and Setsuko.

name: Mrs. Yokokawa
about:
She is first seen tying a hood on Setsuko, telling her to be a good girl and to listen to her brother as the family prepares for the bombing. She then states that she best start for the shelter, and for them to meet her there as soon as possible. Seita asks her if she has her heart medicine with her, and she says yes and motions to her bag, telling him not to worry. She then leaves.

When Seita and Setsuko arrive at the shelter, Seita is told his mother had been badly injured. He rushes to see her and finds her asleep on a bed, heavily bandaged, bloody, and burned. Horrified, Seita painfully states that his mother has heart trouble and asks if she can have her medicine. The man there states he will find out. When he leaves, Seita tries to communicate with her, but is greeted with only soft breathing.
When Seita returns to Setsuko, he tells her that she is hurt and in the hospital, but will get better soon, afraid to tell his little sister the truth.

Seita's mother's dead body is then seen being put into a truck as flies and maggots move about her, while a man states that she is not unbandaged because her body is too gruesome to see; another man states that she must go on the truck that day with the heat they are having. Seita watches them carry her away. She is then cremated in a huge fire with many other bodies.

(Source: Hotaru no Haka Wiki)

name: Natsumi Hodaka
about:
Natsumi is Hina's childhood friend who she used to play with when she visited her grandfather in the summers. Initially Hina didn't recognize her but she plays a big part in keeping her in the club because she is someone she knows. 

Natsumi seems like she is just a tomboy but she isn't, she in actuality is very good student much to Hina's surprise and very supportive of Hina's growth as a fan of fishing.

name: Yuuki Kuroiwa
about: President of the Breakwater Club. She seems very aloof and sometimes lazy, but in actuality knows a lot about fishing.

name: Makoto Oono
about:
Referred to a Oono-senpai by Hina and Natsumi, she is the #2 at the breakwater club. Oono is by far the most reliable person at the club and almost acts like a mom to all of the members. She is the daughter of a fisherman so she is very knowledgeable about fish, cleaning and preparing them. She acts as the de-facto club chef.

She also is afraid of the water due to the fact that she cannot swim and wears a life jacket at all times. This doesn't deter her from fishing or enjoying the club. The President has said that Oono would make perfect wife someday, which makes her blush.

name: Hina Tsurugi
about:
Main character, moved to the seaside town where her grandfather lived and originally wanted to join the arts and crafts club due to her passion for all things associated with it. While exploring runs into Yuuki thinking she needs to be rescued but instead gets being roped into joining the Breakwater Club.

Initially has very little interest in fishing, it slowly develops as she integrates herself into the club discovering the same love of fishing all the other members have but is very squeamish about killing or cleaning what she catches which turns into a running gag.

name: Sayaka Kotani
about: Sayaka is both Umino Senior High School's infirmary nurse, and advisor to the Embankment Club. Despite being somewhere in her late 20s, she has the alcoholic tendencies of an old man.

name: Eru Chitanda
about:
Name: Chitanda Eru
Age: 16
Height: 160cm (5'3")
Weight: 54kg
Hair color: black
Eye color: purple

Chitanda is a calm and happy person, but can become very excited when new or interesting things happen, especially when it involves her club. She is described as a beautiful 16-year-old girl with long black hair and purple eyes. She usually sports a cheerful expression and is usually seen in her uniform.

She is the single daughter of the Chitanda Family, one of the four remaining wealthy farming families of the area, according to Satoshi. She joined the Classics Club due to "personal reasons," and is the president of the club due to it not retaining any members from the previous year. She likes mysteries and has a great curiosity, which often drags Houtarou into solving them. She often expresses her curiosity with the phrase "Watashi kininarimasu!" which is often translated as "I'm curious!"

name: Satoshi Fukube
about:
Age: 15-16
Height: 163 cm
Weight: 57 kg
Motto: "A database can't draw conclusions."

Satoshi went to the same middle school as Houtarou and Mayaka. He knows a lot of things, but most of all are trivial ones. He's really cheerful and a great match to befriend the apathetic Houtarou. He is really active, already being a part of the Student Council and Handicraft Club before joining the Classics Club. He is the "database" of the club and has a very good memory.

name: Mayaka Ibara
about:
Name: Ibara, Mayaka
Age: 15-16
Height: 148 cm
Weight: 48 kg
Hair color: brown
Eye color: pink

Mayaka is strict with others and herself. She is short and has brown hair that extends just past her ears and pinkish-purple eyes.

She has been in the same class with Houtarou for nine years, since their first grade in elementary school. She has an interest in Fukube, which is what leads her to join the classic literature club. She is also a member of Library and Manga Society. She has a blunt and frank personality, and she usually makes nicknames for some of her friends (i.e: Fuku-chan, Chi-chan).

Her favorite manga is "A Corpse by Evening," which was made by other students for a previous Kenya Fest. Mayaka is also drawing one of her own manga.

name: Houtarou Oreki
about:
Age: 15-16
Birthday: April 28
Height: 172 cm
Weight: 62 kg
Hair color: brown
Eye color: green
Relatives: Oreki Tomoe (sister) 
Personality: Quiet, laid-back, lazy 
Motto: "If I don't have to do it, I won't. If I have to do it, I'll make it quick."

Oreki is a high-schooler with messy brown hair and green eyes. Due to his very lazy lifestyle, he almost always has a tired or bored look on his face. His hair is especially very messy when he wakes up.

He is shown to be a quiet student, and never concerned about things that happen around him. Despite being shown as an average high school student, he is quite intelligent and perceptive. The reason for his usual laziness is because he wishes to "save energy." Even though he is shown to be quite lazy, he never leaves his homework undone, as pointed out by Satoshi. He's considered lazy and apathetic, always living on the "gray" side, and is not interested in any activities that might waste his time and energy. He actually never intended to join any club, but his sister ordered him to join the Classics Club to save it from being disbanded. Even though he might not seem it, he's unbelievably good at solving mysteries and seems to be able to always find a solution if he gives it a thought. He has a habit of holding his bangs whenever he's thinking about a mystery.

name: Cooking Research Society President
about: Appears in episode 14.

name: Kurako Eba
about: A close friend of Hongou's. She seems shy and reserved, and also describes Hongou as "diligent, careful, has a strong sense of responsibility, ridiculously kind, and easily moved."

name: Naoki Gotou
about: Appears in episode 13.

name: Henmi
about: Manga Society member

name: Iizuka
