Blood type: O
Hair color: black
Eye color: black
Family: father, mother, 3 older brothers
Attends: Chidori Metropolitan High class 2-1
Hobbies: snowboarding
Likes: Sour things

Another friend and classmate of Rintarou's who is shown to be good-natured, friendly and insightful, though he sometimes pokes fun at others. However, when his friends get ridiculed and hurt, he does not hold back in taking action towards those who hurt his friends, showing a proficiency in self-defense; despite this skill, he makes an effort to avoid resorting to violence.

(Source: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku Wiki, Wikipedia)

name: Madoka Yuzuhara
name_kanji: 柚原 円蚊 / 柚原 まどか
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: June 11
Zodiac: Gemini
Height: 158 cm (5' 2")
Blood type: O
Hair color: medium brown
Eye color: Green
Family: Father, Mother, Older Brother
Attends: Kikyo Girls High School Class 2-A
Hobbies: All kinds of games
Likes: Salty candy, Red bean jelly

Madoka is an average sized student standing taller than Kaoruko. She wears her hair in braids similar to pigtails and wears a pair of glasses.

Another friend and classmate of Kaoruko's who does not harbor ill sentiments towards the students of Chidori Public High unlike her fellow schoolmates, being indifferent with the rivalry between each school.

(Source: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku Wiki, Wikipedia)

name: Yuuki Izumi
about: Izumi is one of the main characters in the series and also Shikimori's boyfriend who accompanies her. He is cheerful and full of spirit, he is also the type of person who really values his friends.

name: Miyako Shikimori
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: October 25
Height: 162 cm
Eye Color: Blue
Hair Color Pink

Shikimori is a confident, caring, faithful, and athletic person. She is shown to be very competitive and hates to lose. Her cool side, which is intimidating and amazing at the same time, is shown when she is competing or protecting her Izumi from his bad luck.

Shikimori is a good student, having placed 11th in her class. She has a few weaknesses such as cooking and singing.

name: Yui Hachimitsu
about:
She is one of Shikimori's best friends along with Nekozaki. She's described as having a lifeless expression, but is observant. She is petite compared to her friends, and prefers indoor activities like Izumi. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Shuu Inuzuka
about:
Izumi's best friend. He is described as "true to himself, likes to goof around, but doesn't like slacking off." Shikimori's friends call him "Inu" ("Dog"). He has a part-time job.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)

name: Akisada Izumi
about:
Izumi's father and Motoko's husband. He is fairly strong as he is able to carry Izumi and Shikimori on his back.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Motoko Izumi
about: Izumi Yuu's mother. She is as accident prone as Izumi.

name: Ai Kamiya
about:
A star player on the volleyball team. She is tall and slim, and very popular at school. She and Izumi work on the library committee together. 



(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kyou Nekozaki
about:
She is one of Shikimori's best friends alongside Hachimitsu. She's described as "sporty", "really outgoing but can get a little sappy". She is on the volleyball team with Kamiya.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Fuji Shikimori
about:
Shikimori's brother.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Miyabi Shikimori
about:
Shikimori's mother. Like her daughter, she gives off a serious look.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mizuha Kiryuu
about:
Birthday: March 3

Mizuha Kiryuu is Keiki's younger sister. She is very close to her brother and frequently "flirts" with him, ranging from pampering to sneaking into bed with him.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Keiki Kiryuu
about:
Birthday: October 11

Keiki is a second-year high school student, library helper and member of the calligraphy club. After cleaning up the club room he found a love letter left for him along with a pair of panties, and is now trying to track down the "Cinderella" who left these items for him.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yuika Koga
about: Yuika is a first-year student and assistant librarian with Keiki. She is one-quarter Caucasian, has blonde hair and blue eyes, and is initially shy and stand-offish, but warms up to Keiki's persistent attempts to get to know her. She's secretly a sadist who wishes to make Keiki her slave. She found out about Sayuki's fetish the first time they met and has been fighting to "protect" Keiki from the "Witch's" clutches.

name: Mao Nanjou
about: Keiki's classmate and dear friend. She frequently hangs out with him and Shoma. She's secretly a fujoshi who constantly fantasizes about Keiki and Shoma in homoerotic situations, which she writes and illustrates in a published series. She begs Keiki to become an actual couple with Shoma to help fuel her fantasies and aid her in her work.

name: Sayuki Tokihara
about:
Height: 172cm (5'8")
Weight: 55kg

Sayuki is a third-year student and president of the calligraphy club. She is a masochist who longs to be Keiki's "pet." She repeatedly uses hidden cameras to gain material with which to blackmail him into satisfying her fetish. She's known about Yuika's fetish from the first time they met and immediately became fierce rivals, constantly fighting for his attention.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Shouma Akiyama
about: Keiki's best friend. Though popular he's a confirmed lolicon. He regularly acts as a confidant for Keiki, helping him to figure out who the "Cinderella" may have been.

name: Ayano Fujimoto
about: She is a second year and is the student council vice president. Although at first she appears to have feelings for Keiki, she actually has a boys smell fetish, although Keiki's smell is her favourite.

name: Koharu Ootori
about: Koharu is a third-year from the Astronomy club. She's a stalker who engages in constant voyeurism. She is extremely tiny, resembling a small child. She's in love with Keiki's lolicon friend Shoma, but worries that despite her "loli" appearance he'd still refuse to date her on account of her being older than him. She thus uses secretly-taken photos to try and blackmail Keiki into helping her.

name: Vegetarian's Owner
name_kanji: ベジタリアンの飼い主

name: Suletta Mercury
name_kanji: スレッタ・マーキュリー
about:
A second-year student in the piloting department, who transferred to the school from Mercury. Suletta is timid and somewhat lacks communication skills.

She is the pilot of the Gundam Aerial developed on Mercury.





(Source: Official Site)

name: Miorine Rembran
name_kanji: ミオリネ・レンブラン
about:
An attractive and academically distinguished second-year student in the management strategy department. Miorine is the only daughter of Delling Rembran, the president of the Beneritt Group and chairman of the school's board.

She has a strong rebellious feeling toward her father.

(Source: Official Site, edited)

name: Elan Ceres
about:
Mobile Suit: Gundam Pharact
Affiliation: Peil House

The top pilot backed by Peil Technologies, one of the group's three branches. A third-year student in the piloting department. Elan is a taciturn and solitary person, who doesn't open his heart to anyone in school. He has an interest to Suletta.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Secelia Dote
about:
Secelia Dote, is a character in Mobile Suit Gundam the Witch from Mercury. She is a second-year student at Asticassia School of Technology in the management strategy department, who belongs to Burion House.

Secelia is a member of the Dueling Committee who known for making sarcastic and snide remarks to other students. She enjoys getting a rise out of others and flaunting her position on the Committee, and she holds very little respect for others she views as beneath her. She also revels in gossiping and learning about other people's failings and secrets, which she even uses as leverage to blackmail others into doing her bidding.

While she mostly follows gossip for her own amusement, she is observant about the broader mechanics and political stakes surrounding the school and larger conflicts. She is also willing to offer genuine personal advice to others on rare occasions.

name: Norea Du Noc
about:
A pilot of the Gundam Lfrith Thorn from the anti-Spacian organization "Dawn of Fold". Contrary to her calm expression, she has a strong resentment towards Spacians and a pessimistic view of the world.

(Source: Official site)

name: Sabina Fardin
name_kanji: サビーナ・ファルディン

name: Haro
about: Haro is a small sphere-like robot. Haro has appeared in multiple Gundam stories throughout the years, starting in the original series as Amuro and later Fraw Bow's sidekick, and Haro has maintained both the role of sidekick/support character as well as the status of Gundam mascot ever since.

name: Guel Jeturk
about:
Mobile Suit: Guel's Dilanza
Affiliation: Jeturk House

An heir to Jeturk Heavy Machinery, one of the group's three branches, and a third-year student in the piloting department. Guel has a rough temperament and is quick to anger. As the ace pilot of Jeturk House, he has absolute confidence in his own skills.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Lilique Kadoka Lipati
name_kanji: リリッケ・カドカ・リパティ

name: Aliya Mahvash
name_kanji: アリヤ・マフヴァーシュ

name: Prospera Mercury
name_kanji: プロスペラ・マーキュリー
about: CEO of Shin Sei Development Corporation, which created the Gundam Aerial.

name: Nika Nanaura
about:
A second-year student in the mechanical department, who belongs to Earth House. She loves mecha, and is very curious about Suletta's Gundam Aerial. Nika has outstanding maintenance skills, and is proud of herself for customizing Chuchu's Demi Trainer.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Chuatury Panlunch
name_kanji: チュアチュリー・パンランチ
about:
A first-year student in the piloting department, who belongs to Earth House. She is nicknamed "Chuchu." She hates the Spacians who discriminate against Earthians, and often gets into fights. Chuchu pilots a unique restored older-generation Demi Trainer.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Delling Rembran
name_kanji: デリング・レンブラン
about:
The president of the Benerit Group, and supervising representative of the auditing organization Cathedra. With his stern and cool-headed attitude, he leads a multitude of affiliate companies. He also shows cruel severity to his daughter Miorine.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Martin Upmont
name_kanji: マルタン・アップモント

name: Shaddiq Zenelli
about:
Mobile Suit: Michaelis
Affiliation: Grassley House

An adopted child of the CEO of Grassley Defense Systems, one of the group's three branches. A third-year student in the piloting department who leads Grassley House. Although still a student Shaddiq has shown his skill in business too, he is a candidate for next generation executive.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Agiri Goshiki
about: A laid-back ninja belonging to the same organization as Sonya. Though she has few appearances, she brings humor with her.

name: Yasuna Oribe
about: The "partner" of Sonya, though most of the time she messes up Sonya's plans. She is easygoing, annoying, childish, naive, and quite unreliable. On the other hand, Yasuna is also a nice and energetic person who loves to mess things up and try new things for sake of fun and love for life.

name: Sonya
about: Sonya is an assassin undercover as a student. She is always on guard against enemies to the point of being paranoid and even harming others if she's startled. Although highly skilled in combat she's still a scaredy-cat, mostly towards ghosts. She frequently argues with Oribe when she gets her ideas.

name: Extra Boys
about: Cho voices all the boys in the anime.

name: Extra Girls
about: Arai Satomi voices every girl other than the main heroines.

name: Little Girl
about:
A little girl whose balloon is stuck in a tree, and Yasuna tries to get it down,but Yasuna uses a stick which makes it float up and away. Then the little girl reveals that it wasn't her balloon, because she was just watching it get stuck. 

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Unused Character
about: A redheaded, green-eyed character with no name who was supposed to be part of the main cast, but was dropped as Yasuna had supposedly taken on all her personality traits. She has since vowed revenge against Yasuna and Sonya.

name: Zenitsu Agatsuma
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: September 3
Height: 164.5 cm
Weight: 58 kg

Zenitsu Agatsuma is a member of the Demon Killing Corps and a traveling companion of Kamado Tanjirou.

Zenitsu has fair skin and downward-sloped, scared-looking eyes that fade from soft brown to gold. He has short, yellow hair of varying lengths, cutting off squarely at the ends where it fades to a darker orange color, that falls in front of his face in uneven bangs. Before he became a Demon Slayer, Zenitsu's hair was originally black, but it turned the color it is currently when he was struck by lightning during his training.

His name is actually pronounced Zen-itsu.

name: Inosuke Hashibira
about: Inosuke is a member of the Demon Slayer Corps and a traveling companion of Tanjirou Kamado. He is often seen wearing the head of a boar.

name: Nezuko Kamado
about: Nezuko is Tanjirou's sister.

name: Tanjirou Kamado
about:
Age: 13 (at the start of the manga); 15 (after completing training with Sabito and Makomo)
Height: 165cm (5'4")
Hair color: burgundy
Eye color: dark red

Tanjirou Kamado is the main protagonist of Kimetsu no Yaiba, who becomes a Demon Hunter and joins the Demon Killing Corps to hunt down the demon who murdered his family and turned his sister Nezuko into a demon.

Tanjirou is kind by nature and has been described by others as having very gentle eyes. He has a great deal of determination and will not give up once he has a goal to achieve, an example being finding a cure for Nezuko. Even though he is relatively strong on his own, he isn't opposed to asking others for help when he needs it. He is very protective of his friends and even more so of his younger sister. His biggest attribute is his ability to empathize with anyone, even demons.


(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Enmu
about: Enmu is a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, having the position of Lower Moon One.

name: Father Spider Demon
about:
The Father Spider Demon was a member of the Spider Family.

The Father Spider Demon is the physically largest of his "Family", his skins is dark brown with the same red dot like design extending from his shoulders reaching down to his arms, like his "Wife" and his "Children" the Father spider demon also has long pale white hair reaching down across his shoulders with his only unique trait being that his face resembles that of a gigantic spider with several eyes and spider pincers in both of his cheeks.

The Father Spider demon seems to be the most devoted to his family, as when he battled Tanjiro and Inosuke he repeatedly told them to stay away from his family while attempting to kill the duo and seemed to be the most devoted to the role of "Father" in Rui's fake family. However he was also shown to be quit abusive towards his "Wife" having repeatedly slashes and physically abused her in the past without even stating his reasons for doing so due to her being weaker than to what they originally expected of her.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Gotou
about: Gotou is a member of the Kakushi, the clean-up brigade of the Demon Slayers.

name: Hotaru Haganezuka
about:
Hotaru Haganezuka is a swordsmith affiliated with the Demon Killing Corps.

Haganezuka first appears in the manga when he delivers Tanjirou's katana to him at Urokodaki's home. He appears wearing a sunflower patterned robe and a large woven hat with floral wind chimes hanging from it. His head is wrapped in a spotted cloth and his face is concealed by a Hyottoko mask (wooden festival mask) similar to Urokodaki.



(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Hand Demon
about:
The Hand Demon was a notorious Demon that killed thirteen of Urokodaki Sakonji's apprentices, including Sabito and Makomo.

The Hand Demon is a large, veiny, hulking monster with olive green skin, red fingernails, and yellow eyes. He used to have a very normal demonic appearance, with regular hair and clothes, but after he started eating multiple humans, he started growing in size. He grew multiple arms and his mouth became huge, with jagged teeth. He grew so many arms that not only did he stop wearing his clothes, using his arms to cover himself, he also stopped using his legs, walking on a sort of hand stand.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Gyoumei Himejima
about:
Age: 27
Birthday: August 23
Height: 220 cm (7'2½")
Weight: 130 kg (287 lb)

Himejima Gyoumei is the Stone Pillar of the Demon Slayer Corps.

name: Horned Demon
about: Horned Demon is a demon who lives in the Drum House.

name: Obanai Iguro
about: Iguro Obanai is a Demon Hunter and the Snake Pillar of the Demon Killing Corps.

name: Kaigaku
about: Kaigaku was a demon slayer in the Demon Slaying Corps, and Zenitsu Agatsuma's senior disciple under Jigoro Kuwajima.

name: Tanjuurou Kamado
about:
Tanjuro Kamado is the father of Tanjiro Kamado and Nezuko Kamado.

Due to his illness, he appears dull and pale. He has the same eyes, hair and outfit as his son, including their ancestor's earings. 

He is a quiet, intelligent, forgiving, and respectable person. He has a peaceful relationship with his family and always gives his son a lecture about life.

He shows a decent, noble aura but with a quiet distance to his surroundings. According to his son, he does not like standing out or displaying his true abilities to others. However, if his family is in danger, he will show no mercy and no hesitation when it comes to killing anyone who threatens them.

name: Takeo Kamado
about: Tanjirou's brother.

name: Kie Kamado
about: Tanjirou's mother.

name: Hanako Kamado
about: Tanjirou's younger sister.

name: Shigeru Kamado
about: Tanjirou's younger brother.

name: Rokuta Kamado
about: Rokuta is the youngest brother of Tanjirou.

name: Kamanue
about: Kamanue is a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, having the position of Lower Moon Six.

name: Kozo Kanamori
about: Kozo Kanamori is a swordsmith affiliated with the Demon Killing Corps.

name: Mitsuri Kanroji
about:
Age: 19
Birthday: June 1
Weight: 56 kg
Height: 167 cm (5'6")

Kanroji Mitsuri is a Demon Hunter and the Love Pillar of the Demon Killing Corps.

(Source:  Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Aoi Kanzaki
about: Aoi Kanzaki is a Demon Slayer, though she works as a servant in the Butterfly Estate rather than taking to the front lines.

name: Rei Kibutsuji
about: Muzan Kibutsuji's wife.

name: Muzan Kibutsuji
about:
Age: <20 (Human), ≈1,000 (Chronologically), >10,000 (Biologically)
Height: 179 cm (5'10½")
Weight: 75 kg (165 lbs)
Affiliation: Twelve Kizuki (Leader)

Kibutsuji Muzan is a Demon, the first of his kind, and the progenitor of most other Demons.


(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Kanae Kochou
about:
She was a Demon Slayer and the late Flower Pillar, slain several years prior to the present story. She was also the biological older sister of Shinobu and the adoptive older sister of Kanao.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki, edited)

name: Shinobu Kochou
about: She is a Demon Hunter and the Insect Pillar of the Demon Killing Corps. Due to her below-average physical strength, her sword style relies on poisons, high speed/agility, and straight jabs, somewhat resembling fencing.

name: Kotoha
about: Kotoha was the mother of Inosuke Hashibira.

name: Jigorou Kuwajima
about:
Jigorou Kuwajima was the man who trained Agatsuma Zenitsu and Kaigaku. He was formerly a Pillar in the Demon Killing Corps.

Jigorou mainly appears in the manga through the forms of flashbacks. He was a physically short and elderly man with silver or grey colored hair and a visible scar located below his left eye. Jigorou often carried a wooden cane with him likely to support his body due to age. He is commonly seen in the manga wearing a jinbei styled kimono similar to the one worn by Sakonji Urokodai.

Jigorou had a steadfast devotion to his students and strict training. Despite his status as a strong mentor and experience as a previous pillar, he had a soft spot and unwavering dedication towards raising the next generation of students.

Zenitsu noted that despite how often he whined and ran away, Jigorou never gave up on him once. He had saved Zenitsu from a lifetime of debt and taken him on as a student. Showing unyielding patience, he was happy just to see Zenitsu master the first form. He had a great belief in training skills to perfect through repitition comparing it to forging and purifying the steel of their swords.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Kyougai
about:
Kyogai was a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, having held the position of Lower Moon Six. He is also known as Drum Demon (鼓の鬼, Tsuzumi no oni).

Sometime after becoming a Demon, Kyogai was lectured by an unknown individual over the quality of his writings. This person noted that he had become boring, only beating his drum and not leaving his house, and didn't have the skills to teach people. As he left, the individual stepped on one of the Demon's papers, causing an irate Kyogai to kill him.

While still a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, Kyogai slowly lost the ability to eat humans. He was visited by Kibutsuji Muzan, who removed his number due to the Drum Demon having reached his limit. Because of this, Kyogai obsessively began his quest to rejoin the Twelve Demon Moons.

At some point, Kyogai captured Teruko and Shoichi's older brother, Kiyoshi, due to him possessing "rare blood", and took him to the Drum House. Before he could eat him, he was attacked by two other Demons who were also after Kiyoshi's rare blood, suffering an injury that dislodged the drum from his back.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Makomo
about:
A cute and mysterious girl who wears a floral pattern kimono. Her fox mask has two flowers on its right cheek. Tanjirou noticed that her favorite phrase was "We really like Urokodaki-san."

Opposite to Sabito's aggressive personality, Makomo is patient and kind. She points out to Tanjirou any mistakes in his technique and corrects any bad habits he had unconsciously developed.

Although very close, Makomo and Sabito are not siblings. They were both adopted by Urokodaki as orphans.


(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Mother Spider Demon
about:
The Mother Spider Demon was a member of the Spider Family.

The Mother Spider Demon is a short woman with long white hair, red markings on her face, and large breasts. She wears a long white kimono with large sleeves.Her original appearance was completely different from her current,being small almost child like,having simple black hair and X like marks in her pupils and her breasts being not even visible,hinting that she had to extensively alter her appearance to match Rui's desire for a mother.

Like most demons, she is cruel, unfeeling, and murderous towards humans. Though after much time with him, she developed fear for Rui and the Father Spider Demon who abused her for being weaker than expected, this abuse was severe enough to cause her to fully embrace death instead of having to continue on knowing that both Rui and the Father Demon would continue to abuse her, in her final moments she seemed to have regained some of her feelings and memories as a human and seemed to have been genuinely touched by Tanjiro's kindness that she bid him good luck as she died. It was later revealed that compared to the rest of her "Family" she was technically the youngest demon of the "family" and was still copping with her previous human feelings and memories causing her to cry and grieve many times when remembering them, due to this she became a target of severe reprimand from Rui,due to her inability to be a proper "Mother" to her "Children",who were all technically older than her.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Mukago
about: Mukago is a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, having the position of Lower Moon Four.

name: Murata
about: Murata is a member of the Demon Slaying Corps.

name: Sumi Nakahara
about:
Sumi Nakahara is a servant of the Butterfly Estate.

Sumi has light skin and a set of black button like eyes. She wears her hair in low twintails fastened with two blue butterfly clips. She also sports a long sleeved nurse uniform tied with a blue ribbon and wears knee socks and also white shoes.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Nakime
about: She is the demon who controls the Dimensional Infinity Fortress.

name: Older Brother Spider Demon
about:
The Older Brother Spider Demon was a member of the Spider Family.

The older brother Spider Demon body takes the form of a giant spider possessing a human head, his face similar to the Mother and Older sister demon has the same facial features of red dots and pure white skin and white hair similar to his "younger brother" Rui with the only difference being that his eyes possess dark red almost pitch black Sclera with deep blue iris's and pupils.

The Older Brother Spider demon is shown to be sadistic and cruel, that in the flashbacks of the Mother Spider Demon he openly taunts and enjoys the physical and verbal abuse she was being put through by Rui and the Spider Demon Father,while sarcastically calling them "Mother" and "Father", showing that he sadistically enjoys playing the part of being in a "Family".

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Older Sister Spider Demon
about:
The Older Sister Spider Demon was a member of the Spider Family.

Her physical features are similar to that of her "Younger Brother" Rui, completely milky pale white skin complexion with snow white hair, her eyes are pure white with only her silvery pupils separating them from her sclera, she also possess several red dot like patterns in her face similar to her "Family". Her original appearance as a demon was completely different than her current, having morphed and changed her features due to being forced by Rui to be a family, her original appearance was simple,having black hair and slitted cat like eyes and grayish skin.

The Older Sister Spider demon is shown to be the most cautious of her "Family" having instead opted to observe and stand back rather than jump right into the battle against Demon Slayers, shes also shown to be one of the most cowardly of her family both with battling against the Demon Slayer Corps and dealing with the internal conflict of her "Family" as seen when the Mother Spider Demon was being violently abused and reprimanded by "Younger Brother" and her "Father" instead of helping her she instead opted to stand back and give her "Mother" the same severe glare due to her weakness, and she again showed her cowardice by trying to convince Rui to run instead to fight after most of their Family was defeated. In truth the Older Sister spider demon loathes and hates her "Family" and has begun thinking that she would have likely done better on her own and believes that the rest of her "Family" to be idiots for playing along with Rui, but non the less did whatever it took to survive she even went as far as attempting to use sympathy and pity on Shinobu Kocho despite knowing that she was a demon slayer, later also showing a more gullible side to herself when she genuinely believed Shinobu's promise not to kill her and got her to confess the amount of people she has killed.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Ozaki
about: Ozaki is a Demon Hunter and part of the Demon Killing Corps.

name: Kyoujurou Rengoku
about:
Age: 20
Date of Birth: May 10th
Height: 177 cm (5'9½")
Weight: 72 kg (159 lb)
Race: Human
Gender: Male
Hair Color: Gold with Red Tips
Eye Color: Gold with Red Irises
Affiliation: Demon Slayer Corps
Occupation: Demon Slayer, Flame Hashira

Abilities: Extrasensory Perception, Immense Speed & Reflexes, Immense Stamina & Endurance, Immense Strength, Indomitable Will, Keen Intellect

Kyoujurou is a major supporting character of Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba and a major character in the Mugen Train Arc. He is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer Corps and the former Flame Hashira.

Kyoujurou was a young adult of tall stature and athletic build. He is known have an air of great optimism about him, having an enthusiastic smile plastered on his face nearly all the time. He had long bright yellow hair with red streaks akin to flames along with two shoulder-length bangs and two chin-length bangs on the side of his head, black forked eyebrows, and golden eyes that fade to red with white pupils.

Kyoujurou wore a paler brown version of the regular Demon Slayer uniform, which consisted of a brown gakuran jacket, a white belt around his waist and hakama pants. Over this, he wore a haori with a white-yellow gradient pattern and red flame-like ridges at the end that his father Shinjuro once worn and more than likely his father worn when they were the Flame Hashira respectively. Finally, he wore red Kyahan with yellow flames erupting from the bottom-up, with pale brown tabi socks and a pair of white zōri with red straps.

Kyoujurou was greatly enthusiastic in regard to his duties as a Hashira, and often came across as cheerfully eccentric. He was amiable, pure of heart and boasted extraordinary technique and swordsmanship stemming from strict practice and discipline. He was an honorable warrior who adhered to his code of morals and principles that was instilled into him by his mother at a young age — the most significant being his belief that those who were born strong have a duty to protect the weak.

Kyoujurou also loved his family immensely, displaying great respect and worry towards his father, Shinjurou Rengoku, despite him growing slowly more aggressive and apathetic towards Kyoujurou. He is incredibly encouraging and optimistic towards his little brother, Senjurou Rengoku, believing in him and wishing him the best no matter what. This is further accentuated during his death where his final words for his father and his little brother were "take care of your body" and "follow your dreams no matter what". Kyoujurou also believes that if someone lacks immense skill, their hard work towards their dreams and desire to help people doesn't count for nothing.

Beneath his enthusiastic demeanor, Kyoujurou is very logical and tactically intelligent, acting quickly and precisely in battle, especially when the lives of others are on the line. Kyoujurou also is great in seeing talent in others, even in Nezuko, a Demon which he wanted to kill beforehand after seeing her risk her lives to fight Demons. Though he is extremely optimistic, Kyoujurou does sometimes have a sense of foreboding that those he believes in might die, especially his friends which he care deeply for. Lastly, he, like most Demon Slayers, absolutely detest Demons, usually because of their heinous deeds or because of their clashing morale values.

name: Rokuro
about: Rokuro is a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, having the position of Lower Moon Two.

name: Rui
about:
Rui was a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, having held the position of Lower Moon Five.

Rui has the appearance of a young boy. His skin is white, with red dots. His hair is light pink and bears resemblance to spider legs. The sclera of his eyes are red, while his irises are pale blue.

His blood demon technique allows him to create strings that are hard to cut. He is able to use the strings in both offensive and defensive way, by either using them to cut something or to block attacks.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Rui's Father
about: Appears in episode 21.

name: Saburo
about: Saburo is a villager from the village near Tanjiro's home.

name: Sanemi Shinazugawa
about:
Age: 21
Height: 179 cm (5'10½")

Shinazugawa Sanemi is a Demon Slayer and the Wind Pillar of the Demon Slayer Corps.

name: Genya Shinazugawa
about:
Genya Shinazugawa is a Demon Hunter of the Demon Killing Corps. He is also the younger brother of the Wind Pillar Shinazugawa Sanemi.

Early on in the series, Genya had a short build which stood slightly above Tanjirou Kamado. He had short, messy back hair that what shaved off at the sides. thin eyebrows, and a scar that is covers most of his face's width.

Later on, he reappeared with a wilder look as his height changed significantly, making him taller than most and now has longer hair reached down to his neck. He also gained a large, muscular build along with this as well as various scars all over his body.

Genya is a foul-mouthed and ill-tempered individual with a "lone wolf" character who refuses any help from others and does not show any interest in being polite or having any manners.

This changes later on when after he fought Hantengu, an Upper Moon demon, along with Tanjirou, Kanroji Mitsuri; the Love Pillar, and Nezuko Kamado, and was not as imposing as before.


(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki, edited)

name: Shoichi
about:
Shoichi is the young boy, accompanied by his sister Teruko, who approach Tanjirou and Zenitsu to help save his older brother from the Drum House.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Susamaru
about:
Susamaru was a Demon that aspired to join Kibutsuji Muzan's Twelve Demon Moons group.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Swamp Demon
about:
The Swamp Demon was a Demon that went on a rash of kidnappings during Kamado Tanjiro's first mission for the Demon Killing Corps.

The Swamp Demon was a pale skin young man with long blue hair with two long strands of violet on both sides of the face, supported by two golden hair separators. As usual in several demons, he had claw-like nails and the veins on his forehead are quite prominent, in his case, to the point of replacing his eyebrows. His eyes were red without pupils and with prominent dark eye bags. Because he could be divided into two demons apart from himself, each demon differed from the other in the number of horns and clothing. The three demons wore shinobi clothing.

The main body had a single horn in the upper center of its forehead and wore a full-length long-sleeved shinobi uniform with meshes on its wrists and neck, the mesh of the neck having three small ribbons centered hanging from it. There were divisions inside his uniform coat where he could keep the collection of hairpins of his victims.

The second body had two horns, one on each side of its forehead. His shinobi attire did not have sleeves, instead, it had two small triangular meshes in the armpit area and a large triangular mesh in the chest area.

The third body had three horns, each in the position in which the other two bodies had their own horns and wore a shinobi garment sewn with meshes on both sides of the arms, shoulders, and thorax. Under his coat, he wore a sleeveless bottleneck shirt.



(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Naho Takada
about:
Naho Takada is a servant of the Butterfly Estate.

Naho is a light skinned young girl. Her eyes are button like and appear to be black. Naho wears her hair with a middle parting and two braided twintails which are tied with two green butterfly clips. She wears a long sleeved nurse uniform with a green bow and also sports knee socks and white shoes.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Tamayo
about: Tamayo is a doctor and close ally of Kamado Tanjirou. She was turned into a Demon by Kibutsuji Muzan.

name: Temple Demon
about:
The Temple Demon is the first Demon encountered by Tanjiro Kamado .

The Demon had already been attacking travelers who take shelter at a small temple hut on the pathway that leads to the Narrow Mist Mountain. When Tanjiro was asking for directions, one of the villagers mentioned that it would be dangerous for him to travel at night as people had been going missing in the area.

When Tanjiro and Nezuko arrived at the hut, the Demon had just killed three people. When the Demon tried to strangle Tanjiro, Nezuko kicked its head clean off its body.

Even without a head, the Demon could still command its body to attack the siblings. The Demon also grew a pair of hands from his head. As the body was furiously attacking Nezuko, Tanjiro tackled the body and threw it off a cliff. However, this did not result in the Demon's death, although losing its body caused it excruciating pain.

Tanjiro had also pinned the Demon's head to a tree with his axe to stop its movements. As he was too compassionate, he failed to kill the Demon before dawn, accidentally allowing the Demon to perish by the sun's first rays instead.


(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Matsuemon Tennouji
about:
Very intelligent. It named itself and seems to have a large ego. It's quite disgusted with Zenitsu upon their first meeting, and thinks he should make girls cling to him like Matsuemon does instead of clinging to them.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Kiyo Terauchi
about:
Kiyo Terauchi is a servant of the Butterfly Estate.

She has light skin, black circle eyes, shoulder-length black hair, and thin bangs that frame her face. She wears two pink butterfly clips on each side of her head and a white long nurse dress tied with a pink bow. She also sports knee socks and white shoes.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki, edited)

name: Teruko
about: Teruko is the young girl, accompanied by her brother Shoichi, who approach Tanjirou and Zenitsu to help save her older brother from the Drum House.

name: Muichirou Tokitou
about: Tokitou Muichirou is a Demon Slayer and the Mist Pillar of the Demon Killing Corps. He is usually cold but has a soft side for people that reminds him of his family.

Gender: male

name: Tongue Demon
about: Tongue Demon is a demon who lives in the Drum House.

name: Toyo
about:
Toyo is an udon street vendor who lives in Asakusa, Tokyo.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Yoriichi Tsugikuni
about: Yoriichi Tsugikuni was a member of the Demon Slaying Corps during the Sengoku Era.

name: Kanao Tsuyuri
about:
Age: 16
Height: 156 cm
Weight: 46 kg
Birthday: May 19th

Tsuyuri Kanao is a Demon Hunter and Kochou Shinobu's Tsuguko, who is personally looked after by the Demon Killing Corps' Pillars.

She uses the breath of flower. 







(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Nichika Ubuyashiki
about: Nichika Ubuyashiki is one of the older daughters of Kagaya Ubuyashiki.

name: Kiriya Ubuyashiki
about:
Kiriya Ubuyashiki is the son and middle child of Kagaya Ubuyashiki and the current head of the Ubuyashiki Household.

Kiriya appeared along with one of his sisters at the Final Selection to greet and inform the Demon Hunters in training of what their last trial will entail.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Kanata Ubuyashiki
about:
Kanata Ubuyashiki is a daughter and one of the lastborns of Kagaya Ubuyashiki. She currently serves her older brother, the current head of the Ubuyashiki Household, Kiriya Ubuyashiki.

She adorns an elongated wisteria headpiece on the right of her head. Kiriya wears the same headpiece on the opposite side instead.

She is first named in Chapter 144. However, her headpiece was initially obscured which made identification impossible until Chapter 147. Though mistakenly drawn on her left side, its shape confirms her identity to be the same as the Final Selection examiner since her only other surviving sister has a shorter headpiece.


(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Hinaki Ubuyashiki
about: Hinaki Ubuyashiki is one of the older daughters of Kagaya Ubuyashiki.

name: Kagaya Ubuyashiki
about: Ubuyashiki Kagaya is the leader of the Demon Killing Corps.

name: Ukogi
name_kanji: うこぎ / チュン太郎
about: Ugoki is Zenitsu Agatsuma's Kasugai-Crow (sparrow). She is the only sparrow that passed the Kasugai-Crow Test. Zenitsu calls her "Chuntarou," but "Ukogi" is her actual name (and her favorite food at the same time).

name: Sakonji Urokodaki
about:
Urokodaki Sakonji is a Cultivator of Swordsmen in the service of the Demon Killing Corps. He was also formerly a Demon Hunter, having held a position as a Pillar.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Ruka Rengoku
about: Ruka Rengoku is the wife of Shinjuro Rengoku and mother of Kyojuro Rengoku and Senjuro Rengoku.

name: Senjurou Rengoku
about: Senjurou is the younger brother of Kyoujurou and the son of Shinjurou and Ruka.

name: Shinjurou Rengoku
about: Shinjurou Rengoku is the father of Kyoujurou and Senjurou and the former husband of Ruka. He formerly served as the Flame Pillar in the Demon Slaying Corps.

name: Amane Ubuyashiki
about: Amane Ubuyashiki is the wife and caretaker of Kagaya Ubuyashiki.

name: Hinatsuru
about:
Age: 21
Hair color: black

Hinatsuru is a kunoichi and one of Tengen Uzui's wives.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Makio
about:
Makio has a headstrong personality and is both bold, and confident in the way she acts. Out of her two co-wives, Makio tends to have less patience with Suma. When the women fought the obi in the underground cavern, Makio can be seen berating her for being condescending acting somewhat irritated.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Suma
about:
Age: 19
Hair color: Black
Eye color: Blue

Suma is a kunoichi and one of Tengen Uzui's wives.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Aizetsu
about: Aizetsu is an emotional manifestation of Hantengu, representing Sorrow.

name: Daki
about: Daki is a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, holding the position of Upper Moon Six.

name: Douma
about:
Age: 20 (Human); > 133 (Chronologically)
Height: 187 cm (6'1½")
Weight: 86 kg (190 lbs)
Hair Color: White (anime), Platinum Blond (manga)
Eye Color: Rainbow
Affiliation: Twelve Kizuki
Occupation: Cult Leader

Douma is a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, holding the position of Upper Moon Two, making him the third-strongest demon after Muzan and Upper Moon One. He has a very friendly attitude, and fights with a pair of metal fans. He is the founder of a cult known as the "Eternal Paradise Cult," and eats his followers, allegedly in order to release them from the pain of living.

name: Gyokko
about:
Age: >113 (Chronologically)
Height: 150 cm (4'11") (Normal), 170 cm (5'7") (Molted)
Weight: 40 kg (88 lbs) (Normal), 80 kg (176 lbs) (Molted)
Affiliation: Twelve Kizuki

Gyokko, along with Hantengu, one of the primary antagonist in the Swordsmith Village Arc of Demon Slayer. He is a demon affiliated with the Twelve Kizuki, holding the position of Upper Rank Five.

Before becoming a demon, he was a human by the name of Managi.
