Kokushibo is a member of the Twelve Demon Moons, holding the position of Upper Moon One.

name: Kotetsu
about:
Kotetsu is a young villager from the Swordsmith Village. His ancestors built the battle doll Yoriichi Type Zero. Kotetsu's actual face bears a striking resemblance to his mask.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Sekido
about: Sekido is an emotional manifestation of Hantengu, representing Anger.

name: Sumiyoshi
about:
Sumiyoshi is an ancestor of the Kamado Family and a close acquaintance of Yoriichi Tsugikuni.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Yuuichirou Tokitou
about: Yuuichirou Tokito is the older twin brother of the Demon Slayer and Mist Pillar, Muichirou Tokito.

name: Urogi
about: Urogi is an emotional manifestation of Hantengu, representing Joy.

name: Zohakuten
about: Zohakuten is an emotional manifestation of Hantengu, representing Hatred.

name: Koinatsu
about: Koinatsu is the oiran of the Tokito House.

name: Omitsu
about:
Omitsu is the manager of the Kyogoku House in the Entertainment District of Yoshiwara, Tokyo.

(Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki)

name: Mitsuha Miyamizu
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: December 1
Zodiac: Sagittarius 

Mitsuha is generally a kind individual like Taki. She is a very determined person, sometimes persistent, and is also adventurous. Mitsuha wants to live in the city because she is desperately getting tired of the countryside.

name: Taki Tachibana
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: December 1
Zodiac: Sagittarius
Occupation: Italian Waiter

A high school boy who lives in the city side of Tokyo. In his daily life, he spends fun times with friends and works part-time at an Italian restaurant. He holds a secret affection toward his co-worker and senpai Okudera. He is interested in architecture and art.

Taki is also a kind individual, but he can sometimes be persistent. He is a very helpful and busy individual also, and sometimes may be a bit sensitive toward others. Taki is also quick to anger, which causes him to be impatient and stubborn.

name: Tsukasa Fujii
about:
One of Taki's friends in high school. He is often concerned about Taki whenever Mitsuha embodies him.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Toshiki Miyamizu
about:
Toshiki Miyamizu is shown to be a very busy man and the estranged father of Mitsuha and Yotsuha Miyamizu. Following his wife's, Futaba's, death, he rejected the Miyamizu shrine and its traditions to pursue a career in politics. He became the mayor of Itomori two years after his wife's death and has held the position for four years as of 2013.


(Source: Kimi no Na wa Wiki, edited)

name: Yotsuha Miyamizu
about:
Mitsuha's younger sister, who lives with her and their grandmother. She thinks her sister is somewhat crazy but loves her despite the situation. She participates in creating both kumihimo and kuchikamizake.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Futaba Miyamizu
about:
Futaba Miyamizu was the wife of Toshiki and the mother of Mitsuha and Yotsuha. She was a caring mother with a very high level of devotion to the Miyamizu family shrine and their religion, even when on her death bed. 

Despite everything, she always believed things will turn out the way they're supposed to.

name: Hitoha Miyamizu
about:
The head of the family shrine and the grandmother of Mitsuha and Yotsuha. Their family name 宮水 literally means "shrine water." She is the master of kumihimo, which is one of her family's traditions. The town 糸守 (Itomori), where she and her family live and half of the plot's events take place, means "thread-guard."

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Sayaka Natori
about:
Mitsuha's friend. She is a nervous girl in the broadcast club in high school that vehemently denies her attraction to Katsuhiko.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Miki Okudera
about:
A university student, she works in the same restaurant as Taki. She and Taki have a mutual crush on each other. She is more commonly referred to as Ms. Okudera or senpai (a respectful term for upperclassman).

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Father Tachibana
about: Taki's father.

name: Shinta Takagi
about:
One of Taki's friends in high school. He is optimistic and jumps to the rescue of his friends.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Katsuhiko Teshigawara
about: Mitsuha's friend, who is an expert with construction machinery, particularly explosives. He's understanding of Mitsuha and relates to her a lot, due to their obligations being put upon them by their guardians.

name: Yukari Yukino
about:
In Kotonoha no Niwa, she is a mysterious 27-year-old woman Takao meets one rainy day in the garden. She spends her days with chocolate in one hand and a beer in the other. Their rainy morning meetings begin after she responds to Takao's greeting in classic verse.


In Kimi no Na wa, she is Mitsuha, Tessie, and Sayaka's Japanese literature teacher. She teaches them the word "Kataware-doki," meaning "twilight" in the local Hida dialect.

(Source: Official site, edit)

name: Haruki Shiga
about: A guy who incidentally found a book in the hospital titled "Living With Dying" which is owned by his classmate Sakura Yamauchi.

name: Sakura Yamauchi
about:
A high school student who suffers a pancreatic disease, has her lifespan dramatically shortened. She has a diary called "Living with Dying" where she writes about her daily experiences since her illness was first diagnosed.

Despite her situation, she keeps her smile and even jokes about it.

name: Issei Miyata
about: Haruki's classmate who constantly tries to interact and offers gums to him.

name: Takahiro
about: Sakura Yamauchi's ex-boyfriend.

name: Kyouko Takimoto
about:
Kyouko Takimoto is one of the main supporting characters in the I Want to Eat Your Pancreas series and the best friend of Sakura Yamauchi. It is hinted at the end of the story that she might end up dating Issei Miyata.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Minato Shirakawa
about: A close friend of Isami.

name: Kanna Kamui
about:
Tohru's friend from the dragon realm who got exiled from her world and winds up living with Kobayashi as well. She is very young by dragon standards and starts attending 3rd Grade in Japan in her humanized form. She initially assumes that Kobayashi seduced Tohru into staying and wanted her to return to their original world. She later grows attached to Kobayashi, viewing her as a mother figure.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kobayashi
about:
Age: 25

A normal office worker who suddenly finds herself living with a dragon. While typically stoic and kind-hearted, she can get wild when drunk and has a particular fascination with maids. She is occasionally mistaken as a boy, due to her lack of feminine features, particularly her flat chest.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Tooru
about:
Tooru is a female dragon who has the ability to transform into the shape of a human girl. After her life is saved by Kobayashi, she falls in love with her and starts living in her apartment as a maid. She usually retains her horns when changing into human shape, and occasionally retains her tail. She is commonly mistaken for a cosplayer.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Elma
about:
A female dragon belonging to the Order faction, rival to Touru's Chaos faction, who ends up working alongside Kobayashi at her office after getting stuck in the human world. She is as powerful as she is diligent and driven, but also naive and easily swayed by food due to her low income.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Fafnir
about:
A male dragon with a strong distrust for humans, old friend of Tohru: appears as a refined young man in his human form. He eventually comes to live in the human world with Takiya, becoming obsessed with video games.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Shouta Magatsuchi
about:
Shouta is a young boy born into a family of mages in the modern world. He is quite a shy person most of the time when being with Lucoa. When Lucoa attempts to seduce Shouta, he would run away with embarrassment and accuse Lucoa to be a demon.

(Source: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Wiki)

name: Quetzalcoatl
about:
A dragon goddess and another friend of Tohru, lost her divine status centuries ago after getting drunk and causing a scandal, much like the Quetzalcoatl of the original myth. Appears in her human form as a tall, voluptuous woman.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Riko Saikawa
about:
Kanna's classmate in elementary school who is initially hostile towards her but soon develops a crush on her, a running gag that involves this character is that every time she and Kanna make contact, Saikawa immediately blushes with bliss.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Georgie Saikawa
about: Saikawa's sister who pretends to be a housemaid.

name: Makoto Takiya
about: A programmer who is friends and works with Kobayashi. He turns into a otaku when he's at home and not working. He later becomes good friends and room mates with Fafnir.

name: Taketo Aida
about: Candy Shop owner's Ms Aida's grandson.

name: Chloe
about: Chloe is a girl that Kanna meets during her trip to the United States. Kanna's new friend.

name: Ilulu
about:
A Chaos dragon who targets Tohru because of her relationship with a human, attempting to destroy the city in the process. She then turns her eye to Kobayashi, trying to drive her and Tohru apart to prove her beliefs, but after Kobayashi and Tohru save her from an Order dragon she has a change of heart and ends up living with them. Ilulu appears in her human form as a petite girl with massive breasts and wide hips.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)

name: Shouya Ishida
about:
Age: 18
Gender: Male
Birthday: June 6th

The main character and narrator. Ishida bullied Nishimiya Shouko in elementary school and when she transferred away, he was ostracized and bullied by his former friends. He started to ignore those around him (imagining them with a large X across their face) and was driven to the point of suicide. He changed his mind after he apologized to Nishimiya and began to spend time with her. He learned sign language specifically so he could apologize to her and is shown to be very talented in it. He feels like he hasn't been punished enough for bullying Nishimiya and often wishes he could kill his younger self. He seems resigned to the fact that he will never be able to have friends again.

name: Shouko Nishimiya
about:
Birthday: June 7
Blood type: A

A young, deaf transfer student with an amazingly positive outlook on life. Despite being a victim of continuous bullying, she always keeps a smile on her face.

name: Headteacher
about: The director of the elementary school. He alarms about Shouko's harassment.

name: Keisuke Hirose
about:
Ishida's other best friend in elementary school. He is a fat boy who often went alongside Ishida in his "life-challenging activities."


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Maria Ishida
about:
Ishida's young niece who lives with Ishida and his family. Maria is half-Japanese from her mother's side and half-Brazilian from her father's side.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Miyako Ishida
about:
A kind and loving single mother of Shouya and his older sister who owns a hair salon. She cares for her granddaughter Maria as well as Ishida and often lets Yuzuru stay around the house. She became disappointed upon learning that Ishida bullied Nishimiya and had to pay 1.7 million yen for all the hearing aids Ishida broke.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Miki Kawai
about:
Nicknamed "Kawaiichi," Kawai was the school representative at Ishida's elementary school. She is popular and normally takes charge of situations and is shown to be kind to everyone; however, all her actions seem to have her academic reputation in mind. Kawai is also a narcissist who believes that everyone should love her, as well as wanting to be the victim in every problem she faces.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Satoshi Mashiba
about:
A boy who becomes interested in and joins Ishida's group of friends upon learning they are making a movie. He is eager to be the leading actor and is considered handsome and talented enough to do so. Mashiba was lonely as a child and the other children took him for granted and bullied him, now he is completely intolerant of bullies in any form, and while generally calm and level-headed, he reacts violently to any random act of bullying he sees.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Tomohiro Nagatsuka
about:
A short and lonely boy. When someone tries to steal his bike, Ishida offers his to be taken instead. Nagatsuka sees this act of kindness as a unbreakable act of friendship and swiftly becomes Ishida's self-proclaimed best friend and starts to idolize Ishida. He is shown to be quite obsessive and protective of Ishida and often dislikes him befriending other people. However, Nagatsuka is also supportive of Ishida and often offers advice. He has plans to become a millionaire so is willing to hand out money to friends and is keen to become a film director - entering himself and Ishida into a film competition. It is shown both Ueno and Kawai find Nagatsuka repulsive, while Ishida is uncomfortable that Nagatsuka is so willing to take his side when he knows so little about him. Though his film proves to be a failure, this only made Nagatsuka resolved to take up film studies as his college subject.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Ito Nishimiya
about:
Shouko and Yuzuru's maternal grandmother. A caring, wise woman, she cared for Nishimiya and Yuzuru when their father left and their mother was at work. She bought Yuzuru her first camera and tries to convince Yuzuru that her mother means well for both her and her sister.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yuzuru Nishimiya
about:
Nishimiya's younger sister who is currently a middle school student. She cut her hair short so their mother would not cut Nishimiya's and has kept it that way ever since; due to this, she is often mistaken for a boy, with Ishida even thinking that she is Nishimiya's boyfriend at first.

Yuzuru is extremely protective of her big sister and has a deep hatred of all the people who ever bullied her, in particular Ishida; however, upon learning that Ishida has changed, she mellows down, accepts, and even encourages him to go out with her sister, though she is frustrated of their reluctance to do anything about their feelings and never moving past their relationship as friends. Yuzuru often bunks off school to take photos of dead animals and insects, which causes her and her mother to not get along.



(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yaeko Nishimiya
about:
A cold woman, who after catching a virus from her husband during pregnancy, left Nishimiya deaf. Her husband's family quickly filed for a divorce. When her husband left, she was pregnant with Yuzuru and her mother helped her raise both her daughters.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Pedro
about: Maria's Brazilian father.

name: Miyoko Sahara
about:
A kind girl from Ishida and Nishimiya's elementary school. She was the only person willing to make an effort to learn sign language and befriend Nishimiya.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kazuki Shimada
about:
Ishida's best friend in elementary school. He helped him bully Nishimiya.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Takeuchi
about:
Ishida's teacher at the elementary school. He is a shallow man who finds Nishimiya's presence in the school unfair on the other pupils.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Naoka Ueno
about:
A girl from Ishida and Nishimiya's elementary school and the girl that Ishida was closest to at school. Ishida remembers her bossing him about and also being his main helper in bullying Nishimiya. After having separated from him since middle school graduation, Ueno runs into Ishida years later, herself now working in a cat café. 


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mai Inose
about:
Birthday: September 12
Height: 145 cm

name: Mira Konohata
about:
Birthday: June 13
Height: 155 cm

name: Ao Manaka
about:
Birthday: May 25
Height: 158 cm

name: Mikage Sakurai
about:
Birthday: July 20
Height: 160 cm

name: Sayuri Ibe
about: President of the newspaper club and Mai's friend, who prefers to be called "Eve".

name: Misa Konohata
about: Mira's older sister and the student council president.

name: Chikage Sakurai
about: Mikage's younger sister. She joins the Earth Sciences club after Mikage graduates. She shares her sister's enthusiasm for geology and enjoys fortune telling by using minerals and rocks.

name: Megu Suzuya
about: Moe's younger sister who is heavily involved in sports clubs at her school. She's also extremely tall for her age.

name: Ayano Usami
about: A friendly girl from the Newspaper Club. Good friends with Sayuri.

name: Shouko Komi
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: December 25
Blood type: A
Height: 168 cm (5'6")
Weight: 48 kg

Though Komi Shouko is regarded as the Madonna of their school, she herself is incapable of socializing with others to such a level that it can be called a communication disorder. She is unable to utter a word nor sound in her daily life due to her crippling anxiety and fear of rejection by her peers. However, she dreams of overcoming this adversity and desires to build friendly relationships with others and make 100 friends. The only person in her school that knows of her inability to communicate well is her fellow classmate Tadano Hitohito. Tadano has decided to help her overcome her anxiety and make her dream of 100 friends a reality. With Tadano's help, she attempts to socialize with and befriend the other students of her class.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki)

name: Hitohito Tadano
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: September 29
Height: 170.2 cm

His name is a pun on "just a guy," he is normal and average in every way. In the one-shot, his name is Shigeo Tadano.

Claims his specialty is "reading the room," which is shown when he is the first person to notice that Komi is not rude, or looking down on anyone.

He is the first person to become friends with Komi.

name: Himiko Agari
about:
Height: 156cm (5'1")
Gender: Female
Birthday: April 30
Sign: Pisces(western) Rabbit(eastern)
Blood type: B
Favorite foods: Tomatoes, Avocadoes, White rice
Measurements: 34-27 

Agari is the glasses girl who has been a member of Library Committee for a year. 
She finds solace in toilet stalls as she's weak against peer pressure, having no confidence in herself.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki)

name: Kamiko Arai
about: She's a newcomer who started a job at beauty salon Beyoung Sheets in April.

name: Nokoko Inaka
about: A girl with a complex about her being from the countryside.

name: Maki Karisu
about: She's a charismatic hairdresser at Beyoung Sheets, and also the senpai of Arai.

name: Rami Kawai
about: She was Hitohito's classmate in middle school and his first love.

name: Shuuko Komi
about:
Shuuko Komi is Shouko's mother. She looks like Shouko, but her personality is like that of a teenager. She introduces herself to Hitohito and Najimi as forever 17 years old.

Just like her son and daughter, Shuuko is very beautiful. She is always the chatterbox in their family as her kids take after their father Masayoshi, and are very silent. Shuuko is always wondering how her family talks and understand each other.

Before she was married, her name was Shuuko Nimi. She was bored by school and had even dissed her future husband, Masayoshi Komi, until she saw Masayoshi do various things that cause her to blush out of confusion and fall in love with him.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki, edited)

name: Shousuke Komi
about: Shouko's brother. Like his sister, he doesn't talk very much. Unlike his sister, he actually doesn't have trouble communicating with people, he just speaks whenever he wants to.

name: Akira Komi
about: She's the cousin of Shouko and Shousuke. She's a first year high school student.

name: Masayoshi Komi
about:
Masayoshi Komi is Shouko's father.

Like Shouko and Shousuke, Masayoshi rarely speaks. Similar to his daughter, Masayoshi struggles to express himself verbally and can at times be easily flustered.

Complementary to his wife's youthful attitude, Masayoshi often appears mature and stoic. While he may come across as stern, he is often shown to be kind, considerate, and supportive.

Like his son, Masayoshi tends to make up for his lack of communication with strong actions, and is generally talented is a variety of skills, including baking, woodworking, motorcycle riding, and sandcastle construction. Despite his stoic expression, he is adept at non-verbal communication and often holds silent conversations with his children, much to Shuuko's amusement.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki)

name: Omoharu Nakanaka
about:
Nakanaka is a student who usually speaks in dubious speech as a result of being a chuunibyou.

She states that she was Arsot Les Primavera and that Komi Shouko is Princess Komilia.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki)

name: Chika Netsuno
about: Netsuno Chika is an athletic high-school student who is one year above Komi and Tadano. She is very passionate about sports and loves a competitive spirit. She can be seen categorizing people's energy levels through temperature.

name: Nene Onemine
about:
She's a former classmate of Komi Shouko, Tadano Hitohito, and Osana Najimi, noticeably known as a very caring person, who acts as an older sister figure to her friends.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki)

name: Najimi Osana
about:
A friend of Tadano's from middle school. Their name literally means "childhood friend."

Even though Najimi wears a girl's uniform with a boy's tie, Tadano remembers them as a boy wearing a boy's uniform back in middle school.

name: Kaede Otori
about: An airhead who likes to take things slow, to the point where she kept on watching a fireplace recording from Christmas to New Year's Day.

name: Hitomi Tadano
about:
Hitohito's little sister.

She bears resemblance to her brother in terms of understanding people's mind. 

She is an active girl, unlike her brother who is a timid and more passive in doing things.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki)

name: The Shopkeeper
about:
The Shopkeeper (店長) is the cook and owner of Itan's Ramen Darou. He speaks extremely quietly, and is also bad at communicating. Due to also being bad at communicating, he shares an empathy between Shouko and much like her family, can have a conversation without speaking.

He (and, by extension, Ramen Darou) has five Golden Rules. They are as follows:
1. Thou shalt not speak.
2. Thou shalt immediately buy your ticket and promptly take your seat.
3. Thou shalt uphold manners, respect the shopkeeper and wait with peace of mind.
4. Thou shalt not touch your cell phone.
5. Thou shalt return your bowl once you finish eating and immediately give up your seat.

Komi, having already been shown to share Shopkeepers lack of communication skills, is also adept at following his rules, and is shown to be a model customer.

He debuts in episode 5 of the anime, and chapter 65 of the manga.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki, edited)

name: Makeru Yadano
about:
A competitive girl who likes to compete herself to Shouko.

Makeru is the self-addressed rival of Komi Shouko. She is often seen struggling on her own, pretending as if Komi has accepted her rivalry each time being defeated by Shouko's results. In comparison to Shouko's "goddess" position of their class Makeru has called herself as the "commoner". Even so, she has her own fan club consisting of mostly masochistic type male students. 

(Source: Komi-san Wiki)

name: Ren Yamai
about:
A girl in the same class as Komi and Tadano.

She displayes yandere-like tendencies towards Komi; her name is a combination of "yandere" and 'yamu,' which means 'suffer.'

She views Komi as a goddess, and despises Tadano for being close to her. She is often seen sexually harassing Komi.

name: Aqua
about:
Birthday: August 1
Height: 158 cm
Weight: 49 kg
Three sizes: B83-W56-H83

The goddess of water who judged humans to send to the RPG world, up until Kazuma dragged her along with him. She is an energetic and simpleminded girl who likes to receive reverence for her status and gets upset easily. As an Archpriest and a goddess, she is powerful against demons and the undead, and is able to resurrect recently deceased people as well as purify water supplies. Rather than learning skills which would benefit her party, she spends most of her skill points learning Party Tricks.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Lalatina Ford Dustiness
name_kanji: ダスティネス・フォード・ララティーナ / ダクネス
about:
Age: 18
Birthday: April 6

A crusader who possesses powerful offense and defense, but lacks the accuracy to deliver her attacks. She is a masochist who dreams of being ravaged by monsters or married to an abusive husband; regardless, she is serious with issues involving her friends.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Megumin
about:
Age: 13–14
Birthday: December 4

An arch wizard who is descended from crimson demons; powerful humanoids who possess black hair and red eyes, and sport chuunibyou characteristics. Megumin only knows a single skill, the incredibly powerful explosion magic that immediately incapacitates her for the rest of the day when cast, and refuses to learn any other skills.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)

name: Kazuma Satou
about:
Age: 17 Height: 165 cm

The main protagonist of KonoSuba. A sixteen-year-old Japanese teenager who became a game-obsessed shut-in after having his heart broken over his childhood friend during middle school. He is sent to the parallel reality after dying from acute stress reaction, forcing Aqua to come with him after she irritates him with her attitude. Kazuma is classed as an Adventurer which, despite being the lowest ranked class, allows him to learn various skills from other classes, albeit at an increased cost. With his ability, Kazuma learns basic skills such as stealing, archery, monster detection, and basic magic.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Arakuremono
about:
An anime-exclusive character. The first person Kazuma speaks with in Axel's guildhall.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Beldia
about:
A dullahan and one of the Devil King's generals. He becomes hostile towards Kazuma's party after Megumin keeps using his castle for explosion practice.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Chris
about:
Darkness' friend, as well as the thief who taught Kazuma the Steal skill and who is his partner in crime.



(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Dust
about: Dust is an adventurer who is part of Taylor's party. He is also a famous delinquent in Axel, often going to jail for petty crimes and schemes, and a regular costumer in the Succubus Shop.

name: Eris
about:
A goddess of the RPG world who Kazuma first meets after he is killed during a battle. She is kind-hearted but is prone to embarrassment from Aqua, who is jealous over how much more Eris is worshiped despite being Aqua's junior goddess.



(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Head Researcher
about:
"Head Researcher" is an unnamed person who lived and died centuries before the main story begins. He is sometimes also referred to as "Idiot Inventor," "Stupid Chief Engineer," "The Scientist," or some other names along those lines. He was born in modern Japan and sent to the distant-past Fantasy World as a Reincarnator to fight the Demon King of that time. While we never get to meet him when he was alive, we do see glimpses of his life from his research diaries.

(Source: KonoSuba Wikia)

name: Luna
about:
The official quest-giver of the Axel guildhall and the go-to woman for adventurers visiting the guild.

Luna is a very kind, caring and cheerful young woman who has a rather big sister aura about her. She has common sense which is a rarity in the Fantasy World. Luna is also a calm person, taking everything in stride.

(Source: Konosuba Wiki, edited)

name: Kyouya Mitsurugi
about: A boy with a strong sense of justice who is also from Japan.

name: Newbie Succubus
about:
The Newbie Succubus, also known as the Loli Succubus and Lolisa (a name given to her by Dust), is the youngest employee of the Succubus Cafe. She is introduced when she was captured by Aqua, after having been on her way to service Kazuma.



(Source: Konosuba Wiki)

name: Receptionist Succubus
about: She is one of the Succubi working in the "special" shop.

name: Rin
about:
Rin is a intermediate wizard and a member of the party consisting of Taylor, Dust, and Keith. She currently lives in Axel, the city of beginner adventurers. Rin is a minor supporting character in the main Konosuba series, as well as a major supporting character of the Kyakkou spinoff series.

Rin is a confident gal, although she is also humble and describes herself as a rookie wizard. She is also a very direct and honest person, and although she's usually calm, she knows how to hit someone back when she is teased.

She is shown to be more prone to fear than her other party members, such as 
(Source: KonoSuba Fandom Wiki)

name: Sena
about: Sena is the special prosecutor from the Capital who deals with serious crimes.

name: Wiz
about:
A powerful lich wizard who, despite being one of the Devil King's generals, is a timid and kind woman who uses her powers to assist civilians and lead lost spirits to the afterlife. She runs an unsuccessful magic shop.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Walther Alex Barnes
name_kanji: アレクセイ・バーネス・バルター

name: Chomusuke
about: Chomusuke is Megumin's familiar.

name: Ignis Ford Dustiness
name_kanji: ダスティネス・フォード・イグニス
about: Father of Darkness who is always worried about her.

name: Hans
about: One of the Devil King's generals, Hans the Poisonous Slime. He is responsible for poisoning the hot spring in Alcanretia, home of the Axis cult

name: Keele
about: The arch-wizard who created the Keele's Dungeon. He has later been purified by Aqua.

name: Komekko
about: A crimson demon, and the younger sister of Megumin.

name: Vanir
about: Vanir is Demon King's army ex-general. He is an Arch-Demon and Duke of Hell. He works at Wiz's Shop now, often punishing Wiz for her bad business decisions.

name: Wolbach
about: Wolbach is the goddess that presided over violence and sloth and one of the Demon King's Generals.

name: Yunyun
about:
Age: 13-14

Yunyun is a self-proclaimed rival of Megumin. She is also the daughter of the Crimson Demon Magic Clan's Chief and as such she wants to prove herself the greatest by challenging Megumin at every given opportunity. She lacks social skills, resorting to using money to make friends.

name: Iris Stylish-Sword Belzerg
name_kanji: ベルゼルグ･スタイリッシュ・ソード・アイリス
about:
Age: 12-13
Birthday: September 6

Iris is the 12 year old princess of Belzerg. 


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Claire
about: Princess Iris' bodyguard, with who Claire is infatuated.

name: Rain
about: Princess Iris' down-to-earth tutor.

name: Sylvia
about: Growth Chimera Sylvia is a chimera and one of the eight generals of the Demon King, serving as the director of the Monster Enhancement Division.

name: Tranquility Girl
about: A plant-type monster that looks like a helpless girl in the roadsides, attracting travelers whom will protect her until they die by starvation by eating the Tranquility Girl's fruits, that don't have any nutrient, ending up as the monster's fertiliser.

name: Arue
about: Arue is one of Megumin's old classmates, and third highest scoring student in her class, only trailing behind Megumin and Yunyun, respectively. She is also an aspiring author and, according to herself, the most voluptuous among the Crimson Demons.

name: Bukkororii
about: Town house shoes store, son

name: Dodonko
about: Dodonko is a member of the Crimson Demon Clan. She is also one of Megumin's former classmates and is often seen next to Funifura. In school, she and Funifura would manipulate Yunyun into giving them lunch by saying "we're friends, right?"

name: Funifura
about: Funifura is a member of the Crimson Demon Clan. She is also one of Megumin's former classmates and is often seen next to Dodonko. According to herself, she does have a brother complex.

name: Hyoizaburo
about: He is Megumin's father and is part of the Crimson Demon race.

name: Pucchin
about: Pucchin is a member of the Crimson Demon Clan. He was the homeroom teacher of Megumin, Yunyun and Arue. His goal is to become the principal of the magic school in the Crimson Demon Village.

name: Soketto
about: The town's top beauty

name: Yuiyui
about: She is Megumin's mother and is part of the Crimson Demon race.

name: Nagisa Kubo
about:
Age: 15
Height: 160cm
Birthday: August 2

Nagisa Kubo is the female protagonist in Kubo-san wa Boku (Mobu) wo Yurusanai. She is one of the few people who's able to find Shiraishi easily.

(Source: Kubo-san wa Boku (Mobu) wo Yurusanai Wiki)

name: Junta Shiraishi
about:
Age: 15
Height: 166cm
Birthday: April 25

Junta Shiraishi is the male protagonist in Kubo-san wa Boku (Mobu) wo Yurusanai. He lacks almost any kind of presence, so people often overlook him. An exception to this is Nagisa Kubo, who is able to find him easily.

(Source: Kubo-san wa Boku (Mobu) wo Yurusanai Wiki)

name: Akina Kubo
about: Nagisa Kubo's older sister.

name: Saki Kubo
about: Younger paternal cousin of Nagisa Kubo and Akina Kubo.

name: Seita Shiraishi
about: Junta Shiraishi's younger brother.

name: Yuuma Sudou
about:
Sudou is a classmate of Kubo and Shiraishi. He originally was a member of the environmental committee but had trouble taking good care of the flower beds that were his responsibility.

He has a horrible sense of direction, and can't seem to find Shiraishi when he is standing right next to him.
He is also really good at math but seems to suffer with other subjects, ironically it ended up in him passing all of his exams except math because he forgot to write his name on the paper.

Chapter 34 page 2 He is introduced.
Chapter 34 page 3 talks about how he had trouble taking care of the flower beds.
Chapter 50 page 2 speaks on how he has trouble finding Shiraishi.
Chapter 69 page 5 it talks about how Sudo has a terrible sense of direction.
Chapter 80 page 4 he shows how he got a zero on his math exam but would have gotten 100% otherwise if he wrote his name.

name: Unzen-sensei
about:
Unzen-sensei is a teacher at Haruka North High School.

He is a petite old man with end male pattern baldness and with what hair he does have around the rim of his head is white and puffy. He also has a thick mustache and narrow eyes. He wears a darkish brown outfit and shoes.

He is seen as a calm and collected man.

(Source: Kubo-san wa Boku (Mobu) wo Yurusanai Wiki)

name: Tooru Kirishima
about:
Age: 28

Tooru Kirishima is the wakagashira of the Sakuragi Group. He's known as "The Demon of the Sakuragi Group."

name: Yaeka Sakuragi
about: Yaeka Sakuragi is the daughter of the Sakuragi Group's boss.

name: Kanami Kurosaki
about: She is Yaeka Sakuragi's aunt.

name: Jinshi
about:
Age:
18 (LN V1) (real), 23 (as eunuch Jinshi)
19 (LN V2) (real), 24 (as eunuch Jinshi)
18 (WN V2) (real), 24 (as eunuch Jinshi)

Height: 181 cm (5'11")
Hair color: Black (WN), Dark Purple (LN)
Eye color: Black (WN), Pink (LN)

Jinshi is the deuteragonist of Kusuriya no Hitorigoto. He appears to be beautiful eunuch who was placed in charge of the inner palace and often requests for Maomao to solve mysteries in the palace in exchange for rare medicines. He finds Maomao's apathy toward him refreshing and amusing. Later, his childish curiosity evolves into a one-sided romantic affection.

Jinshi is a beautiful eunuch who works in the palace. With a celestial-like face, not only are women fascinated by him, but men are as well.


(Source: The Apothecary Diaries Wiki, edited)

name: Maomao
about:
Age: 17
Birth place: Rokushoukan
Hair color: Black (WN), Dark Green (LN)
Eye color: (Black (WN), Purple (LN)
Height: 153 cm (5'0")

Maomao became a maidservant to the Emperor's harem after being kidnapped and sold. She used to live with her father as a pharmacist in the red light district and is very knowledgeable about medicine and poisons but isn't very interested in other humans.

She is skinny and short, and her plain face is covered with freckles.

AbilitiesMaomao's name is derived from 猫 (māo), the Chinese word for cat. This reinforces the fact that she is often described as a cat or cat-like.


(Source: The Apothecary Diaries Wiki, edited)

name: Ah-Duo
about: Lady Ah-Duo, Pure Consort of the Garnet Palace, is the childhood friend and consort of the Emperor. She holds great charisma and influence over the court.

name: Anshi
about: Mother of the current emperor.

name: Emperor
about:
The current Emperor and the head of the Imperial Family of Country of Li. The Emperor has short black hair, pink eyes, and a long magnificent beard to compliment his kingly look. He is often expressionless but shows a faint smile at times. He is aloof and rarely shows his emotions to anyone. As the Emperor, he sees his consorts as little more than political entities, causing some to see him as cruel. While he can be inconsiderate at times—for example, proclaiming his care for the well being of a consort while in the presence of another consort—he seems to be a good father, often visiting the Jade Palace to play with Lingli and talk with Gyokuyou. Maomao describes his taste for women as "[liking] his fruit ripe and voluptuous," a preference which stems in part from his desire to go against his father, who infamously only slept with children.

(Source: The Apothecary Diaries Wiki, edited)

name: Gaoshun
about: Gaoshun is Jinshi's assistant. He is in charge of various tasks in the inner and outer palace to lessen the workload of his master.

name: Guen
about: Quack Doctor is the Eunuch Court Physician of the inner court. He holds the responsibility of managing the health of the consorts in the inner palace.

name: Gyokuyou
about: Lady Gyokuyou, Noble Consort of the Jade Palace is the Emperor's favorite Consort. She holds great charisma and influence over the inner court.

name: Hongniang
about: Hongniang, Chief of Servant of the Jade Palace is Lady Gyokuyou's servant. She is in charge of managing cleaning and cooking in the palace.

name: Joka
about: Joka is the youngest of the Three Princesses of Rokushoukan and one of Maomao's adopted sisters.

name: Lakan Kan
about:
Kan Lakan is a military strategist in the Li military and the head of the La clan. He is an eccentric man, good at playing go and shogi, and frequently visits the Verdigris House.




(Source: The Apothecary Diaries Wiki, The Apothecary Diaries LN, volume 2, edited)

name: Lahan Kan
about:
Lahan is the adoptive son and biological nephew of Lakan and the adoptive brother and biological cousin of Maomao. He is a secondary character in Kusuriya no Hitorigoto.

He looks like the male version of Maomao and has fox eyes.

Cunning and perceptive like the rest of his family, Lahan is a miser who is particularly good with numbers and finances and runs several businesses. Unlike his adoptive father, he is a reasonable person who can handle social situations; like his adoptive father, he can't handle alcohol at all.

(Source: The Apothecary Diaries Wiki)

name: Lihaku
about: Lihaku is a rising official in the Outer Court and an acquaintance of Maomao.

name: Lihua
about: Lady Lihua, Able Consort of the Crystal Palace is the Emperor's High Consort. She holds great charisma and influence over the inner court.

name: Lishu
about: Lady Lishu, Virtuous Consort of the Diamond Palace is the Emperor's least favor consort. She holds very little influence over the inner court. She was also the former Emperors Concubine, making her the former Mother-in-law for Concubine Ah-Duo.

name: Loulan
about: Lady Loulan, Pure Consort of the Garnet Palace and the Emperor's consort. She holds some influence over the inner court.

name: Luomen
about:
Luomen is a physician in the red-light district and someone who Maomao calls "father."



(Source: The Apothecary Diaries Wiki)

name: Meimei
about: Meimei is the second-oldest of the Three Princesses of Rokushoukan and one of Maomao's adoptive sisters.

name: Pairin
about: Pairin is the eldest of the Three Princesses of Rokushoukan and one of Maomao's adopted sisters.

name: Rikuson
about:
A gentle, diligent, and quick-witted person, Rikuson is a very capable official. He is able to stay calm in any situation, a skill he trained into himself as a result of his mother's last words. He is a quick thinker and good at manipulating people (though it is likely for their own good). Due to his diligence, Maomao thinks of him as Gaoshun #2.

Rikuson is able to memorize any face he sees, a skill he likely achieved through training and diligent work rather than pure natural talent.

(Source: Kusuriya Wiki)

name: Shisui
about: Shisui is a servant girl who likes to catch bugs around the Rear Palace.

name: Suirei
about: Suirei is a Court Lady in the Outer Court, who planted an unofficial herb garden near the military offices.

name: Xiaolan
about: Xiaolan is a court lady that serves as a low class servant to the harem.

name: Yinghua
about: Yinghua, Maid Servant of the Jade Palace is Lady Gyokuyou's servant. She is in charge of cleaning and cooking in the palace.

name: Karin Asaka
about:
Year: Third Year
Birthday: June 29 (Cancer)
Gender: Female
Blood Type: AB
Height: 167cm
Three Sizes: B 88, W 57, H 89

Karin Asaka is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a third year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is royal blue. She is a member of DiverDiva, a unit under the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Kanata Konoe
about:
Year: Third Year
Birthday: December 16 (Sagittarius)
Gender: Female
Blood Type: O
Height: 158cm
Three Sizes: B 85, W 60, H 86
Favorite Food: Takoyaki
Disliked Food: Bitter Melon

Known as the group's "sleeping beauty," Kanata has the uncanny ability to somehow relax anybody in her presence. She formerly attended Shinonome Academy and has a little sister named Haruka. Along with Shizuku Osaka and Emma Verde, Kanata works with the Love Live! School idol festival app.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Ai Miyashita
about:
Year: 2
Birthday: May 30
Blood Type: A
BWH: 84-53-86
Height: 163 cm
Hobbies: Fashion
Skills: Smart
Food likes: Nukazuke, Candy

Ai Miyashita is one of the eleven main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is known for being very popular in her school, even if she doesn't realize it herself. Ai is also known for her puns, which most people around her don't find funny.

Her appearance often leads to others thinking she skips school and is rebellious. However, Ai gets very good grades and is very nice to others. She is also shown to extremely care for her Grandmother whom she lives with.

(Source: Love Live! Wikia)

name: Kasumi Nakasu
about:
Kasumi Nakasu is one of the nine idols in Nijigasaki High's Idol Club. She is a first year and her image color is yellow.

As Kasumin loves all things cute, her unrivaled love for idols is strong and inspired. With the goal to dominate and become number one, she's a sore loser when she comes anything other than first place, even to the point of sabotage or cheating. She hates the nickname Kasukasu (かすかす) which roughly translates to "just barely" or "not quite", and gets in a bad mood when referred to with it. You'll often find her scheming or thinking up new ways to ensure her own victory; however, these plans often fail or aren't as devious as she thinks.

(Source: Love Live! Wiki)

name: Shizuku Ousaka
about: A level-headed and mature honor student that is considered a Japanese beauty and can be quite timid at times. She is passionate about acting and is a member of the Nijigasaki drama club. She is a fan of old movies, old novels, and dogs. She has a female golden retriever named Ophelia.

name: Yuu Takasaki
about:
A second year at Nijigasaki High, and Ayumu Uehara's childhood friend. She and Ayumu are the first two girls Kasumi Nakasu recruits after she attempts to revive the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. 

Despite being a member, Yuu herself is not an idol, preferring a role as the club's cheerleader.

(Source: Love Live! Wikia, edited)

name: Rina Tennouji
about:
Year: First Year
Birthday: November 13th
Blood type: B
Height: 149 cm
BWH: 71-52-75

Rina is not great at conveying emotions through her face. Because of this, she makes use of her "Rina-Chan Board", which is a sketchbook she uses to draw her emotions onto.

Rina shows a strong interest in science. She excels in science and maths but struggles with her Japanese class. Rina is great at arcades and video games, and also shows a fondness for animals.

name: Ayumu Uehara
about:
An ordinary girl with no exceptional talents, Ayumu is seemingly content with just living a normal high school life. But when she and her best friend, Yu Takasaki, stumbled upon a school idol performance for the first time, a new path would suddenly appear in Ayumu's world. Despite not being able to sing or dance, Ayumu would nevertheless venture on to become a school idol herself. 

(Source: LoveLive! Wiki)

name: Emma Verde
about:
School Year: 3
Birthday: February 5
Blood Type: O
Height: 166 cm
BWH: 92-61-88

A third-year student at Nijigasaki High School. A Swiss exchange student with a keen interest in school idols. Quiet and compassionate, she has a love for the mountains and nature of her homeland. 

(Source: Official website)

name: Setsuna Yuuki
about:
Height: 154cm
Birthday: August 8th
Blood type: O

A second-year at Nijigasaki and a rising star of the school idol world. Setsuna's energetic smile and great performances draw many eyes. She loves anime and manga, and if you get her talking about either, she won't stop. Since she's so busy with her idol work, she has urban legend-style rumors surrounding her, stating that no one has ever seen her on campus.

name: Christina
about: A third-year at Shinonome Academy and a member of its school idol group.

name: Kasane Hasekura
about: Second-year student at Shinonome Academy. Part of Haruka Konoe's school idol group.

name: Haruka Konoe
about: Kanata Konoe's younger sister. Attends Shinonome Academy and is the center of Shinonome Academy Idol Club.

name: Shioriko Mifune
about:
Shioriko is the second daughter of the prestigious and wealthy Mifune family. 



(Source: Love Live! Wiki)

name: Mia Taylor
about:
She was brought to Nijigasaki (more specifically "dragged") by her friend Lanzhu Zhong. She was first introduced in Chapter 19 of Love Live! School Idol Festival ALL STARS. Despite coming from a family of esteemed musicians, Mia would much rather prefer the life of a homebody and eat nothing but burgers. 

(Source: Love Live! Wiki)

name: Lanzhu Zhong
about:
A 2nd-year student at Nijigasaki High School who is from Hong Kong. She had a very refined upbringing, and everything she does ends up absolutely perfect. She very much wants to be friends with everyone, but can't seem to manage it. She loves the girls in the Club. Her favorite thing to eat is meat.

Year: Second Year 
Birthday: February 15 (Aquarius)
Gender: Female
Blood Type: B
Height: 165cm
Three Sizes: B 87, W 55, H 82

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Festival ALL STARS)

name: Jennifer
about: President of Y.G. International Academy School Idol Club.

name: Sakura Kurobane
about: Sakura Kurobane is a student at Shion Girls Academy. She is the younger sister of Sakuya Kurobane.

name: Sakuya Kurobane
about: Sakuya Kurobane is a student at Shion Girls Academy. She is the sister of Sakura Kurobane.

name: Eri Ayase
about:
Age: 17
Birthdate: October 21
Height: 162 cm
Three sizes: B88-W60-H84
Blood type: B
Favorite food: chocolate
Disliked foods: pickled plums, nori

Eri is shown to be a perfect role model to the students in Otonokizaka High School. With her as the student council president, she is often portrayed as a cold and strict character due to her responsibilities, and being against the idea of Kousaka Honoka and her friends forming an idol group to get more attention from the public.

Eri is highly respected and well-known among the students, especially among her juniors. Unlike Nozomi, she appears rather stoic and skeptical in the early episodes, but it is shown that Eri is actually very kind and caring towards people that are close to her, like her little sister. On top of that, she is also very mature and level-headed and acts as a strategist in promoting their group.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wiki)

name: Rin Hoshizora
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: November 1
Blood type: A
Height: 155 cm
BWH: 75-59-80
Favorite food: ramen
Least favorite food: fish

Rin appears to be a tomboy due to playing sports and not wearing a skirt when she was a child. She mostly teases Koizumi Hanayo and appears to be with her most of the time. Her personality is similar to Kousaka Honoka's because they're both determined and hard-working. She usually ends her sentences with nyan~! (Meow). In addition, she sometimes acts like a cat and does the signature curved mouth look. Despite acting like a cat, Rin is, ironically, allergic to cats. Hanayo and Rin once found a stray cat but could not adopt it due to Rin's allergies.

Rin is great at sports, and is skilled in hurdling, football, and basketball. She enjoys dance very much and is the current practice leader of μ's. Her special skill is her sharp nose, which is almost on par with a dog's.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia, edited)

name: Hanayo Koizumi
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: January 17
Blood type: B
Height: 156 cm
BWH: 82-60-83
Favorite food: white rice
Least favorite food: none

Hanayo is a very shy, quiet character who doesn't normally voice her opinions. She is very reserved and will often let other people make decisions for her because of this. However, her personality changes when it comes to school idols, as she is very enthusiastic about them.

Hanayo is interested in drawing and origami, and is also obsessed with school idols.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Honoka Kousaka
about:
Age: 16
Birthdate: August 3
Blood type: O
Height: 157 cm
BWH: 78-58-82
Favorite food: strawberries
Least favorite food: bell peppers

Personality:
Honoka is an optimist who is never afraid to take risks. She is always in a good mood and likes to look at the bright side of things. She doesn't enjoy eating red bean paste despite working at her family's shop that sells Japanese sweets. She is determined and once her mind is set on something, nothing can stop her. This is believed to be the driving force behind μ's formation and success.

As hobbies, she enjoys swimming and sticker collecting. Honoka also has a knack for finding loose change on the ground.


(Source: Character Book & Love Live! School Idol Project Wiki)

name: Kotori Minami
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: September 12
Blood type: O
Height: 159 cm
BWH: 80-58-80
Favorite food: cheese cake
Disliked food: garlic

Minami Kotori is known for having her head in the clouds. Despite this, she is the group's designer. Kotori has a very huge aptitude for fashion, and is very good at drawing the costumes for the group. Kotori is shown to be very kind to her friends, and does genuinely care about them, especially about their feelings.

Kotori is also shown as the most indecisive person among all nine members, and tends to have Sonoda Umi and Kousaka Honoka, her childhood friends, make decisions for her. She also has a hard time expressing her feelings, since she always takes other people's feelings into consideration.

She is μ's wardrobe supervisor and helps with the choreography. It was discovered that Kotori worked in a maid café in Akihabara and is a famous maid named "Minalinsky." She was known as a "Legendary Maid" in Akihabara due to her kindness, cuteness, and soft voice. She also likes making candy.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Maki Nishikino
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: April 19
Blood type: AB
Height: 161 cm
BWH: 78-56-83
Favorite food: tomatoes
Least favorite food: tangerines

Maki has the qualities of a tsundere and has a hard time admitting her true feelings to her peers. She also has somewhat childish beliefs due to the group finding out that she still believes in Santa Claus. Maki is also quite stubborn.

Maki is skilled at playing the piano, and is the composer of the group. She is also their vocal coach. Her other hobbies are photography and stargazing. She became the Idol Research Club's vice president after the third-years graduated.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wiki)

name: Umi Sonoda
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: March 15
Blood type: A
Height: 159 cm
BWH: 76-58-80
Hobby: Calligraphy, Kyudo, Kendo, Koto, Nagauta, Traditional dancing.
Favorite food: Honoka's home Manjuu.
Dislike food: carbonated drinks

Personality:
Umi is normally a shy girl, but she has a strong will and has some qualities of a leader. Despite this, she is content to stay reserved and always thinks logically. Umi became the group's main lyricist, and wrote the song "START:DASH!!," along with most of the rest of their songs. Umi is uncomfortable with wearing short skirts, but gets used to it after their first live. Apparently, if awakened while sleeping, Umi takes on a completely different and angry personality.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Nozomi Toujou
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: June 9
Blood type: O
Height: 159 cm
BWH: 90-60-82
Favorite food: yakiniku
Least favorite food: caramel

Nozomi is Eri's best friend and the vice president of the school's student council. She often advises μ's and appears as wise. However, because of the way she punishes them (by grabbing their breasts), she often seems perverted. Despite this, she is the eldest member of μ's.

She likes spiritual things such as "power spots" and charms, though she is most well known for her fortune-telling which she uses as her secret method of quickly fitting in whenever she is forced to change environments. She also finds an interest in helping the other girls as much as possible. She was Otonokizaka High School's student council vice-president. It is also stated that she likes taking naps.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Niko Yazawa
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: July 22
Blood type: A
Height: 154 cm
Three sizes: B74-W57-H79
Favorite food: sweets
Disliked food: spicy foods

Normally, Niko has quite an aggressive personality, but when she takes on her alternate personality she becomes a happy, upbeat character who is always smiling. Her catchphrase is "Nico Nico Nii!" accompanied with a pose. She often thinks a bit highly of herself but despite that, she is also caring.

A common joke in the series is that she's often ignored by the other members of μ's at her attempts at being the best idol among them. Niko often gets annoyed with the former student council president, Ayase Eli, for taking away the spotlight from her with her beauty and maturity.

Niko was the Idol Research Club's president until she graduated. In Episode 10 she is shown to be a very skilled cook despite her saying she has never cooked before. However, she accidentally forgot about her lie when it was dinner time, and ended up cooking for everyone to reveal the truth. Niko is also interested in fashion.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wiki)

name: Arisa Ayase
about: Eri's little sister and currently a middle schooler in Yukiho's class. She loves μ's and is a big fan. Having mostly lived abroad due to her being part-Russian, she is unfamiliar with many Japanese customs.

name: Fumiko
about: Honoka's classmate.

name: Hideko
about:
Hideko is usually seen hanging out with Mika and Fumiko, and like them, supports μ's in their dreams to become school idols since the time the group was first formed.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Tsubasa Kira
about:
The center of the UTX high school idol group, A-Rise. The shortest among the three members with a striking forehead.

Tsubasa is humble yet competitive. Despite A-RISE's popularity, she admits that she wasn't interested about it nor does she seemed concerned losing the popularity their group has achieved. She never seems to look down on A-RISE's opponents, especially μ's whom she praises and respects. Though she admires them, she mentioned that she never wanted to lose to them.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Mother Kousaka
about: Honoka and Yukiho's mother.

name: Yukiho Kousaka
about:
Yukiho is often shown doing embarrassing things when she's by herself. Despite constantly scolding her sister, Yukiho really does care about her older sister. She is the only little sister to Kousaka Honoka. It is also shown in the anime that she has a good friendship relation with Ayase Arisa, Ayase Eri's little sister.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Father Kousaka
about:
He is a Wagashi chef who owns and runs a Japanese sweets shop named Homura, with his wife and two daughters, Honoka Kosaka and Yukiho Kosaka. His facial appearance is mostly unknown due to the top half of his face always being off-screen.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Mika
about: Honoka's classmate.

name: Mother Minami
about: Principal Minami takes her job as chairwoman seriously and cares about Otonokizaka High School very much, but doesn't believe there's anything she can do to save it. She also cares a great deal about her daughter Kotori, as shown in episode 11 when she asks her if she's sure about her decision.

name: Mother Nishikino
about: Maki's mother and a childhood friend of Kotori's mother.

name: Erena Toudou
about:
Toudou Erena is a student at UTX High School. Together with Kira Tsubasa and Yuuki Anju, they formed the school idol group A-RISE, which rose to popularity.

Toudou seems to be the most mature amongst the members of A-RISE, indicated by her looks and height. She is respectful towards others and does not hide her admiration for other people. She also sees the opponents of A-RISE as equals, and does not seem to look down on them. When meeting μ's for the first time, she praised every member of μ's, and mentioned that pleasing their audience was what matters now to them.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Anju Yuuki
about:
Anju Yuuki, is a girl with a sweet voice and has a princess look to her. She is member of A-Rise school idol group.

(Source: Love Live! School Idol Project Wikia)

name: Mother Yazawa
about: Nico's mother. It is implicit that she is an office worker and she raises her children alone with the help of Nico.

name: Kokoro Yazawa
about: Cocoro has an apparently calm personality among the Yazawa siblings besides Cotaro, shown on how she reacted when she first met the other members of μ's. She is Nico's little sister.

name: Kokoa Yazawa
about: Cocoa seems more active and energetic compared to the other siblings. She is Nico's little sister.

name: Kotarou Yazawa
about:
Cotaro is the youngest among the Yazawa siblings. He's often seen with snot coming out of his nose and is also often seen holding a toy hammer.
Cotaro is Nico's little brother

name: Hanamaru Kunikida
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: March 4
Blood type: O
Height: 152 cm
BWH: 83-57-83
Hobbies: reading
Skills: solo singing (member of choir)
Food likes: oranges, anko (sweet bean paste)
Food dislikes: milk, noodles

A first year student, the daughter of a family who's run a nearby temple for generations. A fan of reading, she has a deep fondness for Japanese literature. She's also a gifted singer, earning her a spot in the choir. Gentle and caring to those around her, but often finds herself going in circles anyway.

(Source: Official website)

name: Ruby Kurosawa
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: September 21
Blood type: A
Height: 154 cm
BWH: 76-56-79
Hobbies: clothing, needlework
Skills: selecting dresses
Food likes: French fries, sweet potatoes 
Food dislikes: Wasabi

A first-year student who's almost always nearby her good friend Hanamaru. Fearful and tends to cry a lot, but still has a tough interior, forged by her role as a girl in a rich, well known family. Always looked up to pop idols. Needlework is the only thing she's really great at.

(Source: Official website)

name: Dia Kurosawa
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: January 1
Blood type: A
Height: 162cm
BWH: 80-57-80
Hobbies: Watching films, reading
Skills: Koto harp, singing Japanese songs, dressing up in kimono 
Food likes: Green tea-flavoured sweets, flan
Food dislikes: Salisbury steak, gratin

A third year student who leads the school council. From an old fishing family whose name is well known around the area. Prideful and perfectionistic in her own way, she can't abide it when things are done sloppily or incorrectly.

(Source: Official website)

name: Kanan Matsuura
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: February 10
Blood type: O
Height: 162 cm
BWH: 83-58-84
Hobbies: astronomy, swimming
Skills: diving, ship handling
Food likes: sazae (sea snail), wakame (edible seaweed)
Food dislikes: umeboshi (pickled plums)

Kanan Matsuura is a third-year student living alone with her grandfather, who runs a diving shop on a nearby island. Breezily mature, she rarely sweats the details and usually maintains a calm, cool demeanor.

(Source: Official website)

name: Mari Ohara
about:
Year: 3
Birthday: June 13
Blood type: AB
BWH: 87-60-84
Height: 163 cm
Hobbies: Sports, horseback riding 
Skills: Flexibility, singing 
Food likes: Coffee, lemons
Food dislikes: Natto, kimchi 

Mari Ohara is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is 17 years old and a third year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. She was born on June 13. Her image color is purple.

Mari is of mixed descent. Her father is an American who runs a hotel-chain in Italy, while her mother is Japanese.

She does not feel she is very suited to become an idol. She has a bright personality and often prefers to take action by herself. She also tends to insert English words into her sentences, but if she becomes sad or serious, she uses them less.

Her hobbies are sports and horse-riding, her talent is in her flexibility and singing. Her favorite genre of music is industrial metal. She appears to be the composer for Aqours.

(Source: Love Live! Wiki & official website)

name: Riko Sakurauchi
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: September 19
Blood type: A
Height: 160 cm
BWH: 80-58-82
Hobbies: drawing, handicraft, cooking skills
Skills: music (piano, viola)
Food likes: hard-boiled eggs, sandwiches
Food dislikes: bell peppers

A second-year student who joined Chika's class after moving from Akihabara, Tokyo. Reserved, modest, and likes indoor activities. She may look calm and mature, but she often flies into a panic, jumping to conclusions and making mistakes.

(Source: Official website)

name: Chika Takami
about:
Age: 16
Birth date: August 1
Blood type: B
Height: 157 cm
BWH: 82-59-83
Hobbies: Softball, karaoke
Skills: Horizontal bars, table tennis, calligraphy
Food likes: Oranges
Food dislikes: Coffee, shiokara

Chika Takami is the second-year student at Uranohoshi Girls' High School who launched Aqours. The youngest of three sisters, she comes from a ryokan-owning family and is proud of their open-air, ocean-view bath. Sociable and rarely gives in easily. Her positive, can-do attitude gradually begins to affect everyone around her.

(Source: Official website)

name: Yoshiko Tsushima
about:
Age: 15 (16 at the start of Genjitsu no Yohane: Sunshine in the Mirror)
Birthday: July 13
Blood type: O
Height: 157 cm
BWH: 79-58-80
Hobbies: "Little devil" -style fashion
Skills: Video games, magic
Food likes: Chocolate, strawberries
Food dislikes: Oranges

A first-year student who likes the "little devil" look and proclaims herself to be "Yohane, the fallen angel." Born in the urban side of Numazu city, she's bright, self assured, smart and thoughtful. She's also cursed with extreme bad luck, running into all kinds of unforeseen trouble wherever she goes.

(Source: Official site)

name: You Watanabe
about:
Year: 2
Birthday: April 17
Blood type: AB
Height: 157 cm
BWH: 82-57-81
Hobbies: weight training
Skills: high dive, intuitively forecasting the weather
Food likes: salisbury steak, oranges
Food dislikes: sashimi, anything too dry

A second-year classmate of Chika's. Good enough at the high dive to qualify for the national team. Weight training is her hobby, and she tends to take action without thinking matters over first. Her father captains a ferry, and she'd like to have his job someday.

(Source: Official website)

name: Sarah Kazuno
about:
Sarah is the leader of Aqours rival group, Saint Snow. She is one of two members, the other being her younger sister, Kazuno Leah.

(Source: Love-Live Wikia)

name: Leah Kazuno
about:
Leah is a member of Aqours rival group, Saint Snow. She is one of two members, the other being her older sister, Kazuno Sarah. Leah is a first year student at Seisen Girls' Academy. Her image color is white.

(Source: Love-Live Wikia)

name: Chisato Arashi
about:
Chisato Arashi is a member of Liella! and a main character in Love Live Superstar!!

Year - First Year
Birthday - February 25th
Blood Type - B
Height - 155 cm
Favorite Foods - Takoyaki, Cola, Peaches
Disliked Foods - Bell Peppers
Image Color - Pink

Chisato is the childhood friend of Kanon. Being an athletic spirit, she entered Yuigaoka High primarily for dance, but after a chance encounter with the other Liella! members, Chisato decided that she would focus more on becoming a school idol. Chisato works part-time at a Takoyaki food truck, which can be seen parked at Aoyama's open-air food court.

Although Chisato describes herself as being a kind-spirited person, she has also admitted that others can find her "scary" when she is mad, a thought that rarely ever crosses her mind. 

Her favorite sayings are "The Early Bird Gets the Worm" and "Fortune comes in at the merry gate."

name: Ren Hazuki
about:
Ren Hazuki is a member of Liella! and is a main character in Love Live Superstar!!

Year - First Year
Birthday - November 24th
Blood Type - A
Height  163 cm
Favorite Foods - Consomme Soup, Strawberries, Darjeeling Tea
Image Color - Dark Blue


Ren is polite and always speaks in a very formal tone, although she isn't quite used to holding casual conversations. Ren is also very dedicated to enriching the lives of her fellow students, as the responsibilities of the school were handed down to her from her mother. Ren studies calligraphy, art, English, ballet, and practices swimming, but she is the most adept to playing the piano and performing as a figure skater. 

(Source: Love Live Fandom Wikia)

name: Sumire Heanna
about:
Sumire Heanna is a member of Liella! and is a main character in Love Live Superstar!!

Year - First Year
Birthday - September 28th
Blood Type - AB
Height - 161 cm
Favorite Foods - Tamago Kake Gohan (Egg Rice), Green Tea, Melon
Image Color - Light Green

Sumire has been living the life of a performer for almost her entire life. Having been thrust into the show business scene as a young child, she is no stranger to performing! The most important thing to her is making sure that she pleases her audience. Her favorite saying is "Faith will move mountains."

(Source: Love Live Fandom Wikia)

name: Kanon Shibuya
about:
Kanon Shibuya is a member of Liella! and is a main character in Love Live Superstar!!

Year - First Year
Birthday - May 1st
Blood Type - A
Height - 159 cm
Favorite Foods - Hamburger Steak, Tomatoes, Cafe Au Lait, Baked Apples
Image Color - Orange

Kanon is seen as being shy and flustered, admitting that she isn't the best at communicating herself. Although her true passion is singing and is her favorite pastime, Kanon is more likely to been seen helping her mom at their family cafe, serving up their specialty, Baked Apples with Cream.

name: Keke Tang
about:
Keke Tang is a member of the Liella! group in Love Live Superstar!!

Year - First Year
Birthday - July 17th
Blood Type - O
Height - 159 cm
Image Color - Light Blue
Favorite Foods - Napolitan, Choco Bananas, Milk Tea

Keke is a fun-loving optimist who has a love for school idols, which led her to move to Yuigaoka High School from Shanghai. The most important things to Keke are passion and a smiling face. Her favorite saying is "There is no time like the present!"

(Source: Love Live Fandom Wikia)

name: Mao Hiiragi
about:
Mao Hiiragi is a co-founder of Sunny Passion and is a supporting character in Love Live Superstar!!

Year - Second Year
Image Color - Magenta


Mao is from Kozushima. Along with Yuna Hijirisawa, she formed the school idol group Sunny Passion. Mao is seemingly calm and observant. She's less talkative than Yuna, but is nonetheless kind, friendly and supportive towards Liella!, despite their rivalry. Mao has long purple hair with pink highlights. She also has side-swept bangs. Her eyes are purple, and she has thick prominent eyebrows.

(Source: Love Live Fandom Wiki)

name: Yuuna Hijirisawa
about:
Yuna Hijirisawa is a co-founder of Sunny Passion and is a supporting character in Love Live Superstar!!

Year - Second Year
Image Color - Yellow


Yuna Hijirisawa is from Kozushima. Along with Mao Hiiragi, she formed the school idol group Sunny Passion. She described to her colleague Mao that she is the kind of person who saves her favorite things for the last moment. She's cheerful, talkative, kind and friendly, and just like Mao, she helps Liella! despite their rivalry. Yuna has green eyes and shoulder length yellow-orange hair, which she ties back in a ponytail.

(Source: Love Live Fandom Wiki)

name: Saya
about: Ren Hazuki's maid.

name: Sumire's Sister
about: She is Heanna Sumire's little sister.

name: Natsumi Onitsuka
about:
Birthday: Aug 7
Gender: Female
Blood Type: AB
Height: 152cm

A first year student of Yuigaoka Girls' High School. She is a new member of Liella!. Her image color is hot pink.

(Source: Love Live! Wiki)

name: Kinako Sakurakouji
about:
Birthday: Apr 10
Gender: Female

name: Kagami Hiiragi

Kagami is the older fraternal twin sister of Tsukasa. In school, her grades are excellent and she studies very hard. She was even the class president of her class in her first year. She is in a different class than Konata and Tsukasa, but she frequently comes to their class during lunch time to eat with them. Additionally, Kagami chose the humanities course in her second year so that she could be with Konata, but she was the only one separated into a different classroom; the same occurred in her third year. Kagami, seldom referred to as "Kagamin," is a bit egotistical and is not a good cook.

Kagami's physique is average. She has long light purple hair, wears a ribbon tied into pig-tails, and her sharp eyes are light violet. Kagami is the stereotypical "tsukkomi" character, however, she is prone to become shy at times, hence being a tsundere character as well. 

Much like Konata, Kagami likes video games, but plays a different genre than Konata: Kagami likes to play scrolling shooters. She loves to read light novels, but she feels lonely at times because no one around her has the same interest as her.

name: Tsukasa Hiiragi
about:

Disliked Subjects: PE
Hair Color: Light Purple

Tsukasa is the younger fraternal twin sister of Kagami and lives in a six-member family household with her parents. She isn't good at studying or at sports but excels in cooking. Tsukasa is also in the same class as Konata.

Tsukasa's physique is a little smaller than average. She has short, light-purple hair, and wears a ribbon like a head band in it, and her droopy eyes are light violet. She is portrayed as a stereotypical klutz and as a "healing-type" character. She spends a lot of time sleeping.

name: Konata Izumi
about:
Age: 17-18
Birthday: May 28
Height: 142 cm (4'8")
Handedness: Ambidextrous
Zodiac Sign: Gemini
Residence: Satte, Saitama Prefecture
Blood type: A
Strong Subjects: PE (However, it is not her favorite subject)
Disliked Subjects: Math, Science
Favorite Food: Choco Cornet, Curry, Noodles
Favorite Color: Red
Hair Color: Blue
Eye Color: Green
Online Name: Konakona

Konata Izumi is, more by default than anything else, the "leader" of the main characters. Nicknamed "Kona-chan" by her friends, she is an eccentric but friendly and outgoing girl, with a mischeivous but good-natured sense of humor. She can be smart, but she hates studying, thus her grades are a bit uneasy. However, she is an expert in pulling an "all-nighter." In contrast to her studying habits, she loves video games, to the extent that she can compete against Kagami Hiiragi on trivia games (by remembering the question orders, not by knowing the actual answers). In addition, she loves anime, which is also due to her father, Soujirou Izumi's influence, along with the games. He buys ero-games for himself, so she is able to play and enjoy them. In fact, when she became eighteen, Konata was overjoyed, since she could now go buy and play ero-games legally. In the anime, Konata constantly refers to or parodies several popular games, anime, and manga (much to the annoyance of Kagami), but her favorite franchise seems to be the Haruhi series, as she has many Haruhi figurines and decorations that makes her room, and even once went to the Suzumiya Haruhi no Gekisou with her friends. She often gives false information to her family, thus making her father believe that Kagami and Tsukasa are shrine maidens. Interestingly enough, her voice actress for the animated version, Aya Hirano and Wendee Lee, is in fact the same person who voiced Haruhi Suzumiya in The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya anime; other voice actors from the same series make guest appearances during the course of Lucky ☆ Star.

Since she spends quite a large sum of money on video games and doujinshi, Konata was lucky enough to get a part-time job at a cosplay cafe. Continuing with her theme of playing video games, Konata plays the role of a male character in an online game and is married in that world. Her significant other in the game is coincidently a male gamer using a female character. She often plays late into the night, hence why she tends to fall asleep in class, which makes her a frequent victim to her homeroom teacher, Nanako Kuroi. One of her talents as mentioned on the show is that she can name all the Pok$#!ns

Her physique is smaller than average when compared to her peers, which she claims hasn't changed, since she was in the sixth grade. She is ambidextrous, in contrast to the mostly left-handed main cast. She has long, blue hair which comes down to her calves with a large ahoge, sleepy eyes and a beauty mark under her left eye, just like her father. Her mother, Kanata Izumi, died when she was an infant, and she has lived alone with her father since. In her third year of high school, however, her cousin, Yutaka Kobayakawa, came to live at her house, giving a total of three people in the Izumi residence.

name: Miyuki Takara
about:
Birthday: October 25
Height: 168 cm (5'6'')  
Lives in: Den-en-chōfu, Tokyo Prefecture
Blood Type: O
Handedness: Left handed
Zodiac: Scorpio
Hair Color: Light pink
Eye Color: Purple

Miyuki is a "young lady" from a wealthy family whom is also beautiful, smart, and well-mannered. She was the president for her grade level in her first year when she became great friends with Kagami. Now Miyuki is the same class as Konata and Tsukasa. Miyuki is more relied on by her classmates in helping their studies than Nanako. 

Miyuki's physique is average, but she has excellent proportions; she has large breasts that Konata analogies her to a cow. Her appearance is as follow: has long light pink hair, and her eyes, covered by the glasses she wears, are light bluish-purple. She is a stereotypical "healing-type" meganekko. Her vision is less than 0.1, though used to be good until elementary school when she started reading books in the dark after her mother dozed off in the midst of reading them to her in her bed. She likes to read books, but does not read light novels. 

Miyuki loves to sleep, and she always goes to sleep at eleven. She used to go to sleep much earlier at ten before her second year. However, she hates going to the dentist, but she frequently has to go there to fix a loose crown or because of tooth decays. On the rare occasion that she plays video games, her personality seems to change.

name: Meito Anizawa
about:
Meito Anizawa, also known as Anime Tenchou, is the manager of the Animate shop that Konata regularly visits; he was originally the mascot of Animate. He and his staff consider Konata their most valued customer known as "Legendary Girl A" and go to great lengths to sell to her. Their attempts usually fail miserably. His appearance is heavily stylized compared to the other characters, and he is known for his hot-blooded yelling and highly energetic movements and poses.

He bears a very similar resemblance to Jouji Gouda in Akane Maniax.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Cherry
about: Minami's dog.

name: Yuuko Gotou
about: A tough-talking "Yankee" called Gotouza-sama by Shiraishi and Akira. She is feared and respected, and gets mad seeing the trashed Lucky Channel set.  She drives a motorcycle and carries around a wooden sword.

name: Inori Hiiragi
about: Inori is the eldest sister of the Hiiragi sisters. Just like her younger sister, Matsuri, she is also a miko at the Takanomiya Shrine.

name: Tadao Hiiragi
about: Tadao Hiiragi is the father of the Hiiragi family and has short black hair. He works as the priest of the Takanomiya Shrine. As a parent, he often makes sure that his daughters are doing their school work, and checks on their progress. He is the only one in the Hiiragi family who is right-handed.

name: Matsuri Hiiragi
about:
Matsuri is the second oldest sister in the Hiiragi family.
She is a college student and a miko at the Takanomiya Shrine. She tends to be less dependable than Inori, the eldest sister, when helping their younger twin sisters with school work.

name: Miki Hiiragi
about: She is the mother of Tsukasa and Kagami

name: Aya Hirano
