Marten Liebert is a minor character in the first season. He is a business worker for Hans Lemerio. 

Marten is middle aged man around 30. He sports short blonde hair and a matching goatee. He is usually seen wearing a black cloak with his work attire and a dark beret. 

Not much is known about his personality.

name: Marhait Liechten
name_kanji: リヒテン・マールハイト
about:
Richten Marlheit (usually referred to as Marlheit) is the manager of the Milone Trading Company’s Pazzio branch and as such is a very shrewd and experienced merchant.

Marlheit is a middle-aged man with bespectacled blue-gray eyes and straight, medium-length blonde hair in a modified pageboy cut.

Though he shares the occasional lengthy joke, Marlheit is generally calm and rational, especially when confronting a crisis. His success as branch manager is partly due to these traits. The main reasons, however, are his ability to read people and his willingness to take risks when appropriate, as exemplified when he decides to help Lawrence despite knowing Holo’s true nature. Though his primary concern is with the success of his company, he is not an apathetic man, as he more than empathized with Lawrence's concern over Holo's capture, and therefore satisfied both halves of his nature by concocting a plan in which he could both assist Lawrence and Holo while still covering his business interests.



(Source: Spice and Wolf Wiki)

name: Hans Remerio
about: Hans Remerio  is the head of the Remerio Trading Company in Lubinheigen. Lawrence procures a large quantity of armor goods and visits Remerio, but when he arrives, the company entrance is extremely vacant and appears to be in trouble.

name: Dian Rubens
name_kanji: ディアン・ルーベンス
about: Dian, who first appears in volume three of the novels, is an alchemist. She is in the process of chronicling pagan tales and beliefs so as to print them in books. She carries information about Holo's birthplace Yoitsu. Dian's name sounds very masculine, so she asks Lawrence to call her "Diana".

name: Elsa Schtingheim
name_kanji: エルサ・シュティングハイム
about: Elsa Schtingheim appears for the first time in Volume 4 and manages the church in the village of Tereo.

name: Jacob Tarantino
name_kanji: ヤコブ・タランティーノ
about: Jacob Tarantino is the head manager of the Rowen Trading Company in Lubinheigen, of which Lawrence is a member. He is a longtime merchant who considers all the members of Rowen Trading Company to be his children. He has known Lawrence since Lawrence was still learning to become a merchant, and he is the one who gave him the nickname "Kraft."

name: Yarei
about: Yarei is a character from the Spice and Wolf series. His role was replaced by Chloe in the original anime.

name: Zheren
about:
Zheren is a traveling merchant similar to Kraft Lawrence.

Zheren is a young man with brown hair and eyes and a distinctive missing upper tooth. He is usually depicted with his eyes closed and a nervous, shy smile on his lips. Whether his awkward, somewhat blunt persona belies actual inexperience or is merely a front for luring his targets remains unknown.



(Source: Spice and Wolf Wiki)

name: Kirino Kousaka
about:
Age: 14–16
Birthday: April 8
Height: 165 cm
Weight: 45 kg
Sizes: 82-54-81

Kirino is Kyosuke's 14-year-old younger sister. She is mature for her age with a cold, tsundere-like personality. She has a strong "little sister" fetish and owns many adult games with older brother/little sister themes, relying on a modeling job to pay for them. Despite this, she states she does not know why she started liking it, though it is suggested that she has a brother complex and is using the games as a surrogate to this. She often denies such feelings and believes the 2D and 3D worlds should be kept separate.

As a student, Kirino possesses a keen focus to studying and athletics. This attitude of hers when it comes to school activities has rewarded her with above-average marks, even as she enters the career of modeling. She developed a sort of perfectionist attitude due to becoming an overachiever, which eventually made her more prone to struggling when the odds are against her. When these moments come, however, she displays a more passive side.

Upon her initial interactions with Kyousuke, she demonstrates an attitude similar to a "tsundere," with the bossy and abusive part more dominant. Although she maintains this attitude, she slowly tries to open up to her brother at times, reluctantly expressing gratitude on things that Kyousuke has done for her.

name: Kyousuke Kousaka
about:
Age: 17
Height: 175cm
Weight: 60kg

Kyousuke is the seventeen-year-old main character. He describes himself as average: he has average grades, lives in an average family (upper-middle class with a father, mother and sister), and has average physical features. Currently, he attends an average high school with Manami (later, Kuroneko as well); he begins the story as a first-year, but he becomes a second-year during the events of the novel. As far as future plans, he intends to attend the same local university as his childhood friend, Manami.

At the beginning of the series, Kyousuke and his younger sister, Kirino, have a distant relationship. Kyousuke says that they entered a "cold war" of sorts a few years ago, but the details of this cold war have yet to be revealed. After years of coldness between the two, things suddenly change when Kyousuke finds one of Kirino's adult games and learns that she is an otaku. Through this, he tries to be a supportive older brother while realizing that he knows very little about his sister (for example, Kyousuke was oblivious to the fact that she was a model, a track star, and one of the top five students of the prefecture). Kyousuke feels somewhat belittled by Kirino's accomplishments, but he learns to take pride in her.

After discovering Kirino's secret hobbies, Kyousuke provides Kirino with "life counseling" at her request. During this "life counseling," Kirino forces Kyousuke to play eroge. Kyousuke now considers himself to be a bit of an otaku and often refers to situations and people using otaku terms (e.g., flag events, tsundere, yandere). Trying to be a good brother, Kyousuke offers to accompany Kirino to her offline meet-up. This introduced him to Saori and Kuroneko; both of them have become his friends. Additionally, Kyousuke is friends with Manami, one of his childhood friends. Some of Kyousuke's classmates assume that Kyousuke and Manami are going out, but Kyousuke denies this. When Akagi asked Kyousuke if he would be okay if someone started dating Manami, Kyousuke said that he would be uncomfortable with the situation.

Kyousuke is a good-hearted character and is extremely loyal to his friends and Kirino. He's willing to take risks for them and help them at any cost. When Kuroneko started attending the same high school as Kyousuke, she was without any friends; however, Kyousuke joined the computer research club with her, despite being ignorant about anything concerning computers, in order for her to meet new friends. He has shown the same amount of concern for other friends as well as his sister on several occasions.

name: Kouhei Akagi
about: Kouhei is one of Kyousuke's classmates. He prods Kyousuke about his relationship with Manami.

name: Alpha Omega
about:
Alpha Omega is the character that Bridget Evans cosplays as. She is Meruru's companion in Kirino's favorite anime, Stardust Witch Meruru.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Ayase Aragaki
about:
Age: 14-15
Birthday: May 2nd
Zodiac: Leo
Blood Type: A
Height: 166 cm
Weight: 44 kg
Measurements: 80/56/83

Ayase is Kirino's friend and classmate who works as a model alongside her and is also her best friend. Ayase is a friendly, nice, and refined lady, but becomes agitated and somewhat violent at the thought that she is being lied to, which she hates above all else. She tends to believe what she sees on the news. Therefore, she disapproves of anime and manga, calling it a disgusting hobby, especially eroge, due to the media portrayal that otaku will eventually become criminals. Originally she had a simple crush on Kyosuke, thinking of him as Kirino's caring brother. That all changed when she finds out of Kirino's otaku hobby and how he was aware of it and helps support it. She later refers to Kyosuke when she needs to talk about Kirino and her hobby, even asking for his help in making up with Kirino. However, she still dislikes him, believing him to be the reason for Kirino being an otaku. She is also friends with Manami and even exchanged numbers with her.

name: Comet-kun
about: Meruru's bunny-like fairy mascot. Apparently, he is considered ugly in his homeworld, but cute on Earth, so he likes to put on an act of cuteness for Earthling enjoyment

name: Thanatos Eros
about:
The main antagonist of Kirino's favorite anime, Stardust Witch Meruru

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Bridget Evans
name_kanji: ブリジット・エヴァンス
about:
Height: 151cm
Weight: 43kg
Three Sizes: B76/W59/H79

She is a 10-year-old girl from England, who initially gets popular with her cosplaying video on Nico Nico Douga and eventually wins the championship of the 1st Stardust Witch Meruru Cosplay Contest by playing Alpha Omega.

name: Ruri Gokou
about:
Age: 15-16
Birthday: April 20
Height: 160cm (the original initial setting), 155cm (animation)
Weight: 43 kg
BWH: 77-53-80

Ruri Gokou—perhaps better known as her alter-ego Kuroneko (“Black Cat”)—is a member of the All Together, Otaku Girls online community that Saori manages. She goes to an offline meet-up where she meets both Saori and Kirino in person. Like Kirino, she remains aloof during this meeting, and it isn't until after the meeting at Saori's post-gathering that she is formally introduced. Kuroneko is a fan of teenage fantasy anime and is sickened by cute anime, like Meruru. Naturally, this precipitates several arguments between Kirino and her, but they still manage to maintain a friendship despite their differences. Kuroneko is shown to care greatly for her friends despite her cold attitude towards people of “the mortal world.”

Kuroneko is known for her dark clothing and scarlet eyes. She cosplays daily in gothic lolita clothing similar to those worn on her favorite anime, Maschera ~Lamentation of the Fallen~. However, it is revealed that scarlet isn't her real eye color; she just wears contacts (her real irises are lavender). She writes doujinshi and novels, but none of her works are popular. Kuroneko is very intelligent and has a large vocabulary, making her works too sophisticated for the average reader.

name: Tamaki Gokou
about: This is Kuroneko's little sister. She looks up to Kuroneko not understanding Kuroneko's hobbies. She is a fan of Meruru. Kuroneko seems to like her sister a lot. She has another older sister, Hinata. (the middle child).

name: Kurara Hoshino
about: Kurara is the seiyuu of Kirino's favorite anime character, Meruru. She also serves as an emcee in Merurup-related events.

name: Kirara Hoshino
about: Kirara Hoshino is a members of the dissolved otaku community Pretty Garden. She works at a maid cafe in Akihabara. Her sister voices Meruru's seiyuu in the anime.

name: Setsuna Fate Iori
name_kanji: 伊織・F・刹那（いおり・フェイト・せつな）
about: Fate-san works at a company called MediAscii which produces anime. She helped and guided Kirino in turning her novel into an anime. She is one-fourth Japanese.

name: Daisuke Kousaka
about:
Father of Kyousuke and Kirino.

He has a job that is within the Japanese police department.

He holds a identical view of the public opinion that Otakus are bad for society. Leading to eventual argument between himself and Kirino upon finding out Kirino's hobby.

He pampers Kirino more than Kyousuke.

name: Yoshino Kousaka
about:
Yoshino is the mother of Kyousuke and Kirino. Her role in the family is pretty neutral; however, she often takes Kirino's side when arguing with her husband, Kousaka Daisuke. She has a rather sarcastic yet playful personality. She enjoys making fun of Kyousuke, especially concerning his porn collection. Kyousuke suspects that she goes through his porn collection checking for new additions every time she cleans his room. However, she doesn't seem to mind that Kyousuke owns porn; in fact, she finds it somewhat amusing.

She will always cook curry rice for lunch and dinner. Kyousuke finds it strange having almost curry rice every day of the week. Probably, it is the easiest dish to cook.

name: Kanako Kurusu
about:
Age: 14 
Height: 148 cm
Weight: 39 kg

Kanako is Kirino's classmate and friend. She has a "loli body" (as Kyousuke describes her) and a childish temperament to accompany it. Kanako demands praise from others; when she receives praise, she absolutely melts, but she has a fiery temper otherwise.

Kanako likes to sing and dance (she can memorize songs upon hearing them once). Fittingly, her dream is to become an idol. She was tricked into cosplaying as Meruru for a contest (thus winning Kirino a prize) and has been contracted to appear as Meruru for special events. Unlike Kirino, Kanako hates otakus; however, she loves having fans—even if they are "disgusting".

name: Saori Makishima
about:
Age: 15
Height: 180 cm
Weight: 61 kg
Three sizes: B88-W61-H89

One of Kirino's otaku friends. She is a tall, bespectacled girl dressed in otaku fashion. Her alias Bajeena is a clear reference to Quattro Bajeena from Zeta Gundam.

She is the moderator for the 'Otaku Girls Unite' Community.

name: Meruru
about:
The anime character which is Kirino's favorite. It started out as a PC Doujin game and soon developed for all ages on PC and so on...

The seiyuu known to voice for Meruru is Kurara Hoshino (character) in the anime.

name: Miyabi
about: A character from one of Kirino's eroge. She has a mature, caring personality (in stark contrast to her twin sister's fiery temperament).

name: Queen of Nightmare
about:
The Queen of Nightmare is the main antagonist of Maschera. Kuroneko's favorite anime. Kuroneko usually cosplays as this character.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Rinko
about:
A character from one of Kirino's eroge. She has a fiery, mercurial temperament. As Kirino puts it, she is 100% tsun and 0% dere. Her twin sister is Miyabi, who perfectly contrasts Rinko's temperament with her mature, caring personality.

Rinko is supposed to be a representation of Kirino (and Rinko's relationship with the main character of the eroge is symbolic of Kirino's relationship with Kyousuke).

name: Shikkoku
about:
The dark hero of Maschera, Kuroneko's favorite anime. He is a manifestation of a contract between Lucifer (ルシファー) and a human named Shinya Kurusu (来栖真夜). The two personalities share the same body.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Iwao Tamura
about:
Manami's younger brother.

He has a fantasy of being a rock star, which was made fun by his grandfather.

He was also scammed by a barber to cut his hair "monk" style instead of getting a "bald"head

name: Grandfather Tamura
about:
Manami's grandfather is a real joker and a young man in a old man's body.
Keeps joking about Kyousuke and Manami's relationship as friends and trying to push them more towards the lovey-dovey kind of relationship.

name: Manami Tamura
about:
Age: 17
Height: 160 cm
Weight: 50 kg
B84 / W59 / H86

Manami is Kyousuke's classmate and childhood friend. She usually behaves in a pretty traditional mindset, which Kyousuke made fun of her by calling her 'grandma'. In return, Manami calls him 'grandpa'. Kyousuke would sometime drop by her house for studying.

name: Sena Akagi
about:
Sena is Akagi Kouhei's little sister. While at first she pretends otherwise, Sena is a fujoshi, or "rotten woman" (a woman who loves yaoi). She often fantasizes about it; the idea of her brother and Kyousuke having a homosexual relationship is particularly pleasing to her. While she denies it, she is a brocon and has feelings for her brother. It is also shown that her brother cares deeply for her and, as Kyousuke says, is "a total siscon."



Sena is also part of the Computer Research Club, along with Kyousuke and Kuroneko. For a period of time, Sena quit the club, because the club was unwilling to create her video game for a contest. Kuroneko, her partner for this contest, was forced to work on it by herself; however, while Kuroneko is good at writing, she cannot program as well as Sena. The video game that Kuroneko had too many bugs to work. In the eleventh hour, Kuroneko was forced to ask Sena for help, who surprisingly agreed. Fittingly, Sena wants to become a computer programmer.

Finally ending Kuroneko's inability to make friends at high school, Sena becomes friends with her. The nature of their relationship is unknown, but Kyousuke is glad that Kuroneko finally was able to befriend someone.

name: Ria Hagry
about: Kirino's rival. She loves to run.

name: Kaede Makabe
about: Kaede is a second year member of the Games Research club, and also the most normal member of the club.

name: Gennosuke Miura
about: President of the Videogame research club.

name: Ayaka Fujisaki
about: The game character who resembles Ayase.

name: Kanata Kurusu
about:
Kurusu Kanata  is one of the former members of the dissolved otaku community "Pretty Garden". She is the older sister of Kanako, and the original author of Ruri's favorite anime series Maschera.

Her nickname is Ganma Yamanashi.

(Source: Oreimo Wikia)

name: Kaori Makishima
about: Makishima Kaori is Saori's older sister, and the founder of the otaku circle "Pretty Garden".

name: Shinya Sanada
about:
Sanada Shinya is the only male member of the otaku circle, Pretty Garden. He very similar to Lucifer, the main character of Maschera. In fact he was used as a base for the character by the author and fellow member, Kanata Kurusu.

(Source: Oreimo Wikia)

name: Himeka Akishino
nicknames: Himekashizuka Heaven's Rain|Burning Princess Saint Dragon Lady of Dawn|Burning Pudding Prince
about:
Birthday: May 30
Height: 153 cm (5')
Weight: 46 kg (101 lbs)
Likes: Video games

A mysterious, black-haired girl who is actually a chuunibyo. She sent Eita letters and messages so she could finally see him. Himeka calls herself "Himekashizuka Heaven's Rain" while being in chuuni mode, and tells that her name from past life was "Burning Princess Saint Dragon Lady of Dawn".  She has a one-sided crush for Eita, and says that she is his former girlfriend. However, when she isn't in chuuni mode, she has a poker face usually on, talks in third person, is a taciturn who answers usually by nodding and even throws tantrums sometimes about how Eita is only hers.

In the anime she is known as "Burning Pudding Princess."

name: Ai Fuyuumi
about:
Birthday: June 16
Height: 157 cm (5' 2")
Weight: 52 kg (114 lbs)
Likes: Banana

She is an uptight and by the book member of the Student Council's Hallway Monitoring Committee, it is hinted that she often reprimands Chiwa due to her rowdy behavior along the hallways. She and Eita's friend, Kaoru, were classmates in elementary school.

name: Chiwa Harusaki
about:
Birthday: May 1
Age: 16
Height: 150 cm (4' 9")
Weight: 45 kg (99.2 lbs)
Likes: Kendo

Eita's childhood friend and neighbour who is in love with him, and a 1st year Highschool student. Her friends often call her 'chihuahua' (Chiwawa), due to her petite appearance and two ponytails that resemble puppy's ears. She used to be in Kendo Club until the last year of junior highschool due to a critical injury. She is tomboy, who loves eating meat, as she thinks about food from dawn till dusk. She wants to be popular with males, and constantly fights Masuzu for Eita's efforts. She is also a terrible cook.

(Sources: The novels, Wikipedia)

name: Eita Kidou
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: May 6
Gender: Male
Height: 165 cm
Hair Color: Brown
Eye Color: Brown
Blood Group: A

The main character and a first year high school student. He aims to attend medical school after graduating from high school. Eita is very smart and always places at the top of the class during term exams. He doesn't like romance and love, as he calls himself "anti-romance." However, there is a reason for this: his parents divorced to search for 'the real one' and left him alone, never appearing before him again. This is why he lives with his aunt, Saeko-san.

name: Masuzu Natsukawa
about:
Age: 16
Height: 160 cm
Weight: 52 kg
Likes: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure

Masuzu is Eita's classmate and his girlfriend. A first year high school student, who spent nine years overseas. She is considered to be the school beauty and is constantly confessed to by male students before she forms a fake relationship. She is bold and acts more evil out of school and she is very devious. Like Chiwa, she is a terrible cook.






(Source: Novels, Wikipedia)

name: Kaoru Asoi
about:
Eita's classmate and his best friend.

He is also friends with Ai whom was his former classmate back in elementary school.

name: Saeko Kiryuu
about: Saeko is Eita's aunt. She lives and takes care of him, but rarely comes home due to work. Saeko works in a gaming company, where she mostly makes scripts, graphics, coding and even music.

name: Mana Natsukawa
about: Masuzu's little sister.

name: Sakagami
about: Appears in episode 2.

name: Yoshie Tanaka
about: Appears in episode 8, as Eita's classmate during middle school, who dumped him as he confesses his love for her.

name: Sakura Akino
about:
Birthday: September 19
Age: 17
Eye Color: Purple
Height: 165 cm

Sakura Akino, nicknamed Cosmos (秋桜), is a third year High School student and the Student Council President.

Cosmos is a hardworking and proper girl who is very organized and always on time, if not early, to everything. She always carries her notebook, in which she writes frequently to make notes and plans.

Cosmos's whole demeanor changes when she is nervous, especially around Sun (Cosmos' crush). When she gets nervous, she panics when speaking, which leads to her saying the wrong thing, and she sometimes even talks like a cat-girl unintentionally.
She has something of a coping mechanism to suppress her panic when speaking, in which she talks like an Edo-era samurai.

(Source: Oresuki Wiki)

name: Aoi Hinata
about:
Birthday: June 30
Age: 16
Eye Color: Brown
Height: 155 cm
Weight: 58 kg

Aoi Hinata, also known by her nickname Himawari (向日葵), is a main character in OreSuki. She is a second year high school student and is also the ace of the school's Tennis Club.

Himawari is a bubbly and energetic social butterfly. Despite her outgoing nature, she gets nervous easily, especially around her crush at the beginning of the series, Sun. However after a fight broke out between the group and the reconciled as friends she doesn't have feeling for him anymore and does not appear nervous around him anymore. Himawari is fairly hyperkinetic and is shown to be a physically affectionate person mostly to Joro as she greets him by slapping his back or even tackling him, much to his annoyance. When asking for a favor she can be rather clingy, something that has aroused Joro in many occasions. After Sun's plot was revealed, Himawari was extremely apologetic toward Joro and wanted to stay out of his way to avoid causing more trouble. She was overjoyed when Joro reconciled with her. She does try to help joro in many situations but often unintentionally annoys or hurts him. However it seems that she isn't good at reading his emotions which causes confusion between the two. According to Joro, Himawari’s eyes would dart to the right once and the left twice whenever she is lying.

(Source: Oresuki Wiki)

name: Amatsuyu Kisaragi
about:
Birthday: February 1
Age: 16
Eye Color: Grey
Height: 170 cm
Weight: 60 kg

Amatsuyu Kisaragi, nicknamed Joro (如雨露), is the protagonist of Oresuki. He is a second year High School student and the Student Council secretary.

(Source: Oresuki Wiki)

name: Sumireko Sanshokuin
about:
Birthday: December 31
Age: 16
Eye Color: Blue
Height: 160 cm
Weight: 57 kg

Sumireko Sanshokuin, sometimes called by her nickname Pansy (三色菫), is a main character in Oresuki. She is a second year High School student and a helper in the school library.

Pansy looks like an unattractive gloomy bookworm with long black hair tied in braids, thick glasses and a sharp tongue towards Joro. Beneath her unappealing exterior, she is in fact a gorgeous beauty with a bust size far larger than she typically shows.

Pansy presents herself as an authentic and common person yet an individual with strong charisma and observation. From her perspectives and experiences, she shows herself to be a well-mannered smooth-talker with good advice and a level head, as well as a lovable beauty queen. She appears as a strong person with powerful enthusiasm, but she does show fear at the thought of being with her stalkers.

She is polite to her peers at school, only turning a sharp tongue at Joro. After she makes friends with Himawari, Cosmos and Sun, she shows that she is very kind and considerate to people close to her.

Pansy was pushed into dating Hose in middle school, and she moved away to get away from him, as well as vowed to never keep her true feelings hidden and clash with them head-on once she’s become a high schooler (which trouble Joro the most). She sees that Joro is very similar to Hose and she aims to prevent him from becoming like Hose by giving him affection, as well as forcing him to face his shortcomings such as his inferiority complex.

(Source: Wikipedia, Oresuki Wiki)

name: Hina Hanetachi
about:
Birthday: March 3
Eye Color: Blue
Height: 157 cm

Hina Hanetachi, also known by her nickname Asunaro (翌桧), is a character in Oresuki. She is a second year student in High School and a member of the school Newspaper Club.

Asunaro is a cheerful and energetic girl who is kind and helpful. As part of the Newspaper Club, she is often running around gathering information for her articles.

Asuanaro loves Joro that she has tried to get closer to him, but rarely finds the opportunity to because he is often with Himawari or Cosmos, which drives her to become jealous of them. After the climax of the First Arc, Joro no longer spent time with Himawari and Cosmos, but before Asunaro could make a move, she saw Joro with Pansy. This causes her to see Pansy as her main rival. She decides it is impossible for her to grow to be the closest to Joro, so she formulates a plan to push the others away from him.

Asunaro is very manipulative and good with words. She effortlessly blackmailed Joro by threatening to release a false article about him. She was also able to send an anonymous message to several people, worded in such a way that discouraged them all from participating in the Kabuten dance, and even poisoned Sun, all so that she would be able to dance with Joro.

(Source: Oresuki Wiki)

name: Yasuo Hazuki
about:
Joro's love rival and the target of affection of Cherry and, his childhood friend, Tsukimi. He is a second-year student at Toshobu High School and likes Pansy.

(Source: oresuki.fandom)

name: Asaka Mayama
about:
Birthday: July 15
Eye Color: Pink
Height: 159 cm

Asaka Mayama, also known by her nickname Sasanqua (山茶花), is a character in Oresuki. She is a second-year student in High School and the leader of the Charismatic Group.

Sasanqua is a charismatic and protective person who cares for the wellbeing of her fellow students. She is not afraid to stand up to any potential threat, using her charisma to intimidate.

She also has a softer side, particularly regarding Joro. She is good-hearted and sincere but prideful, which leads to her showing traits of a typical tsundere.

She is also honourable and kind, as evidenced by her feeling guilty after finding out that the article about Joro was fake and this feeling like she not only needed to apologize but also do something in return for him as well. She's also shy around Joro which often leads to her friends pushing her to talk to Joro alone, like the times they took her to Joro's work or when she was about to ask him to go the amusement park with her.

(Source: Oresuki Wiki)

name: Chiharu Youki
about:
Birthday: November 11
Eye Color: Grey
Height: 163 cm

Chiharu Yoki, nicknamed Tsubaki (椿), is a character in Oresuki. She is a second-year transfer student in Joro's class.

Tsubaki is a kind and helpful person who is charismatic and confident when speaking and she is very professional in her work and takes it seriously.

After meeting Joro, she was stunned at how far he was willing to go to help his friend, Sun. By coincidence, she transferred into his class, and she decided she would help him embrace his role as a main character rather than letting his inferiority complex control him.

She is not infatuated with Joro, although she does get flustered when Joro compliments her, and (platonically) swears her eternal devotion to him by kissing his hand.

(Source: Oresuki Wiki)

name: Amane Fujimiya
about:
A moody, cold, tall, black hair student who lives alone in his apartment.
His life turns upside down after meeting the school's Angel Mahiru Shiina.

name: Mahiru Shiina
about:
Age: 16 (Anime/Manga), 17 (Light Novel/Web Novel)
Hair Color: Blonde/Flaxen
Eye Color: Caramel
Height: 155 cm
Birthday: December 6th

Mahiru's appearance is consistently described as beautiful. Her straight, well-groomed, flaxen blond hair is silky smooth and lustrous. Her large caramel-colored eyes are framed by long lashes on both the top and bottom. Additionally, she has pale, milky-white skin that is soft and flawless, and a shapely nose.

Her clothing choices are trendy yet high-quality and practical. They are modest and not too revealing, reflecting her humble and unassuming personality.

Due to her parents' abandonment, both physically and emotionally, Mahiru was raised by Koyuki-san, a housekeeper. This has made her very withdrawn, much like a lone flower in an unreachable place. She hides her thoughts and feelings behind a figurative mask, appearing angelic but distant. Mahiru excels in cooking, impressing Amane, his friends, and his parents. She is also very organized, practical, and frugal, easily managing household tasks. 

Mahiru excels both academically and athletically, often ranking at the top of her class with perfect scores. She is a tireless worker who strives to make her achievements seem effortless. 

Mahiru is an innocent, cute, kind, and loving person with a strong moral compass and a deep generosity. She goes out of her way to help others when she feels safe doing so. While she maintains a guarded demeanor, especially regarding her parents, she avoids lying and tends to become reserved or cold when discussing past trauma. Her private honesty emerges more clearly when she is alone, though she never expresses it harshly.

Mahiru has some social awkwardness, particularly in close relationships, often making gestures that might be misinterpreted. She also struggles with self-confidence and is often surprised by, and relieved from, genuine compliments from Amane.

Mahiru, being the most popular girl at school, primarily interacts with other female students due to the frequent and unwanted attention from boys who are infatuated with her. She dislikes this attention and is cautious about trusting strangers. To keep people at a distance and protect her privacy, she readily lies or obfuscates the details of her life. Despite these efforts, she maintains an impeccable image, always appearing polite and humble about her achievements, which further reinforces her perfect reputation among her peers.

(Source: Otonari no Tenshi-sama Wiki)

name: Itsuki Akazawa
about: He is the best friend of Amane Fujimiya and boyfriend of Chitose Shirakawa.

name: Shuuto Fujimiya
about: Shuuto is the father of Amane Fujimiya.

name: Shihoko Fujimiya
about: Shihoko is the mother of Amane Fujimiya.

name: Yuuta Kadowaki
about: Yuuta is Amane's and Itsuki's classmate.

name: Sayo Shiina
about: Sayo is the mother of Mahiru Shiina

name: Chitose Shirakawa
about: She is the girlfriend of Itsuki Akazawa.

name: Ougi Oshino
about:
Ougi appears as a girl with short black hair, black pupils, and pale white skin and is a junior of Koyomi Araragi at Naoetsu Private High School, as Ougi refers to Koyomi as senpai. Ougi claims to be Meme Oshino's niece.

In Hanamonogatari and Orokamonogatari, Ougi appears as a male.

name: Izuko Gaen
about:
Gaen Izuko debuted in Tsubasa Tiger as Episode's latest client, and was in a different kind of business with the vampire hunter during the appearance of the tiger-shaped oddity Kako.

She is a young-looking woman who wears hip-hop-style clothes that are too big for her. She is the most knowledgeable specialist in the series. Gaen claims to know everything, to the degree where she can predict the future; as a result, she likes to brag about this and her catchphrase is "There is nothing I don't know, I know everything." Although the credibility of her claims over "knowing everything" may be debatable, it can be argued that she is good in taking advantage of what she knows and what other people do not know, allowing her to break down a person's confidence, like Tsubasa's confidence in her knowledge, for example.

She has five cellphones and gave Koyomi three of her contact numbers during the events of "Shinobu Time." Compared to Meme, who wants compensation, Kaiki, who works for money, and Yozuru, who works for free, Gaen demands "friendship" as a form of payment. In other words, she demands that people owes her a favors and doesn't pay her now, but later. She doesn't tell when or what favors she wants done and that she is essentially building a network of people who owe her favors, and use these favors as transactions to get what she wanted done.

name: Tadatsuru Teori
about:
Tadatsuru Teori was a dollmaster and another Oddity specialist. Similar to Yozuru Kagenui, he specialized in immortal oddities. In particular, he specialized in dead oddities rather than living ones like Kagenui. As a stray specialist, Tadasturu was obsessed with oddities and viewed them as beautiful creatures and even sometimes captured them for himself.

Tadatsuru was also involved in Izuko Gaen's group in college that included Meme Oshino, Yozuru Kagenui, and Deishuu Kaiki known as the Occult Research Club. Due to their different interests in oddities, Tadatsuru and Kagenui didn't get along well. After the group created Yotsugi Ononoki and she chose Kagenui over him as her master, they've been rivals ever since.

name: Eiko Tsukimi
about:
Age: 20-21 (estimate)
Birthday: March 22
Height: 164.5 cm (5'5")

Tsukimi Eiko is an amateur-singer at BB-Lounge, and hopes to debut as a singer one day. After meeting Kongming, her singing-career finally takes off.


(Source: Ya Boy Kongming Wiki)

name: Kongming Zhuge
about:
Zhuge Liang (Courtesy name Kongming) was a military strategist during China's Three Kingdoms period, reincarnated to modern day Japan after his recorded death. At club BB Lounge, he witnesses Eiko's performance on stage. Charmed by her singing, he decides to help her become a successful singer by becoming her "tactician."

He easily becomes employed as a part-time bartender at BB Lounge due to the owner's deep interest in the Three Kingdoms period.

name: DJ Satori
about:
DJ Satori is the main DJ at BB Lounge. He is usually seen wearing a fisherman's cap with a hooded jacket.

(Source: Ya Boy Kongming Fandom Wiki)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Eiko's Fan
about:
He has been a fan of Eiko since she started singing at BB Lounge, and attends almost all her concerts, including Lady's Ready Night and the Yoyogi Arts Festival, thus earning him the title of Eiko's No.1 Fan. He is tech savvy and has great video and photo editing skills



(Source: Ya Boy Kongming Fandom Wiki)

name: Mia Iriomote
about:
Age: 26
Hair Color: Black
Eye Color: Brown
Occupation: Singer, Social Media influencer

Mia Iriomote is a popular singer who has 100,000 followers.

(Source: Paripi Koumei Wiki)

name: Kabe Taijin
about:
Real name: Taito Kawabe.
Titled the "Magician of words", "The precision machine of rhyme" and "The inventor of the rap world." A freestyle rapper with overwhelming ability, he has won the MC Battle Championship DRB for the third time in a row.

(Source: mangainfo.work)

name: Toshihiko Karasawa
about:
He is a producer at the major music company Key Time, and is also responsible for the popular band AZALEA. He approached AZALEA and repproached them as a washed up unpopular band, and offered them an opportunity that will turn them into a popular band within two years, but under the condition that they'll sing his songs. 

(Source: Ya Boy Kongming Fandom Wiki)

name: Steve Kido
about:
Hair Color: Brown
Eye Color: Light brown

Steave Kido is a famous DJ, arranger and composer who'd DJed in Los Angeles and Ibiza. One of his most famous acts was at Summer Sonia (three years before Eiko was first introduced to Steave), where he threw cakes at the crowd.

Steave Kido is based on real-life DJ Steve Aoki, who once threw cakes at the crows during his performance in Tomorrowland.

(Source: Ya Boy Kongming Fandom Wiki)

name: Nanami Kuon
about:
Singing Voice: Lezel

Nanami Kuon is a bassist and is first seen busking on the streets of Shibuya. After encountering Eiko Tsukimi, they both grew close through their mutual love of music. She is a talented singer and bassist. Her skills even won the praise of Eiko.

(Source: Ya Boy Kongming Wiki)

name: Owner Kobayashi
about: Kobayashi is the owner of BB Lounge, a nightclub in Shibuya. He is also a Three Kingdoms fanatic, even going so far as to hire Kongming (who he believes is a skilled impersonator) to satisfy his love of the time period.

name: Part-timer
about: Works at BB Lounge, a nightclub in Shibuya. Calm and positive young man.

name: Ryo
about:
RYO is the main guitarist and leade vocal of the indie band Jet Jacket. His appearance led Zhuge Kongming to deduce that Ryo is a sensitive person who likes to plan ahead.

(Source: Ya Boy Kongming Fandom Wiki)

name: Sasaki
about: A friend of Kabe Taijin who inspired him to rap.

name: Kung Fu Sekitoba
about:
A young rapper that's never been defeated before, that was until Kabe-Taito appeared. Sekitoba Kung Fu had never forgotten about his defeat under Kabe, and has been eager to have a rematch with him in an MC battle ever since.

(Source: Paripi Koumei Wiki)

name: Tsuyoshi's Secretary
about: Secretary of Tsuyoshi Kondo. Translating the chief's speech into Japanese, she parodies his voice.

name: Beatrice
about: A mysterious mage who was hired by Roswaal to keep his ancient magical tomes safe in his enormous library. She has the ability to warp any room in the mansion to this library whenever she chooses, but can't completely leave the mansion. Despite of her cold behavior and verbal abuses to Subaru, Beatrice can't stand if people are hurt in front of her and becomes one of people that Subaru can trust.

name: Emilia
about:
Birthday: September 23
Height: 164 cm (5'4.5")

The main female protagonist. She is a silver-haired half-elf girl who is one of the candidates to become the next ruler in the royal election. Subaru first meets her when her insignia is stolen by Felt as she needs to possess it to be eligible to participate in the election. She introduces herself as Satella when she and Subaru met during the first timeline before introducing herself by her real name when she got her insignia back.

Emilia is good natured and likes to take care of others, though she herself refuses to admit it, instead thinking of it as her own selfishness. She is indifferent to her own appearance, leaving Puck to take care of her clothes and hair. Because her appearance is similar to the Witch of Envy, she has received unfair discrimination from others. She sometimes acts like a child and is unacquainted with the world as she used to live in the woods with other Elves, though despite this she still works hard to become a ruler.

name: Subaru Natsuki
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: April 1
Height: 173 cm (5'8")

On the way home from the convenience store, he suddenly finds himself transported into another world. He has the ability that he calls "Return by Death" to go back in time when he dies, with only himself being aware of the reversal of time. Despite being a hikikomori and gamer in his real world, Subaru does a bit of workout and seems to know basic hand-to-hand combat, making him not completely weak.

While Subaru tends to not read the situation, he is loyal to those he holds dear, willing to help them, even if that means taking the thorny path. He has his resolve confirmed through the many situations and circumstances he faces in the fantasy world, originally having been one to always take the "easy" route. As a hikikomori, he is hopeful of the possibilities that being sucked into a new realm brings, but later realizes the realities of the predicament he is in. Ultimately, he resolves himself to be faithful and protective of the ones that he cares most about.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Pack
about: Pack is Emilia's magical creature. He has the appearance of a cat and has strong ice powers. He calls Emilia his daughter.

name: Ram
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: February 2
Height: 154 cm

Ram is one of the twin maids working for Roswaal L Mathers. She is seemingly self centered and does things at her own pace, however, in actuality she maintains a distance from people to ascertain them. She believes that Roswaal is the greatest and no one else is as precious, except for her sister Rem.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Rem
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: February 2
Height: 154 cm (5'1'')

Rem is one of the twin maids working for Roswaal L Mathers. She tends to speak in a superficially polite manner and sometimes acts without thinking. She holds both worshipping respect and guilt toward her sister for an incident in the past; because of this, Rem tends to think of herself as inferior.



(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Mongfa Bai
about:
Birthday: November 11th
Zodiac: Scorpio
Blood Type: O
Hobbies / Special Skills: tai chi, yoga
Favorite things: liquor, lychee

(Source: Official Site)

name: Irina Ilyukhina
name_kanji: イリーナ・イリューヒナ
about:
Birthday: August 30th
Zodiac: Virgo
Blood Type: A
Hobbies / Special Skills: making sweets, embroidery
Favorite things: palatschinke

(Source: Official Site)

name: Amelia Irving
name_kanji: アメリア・アーヴィング
about:
Birthday: March 26th
Zodiac: Aries
Blood Type: B
Hobbies / Special Skills: reading, calculation
Favorite things: pudding, pancakes

(Source: Official Site)

name: Karin Istel
about:
Birthday: February 13th
Zodiac: Aquarius
Blood Type: B
Hobbies / Special Skills: shopping, SNS
Favorite things: chocolate, pretzels

(Source: Official Site)

name: Aoi Izumisawa
about:
Birthday: October 1st
Zodiac: Libra
Blood Type: AB
Hobbies: cooking, making accessories
Favorite thing: ichigo daifuku

A Japanese student and Asahi's classmate. She wears glasses and has a bright and cheerful personality.

(Source: Official Site, Wikipedia)

name: Asahi Kashiwagi
about:
Birthday: October 8th
Zodiac: Libra
Blood Type: O
Hobbies / Special Skills: soccer
Favorite thing: bananas

(Source: Official Site)

name: Yoshio Ijuuin
about:
Birthday: April 1st
Zodiac: Aries
Blood Type: AB
Hobbies / Special Skills: games, information gathering
Favorite things: snacks

(Source: Official Site)

name: Fa
about: The half-dragon girl. She works as a realtor in a real estate agency with Kotone Kazairo, Rufuria and Rakira. Cheerful and carefree, she is able to communicate with many different creatures and often acts as a translator between animals and humans. She is especially friendly with Kotone, who lives next door to her.

name: Kotone Kazairo
about: A girl who came to the capital from the countryside and got a job as a realtor in a real estate agency. Thanks to her kindness and hard work, she instantly became friends with her colleagues: Fa, Rakira and Rufuria. She feels a special affection for Fa, which she worries about and cares in every possible way. Despite her magical education, Kotone has not succeeded in magic and has little magical power. Sometimes she is absent-minded and frivolous. Kotone also sings well, loves flowers very much and is well versed in plants.

name: Rakira
about: A realtor, a colleague of Rufuria, Kotone Kazairo and Fa. She is especially friendly with Rufuria, with whom she lives in the same room. Rakira was raised as a warrior and has many combat skills. Constantly increases the combat level and is always ready to fight to protect her friends. She loves to cook and often pampers colleagues with culinary masterpieces in her spare time.

name: Rufuria
about: A realtor in a real estate agency, a colleague of Kotone Kazairo, Rakira and Fa. She is responsible for her work, a true professional in her field. Despite her success in real estate, Rufuria dreams of becoming a high priestess in the kingdom. She likes to read newspapers, so she is always up to date with all events. She is friends with Rakira and lives with her.

name: Hibiki Kazairo
about: Tsuzumi's twin sister and Kotone's younger sister.

name: Tsuzumi Kazairo
about: Hibiki's twin sister and Kotone's younger sister.

name: Lily
about: The girl who came to RPG real estate to find a place to live. Necromancer, loves ghosts.

name: Mona
about: A sorceress who performs various tasks for Satona. The official representative of the kingdom of Actus, working in tandem with Seira.

name: Satona
about: The High Priestess of the kingdom of Actus. He has unlimited power both in the internal affairs of the kingdom and on the battlefield. She is always firm and cold-blooded in her decisions. Possesses powerful healing magic.

name: Seira
about: The official representative of the kingdom of Actus, working in tandem with Mona under Satona.

name: Toto
about: A girl who moved from the countryside to the capital of the kingdom of Actus. She is inseparable from her pet Shiro.

name: Tomoya Aki
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: December 18

A hardcore consumer otaku who has a fateful encounter with Megumi prompting him to uncover some inexplicable urge to create a galge focused around her. 

A donkan by nature, he is practically immune to his surroundings and goes off on his own tangents.

name: Utaha Kasumigaoka
about:
Birthday: January 31
Three sizes: B89-W61-H88

Popular acclaimed writer whom Tomoya Aki is a fan of. Rarely approached and often admired from a distance by her peers. Perfect in aspects any male would want: beautiful, intelligent, graceful, cold, and composed.

She joins Tomoya's circle by leveraging her writing talents in order to get closer to him.

name: Megumi Katou
about:
Birthday: September 23
Age: 16
Height: 160 cm
Three sizes: B84-W57-H83

Megumi is the girl in the summer dress that Tomoya Aki met during "fate's summons," on top of the hill. Tomoya feels like she is the most beautiful girl he has seen, and soon after, he is inspired to make a dating sim game, with her as the main heroine. However, he is initially disappointed in her real personality as she is an extremely normal girl, to the point where Tomoya didn't even realize that he was classmates with her. She is also very stealthy, and due to her lack of presence, people forget that she is in the room. However, soon after, Megumi agrees to be the model of the main heroine in Tomoya's game.

name: Eriri Spencer Sawamura
name_kanji: 澤村・スペンサー・英梨々
about:
Birthday: March 20
Three sizes: B79-W56-H86

Tomoya Aki's Japanese-British childhood friend. Popular, intelligent, and elegant. She's a well known figurehead amongst her peers (along with Kasumigaoka Utaha). A naturally gifted artist who holds accolades under her name from a young age. But behind closed doors, her maniac side is shown and the tsundere side takes form.

Joins in Aki's efforts even though he "wastes her time with such a retarded project."

name: Izumi Hashima
about:
Birthday: May 5
Three sizes: B88-W58-H86

Izumi is a student in class 3-A of Honoda Junior High, and two years younger than Tomoya, and it was through Tomoya's influence that she became interested in otaku culture. She is deeply grateful to Tomoya for this. There is rivalry between Eriri and Izumi, then Izumi decided to compete with Eriri in the next Winter Comiket. Izumi made up her mind to be the illustrator for her brother Iori's doujin circle "Rouge en rouge."

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Iori Hashima
about: Izumi's older brother. He is also Tomoya's old friend.

name: Tokino Himekawa
about: The guitarist in Michiru's band. She is also a voice actor fanatic.

name: Michiru Hyoudou
about:
Birthday: December 18
Three sizes: B86-W56-H84

Tomoya's cousin who was born in the same hospital as him. She is a second-year student at Tsubaki Girls' Senior High School. A stoic by nature, seemingly uninterested in everything but her band. The band is actually the first thing she was passionate about; she rarely sticks to anything but was absorbed by the band. Michiru is versatile and often considered a genius, except her poor performance in school.

Recruited to Tomoya's project to compose music. Initially rejecting the offer, but after seeing the dire straits that the project was in, caved in and decided to help out after all. Michiru doesn't like otakus and otaku culture, and often tries doing all kinds of things to turn Tomoya away from his otaku hobbies, like throwing away his figurines and then trying to offer herself to him.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Echika Mizuhara
about: The bass player in Michiru's band. She is a Vocaloid addict.

name: Ranko Morioka
about: The drummer in Michiru's band. She is a casual otaku fan.

name: Akane Kosaka
about: Manga artist and founder of the group Rouge en rouge.

name: Yoshino Koharu
about:
Koharu is the main character. She did not like the countryside and yearned to live in the capital. She has come all the way to Tokyo to find that "special something," however she still has yet to find out what that "thing" is. She has failed her entrance examinations for 30 companies and suddenly a request for work comes in one day. By a stroke of luck, she goes from nothing to being a Queen (Angel of Sightseeing) for a mini-independent kingdom. So, she sets out for Manoyama Town. She is a friend to everyone, but she is serious to the core. She is a normal girl. However, she has a bit of a complex about her "normalness."

(Source: Honey's Anime)

name: Sanae Kouzuki
about:
Sanae moved to Manoyama Town half a year before Yoshino and has an incredible need to appear interesting. She was born and raised in Tokyo. However, after graduating from college, she joined an IT company, and then subsequently quit it. Sanae dreams of being an ecologically conscious consumer. She lives in an old Japanese-style house and does some sort of IT-related work.

(Source: Honey's Anime)

name: Maki Midorikawa
about:
After having her dreams shattered of being an actress, Maki has moved back home to her hometown of Manoyama Town. In Tokyo, Maki had been a part of a small theater troupe and enjoyed dining out. In order to fund her activities, she had multiple part time jobs. She has a cool, big sister-like disposition.

(Source: Honey's Anime)

name: Ririko Oribe
about:
Ririko hates her countryside town of Manoyama Town, but she does not have the courage to leave. After graduating high school, she was not able to find a decent job, so she ended up becoming a hikikomori spending her days surfing the net. Ririko has an issue with communicating. She does have one friend. That person is her childhood friend Shiori.

(Source: Honey's Anime)

name: Shiori Shinomiya
about:
Shiori is a staff member of the Manoyama Town Tourism Bureau who works side by side with Yoshino. She loves her hometown and is quite stable and conservative. She is bright and always keeps a positive face on. She looks after others well and is great with chores. Shiori would make an excellent housewife.

(Source: Honey's Anime)

name: Alexandre Sena Davis Celibidache
name_kanji: アレクサンドル・シーナ・デイビス・チェリビダッケ / サンダルさん

name: Yuzu Iizuka
about:
Birthday: September 27
Zodiac: Libra

Kaede's friend since junior high school. She loves yakisoba (fried noodles), goes to school by motorcycle, and is good at dancing. She is often mistakenly called "Mikan" by Mitsuki.

name: Kaede Ikeno
about:
Birthday: February 2 (Aquarius)

Yuzu's friend since elementary school, class president, has a little brother and sister. She is highly perceptive, and likes to trick with others.

Her symbol is a maple leaf ("Kaede" means "maple" in japanese).
She became the vice-president of the student council in her second year of high school.

name: Shizuku Minami
about:
Birthday: April 15

Kotone's cousin who is usually expressionless and calm. Her expressions are overblown when she's happy or angry. She likes to do fashion shows alone with the clothes she buys.

name: Kotone Noda
about:
Birthday: January 3 (Capricornus)

Shizuku's cousin who comes from a rich family, but decided to live in Shizuku's house. She loves to tease other people, especially Haruka and Yuu. She's in love with Shizuku.

name: Yuu Sonoda
about:
Birthday: June 24
Sign: Cancer
Likes: green tea flavour, matcha

Yuu can be childish sometimes while getting along with Haruka or other classmates. She doesn't have good grades at school, and needs Haruka's help for her school work.

Just like her sister, Yuu has flower-shape hair ornaments.

name: Haruka Takayama
about:
Birthday: August 25
Sign: Virgo

A student of Misato West High School, the big white hair ribbon is her trademark.

Haruka didn't have friends before she met Yuu, and as a result, she gets jealous whenever Yuu gets along with others. While Haruka acts silly sometimes, she is good at academics, and can even teach Yuu. She is also good at cooking, but bad at drawing.

Yuu likes to call her "S.B.J.K." (Shitto Bukai Joshi Kousei, which means "deeply jealous high school girl"), and Kotone tends to call her "Harupoppo."

She is always pleased to find yuri couples.

name: Sumi Otokawa
about:
Birthday: May 30
Sign: Gemini

Sumi becomes the president of the student council after Mitsuki graduate. She has some habits such as speaking with literary words, and grabbing other girls' chests. Her friends like to call her with the nickname "sumisumi".

name: Rina Sakai
about:
Birthday: November 8
Sign: Scorpius

The vice president of the student council, loves garlic.
She goes to the same college with Mitsuki after graduation.

name: Mitsuki Sonoda
about:
Birthday: August 10 (Leo)

Yuu's older sister, and the president of the student council. She tends to fantasize a lot and is not aware of it.

Just like her sister, Mitsuki has flower-shaped hair ornaments and loves matcha.

name: Yamada
about: Yamada is one of the maid in Kotone's family, she often help out Kotone and Shizuku.

name: Ryuunosuke Akasaka
about:
Age: 16

Ryuunosuke is a second-year student of Suiko. He is the resident of room 102 at Sakura Dormitory. He is a hikikomori who rarely leaves his room and usually communicates with others through cellphone messages and e-mails. To reduce the need to communicate with others, he has written the "Maid" program. He is an expert of computer programming and contributes lots of useful advice and information to Sorata for the latter's computer game. According to Ryuunosuke, his ultimate goal is to make Maid become a real human.




(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Nanami Aoyama
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: September 6
Zodiac Sign: Virgo
Gender: Female
Eye Color: Yellow
Blood Type: A
Height: 158cm

Nanami is Sorata's classmate. Although she is harsh toward Sorata, she actually has a crush on him, and everyone aside from Sorata has noticed this. She escaped from her home to become a voice actress and thus has to live on her own.

name: Misaki Kamiigusa
about:
Height: 156 cm
Weight: 46 kg
Three sizes: B87-W56-H86

Misaki is the resident of room 201. Misaki is a third-year-student of Suiko who later attends Suimei University of the Arts. She is very outgoing and optimistic. Sorata often refers to her as an "alien." She has very good grades and is very good at drawing, but the school decided to send her to Sakurasou Dormitory because she pays too much attention on drawing anime and manga. She is very good at making animation and can handle most work in making one without help from others. She has already sold an animation to a famous publishing company and made enough of a fortune for the rest of her life.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Sorata Kanda
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: May 9
Zodiac Sign: Taurus
Gender: Male
Eye Color: Brown
Blood Type: AB
Height: 168cm

Sorata is the male protagonist of the story. He is a second-year student of Suiko, who lives in room 101 of Sakurasou Dormitory. He was kicked out of the standard school dorm after he chose not to throw away a stray cat he picked up. As many of the Sakurasou Dormitory residents have outstanding grades and art skills, he often feels plain and normal among them. He is chosen by Chihiro to take care of Mashiro's daily life, although he resists at first, but he ends up getting used to it.




(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Jin Mitaka
about:
Height: 178 cm
Weight: 65 kg

Jin is the resident of room 103. Jin is a third-year student of Suiko. He is Misaki's childhood friend and a playboy. He has dated several girls, including Misaki's elder sister, but in the end he breaks up with all of them.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mashiro Shiina
about:
Age: 17 (beginning), 18 (light novel volume 8), 22 (light novel volume 10), 24 (light novel volume 10.5)
Birthday: June 13
Zodiac sign: Gemini
Blood type: A

Mashiro is the female protagonist of the story. She is the resident of room 202. She is a world famous artist who transferred into Suiko as a second-year to learn how to draw manga. Although her artworks are widely admired by the world in spite of her young age, she knows nothing other than drawing, and has an extreme lack of common sense and living ability. Due to this, Sorata is forced to handle Mashiro's living chores, to the point that he even has to pick out underwear for her, or she will go out without them.

She has very bad grades, since she cannot pay attention to the class, but she can still pass the make-up exams by remembering all of the answers with her art talent.

name: Rita Ainsworth
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: April 4
Height: 163 cm
BWH: 88-58-87

Rita was Mashiro's roommate and handler when Mashiro was in England. Despite her being the same age as Sorata and Mashiro, she has a better figure. She was jealous of Mashiro's art talent, and so advised Mashiro to draw manga, but later she regrets this and comes to Japan to bring Mashiro back to England. After realizing Mashiro's determination, she gives up and returns to England with Mashiro's father and starts to study art again. She argues with Ryuunosuke usually.

name: Kazuki Fujisawa
about: A game designer.

name: Shiho Fukaya
about: Classmate of Mashiro.

name: Saori Himemiya
about:
Saori "Hau-Hau" Himemiya is the person  Kamiigusa Misaki goes to for her audio.

She's also the person who dates Tatebayashi Souichirou the ex-president of the Student Council.

name: Ayano Iida
about: She's the manga editor of Mashiro.

name: Fuuka Kamiigusa
about: Misaki's big sister. She looks like Misaki and she is Mitaka Jin ex-girlfriend. She's a lot more calm and reserved than the rest of her family.

name: Father Kanda
about:
Kanda is Sorata and Yuuko's father. From his voice and speaking tone, it seems that he is quite strict with his children and doesn't like to be disturbed.

He is known as a firm father who has a strong borderline of his ideals. He obviously wants to give the best for his children, but it seems that he is quite unable to express his feelings directly. He also loves to tease Sorata.

name: Yuuko Kanda
about: Sorata's little sister, who is currently attending 9th grade. She has a brother complex and even lied to her mom, so she could just meet with Sorata. She also has a complex about her flat chest.

name: Maid-chan
about:
Maid is Ryuunosuke's artificial intelligence (AI) program he wrote personally. Originally, Ryuunosuke designed Maid to filter and automatically reply to his cellphone messages and emails to save him time. However, Ryuunosuke keeps expanding Maid's AI ability. Maid is now capable of blocking and replying to a message or email by her own preference, using new words she has recently learned from other messages, emails, or the Internet in the reply, giving Sorata solid advice for his computer game program, anticipating people's emotions with cameras, writing computer or cellphone viruses and sending them out by herself, or even hacking into Suiko's computer to steal information. The only way to distinguish Maid's message from those from a human is that she replies too quickly. Ryuunosuke lets Maid enter a social networking service, with most people who meet her not realizing she is an AI program. According to Ryuunosuke, his ultimate goal is to give Maid an artificial body and become a real human.

(Source: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo Wikia)

name: Daichi Miyahara
about: Sorata and Nanami's classmate.

name: Chihiro Sengoku
about:
Height: 164 cm
Age: 30

Chihiro is the dorm teacher of Sakurasou Dormitory and an art teacher of Suiko. Despite being a teacher, Chihiro is lazy and only cares about drinking alcohol and trying to date men. Despite being a teacher, she often gives Sorata improper advice. She is Mashiro's cousin and is the one who arranges the transfer, but she forces Sorata to take care of Mashiro due to her laziness. She was a conscientious student of Suiko, and wanted to become a professional artist, but she changed and became an art teacher for unknown reasons instead.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Momoko Souichirou
about: Momoko is a half-Indo, half-Japanese girl. She was born in Port Moresby; hence, she can speak Tok Pisin, an Indonesian language.

name: Sakuta Azusagawa
about:
Gender: Male
Age: 16-17
Birthday: April 10 (Aries)
Height: 5'7" (172 cm)
Occupation: Student
Affiliation: Minegahara High School, 2nd year

Sakuta Azusagawa (梓川 咲太, Azusagawa Sakuta) is the main male protagonist of the Seishun Buta Yarou series. He is incredibly selfless, kind and helpful, but also very snarky. He has a very similar personality to Mai: both are quick-witted, with a sarcastic streak, yet very kind and helpful, with an excellent heart, and always do what's right.

Sakuta's most iconic trait is his consistent deadpan face and manner of speech regardless of his emotional state. He will often voice whatever he has on his mind with a calm demeanor. Sakuta is a socially isolated and calm individual as a result of his ordeal with Adolescence Syndrome. 

While he states that he is not bothered by what people think about him, or care about trying to fit in and be accepted by his classmates, he does admit that rumors about him are sometimes quite painful to hear. Nonetheless, he states that he doesn't care if the whole world would hate him, as long as one person would need him, and isn't hesitant about defying social norms.

Sakuta is also not afraid to show his perverted side and will often make blunt and straightforward lewd remarks to the girls he interacts with. However, these comments are mostly jokes he directs at others and are by no means ill intended.












 

(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Mai Sakurajima
about:
Gender: Female
Age: 17-18
Birthday: December 2 (Sagittarius)
Blood Type: AB
Height: 5'4" (165 cm)
Occupation: Student, Actress, Model
Affiliation: Minegahara High School, 3rd year

Mai Sakurajima (桜島 麻衣, Sakurajima Mai) is the main character of the Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume wo Minai series. She is a notable actress/model and a third year at Minegahara High School, the same school as Sakuta Azusagawa.

Mai is a serious individual, especially around Sakuta Azusagawa. She is very sensitive, polite, levelheaded, helpful, and kind. She isn't harsh by default, but she can become easily annoyed and come across as somewhat snappy or violent especially to Sakuta. Mai tends to ignore and stuff down unpleasant feelings rather than deal with them. Sakuta often points out that she is "dishonest", often lying about her feelings. Despite her snarkiness, she's pure-hearted and even shy around Sakuta's jokes. Mai is also very intelligent; she's implied to have very good grades and even helps Sakuta study at one point. 

Mai found early fame as a model for television, magazines, and books due to the fact that her mother ran a photographing agency. While she did enjoy her job as a model in the show business, the pressure of being in the public began to take its toll on her. After being tricked and forced to participate in a swimsuit photoshoot by her mother in her early school years, Mai realized she was simply being used as a tool to make her mother easy money and took a hiatus from acting as a way to get back at her, deciding to attend highschool. 

However, because of work commitments made prior to her decision to go on hiatus she wasn't able to attend school until half-way through her first year. By then, social circles had formed, making her the "odd one out" and causing her to be isolated. As a result, the student body didn't know how to deal with her; While they had no reason to bully her, they also feared associating with her would cause themselves to be isolated as well.



Two years and several months since beginning her hiatus, Mai went to a library wearing a bunny costume to see if anyone would notice her. She then came across a boy named Sakuta Azusagawa, who was the only person in the building able to see her. After introducing themselves, however, Mai ordered Sakuta to forget about her.









(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Kaede Azusagawa
about:
Age: 14-15
Birthday: November 5 (Scorpio)
Height: 5'3" (162 cm)
Occupation: Student
Affiliation: Minegahara Middle School, 3rd Year

Kaede Azusagawa is one of the main characters of the Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume wo Minai series. She is the younger sister of Sakuta Azusagawa who suffered from Adolescence Syndrome stemming from online bullying. Since then, she has lived with Sakuta and has not attended school.







(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki, edited)

name: Boy
about:
Appearance: Episode 1

A boy who recognized Mai and wanted to take a picture of her without her knowledge.

name: Rio Futaba
about:
Gender: Female
Age: 16-17
Birthday: October 23 (Scorpio)
Height: 5'1" (155 cm)
Occupation: Student
Affiliation: Minegahara High School, 2nd year, Science Club

Rio Futaba (双葉 理央, Futaba Rio) is one of the main characters of the Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume wo Minai series, who is a second-year student at Minegahara High School. She had been in the same class as Sakuta and Yuuma during their first year and is the sole member of the Science Club.

She is a stoic and blunt girl who possesses substantial knowledge in science, including chemistry and quantum physics. She has a sharp sense of humor and is even more sarcastic and straightforward than Sakuta. Despite her stoic nature, Rio also shows various emotions such as love, as holds affection toward Yuuma, as well as anxiousness. She's also genuinely kind and loves her friends.

Rio is implied to have experienced a form of neglect. In addition, she has no siblings, which further proves that she chooses to be alone as this is her comfort zone that she unwillingly developed thanks to her lonely childhood. Although, this loneliness is what gave her the courage to approach Sakuta first when they were in the same class, as she saw him as an outcast just like her.

Before experiencing it herself, she was unwilling to believe the existence of Adolescence Syndrome, but she did acknowledge the abnormal phenomenon it induces and connects them with various scientific theories and principles.

At some point in time, Rio's feminine body parts had developed much earlier than her classmates. Once she discovered the way some boys were ogling her, she began to hate her body and felt like "a truly filthy being."

At some point during her time in the science club, she would come to be known for performing experiments that caused power outages as well as small fires.






(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Uzuki Hirokawa
about:
Birthday: April 30

She is the center idol of Nodoka's idol group "Sweet Bullet".

name: Saki Kamisato
about:
Gender: Female
Age: 16-17
Occupation: Student
Affiliation: Minegahara High School, 2nd year

Saki Kamisato (上里 沙希, Kamisato Saki) is one of the supporting characters of Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume Wo Minai series. She is the girlfriend of Yuuma Kunimi.

Saki's primary concern is her popularity at school; Saki assumed Sakuta's status as a loner would lower Yuuma's reputation and hers as well.

In later episodes, it's revealed that she has a sister that she's often compared to by her parents, causing Saki to develop low self-esteem because of it. Sakuta realized this is why she is very protective of Kunimi's image and her own because her self-image in her eyes is already fragile.



(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Tomoe Koga
about:
Gender: Female
Birthday: May 23 (Gemini)
Height: 4'11" (152 cm)
Occupation: Student, Waitress
Affiliation: Minegahara High School, 1st year

Tomoe Koga (古賀 朋絵, Koga Tomoe) is one of the main characters of the Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume Wo Minai series. As a result of Adolescence Syndrome, Tomoe is capable of eliciting simulated future events.

Tomoe has a solid desire to fit in and avoid being shunned, so she bears unease over her past and why she cares about her social life and status; the latter is why she is usually on her phone. After her experience with Sakuta, she learned not to focus on what others think of her and thanked him for helping her grow as a person.

During her time in a middle school in Fukuoka, Tomoe was a bumpkin who hung out with an unnoticed group in her class. However, her father was relocated, which forced her to move to Tokyo. Fearing she would be considered uncool and get bullied, she began wearing makeup, styled her hair in a fancy salon, and wore clothes from fashion magazines. She became satisfied with the result.









(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Yuuma Kunimi
about:
Gender: Male
Age: 16-17
Birthday: August 19th (Leo)
Occupation: Student
Affiliation: Minegahara High School, 2nd year, Basketball Club

Yuuma Kunimi (国見 佑真, Kunimi Yūma) is one of the supporting characters of the Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume Wo Minai series. He is a member of the school's basketball team, a good friend of Sakuta Azusagawa, and the boyfriend of Saki Kamisato.

Yuuma is a charming and friendly person who cares for the well-being of others not for social gain but for good intentions as a friend as he is usually the one to approach social outcasts like Sakuta Azusagawa, containing his character a friendly individual.





(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Shouko Makinohara
about:
Gender: Female
Birthday: April 10 (Aries)
Height: 4'11" (150 cm) (Younger), 5'2" (158 cm) (Older)
Occupation: Student
Affiliation: Minegahara High School, 1st year

Shoko Makinohara (牧之原 翔子, Makinohara Shōko) is one of the main characters of Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume Wo Minai series. After helping Sakuta Azusagawa deal with his sister's Adolescence Syndrome, she became Sakuta's first crush until she suddenly disappeared.

Shoko is a kind and compassionate person. She voluntarily helped Sakuta Azusagawa, and Kaede Azusagawa went through the hardships of Adolescence Syndrome and was also willing to adopt a cat left in the rain. She's typically helpful and kind-hearted, just like the two main characters, and her everyday goal is to be a little more gentle than before. She's known for teaching Sakuta to try to be as kind as possible.













(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Ranko Nakago
about: Member of the idol group "Sweet Bullet".

name: Sakuta's Father
about: Appearance: Episodes 10, 12, and 13

name: Nodoka Toyohama
about:
Birthday: March 14
Zodiac: Pisces
Height: 5'2" (158 cm)
Occupation: Student, Singer
Affiliation: Sweet Bullet, 2nd year in high school

Nodoka Toyohama (豊浜 のどか, Toyohama Nodoka) is one of the main characters of Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume Wo Minai series. She is the younger half-sister of Mai Sakurajima and a member of an idol group named Sweet Bullet.

Nodoka is quite confident and competitive but has a potent inferiority complex towards her sister. At the start of the series, the two sisters are somewhat hostile towards each other. Still, after what happened, they become very close, and she's ultimately kind like the other main characters. Nodoka later befriends Kaede.







(Source: Seishun Buta Yarou Wiki)

name: Miniskirt Santa
about:
A mysterious miniskirt Santa who suddenly appears before Sakuta. She claims to be Touko Kirishima, an unidentified online singer who has garnered public attention. Only Sakuta can see her, and she does not show up in video recordings. According to her, she is going around gifting people puberty syndrome, but...



(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Kuroto Nakano
about: Kuroto is a white collar worker who works too hard and has no time for a break. He is miserable enough to grab the attention of Senko-san a Inari goddess who helps him with his "darkness" by taking care of him. He loves to touch Senko-sans tail and calls it "fluffy-fluff".

name: Senko
about:
Senko is an 800-year-old kitsune sent from the spirit world to relieve Kuroto from his overworked and stressful life. She proudly goes above and beyond for Kuroto such as pampering him, cooking and cleaning his home. She moves in Kuroto's home and acts like a helpful wife and mother.

Senko loves to pamper Kuroto such as cleaning him, massage, groom and gives him lap pillows to ensure he gets enough sleep. She gets sad if Kuroto prioritizes work over his health. To her dismay, Kuroto seems to have a fixation on her soft fluffy tail and ears.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yasuko Kouenji
about: Yasuko is Kuroto's neighbor. She is a college student and an otaku, she loves to draw and read manga. when she first sees Senko-san she thinks she is cosplaying an anime that she watches and subsequently likes being around Senko-san.

name: Mitaka
about: Mitaka is Kuroto's co-worker and frequently asks him for help with his work.

name: Shiro
about:
Shiro is a Kitsune with long white-silver hair, ears, and tail, as well as red eyes. She also sports two red stripes on both of her cheeks.

Shiro wears a long white dress with a crescent moon on one side revealing one of her legs, as well as black stockings and shoulder-length gloves. She has a red ribbon-like scarf she wears around her lower back. Along with that, she has a black neck collar with a red gem hanging from it.

Shiro is initially arrogant when she first is introduced, believing that Kuroto should be her servant and worship Kitsunes. She is often much more energetic and unpredictable than Senko. She later becomes friends with Kuroto and Senko.

Shiro is initially sent to assist Senko with Kuroto as she is seen having trouble removing his "darkness." She later becomes Yasuko's roommate.

name: Sora
about: An over 1000 year old kitsune, she's Senko and Shiro's ruler, the one that has sent them on Earth to care for Kuroto. She has four tails proving her powers and knowledge as a fox demi-goddess, and she loves to provoke Kuroto with a very seductive and tempting way to act.

name: Kousei Arima
about:
Age: 14-15
Birthday: March 28

Kousei is a prodigy pianist and was the youngest pianist to win the Saki Competition but quit playing after the death of his mother resulted in his inability to hear the sounds of his own playing. Following the death of his mother, he lived two years without playing the piano and saw the world through monotone colors, but this changed after meeting Kaori Miyazono, a beautiful young musician who pushed Kousei to his limits in an attempt to get his fingers back onto the piano keys. 



(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wikia)

name: Kaori Miyazono
about:
Age: 14-15
Birthday: July 4

Kaori Miyazono is one of the main protagonists of Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso. She is a violinist who helps Kousei Arima return to the piano world after his mother's death.

Kaori Miyazono is a free-spirited violinist whose playing style reflects on her personality. She is independent, unpredictable, and short-tempered. It is also touched upon that she is passive aggressive at times. Kaori likes to depend on herself and only herself and can be seen as more of a support for others.

While considered a really sloppy violin player from a technical standpoint, such as not following music score sheets the way they are written, Kaori is an amazing violinist. Noted by one of the judges at Towa Hall during the first competition of the series, her pure abilities far exceed the others in the competition. She wields a free spirited style of performance that emphasizes emotions and artistry over the pure mechanics of music, such playing to specific tempos and dynamics originally intended by the composer. Her style of music is what rekindles Kousei's passion for the piano and inspires him to redefine himself as a musician.

In addition, she has the ability to play the melodica and has had some experience playing the piano.




(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wikia)

name: Tsubaki Sawabe
about:
Birthday: May 19

Tsubaki is Kousei's childhood friend. She has always gone to his performances and cheered him on. Tsubaki would often invite Kousei to play outside but due to his practice time with his mother, she usually ended in failure. Being with Kousei for a long time, Tsubaki gradually took on the role as an "older sister." Kousei was that "useless little brother she just had to take care of." Rather than the music type, Tsubaki was the athletic type. She was on the softball team in both middle school and high school along with her senpai from middle school where she enjoyed the sport a lot.

(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wikia)

name: Ryouta Watari
about:
Birthday: April 4

Ryouta is Kousei and Tsubaki's childhood friend who is also the captain of the school's soccer team. He is extremely popular with girls, often adopting a frivolous attitude. However, he does once in a while come up with good insight.

Ryota is a bit of a play-boy. He seems to prefer girls who are "cute" seen as he comments in episode 1 that when he sees Kaori for the first time he stated that Tsubaki did a good job on finding a cute looking girl.

(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wikia)

name: Nagi Aiza
name_kanji: 相座 凪 / 藍里 凪
about:
Nagi is Kousei Arima's first apprentice and student. She is a first year student, studying a music course in Kurumigaoka Junior High School. She initially introduced herself as Hiroko Seto's fan, but her ulterior motives were revealed later on. 

Nagi is stubborn and childish. She was introduced as a cunning character who despises Arima Kousei.
