Nagi maintains a realistic look in life and repeatedly testifies her hate for cliché. Because of her unerring piano skills, she is slightly arrogant and claims herself as "Angel of Kurumi Junior High". Nagi also appears to have a distaste for anyone who refers to their superiors without the appropriate honorific, as shown when Miike did not refer to Kousei Arima as his Sensei or Senpai, instead addressing him directly as "Arima."

Nagi is often seen to have a brother-complex, seeming to be completely fixated on her brother Takeshi. This complex has driven her to follow in his footsteps in order to get him to notice her and to also stop her brother's own fixation on Kousei.





(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wikia)

name: Takeshi Aiza
about:
Takeshi has a very honest and straightforward personality. He is very upfront about his rivalry and hatred (at first) for Kousei Arima. This hatred is later revealed to be an admiration of Takeshi, and how he looked up to Kousei as a hero. Takeshi looks up to Kousei to the extent of rebuking Kousei when he did not meet his expectations as a pianist. 

Takeshi is one of the best piano players of his generation, as mentioned for being invited to Europe for competitions and winning the majority of recent piano competitions in Japan. 

It was shown that prior to the storyline, Takeshi and Emi Igawa are sitting together complaining about the "emotionless" Kousei after losing to him in a piano competition. The rest of the crowd points out that Takeshi and Emi are head and shoulders above the rest of the competition, which makes Kousei all the more invincible for beating the two. In the storyline, it is shown that Takeshi looked up to Kousei as a hero, and constantly practiced in order to surpass Kousei.

(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wikia)

name: Saki Arima
about: Saki was a well-known pianist across Japan and the mother of Kousei Arima. She forced her son to play until exhaustion, often beating him for small mistakes. She wanted him to live her dream to become a world famous pianist and like that being able to survive by himself when she died.

name: Emi Igawa
about:
One of the best middle school pianist in the story, on par with Takeshi. She is known to play to her emotions and can be thrown off of her game with the slightest sense of discomfort. 

It was shown that prior to the storyline, Emi and Takeshi are sitting together complaining about the "emotionless" Kousei Arima after losing to him in a piano competition. The rest of the crowd points out that Takeshi and Emi are head and shoulders above the rest of the competition, which makes Kousei all the more invincible for beating the two. While Takeshi sees Kousei as a rival that pushes him to greater heights, Emi has a different motive. She was originally inspired by Kousei's passion and pure innocence during his first performance, she decided to learn piano under Yuriko Ochiai for the sake of expression. Over the course of the story, Emi seeks to oppose the "boring" playing style of the old Kousei in hopes to find the "true" Kousei once again.

(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wikia)

name: Nao Kashiwagi
about: Kashiwagi Nao is a supporting character of Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso and is close friends with Tsubaki Sawabe.

name: Yuriko Ochiai
about: Emi's piano teacher.

name: Hiroko Seto
about:
A close family friend of Arima. She was very close to Arima's mother and was one of her classmates years ago. Just like Arima's mother, she is widely known as a talented pianist.
First appearance in episode 10.

name: Koharu Seto
about:
Daughter of Hiroko Seto, Koharu is generally a happy and cheerful child who adores her mother. Koharu has been shown to be quite shy and hesitant around others when she first meets them, but eventually warms up to them and begins to consider them as her family, as seen when she drew a picture of Nagi Aiza playing the piano with Kousei Arima.

(Source: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso Wiki)

name: Anko Koshi
about: She is the younger sister of Torako and is a complete siscon. Usually has a dark and sinister aura when somebody acts all chummy with her sister. She does so with Noko but eventually becomes friends with her.

name: Torako Koshi
about: She acts all prim and proper on the outside while trying to keep her past as a former delinquent a secret.

name: Noko Shikanoko
about: Has a very carefree attitude and acts in very unexpected ways, causing Torako to tsukkomi almost every time. Although most of the time she may seem like an ordinary schoolgirl whose only unusual feature is her horns, throughout the story the characters encounter some of the most incredible aspects of Nokotan biology and life. It's a total mystery on what or who she is.

name: Yoshiharu Tsubameya
about: The owner and sole barista of Swallow Cafe. He is the older brother of Tsubameya Chiharu.

name: Ayame Kajou
nicknames: Blue Snow|Setsugen no Ao|The Blue in the Snow Field
about:
She is a second year high school student at Tokioka Academy and also the Vice President of the school's student council. At school she's conservative, pure and uptight, and she enforces discipline and upholds public morals around campus. However, known only to Okuma and later on with Otome, Kosuri and Hyouka, she also has an alter ego called "The Blue in the Snow Field," a foul mouth exhibitionist who walks around in public not wearing much more than a pair of panties on her head and a smock to cover her naked body. She incites obscene acts of terrorism against the society who strictly upholds the public moral where dirty jokes and toilet humor have been outlawed.

In the anime she is called "Blue Snow."

name: Anna Nishikinomiya
about: Being the president of the Student Council and a daughter to her influential parents, whom are both responsible in enforcing the ever stricter public morality laws, Anna is a soft-spoken and innocent yet strong and determined girl whose role is to get rid any materials that are deemed obscene or lewd not just in the school, but also in the society as a whole.

name: Tanukichi Okuma
about:
He is a first year high school student at Tokioka Academy, whom at the first day of school was rumored to have a low public moral standing due to a past  incident where he apologize for groping some lady's ass that he didn't do (because it was Goriki who actually did it). He admires Anna the school's student council president very much, he was recruited by Kanjou to be a probationary helper in the student council, and later on, the same latter who force him to join her subversive organization call "SOX" in return she would help him get close to Anna.

His father Okuma Zenjuurou is a well known terrorist  who gain notoriety for committing obscene acts against public morality where he opposes the enactment of "Act of Promoting Sound Ways of Life and Public Order" 16 years ago.

(Source: E Manga)

name: Kosuri Onigashira
about:
Daughter of Keisuke and a fangirl of SOX who carries multiple weapons and uses tactics she learned from romantic and shoujo manga to manipulate everyone, even her allies. Ayame lets her join in partly because her hairstyle looks similar to the tip of a penis, however her loyalty is questionable, she can be very manipulative often uses her charm to seduce boys and everyone around her were she can also be very domineering when she has them in her grip. Currently pretending to be Tanukichi's sister while hiding out at his apartment.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Otome Saotome
about:
She is an art prodigy and a senior student at Tokioka academy. Though, she renown for her artistry, she secretly has an insatiable desire of making lewd drawings that concerns all forms of lasciviousness. She was later on recruited by Kajo Ayame to join   her group where she makes lewd drawings and spreads around campus.  Because the PMs she wears detects any lewd movement her hands make, she instead taught herself to draw by holding tools with her mouth to avoid her PM's sensors. Has an unrequited crush on Anna.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Binkan-chan
about: She appears briefly in every episode, mostly showing reactions to SOX's actions or other incidents in the episode.

name: Hyouka Fuwa
about: Hyouka Fuwa is a "aspiring" scientist when it comes to "body-melding" (sex). She wishes to unlock the secrets of "body-melding" and to do so she preforms studies such as watching flies mate, and constantly harassing the main protagonist with questions. Overall Hyouka is a restless yet calm character who will go through any trouble to reveal the secrets of "body-melding."

name: Raiki Gouriki
about:
Treasurer and Secretary of the Student Council with a posture and demeanor similar to that of a gorilla, though he hates bananas. Distrusts Tanukichi upon learning that he is Zenjuro's son but later comes to respect him and even helps care for him in the hospital after Tanukichi saved Anna from some stalkers. Despite of his manly looks, his sexuality is questionable, were it suggests that he is gay.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Takuma Ichinose
about:
Ero-terrorist who wraps himself in panties and is obsessed with underwear. A "high-class pervert" who leads the group "Gathered Fabric" to steal all kinds of underwear across Japan.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Master
about:
He manages an inconspicuous cafe called "Felersio" (which is an old Greek slang for "to suck") which is frequented by Kajo, it also functions as her base of operations as well. It is suggested that Kajo owns the place and that he also serves as her butler.

(Source: ANN)

name: Sophia Nishikinomiya
about: Mother of Anna Nishikinomiya, who was behind a push for even-stricter public morality laws than the ones currently on the books like the so called "X-Bill," in order to create an ideal world that has virtually no threat to Anna's chastity.

name: Zenjuurou Okuma
about: Tanukichi's father.

name: Teihen no Kuro
about:
A friend of Tanukichi's father, Zenjuurou, when they were "dirty terrorists."

He has a fetish for black panties.

name: Oboro Tsukimigusa
about:
A school Prefect trained by Matsukage to adhere to a strict moral code that mostly revolves around protecting Anna from all potentially immoral influences, including mundane items like basketball hoops and toilet paper rolls. Oboro even has this codified under "Five Provisions," which includes the caveat that Oboro cannot interfere if Anna herself exhibits lewd behavior or desires. Surprisingly quick to reverse her position on what is considered "illegal" material when a student protests strongly enough.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Chizuru Aizawa
about: A polite girl who works at a beachhouse alongside her sister Eiko. She is much calmer and cares more for Ika's life on the surface than her sister.

name: Eiko Aizawa
about: A girl who works at a beachhouse alongside her sister Chizuru. After Ika fails to invade the surface, she forces Ika to work for her to pay off a part of the wall she destroyed. She is easily frustrated with Ika and doesn't show much concern for her well-being or safety.

name: Ika Musume
about:
Ika Musume is a squid girl who claims to be "A Messenger of the Sea." Frustrated about her ocean being polluted by human beings, she planned to conquer the world to exact revenge on humanity. However, she soon realizes that she doesn't stand a chance against anyone, as she is clueless about the surface and is alone in her conquest. As a result of breaking a side of a beach house's wall during her invasion, she is forced to work there and learns more about humans and their ways.

She is known to be very stubborn, insists that eventually she'll be able to conquer humanity, has a fear of sharks and killer whales, loves shrimp, can spew out ink at will, and can use her blue hair as tentacles.

name: Takeru Aizawa
about:
Eiko and Chizuru's little brother, who enjoys playing with Ika. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Alex
about:
Sanae's pet dog.

Dislikes Squid Girl since Sanae loves her more.

name: Gorou Arashiyama
about: A lifeguard of the local beach. As a self-proclaimed "Protector of the Sea", he has a mutual respect for Ika, despite seeing her as a hassle.

name: Cindy Campbell
name_kanji: シンディー・キャンベル
about:
An extraterrestrial researcher from the United States who believes Ika to be an alien and wishes to take her back with her for research.
(source: Wikipedia)

name: Clark
about: The Inventor.

name: Martin
about: The Researcher.

name: Yuuta Matsumoto
about: A friend of Takeru's that appears various times throughout the series.

name: Sanae Nagatsuki
about: A good friend of Eiko and Chizuru. Upon seeing Ika Musume, she finds herself infatuated with her, enough to say that she finds Ika cuter than her dog, Alex. She owns a photo album dedicated to pictures of Ika, which prompts her to subject Ika, to cosplay for her collection.

name: Nagisa Saitou
about: A surf-loving girl who starts working at the Lemon. Unlike everyone else, she sees Ika as a threat to humanity and is genuinely afraid of her. Ika on the other hand is pleased that there's someone who fears her.

name: Kiyomi Sakura
about: A middle schoolgirl who Ika makes friends with after a prank gone wrong. She is the first person who Ika makes friends with and they soon become best friends. She is the captain of her school's badminton team.

name: Kozue Tanabe
about: A gentle girl with a peaceful aura, who sometimes talks with Ika, hinting that invading might not be the best thing to do as not all humans are bad. It is implied that she also comes from the sea, as she has a hat similar to Ika's and makes statements that indicate she isn't human. The first syllables of her name spell out 'tako' (たこ?), meaning octopus.

name: Ayumi Tokita
about: The daughter of the owner of a rival beach house.

name: Tomomi Mochizuki
about: Voiced by: Yumi Uchiyama

name: Risa
about: The girl in ep. 9

name: Rei Ayanami
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: March 30, 2001
Height: 4' 11" / 149 cm
Sex: Female
Guardian: Gendou Ikari

Rei Ayanami is the "First Children" of the Marduk Report and the pilot of EVA-00. Shrouded in mystery, she is socially withdrawn and rarely shows emotion. Seemingly completely devoted to her duty as an EVA pilot, her only apparent human relationship being with Nerv commander Gendou Ikari.

However, Rei comes to know Shinji Ikari and after some initial mistrust they come to better understand each other, revealing more of Rei`s emotional side and helping Shinji trust others again.

name: Shinji Ikari
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: June 6, 2001
Height: 155 cm (5'1")
Blood type: A
Father: Gendo Ikari
Mother: Yui Ikari
Guardian: Misato Katsuragi

Shinji Ikari is the Third Child ("Third Children" in Japanese), who pilots Unit 01. He is the son of Gendo and the late Yui Ikari. Abandoned by his father, Gendo, when he was a toddler, Shinji often ran away from difficult situations. As a pilot, he panics easily and reacts very poorly to unexpected events. Over time and with encouragement from Misato, he learns to be less cowardly, more outspoken, and more confident.

name: Misato Katsuragi
about:
Age: 29
Birthday: December 8, 1986
Blood type: A (genotype: AO)
Height: 163 cm

Relations:
Father: Dr. Katsuragi
Guardian of: Shinji Ikari, Asuka Langley Soryu
Ex-girlfriend of: Ryoji Kaji
Friend of: Ritsuko Akagi
Owner of: Pen Pen

Misato Katsuragi is the chief operations officer at NERV, initially holding the rank of Captain (with a later promotion to Major). She is the field commander for the Eva pilots, issuing orders and giving battle strategies. She also acts as Shinji and Asuka's guardian, letting them live in her apartment rather than have them living alone.

While she is professional and diligent in her duties, she is a slob and a drunkard while off-duty. She is the only survivor of the Katsuragi Expedition, the scientific study led by her father which triggered the Second Impact; the cross pendant she wears was given to her by her father just before his death.

She and Ryoji Kaji were lovers during college, and slowly rekindle their romance over the course of the series. She was also friends with Ritsuko Akagi in college and their relationship unravels as Misato learns more about NERV and SEELE.

name: Asuka Langley Souryuu
name_kanji: 惣流・アスカ・ラングレー
about:
Age: 14 , 
Height: 5'1" / 155 cm
Birthdate: December 4, 2001
Zodiac sign: Sagittarius
Blood type: A
Origin: Wilhelmshaven, Lower Saxony, Germany

Relations:
Mother: Kyoko Zeppelin Souryuu 
Guardian: Misato Katsuragi 
Former Guardian: Ryouji Kaji 

Asuka is the Second Child ('Second Children' in the Japanese versions of NGE), who pilots Evangelion Unit 02. She is from Germany, but with an American father and a half-German, half-Japanese mother. In the Rebuild of Evangelion series of movies, her name is changed to Asuka Langley Shikinami.

name: Kensuke Aida
about:
Age: 14 
Birthday: September 12, 2001
Blood type: B

Kensuke Aida is an otaku, a military buff, Toji's best friend, and one of the "Other Children," Eva pilot candidates in the same class as Shinji, Toji, Rei, Asuka, and Hikari. His hobbies include camping in the mountains surrounding Tokyo-3 and playing at simulated war reenacting—by himself. Kensuke solidifies his friendship with Shinji after Shinji saves him and Toji during the fight against the fourth Angel, Shamshel. Kensuke dreams of becoming an Eva pilot and ceaselessly begs Shinji to pull strings in NERV so he can be selected as a pilot, despite Shinji telling him that he has no say in the matter. He also seems oblivious to the intense physical and psychological duress endured by Eva pilots. Nevertheless, Kensuke enjoys the privileges of being the friend of an Eva pilot; he and Toji accompany Shinji on the excursion to the UN combined naval fleet during the transportation of Unit 02. Like presumably every one of Shinji's classmates, Kensuke's mother is deceased. Like Toji, Kensuke has a crush on Misato Katsuragi. He is rarely seen without his camcorder at hand.


Kensuke is named after a main character in the novel The Fascism of Love and Fantasies (Ai to Gensou no Fascism) by Ryu Murakami. He is also similar in appearance to the character Jean, from Hideaki Anno's earlier anime Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water.

(Source: afufu.net/freewill)

name: Ritsuko Akagi
about:
Age: 30
Birthday: November 21, 1985
Blood type: B

Ritsuko Akagi is NERV's head scientist and is heavily involved in the repairs and maintenance of Tokyo-3's defenses against the Angels, particularly the Evas.

She is the daughter of Naoko Akagi, the developer of the MAGI supercomputer system which controls Nerv. In many ways, Ritsuko is living in the shadow of her mother, whom she both admires and despises. Naoko was the head scientist working on the Evangelion project before her death, and Ritsuko is continuing the work her mother began with the Evas, as well as continuing the development of the Magi supercomputer system. Flashbacks to a teenaged Ritsuko reveal that she is a natural brunette, just like her mother.

Ritsuko is extremely intelligent, with a strong dedication to her work and a stoic, detached attitude which is frequently contrasted against Misato Katsuragi's hot-headness, especially during Eva combat. Her occasional jibes at Misato are a source of comic relief in the series. She has a great affinity for cats, and Misato chides her at one point for substituting her cats for human affection. She also is a heavy smoker, as evidenced by an ashtray on her desk filled with cigarette butts stained by her lipstick.

name: Naoko Akagi
about:
Naoko Akagi was Ritsuko's mother. She was the creator of the MAGI system and the former Gehirn head technician. Naoko was involved in a romantic relationship with the recently-widowed Gendo Ikari while working at Gehirn. However, after Rei I called her an "old hag" and said that Gendo himself called Naoko that frequently, she realized that he had merely been using her affections to ensure her performance for him. In a fit of rage, Naoko strangled Rei to death and then either committed suicide or was murdered by an unknown assailant. Soon afterward, Gehirn was disbanded and the organization Nerv was formed in its place. In vol. 10 of the manga, Naoko is shown to commit suicide after killing Rei I. Ritsuko witnesses both Rei's murder and Naoko's suicide.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Shigeru Aoba
about:
Affiliation(s): NERV
Rank: First Lieutenant
Birthday: May 5

Shigeru Aoba is First Lieutenant at NERV and a computer technician. At times a stereotypical metal head, he is a nihilist and plays guitar (he can also sometimes be seen strumming an air guitar).

Again, his character is not explored in depth within the series.

(Source: afufu.net)

name: Kouzou Fuyutsuki
about:
Once a professor of meta-biology at Kyoto University, Kohzou Fuyutsuki is now Deputy Commander of NERV under Gendo. But he is not a military man, despite his professional bearing and seeming ease of command. In the director's cut, it is revealed that he has had some sort of training as a physician though he has either lost or never acquired a license to practice medicine. There is no indication given during the series of any romantic relationships or of any dependents. In the episode The Birth of NERV, in several flashbacks, a few of his students and the superior professor at his institute (who first suggests that he take on the young and brilliant Yui Ikari as a research assistant) suggest that he be more sociable; this hints at Fuyutsuki being a classically withdrawn academic, and possibly a life-long bachelor. Shortly after beginning his academic (and platonically affectionate and supportive) association with Yui Ikari, he was directed by his institution's superiors to initiate a similar arrangement with the then Gendo Rokoboungi.

Given later revelations about apparent decades-long behind-the-scenes machinations of SEELE into all aspects of the sciences directly and indirectly involved in the subject of Instrumentality (the Dead Sea Scrolls were uncovered in 1947, so presumably the world-wide conspiracy behind SEELE's operations had been in existence for only slightly less time) it is safe to say that Professor Fuyutsuki had been monitored by and targeted for recruitment by SEELE early in his career. If speculations regarding Yui actually having been a junior member of SEELE through her father's influence are correct, then Fuyutsuki's association with Gendo Rokoboungi/Ikari was equally planned well in advance. His earlier introduction to Rokoboungi/Ikari by taking him on as a research assistant, bailing him out of jail, and later meeting him again after Second Impact during a research expedition to the area formerly occupied by Antarctica may be seen as steps in a testing procedure to determine his reliability, discretion and intelligence at being able to surmise SEELE's goals...and whether he would actually be amenable to that recruitment.

Fuyutsuki's earlier assessment of Gendo Ikari's personality (in the Director's Cut, the subtitle during Fuyutsuki's recall of the initial meeting at the police station refers to Rokoboungi/Ikari as 'real bastard') was reinforced by the Antarctic mission, during which Fuyutsuki began to suspect that the now Gendo Ikari's associates in SEELE may be more powerful and dangerous than he originally realized. The seed of doubt planted during that voyage led to the discovery of the true nature of the events leading up to Second Impact and SEELE's involvement in initiating that catastrophe.

After Fuyutsuki threatened to expose Gendo to the public, regarding the massive deception concerning Second Impact, in 2003 (through his own research), Gendo Ikari led him into the GeoFront and Central Dogma and revealed to him an incomplete prototype Eva. At that point, Ikari asked Fuyutsuki to join him and "create a new future for humankind, together with me." Fuyutsuki accepted this, and started to help Gendo. Whether this agreement was entirely out of idealism or more from self-preservation is not made clear. In the movie The End of Evangelion it is mentioned that SEELE had threatened Fuyutsuki with being 'disappeared'; the implication is that this recruitment may have been a Hobson's Choice.

Despite Fuyutsuki's initial dislike of Gendo, it is clearly evident that he becomes the closest thing that Gendo has to a confidant in the series. In many episodes, Fuyutsuki may be seen as a sort of external conscience for Gendo Ikari; despite his somewhat gruff nature, Fuyutsuki is genuinely concerned for those under his commend, but having the added knowledge of SEELE's true goals for Instrumentality, must balance his compassion with Ikari's ruthlessness in pursuing both SEELE's agenda and Ikari's own hidden one of re-uniting with his discarnate Yui. Ikari's dependence upon Fuyutsuki as both confidant and his chief lieutenant is shown by the many times that Fuyutski takes the initiative for action without waiting for direction from Ikari.

As had been mentioned and implied in the series, while obviously kindly disposed towards Yui, at all times Fuyutsuki maintained a professional demeanor towards her. It is not intimated how the Destrudo experiment that 'killed' her and ensconced her soul into EVA Unit 01 affected him. The depth of his feelings for her, however, is revealed when immediately prior to dematerializing into LCL during Instrumentality, Fuyutsuki witnesses an image of Lilith-as-Yui which appears to float down to embrace him, comforting him in his transition to a non-corporeal state.

(Source: afufu.net/freewill/)

name: Hikari Horaki
about:
Age: 13 
Birthday: January 25, 2002
Known Relatives: Kodama (older sister), Nozomi (younger sister)

Hikari Horaki (洞木 ヒカリ Horaki Hikari) is the class representative of the class that Shinji and the other Eva pilots attend. Like all of her classmates, she is an unknowing Eva pilot candidate. She has a by-the-book demeanor and takes her responsibilities as "class rep" seriously. Although she frequently bickers with Toji, she reveals to Asuka that she has an enormous crush on Toji but is unable to openly express her feelings to him. She also appears to be Asuka's only friend. After the battle with Arael, Asuka seeks out Hikari and stays with her for an unspecified time. During a late evening she reveals her inner insecurities to Hikari, a testament to their friendship; however, Hikari appears saddened by the hateful words Asuka uses.

Hikari is an accomplished cook who appears to take care of her two sisters. Like presumably every one of Shinji's classmates, Hikari's mother is deceased. No references are made as to whether her father is either.

Like Kensuke, Hikari is named after a character in the novel The Fascism of Love and Fantasies (Ai to Gensou no Fascism) by Ryu Murakami. Her name, and that of her unseen younger sister, Nozomi, and elder sister, Kodama, is also in reference to the names of the trains of the Tokaido Shinkansen line.

(Source: afufu.net/freewill)

name: Makoto Hyuuga
about:
Birthday: February 13

Makoto Hyuuga is First Lieutenant at NERV and a computer technician. He is something of a nerd, reading manga while on his break time, but is a hard worker, nonetheless. He also appears to harbor a deep crush for Misato, as Lilith approaches him during his implementation in the form of Misato.

(Source: afufu.net/freewill)

name: Maya Ibuki
about:
Affiliation(s): NERV
Rank: First Lieutenant
Age: 24
Birthday: July 11, 1991

Maya Ibuki is a First Lieutenant at NERV and a computer technician who works primarily with Ritsuko Akagi. Her main role during the fights with the Angels is to constantly monitor the Eva pilots’ synchronization ratios and send various emergency commands to the Evangelions as ordered by Misato or Gendo. Her implementation scene during the The End of Evangelion movie has been read by many fans as a revelation that she is secretly in love with Ritsuko. When Maya's Instrumentality occurs, Lilith (in the form of Ritsuko) types "I need you" into Maya's laptop and embraces her. Maya's reversion to LCL comes after an ecstatic gasp of "Senpai!" However, this scene is the only one that alludes to her possible feelings towards Ritsuko, and its intention is not clear. In spite of her profession, Maya despises violence of any sort, and is frequently shown becoming nauseous and averting her eyes during battles with the Angels. Notably, in The End of Evangelion, Maya is the only NERV officer who is shown refusing to fight back against the JSSDF invaders. She rejects the gun Shigeru hands her to defend herself saying "I can't shoot this thing", not because she is unskilled, but because she has never shot it at a human being. Throughout much of the second half of End of Evangelion Maya is seen with her face buried in a pink pillow under her desk.

She is sometimes described as representing the audience's views throughout the series, as she shows revulsion when it would be most likely for the viewer to do the same, and delight in other, more light-hearted scenes.

(Source: Evangelion Eclipse)

name: Yui Ikari
about:
Yui is the mother of Shinji Ikari and the wife of Gendo Ikari, was a brilliant bioengineer who worked for Project E at Gehirn. Additionally, she is the daughter of a prominent member of Seele.

Yui Ikari is one of the more powerful presences in the series, Yui is shown to be kind, optimistic, and motherly. Her faith in humanity and belief that it is worth preserving and remembering stand out when compared to the more cynical characters on the rest of the cast.

Yui became romantically involved with a mysterious man, several years older than herself, named Gendo Rokubungi, who was constantly the source of shady rumors  among them that Gendo had approached Yui for nothing but her talent and her affiliation with Seele. Regardless, in Yui's own words, he was "quite a sweet person. It's just that no one knows it."
In the rebuild film series she's reffered to as Ayanami Yui instead of Ikari Yui




After Yui (presumably) graduated, she married Gendo, and the latter took on her surname He became involved with Seele, joining the Katsuragi Expedition to serve as an auditor, although it is not revealed what Yui was doing during this time. After Gendo returned, they had a child together, Shinji who, if a girl, would have been named Rei.


(Source: Evageeks)

name: Gendou Ikari
about:
Affiliation(s): NERV
Rank: Commander
Age: 48
Birthday: April 29, 1967
Known relatives: Shinji Ikari (son), Yui Ikari (wife, deceased)

Gendou Ikari, formerly Gendou Rokubungi, is the Commander of NERV and is responsible for research and development of Project E and the Human Instrumentality Project. He is the father of Shinji Ikari, the Third Child and pilot of Evangelion Unit-01. He is also the guardian of Rei Ayanami, the First Child and pilot of Evangelion Unit-00 and the only person Rei reliably interacts with at the start of the series.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Ryouji Kaji
about:
Affiliation(s): NERV
Rank: Special Inspector
Age: 30
Birthday: June 17, 1985
Known relatives: Misato Katsuragi (lover, former girlfriend), Asuka Langley Soryu (former guardian of)
Blood type: A 

Kaji, while only being a special inspector, secretly works for SEELE investigating NERV's true intentions. He is always called by his last name, Kaji. During college, he had a serious relationship with Misato, but after having long broken up, they see each other again on the UN fleet ferrying Unit 02 and its pilot, Asuka Langley Soryu, to Japan.

name: Keel Lorentz
about: Chairman of SEELE, it is the ambition of Keel Lorentz that drives mankind toward instrumentality. Part cyborg, Keel's eyes and spinal-cord are aided by advanced machinery.

name: Kaworu Nagisa
about:
Age: 29
Sex: Male
Height: 175cm
Birthday: September 13, 2000
Relations: Shinji Ikari (Ally)





(Source: Evangelion Wikia)

Rebuilds 1-4  (Source: Kaworu Nagisa/Rebuild - Evangelion Wiki&EvaGeeks)

Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance (Source: Kaworu Nagisa/Rebuild - Evangelion Wiki&EvaGeeks)

Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo  (Source: Kaworu Nagisa/Rebuild - Evangelion Wiki&EvaGeeks)

Background and the Five Adams (Explored in Thrice Upon a Time)  (Source: Kaworu Nagisa/Rebuild - Evangelion Wiki&EvaGeeks)

Evangelion: 3.0+1.0 Thrice Upon a Time   (Source: Kaworu Nagisa/Rebuild - Evangelion Wiki&EvaGeeks)

 (Source: Kaworu Nagisa/Rebuild - Evangelion Wiki&EvaGeeks)

name: Pen Pen
about:
Age: 5

Pen Pen is a hot-spring penguin who lives with Misato Katsuragi as her pet. He lives in a refrigerator and is a source of company and comfort to Misato, who has problems of her own.

name: Kyouko Zeppelin Souryuu
name_kanji: 惣流・キョウコ・ツェッペリン
about: Mother of Asuka Langley Souryuu. She was a scientist working for NERV before an accident during the testing phases of Evangelion Unit 02 left her hospitalized and mentally unstable.

name: Touji Suzuhara
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: December 26, 2001
Known relatives: Sakura Suzuhara (sister)

Touji is a tough boy, the stereotypical "jock," and is in constant conflict with Asuka. His younger sister was injured in the battle between the third Angel, Sachiel, and Unit 01, and he beats Shinji up soon after for being indirectly responsible. However, after witnessing firsthand the suffering Shinji experiences piloting Unit 01 in the battle against Shamshel, Touji comes to respect Shinji and the two eventually become friends.

Touji is named after one of the main characters in the novel Ai to Gensou no Fascism (The Fascism of Love and Fantasy) by Ryuu Murakami.

name: Minami Shiunji
about:
Birthday: August 8th
Gender: Female
Age: 15
Eye Color: Green
Hair Color: Black
Occupations: High School Student, Tennis Team

Minami Shiunji is one of the youngest Shiunji siblings, along with her twin brother Shion Shiunji. She is a first-year high school student, who is triple champion of the middle school tennis tournament and future Olympian.

Minami has short and spikey black hair with one spike in particular that is highlighted with a light green color on colored pages. She is one of the shortest Shiunji siblings, second only to Seiha Shiunji, and will pair her school uniform with a lime green sweater that she ties across her shoulders. She is the only sibling that doesn't wear socks that are visible past her school shoes. Like her twin brother, she has a more androgynous appearance. Unlike the rest of her s sisters she is more often seen in athletic wear, short or more casual clothing, with Arata being suprised when she wore a skirt.

Minami is very cheerful and spritely, as well as arguably the most athletically talented of the Shiunji siblings. She is considered a child prodigy at tennis and has been scouted several times by professionals since she started entering and winning multiple middle school tennis competitions. It's believed that she will one day compete in the Olympics. Despite all of her athletic achievements, however, she is the only Shiunji sibling to struggle greatly in academics, even having trouble with simple addition. Unlike her sisters, many of Minami's fans within the Shiunji fan club are girls.
She has been described by Aarata as the funnest Shiunji sibling to be around, and is often seen with a smile on her face. While naturally positive she does have a habit of hiding her emotions when something bad happens, trying to maintain an outward demeanor so that it won't affect those around her.

(Source: The Shiunji Family Children Wiki)

name: Kotono Shiunji
about:
Birthday: June 15th
Gender: Female
Age: 14 (Introduction), 15 (Currently)
Eye Color: Amber
Hair Color: Black
Occupations: Middle School Student

Kotono Shiunji is the youngest sibling of the Shiunji family and the only one that's still in middle school. She is a third-year middle school student, who is the type of innocent girl that has a peaceful and shy personality.

Kotono Shiunji is a petite girl with a gentle and shy presence. She has medium-length black hair, with long bangs that cover her right eye, and wears a yellow scrunchie on the left side. Her eyes are a soft golden-amber color, often giving her a timid look.

She wears her school uniform with a light yellow pleated skirt, a lavender cardigan over her top, and a blue sailor collar tied with a yellow neckerchief. She completes the look with navy knee-high socks and brown loafers. Her posture and expression usually reflect her reserved and quiet nature.

Kotono tends to be very shy and meek, rarely looking up from the ground. Because of this, she's one of the most popular girls in the Shiunji Sister fan club. However, there's one thing that can make her act more brashly than most would expect - her romantic feelings for her older brother Arata Shiunji. She has been told multiple times that she must simply be confusing platonic affection for her brother with romantic love, but she refuses to think otherwise. The same night that she learned that they were not related by blood, she looked up the laws regarding marriage between adopted siblings and then proceeded to ambush Arata with a second confession in the bathroom, despite already being rejected once before, only to be rejected yet again.

(Source: The Shiunji Family Children Wiki)

name: Banri Shiunji
about:
Birthday: January 21st
Gender: Female
Age: 19
Eye Color: Purple
Hair Color: Light Orange
Occupations: University Student

Banri Shiunji is the eldest sibling of the Shiunji family and is the only one who has already moved onto university. She is a first-year college student and an aspiring nurse.

Banri is the second tallest of the Shiunji siblings, only slightly shorter than her younger brother Arata Shiunji. She has purple eyes and strawberry blonde hair that is styled into a bob, with one chunk of hair on her left side running down to just past her collar bones and held together with a ponytail cuff. The right side of her hair is brushed behind her ear to reveal a gold dangle earing. Her chest is very large, which seems to be an assest that she is very proud of. She is normally seen in skirts and a fashionable top, and almost always with a necklace with a purple centrepiece.

Both cheerful and mature, Banri seems very satisfied with how her life is going and is often the person to calm everyone down and better identify people's feelings. She is currently enrolled in a prestigious university and hopes to become a nurse. She is said to be the most popular girl in her university, as well as in the fan club for the Shiunji sisters. It is stated that when they were younger, Banri was the person that would always help protect Arata from their other sisters, who enjoyed picking on both him and their other brother Shion Shiunji.

She has been described as both motherly and mature, as well at times childish by Arata. She has a habit of teasing him and acting coy in public, to his embarassment and her amusement.

(Source: The Shiunji Family Children Wiki)

name: Shion Shiunji
about:
Birthday: October 8th
Gender: Male
Age: 15
Eye Color: Blue
Hair Color: White
Occupations: High School Student

Shion Shiunji is one of the youngest siblings, along with his twin sister Minami Shiunji and he is a first-year high school student. He's in relationship with Yuu-chan.

Shion has short white hair and regularly wears a white beanie with two blue stripes along the brim. Attached to the beanie appears to be a large black button with a depiction of the Crux constellation on it. He has large and slightly round blue eyes and long lashes. While in his school uniform, he wears a white hoodie under his blazer.

Seemingly the most laid-back siblings, Shion is mostly shown playing video games on a portable device and/or trying to not get himself involved in complicated situations. Althoug he gives advice to his older brother Arata, when asked, he doesn't seem too bothered to help him without being prompted. In chapter one, he openly admits to only having sex just to see what it feels like. A female classmate, presumably his girlfriend Yuu, is seen wrapped around his arm in the background.

Amongst his siblings, he shows the greatest interest in searching for his birth parents. Upon finding out he was born in Karuizawa, where the Shiunji family has a vacation home, he explored the town to find more information about their whereabouts but was unable to get any leads.

(Source: The Shiunji Family Children Wiki)

name: Seiha Shiunji
about:
Birthday: December 6th
Gender: Female
Age: 17
Eye Color: Blue
Hair Color: Light Blue
Occupations: High School Student

Seiha Shiunji is the second oldest Shiunji sibling, second only to her older sister Banri Shiunji. She is a third-year high school student, who is the valedictorian of her school and the Science Club president.

Seiha has long, pale blue hair with choppy bangs that frame her face. Her expression is often flat, giving her the aura of someone that is cool and collected. She has thick eyebrows and wears a pair of blue glasses with large frames. While in her school uniform, she is usually seen wearing a black sweater over her top. She is the shortest of the Shiunji siblings. She has been given her mother's ring, which she wears sometimes and keeps safe.

Arguably the smartest Shiunji sibling, Seiha is the top ranking student in their entire school, as well as the president of the science club. She is so book smart that she can come off as cold and distant, tackling almost every problem as logically as possible. At times, this logical approach to everything can go to extremes and make the people around her uncomfortable, but she doesn't see to notice this.

(Source: The Shiunji Family Children Wiki)

name: Ouka Shiunji
about:
Birthday: October 10th
Gender: Female
Age: 16
Eye Color: Blue
Hair Color: Pink
Occupations: High School Student, Athletics Team, Swimming Team

Ouka Shiunji is one of the third oldest Shiunji siblings, along with her "twin" brother Arata Shiunji. She is a second-year high school student, who excels in class and sport, ranked second in the high school and the frontrunner for the next student council president election.

Ouka has light pink twin ponytails that run a little past her elbows and are tied off by blue ribbons with two white stripes along the hem. She has bright blue eyes and usually pairs her school uniform with a pale pink cardigan.

Ouka is very popular and outgoing, easily able to make friends of any gender. She is the ace of the school swim team while simultaneously ranking as one of the top students in their entire school, second only to her older sister Seiha Shiunji. Her ranking in academics is mainly due to her ability to put in hard work.

While kind hearted to most people, she tends to be rather feisty with Arata as the "twins" regularly butt heads. Despite this, the two share a close bond and it's stated that they had many moments in their childhood where their thoughts and actions were so in sync that friends assumed that it must be some kind of twin psychic connection. The bond between them is very special to her.

(Source: The Shiunji Family Children Wiki)

name: Arata Shiunji
about:
Birthday: October 10th
Gender: Male
Age: 16
Eye Color: Black
Hair Color: Dark Brown
Occupations: High School Student

Arata Shiunji is the main protagonist of The Shiunji Family Children series. He is one of the third oldest Shiunji siblings, along with his "twin sister" Oka Shiunji and he is a second-year high school student.

Arata has short, slightly spiked, dark brown hair and the bottom half of the back of his head is shaved. He is the tallest of the Shiunji siblings, and has a strong build from working out. His eyes are narrow, emphasized by his thick eyebrows that are almost always slated downwards.

Arata is very protective of his family and caring to his siblings, perhaps in part due to the burden he feels from being the eldest male son and the heir to the Shiunji fortune. Despite his rather sharp and almost aggressive looking facial features, he gets flustered very easily. Arata is shown to carefully think out his words and actions, though his intentions are frequently misunderstood. He usually turns towards his brother Shion for advice, even though he's younger than him. Each time one of his sisters comes after him in a sexual or romantic manner, whether jokingly or seriously, he is very quick to turn them down and reiterate that they are all siblings regardless of blood relation.

On top of the situation with his family, he's also been struggling with one-sided feelings as the girl he has a crush on, Rara Yakoyama, already has a boyfriend. Scared to make a move beforehand, he now has no idea whether or not it would still be a good idea to approach her. It's unknown if Rara even knows he exists, as he always hides when he sees her and is too scared to even send her a friend request.

(Source: The Shiunji Family Children Wiki)

name: Chito
about: Chito is a thoughtful and introspective young girl who explores a post-apocalyptic world alongside her friend Yuuri in Girls' Last Tour. She is known for her analytical mind and reflective nature, often contemplating the remnants of the world they traverse. Chito is more cautious and pragmatic compared to Yuuri, and her practical approach helps them navigate their harsh environment. Her deep curiosity about the world and its history drives much of their exploration. She is also notably the last engineer in human history alongside Ishii. The strong friendship between Chito and Yuuri is a central element of their journey, highlighting themes of companionship, survival, and the search for meaning in a desolate world.

name: Yuuri
about: Yuuri is a resilient and optimistic young girl navigating a post-apocalyptic world with her friend Chito in the series Girls' Last Tour. She is known for her cheerful personality and hungry attitude, which provides a sense of hope and balance amidst their bleak surroundings. Yuuri’s resourcefulness and playful attitude help her and Chito cope with their challenging environment as they search for food, explore abandoned cities, and seek meaning in their desolate world. Her strong bond with Chito is central to their journey, reflecting themes of friendship and perseverance.

name: Automaton
about: A robot who watches over a fish.

name: Eringi
about:
Eringi are Mushroom-like creatures that travel in groups in search of food. This food is usually in the form of thermally unstable materials, ranging from small devices such as radios and bullets to objects such as nuclear warheads, as shown in episode 12. It is hinted that the Eringi may be an artificial species that was created to neutralize unstable energy sources such as weapons by consuming them. The most notable creature that would be classified as an Eringi is Nuko, who is met by Chito and Yuuri in episode 10. The name "Eringi" comes from a type of mushroom. It is shown that Eringi can "float" by unknown means.
Their existence was hinted at by multiple stone Statues of them existing in some neighborhoods of the City, including a temple complex. It's unknown who built these statues and why.

(Source: Girls' Last Tour Wiki)

name: Ishii
about: Woman with glasses who repaired Chito's and Yuri's vehicle and asked for help with plane construction in exchange. The last pilot in human history.

name: Kanazawa
about: A traveler Chito and Yuuri meet while trying to find a path to the upper stratum of the city. He is a cartographer who wants to map the entire city.

name: Nuko
about:
A mysterious creature that Chito and Yuuri pick up on their journey. It can shape shift to activate mechanisms and communicate via radio signals.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Jougorou Kobato
about:
Jougorou Kobato is a first-year student at Funato High School.

Although he has excellent deductive abilities that he calls "wisdom work," he longs for a normal life that could be called ordinary.

Since a certain point in middle school, he has made a promise with Osanai-san to have a "reciprocal relationship" in which they help each other become ordinary.

(Source: Official Website)

name: Yuki Osanai
about:
Yuki Osanai is a first-year student at Funato High School.

Despite her sweet and innocent appearance, Yuki has a calculating and manipulative personality. She doesn't hesitate to use others to get what she wants and is perfectly willing to come up with complex plans to control the outcome in her favor. Around people she doesn’t know well, she tends to keep her distance or seems a bit wary.

Although she has sharp insight and the ability to act, due to past mistakes, she aims to be an ordinary person just like Kobato-kun. She has a sweet tooth and often goes to the sweets shops in town after school.

Age: 16 (Shoushimin Series), 17-18 (Shoushimin Series 2nd Season)
Birthday: March 6
Height: 150cm (4'11)

name: Kengo Doujima
about:
Kengo Doujima is a first-year student at Funato High School. He is a newspaper club member with plenty of stamina and chivalry. He was in the same class as Kobato in elementary school, and although he feels uncomfortable with Kobato's desire to be an ordinary citizen, he still relies on Kobato when the time comes.

(Source: Official Website)

name: Tokiko Nakamaru
about:
Tokiko Nakamaru is a second-year student at Funato High School.

She has a bright and somewhat enthusiastic personality. She confesses her feelings to her classmate Kobato and starts dating him. She tries to call him "Jou" but is cheerfully rejected. She seems to have a good nature as well.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Takahiko Urino
about:
A first-year member of the Funato High School newspaper club, Takahiko Urino begins dating Osanai. In order to leave evidence of her attendance at the school and to impress Osanai, he uses her natural drive to continue her investigation into the arson incident, despite being at odds with the other members of the club.

(Source: Official Site, edited)

name: Monica Everett
name_kanji: モニカ・エヴァレット
about:
A genius and the youngest mage ever selected to join the Seven Sages of the Kingdom of Ridill. A peerless witch who can omit the chants normally needed when humans use mana. Since she almost never appears in public, her identity remains shrouded in mystery.

(Source: LN vol. 1)

name: Felix Arc Ridill
name_kanji: フェリクス・アーク・リディル
about:
Second prince of the Kingdom of Ridill. President of Serendia Academy's student council.
Has excellent grades as well as diplomatic achievements und his belt. A well-rounded boy who excels at everything.
His face and body adhere to the golden ratio (according to Monica).

(Source: LN vol. 1)

name: Claudia Ashley
name_kanji: クローディア・アシュリー
about:
Daughter of Marquess Highown, Cyril's foster sister, and Neil's fiancée.
A mysterious and unapproachable beauty. Extremely knowledgeable, having come from the Lineage of the Wise, but hates it when other people rely on her.

(Source: LN vol. 2)

name: Cyril Ashley
about:
Foster son of Marquess Highown. Vice president of the student council.
Specializes in ice magecraft. Has a condition call mana hyperabsorption. Reveres Felix.
Generally polite to women, except for those who are rude to Felix.

(Source: LN vol. 1)

name: Lana Colette
about:
Daugther of Baron Colette and Monica's classmate. Up on the latest trends and loves fashion. Her father is very wealthy. In the future she wants to open a trading company like her father.

(Source: LN vol. 1)

name: Bridget Greyham
name_kanji: ブリジット・グレイアム
about:
Daughter of Marquess Shaleberry. One of the student council secretaries.
Hails from a family of diplomats and talented at languages. A beautiful noble girl aids to be the most fitting to become Felix's fiancée. Likes dogs more than cats.

(Source: LN vol. 1)

name: Casey Grove
about:
Casey is a second-year student at Serendia Academy. She comes from the Bright Count family.

Although Casey comes from a noble lineage, her family is considered country nobility.

She has a lively personality and is known for helping with a variety of tasks around her home. She excels in horseback riding and hunting,
demonstrating her active and energetic nature.

name: Louis Miller
about:
The Barrier Mage, one of the Seven Sages. Excels in defensive barrier, but his combat style is extremely aggressive. If he throws open his ornamental robe, you should run away and never look back.

(Source: LN vol. 2)

name: Nero
about: Nero is Monica's familiar. Nero can shape shift between the form of a black cat and a human.

name: Isabelle Norton
about:
Daughter of Count Kerbeck. A huge fan of the Silent Witch and Monica's collaborator on her mission.
Tirelessly working to perfect her role as villainess. The sharpness of her laughter is in a class of its own.

(Source: LN vol. 1)

name: Rynzbelfeid
name_kanji: リィンズベルフィード
about:
A high wind spirit contracted to Louis.

Does not particularly care for or respect her master. She read many books in order to learn about humans, but her vocabulary and common sense are rather skewed.

(Source: LN vol. 1)

name: Caroline Simmons
name_kanji: カロライン・シモンズ

name: Hiyori Minagi
about:
Birthday: January 4
Height: 154 cm
Blood Type: O

name: Ichika Fukumoto
about:
Birthday: August 2
Height: 168 cm

(Source: Official Site)

name: Futaba Fukumoto
about:
Birthday: May 12
Height: 135 cm

(Source: Official Site)

name: Kaede Miyano
about: Ichika's friend who works at the restaurant BASE FIELD.

name: Aiko Ninomiya
about:
Birthday: September 22
Height: 136 cm

Aiko is best friends with Futaba who doesn't like hanging with boys. She cheers Futaba on in everything she does. Even though she doesn't like touching bugs or fish, she still supports her in her fishing with zest.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Koi Yoshinaga
about:
Birthday: June 30
Height: 145 cm
Blood Type: A

Hiyori's friend since childhood. She calls Hiyori "Yamahi," referring to her former last name Yamagawa. She works in her family-owned Fly Fishing Shop, but is actually not very interested in fishing.

name: Hana Ichinose
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: April 6
Blood type: A
Height: 154 cm
Weight: 45 kg

A kind-hearted girl, sensitive to others' needs, but somewhat of a crybaby. For reasons yet unknown, she lives on her own in Temari Heights, which is an apartment building managed by her cousin, Shion. She is very gullible.

(Source: Slow Start Official USA Website)

name: Tamate Momochi
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: May 23
Blood type: B
Height: 153 cm
Weight: 47 kg

Always energetic, and she does everything at her own pace.
Friendly to everyone. She is an otaku, being an avid bishoujo gamer and even attending the events as well. Also, talented in cooking!

She preferred to be called with Tama-chan rather than Tamate because of her cute and friendly character with everyone.

(Source: Slow Start Official USA Website)

name: Kamuri Sengoku
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: October 30
Blood type: AB
Height: 136 cm
Weight: 30 kg

She may be small in stature, but she loves to eat. Shy by nature, and is unable to speak articulately around strangers. Loves Eiko, and is extremely attached to her. Surprisingly, tends to say arbitrary things.

(Source: Slow Start Official USA Website)

name: Eiko Tokura
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: June 20
Blood type: B
Height: 163 cm
Weight: 48 kg

With excellent communication skills, she seems very mature.
Being popular among her female classmates, her schedule may rather be jam-packed? She has met Kamuri once before, back in elementary school. Tends to say arbitrary things from time to time.

(Source: Slow Start Official USA Website)

name: Hiroe Hannen
about:
Birthday: January 9
Blood type: A
Height: 167 cm
Weight: 52 kg

A resident of Temari Heights, where Hana lives. Blessed with both beauty and talent, she used to be the type to take on the role of student council president in high school. But following a certain incident, she now rarely leaves her apartment.

(Source: Slow Start Official USA Website)

name: Shion Kyouzuka
about:
Birthday: November 6
Blood type: O
Height: 162 cm
Weight: 56 kg

Hana's older cousin. She is the apartment manager of Temari Heights, where Hana lives on her own. While she is kind-hearted and gentle by nature, she is also a little ditzy. She is extremely open-minded.

(Source: Slow Start Official USA Website)

name: Nanae Takahashi
about: She is a member of the gardening club and goes to school early in the morning to take care of the flowerbeds.

name: Wakana Gojou
about:
Age: 15
Height: at least 180 cm (5"11)
Birthday: March 21

Wakana is quite tall for his age, standing at least 180 centimeters. When Marin asked him his height, he was interrupted before he could finish saying, meaning that he may be taller than 180cm. He has short, black hair and gray eyes, along with a tiny mole on the outer lower corner of his right eye.

Outside of his school uniform, he is always wearing a samue, a general work outfit consisting of a blue suit jacket and pants, with a simple white shirt underneath. He wears wooden sandals and wears a white headband while working. He tends to have it over his shoulders when not wearing his headband.

At the start of the series, Wakana was a withdrawn person in high school, having no friends and a secret love and admiration for hina dolls.His solitary attitude makes him rather submissive with others. Wakana is rather shy and modest, not doing well with embarrassing or lewd topics. Wakana doesn't appear to have much of a life outside of his grandfather's store and helping Marin, as he always wears his work attire outside of his school uniform, and often spends his free time either sewing or painting hina doll faces.

(Source: Sono Bisque Doll Wiki)

name: Marin Kitagawa
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: March 5
Height: 164 cm

Marin Kitagawa is a popular and beautiful high school girl in Gojo's class. She is very interested in cosplay and has tried to make her own, but without much success. By chance, she discovers Gojo can sew and the two bond over their mutual enthusiasm for their respective hobbies. 

She's a dreadful cook, with a bubbly personality. Her favorite cosplayer is Juju-san, and she'll watch anime and play video games for fun.
Kitagawa-san is very emotionally mature, down to earth and respectful.

name: Miori Gojou
about: Gojou Wakana's cousin.

name: Kaoru Gojou
about:
Birthday: October 17 (Libra)

Kaoru is an elderly man with short white hair and black eyes, who has discernible wrinkles on his face and light stubble around his chin. He stands at a shorter height than his grandson, Wakana, and is slightly hunched over as well. He wears the same kind of work outfit as Wakana (a samue) along with glasses, and black-laced sandals.

Kaoru is a caring grandfather towards Wakana, having looked after him since the death of his parents. He is shown to be passionate and loving towards the art of creating hina dolls and supports his grandson in his goal to become a kashira-shi (hina doll maker) like him.

Kaoru is dedicated to his hina doll art and takes it very seriously, saying that should he miss even a single day's work, it would take three days for him just to regain that level of practice.

(Source: Sono Bisque Doll Wiki)

name: Sajuna Inui
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: June 1

Sajuna possesses a petite, child-like appearance, smooth pale skin, pale pink hair, and large hazel eyes that are framed by an array of long eyelashes . She wears her hair half in pigtails and half long, and her clothes are a red serafuku (sailor suit) with a yellow bow, and long black knee socks. 

Sajuna is rather headstrong and blunt, despite her child-like appearance.  She has no problem with chiding others or speaking harshly when it comes to it, and can be quick to lose her temper as well. She is shown to take cosplaying seriously and loves dressing up as characters she adores. Despite her popularity online, Sajuna isn't interested in fame and admits that she only cosplays for herself and by herself.

Sajuna is willing to go to great lengths if it means getting what she's after. While blunt, she is perfectly capable of being genuinely polite and friendly, coming to get along with Wakana and Marin, and clearly caring for her younger sister, Shinju. She is shown to have a fear of thunder and scary places but does her best to try and hide it. 

Furthermore, as a student attending an all-girls school, she is shown to be completely inexperienced with the opposite sex,

Sajuna is shown to have reluctance in expressing how she really feels about certain things, likening her to a tsundere.

(Source: Sono Bisque Doll Wiki)

name: Shinju Inui
about:
Height: 178 cm

Shinju is described as a relatively tall girl for her age. Like her sister, she possesses pale pink hair that falls at the length of her upper back. But instead of possessing sharp hazel-colored eyes like the latter, Shinju's eyes are more droopy and light brown in color.

Given her towering stature and ample bosom, her appearance would leave those to assume that she's an adult, when in reality, she's only a middle schooler.

Unlike her sister, who is rather blunt and headstrong, Shinju is a timid yet kind-hearted girl. She is shown to get nervous easily, especially when meeting new people, as seen during her first meeting with Gojo and Marin. This aside, Shinju strongly admires and loves her sister, working as her cosplay photographer while also creating an online account to share her sister's work. Shinju likes the Flower Princess Blaze alongside Sajuna and Marin. Her favorite character from the series is the older brother Soma, due to his caring nature, as he reminds Shinju of her sister.

Shinju is aware of her mature figure, particularly her chest, and is shown to get embarrassed about it. She also calls herself "fat" in the Japanese dub of the anime.

Like her friends and "big" sister, she is also interested in trying out cosplay but, contrary to the others, she wishes to cosplay as a boy. Her big chest, however, has proven to be a hurdle in achieving this.

(Source: Sono Bisque Doll Wiki)

name: Kaname
about: The main character of the in-universe "SuccIDK" manga series.

name: Shizuku Kuroe
about:
Shizuku has deep violet hair and purple eyes. She wears a dark purple maid uniform with a black headdress and tights.

Shizuku Kuroe is a character featured in the sequel of Saint ♡ Slippery's Academy for Girls video game series. Marin Kitagawa is a big fan of her, so much so that she wanted to cosplay as her, which also was her cosplay debut. She had tally marks up to 17 on her thighs, which is indicating how many sexual encounters the character had, so it is possible as the more sex you had in the game the more tally marks would be added to the character's thighs in the game.

(Source: Sono Bisque Doll Wiki)

name: Liz
about: Liz is a succubus who appears in one of Marin's favorite slice of life series, "SuccIDK." Her Goal is to put the protagonist of "SuccIDK" (Kaname) to sleep, to perform what succubi do with men at night. She normally fails however, in a clumsy manner.

name: Shion Nikaidou
about: Shion is the main character from the in-story fictional anime Flower Princess Blaze.

name: Nowa Sugaya
about:
Birthday: April 3rd

Nowa Sugaya is a friend of Kitagawa Marin.

Nowa is a high school girl who is rather shorter than her friend Marin. She has black hair that is tied into pigtails, which contain parallel red streaks on the sides of her hair and the inward sides of her pigtails. Her eyes are black and she has two piercings in both her ears, along with black painted nails and a black, white-studded bracelet on her right wrist.

She wears her school uniform with a black vest, and is often seen with a lollipop in her mouth.



(Source: Sono Bisque Doll Wiki)

name: Mirai Tengeji
about: The main heroine of fictional anime Flower Princess Retsu!!

name: Veronica
about:
Veronica has short white hair, sharp teeth, tanned skin, and white mascara. Her outfit is very revealing.

Veronica was a prisoner sentenced to be imprisoned for 60,000 years. According to the plot of the game, she was taken in order to fight other characters wherein rich people bet on the fights.

(Source: Sono Bisque Doll Wiki, edited)

name: Daia Yahiro
about: A friend of Marin Kitagawa.

name: Rune Yamauchi
about: A friend of Marin Kitagawa.

name: Nonoka Komiya
about:
The main heroine who returns to Lake Kiriya after moving away seven years ago. She lives with her father as her mother had passed away due to illness.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yuzuki Mizusaka
about:
An energetic girl who has a strong dislike for the disc. She also seems to be on bad terms with her twin brother, Souta.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Souta Mizusaka
about: Yuzuki's twin brother. He is rather stoic and is usually at odds with Yuzuki but he still cares for her when she is in trouble. Souta is also close friends with Koharu that he even take shifts for her at her job.

name: Noel
about: Noel is a mysterious clueless blue-haired girl who Nonoka first met at a laboratory seven years ago. She is childish, but kind-hearted.

name: Koharu Shiihara
about: An air-headed girl who works as a poster girl for a local shop. She is kind and doesn't want to see her friends fight or argue and while she doesn't physically try to intervene, she tries her best in other ways.

name: Shione Togawa
about:
A stern girl who enjoys photography. 


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Shuuichi Komiya
about: Nonoka's father.

name: Kaori Komiya
about: Nonoka's mother.

name: Fern
about: Heiter's adopted daughter. After his death, she came under the care of Frieren. Fern grew up to be a strict and mature person beyond her age. Acts as a mother for the members of the squad. She constantly helps Frieren perform simple daily tasks, such as waking her up, dressing her, cooking. She behaves condescendingly with Stark, although they are about the same age, for example, scolds when he goes to bed late. Despite her outward steadfastness, Fern easily gets upset and can behave like a child if she is offended by something.

name: Frieren
about:
Frieren was a mage in Hero Himmel's party. They travelled along with Priest Heiter and Warrior Eisen in a ten-year journey to defeat the Demon King. She was the last member to be recruited to the party and, despite Heiter's initial impression of her mana being average, Himmel had a hunch she was the most powerful mage he had ever met.

Being an elf that has lived for over a thousand years, Frieren has a hard time forming meaningful relationships with humans because of the difference in their lifespans and how they perceive the passage of time. This generally manifests itself as laziness, since missing an important event is of no importance as she will have plenty of opportunities to relive it in the future, or as a nearly sociopathic inability to comprehend human's feelings. For instance, she tends to not notice how her lack of impatience or cold statements can affect humans around her. Her party members have also frequently stated that they can't comprehend her feelings or read what goes on in her head.

Despite being an extremely powerful mage, Frieren has the habit of collecting rare and daily usage centered magic, like magic that can polish a bronze statue or make flowers bloom. She always asks for a grimoire as a reward even if she already knows its contents or when it comes to The Great Mage Flamme's lost grimoires knows they are fakes.

After the deaths of Hero Himmel and Priest Heiter, Frieren decided she wants to learn more about humans. She is currently traveling with Fern her pupil who was a war refugee left in her care by Priest Heiter in a quest to Ende, the place where souls reside in the northernmost tip of the continent and where the Demon King's Castle was built to try and speak to Himmel's soul. In her new journey, Frieren visits many places her old party travelled through in the past and relives memories, slowly understanding more about their meaning and her feelings.

Ironically, Fern is generally the one to take care of Frieren in daily activities despite being far younger.


(Source: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End Wiki)

name: Stark
about: Stark is a carefree young man who easily makes friendship with others. He is cowardly but has the determination to put aside his fears in order to protect the people dear to him.

name: Aura
about: The great demon. A member of the «Seven Sages of Destruction». Eloquent, selfish, incapable of compassion. Beheads every opponent the defeated, for which she received the nickname the Guillotine.

name: Blei
about: Participant in the examination for the title of mage first class.

name: Burg
about: Burg is a first class mage. Wears a cloak that does not miss magic damage. He was nicknamed the Indestructible Mantle. He was conducting an exam for a second-class mage.

name: Chief of the Village of the Sword
about: The head of the village in the forty-ninth generation. Protects the holy sword from the encroachment of monsters.

name: Denken
about: An elderly Imperial mage. A cautious person who always keeps calm and analyzes the situation before entering into battle. A competent leader who values coordination and cooperation.

name: Draht
about: Young Demon. Lügner's assistant.

name: Dünste
about: Participant in the examination for the title of mage first class.

name: Edel
about: Edel is a second class mage. Possesses extraordinary skills in the field of mental magic.

name: Ehre
about: Ehre is a second class mage. The best student of the Magic Academy. Lernen's granddaughter. Prefers to use elegant and graceful magic. During the First Class Mage Exam, she got into the same team with Wirbel and Scharf and became friends with them. She owns the magic of transforming inanimate objects, can use them to attack.

name: Eisen
about: Eisen is a dwarf and was the Warrior of the Hero Party. An honest, straightforward, strong, and hardy warrior.

name: Falsch
about: First class mage. Acts as an observer in magical exams.

name: Flamme
about: Flamme was Frieren's master thousands of years ago. She is renowned for being the best human mage in history, and the founder of mankind's magic. Prior to Flamme, humanity considered all forms of magic to be demonic techniques.

name: Gabel
about: Butler of Lord Orden. He is laconic, but always diligently does his job.

name: Genau
about: Curator of the First Class Mage Exam. During his life, he lost many dear people, which made him indifferent to the lives and health of the participants. He believes that truly worthy participants will not let themselves be harmed. Genau's special magic allows him to create a pair of black wings. These wings are sharp and allow for close range attacks as well as defense.

name: Granat
about: Count of the Northern Lands. A soft-hearted but determined person. His son died ten years ago in a battle with Aura the Guillotine, after which he became part of her decapitated army. Granat yearns to avenge his son and put his body to rest.

name: Heiter
about: Heiter was the Priest of the Hero Party. Calm, kind and understanding person. Despite his rank, he likes to drink and have fun.

name: Himmel
about: Himmel is the hero whose party defeated the demon lord after ten years of adventure. He dies by natural causes exactly 50 years after the death of the demon lord. Himmel would often make jokes about how handsome he was but was also shown to be willing to help anyone in need.

name: Kanne
about: Kanne is a third class mage. She has been friends with Lawine since childhood and studied with her at the Academy of Magic. She can control water by filling it with mana.

name: Kraft
about: Kraft is a kind and cheerful elf. He is a monk who has performed many feats. He spent several months in the company of the Frieren's party during a long winter in the Northern Lands.

name: Land
about: Land is a First Class Mage Exam participant. Doesn't like to take risks. Prefers to prepare battle tactics in advance and act cautiously. Able to create clones completely identical to him and control them from a long distance.

name: Laufen
about: Laufen is a second-class magician. Participant of the exam for the magician of the first class. She got into the same team with Denken and Richter. Jokingly played the role of Denken's granddaughter. Laufen skillfully uses the spell of the mountain tribe of the Southern Lands, which allows her to move at a speed that the human eye does not catch. This ability gives the impression of instant disappearance.

name: Lawine
about: Lawine is a third class mage. Kanne's friend who she studied with at the Magic Academy. Her magic allows her to freeze vast amounts of water.

name: Lecker
about: The unrivaled chef. As a reward for returning a family heirloom to him, he vowed never to change the taste of his dishes, keeping it unchanged from generation to generation.

name: Lernen
about: An old friend of Denken. First Class Mage and Serie's apprentice. Rarely acts directly, preferring stealth.

name: Linie
about: Linie is Lügner's assistant and a skilled warrior. Able to learn the fighting style of any opponent at a glance.

name: Länge
about: Participant in the examination for the title of mage first class. Slightly distracted girl. Likes to read books and learn new spells.

name: Lügner
about: Lügner is a demon that serves Aura. He gives the impression of a calm, well-mannered and sensitive person.

name: Methode
about: Methode is a strong mage. She possesses the magic of detection and mental magic, as well as hypnosis. Kind-hearted, polite and friendly girl. Methode thinks elves are very cute and likes to pat Serie and Frieren on the head when she gets the chance.

name: Mut
about: The second son of Lord Orden.

name: Orden
about: Lord of the Northern Lands. Wirt's father. One of the three strongest knights of the Northern Kingdom.

name: Qual
about:
Qual was a high ranking demon in the Demon King's army. 80 years ago, he was so powerful that the Hero's Party was forced to seal him away.

Qual is the inventor of a powerful piercing magic called Killing Magic/Soul Track. This magic is able to pierce magical defences, as well as equipment imbued with magical resistance. It was so strong that it was able to eradicate the target's body itself, as well as being responsible for slaughtering 40% of the adventurers and 70% of the sorcerers in that region.

name: Richter
about: Richter is a second-class mage. A pragmatic and cold-blooded person. He can control the earth and stones in their various forms.

name: Scharf
about: Scharf is a third-class mage. On the First Class Mage Exam, he became friends with Wirbel und Ehre. His special magic allows to control many flower petals, transforming them into steel structures.

name: Sein
about: Sein is a Priest from a small village, a member of Frieren's party. An unflappable and easy-going person. Acts as an adult figure, often gives advice to Stark and Fern.

name: Sein's Older Brother
about:
The priest of their small village in the Alt Woods. He is the older brother of Sein and after he and Sein lost their parents, he raised Sein himself. He turned down Heiter's invitation to go to the Holy City of Strahl in order to stay and take care of his brother, a decision which he has never regretted.

(Source: Frieren Wiki)

name: Sense
about: Sense is a curator of the second exam for the title of mage of the first class. A pacifist. Selects the format of the exam in which the participants do not have to fight with each other. Sense's special magic allows her to control the length and strength of her hair, which she uses as a weapon.

name: Serie
about:
Serie is a female Great Mage from the Mystical Era and one of the last known survivors of the elven race. She was the teacher of The Great Mage Flamme, one of the very first human mages that would be able to master advanced magic. Her influence on human magic grew slowly over the last 1,000 years by teaching numerous generations of new human mages. With her founding of the Continental Magic Association, this influence grew even more.

Her magic skills and mana are remarkable even compared to other Great Mages. Not only is she able to use highly advanced defensive and offensive magic, she is also in control of ancient elven magic and human magic from the Mystical Era. This combined with her large pool of mana and over 1,000 years of experience, makes her one of the most powerful mages in the current time.

name: Stoltz
about: Stoltz is the best fighter of the warrior village. Stark's brother. The only one in the family paid attention to Stark and taught him warrior skills. He saved Stark, but remained to defend the village from the attack of demons and died in battle.

name: Ton
about: Participant in the examination for the title of mage first class. Distrustful and self-confident mage.

name: Voll
about: Voll is a old friend of Frieren. Dwarf who had guarded the peace of his late wife's native village for four hundred years. He was the one who brought Frieren together with hero Himmel's party.

name: Warrior Gorilla
about: Sein's childhood friend. At a young age, he went on a journey, dreaming of becoming a legendary hero.

name: Wirbel
about: Wirbel is the captain of the Northern Magic Corps and a very experienced mage. Participated in the exam for the magician of the first class. He is merciless to his enemies, but shows sensitivity to his colleagues. Uses powerful capture magic. If the opponent's gaze intersects with his, then the enemy will not be able to move until Wirbel looks away.

name: Wirt
about:
Wirt is the eldest son of Lord Orden, who died in battle with the army of demons.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Übel
about:
Übel is a female human mage and a member of the Continental Magic Association. She is very proficient in cleaving magic, an invisible magic that is able to cut through anything within a five-meter radius, so long as she can imagine it to be cut. She is stated to cast her magic through feel, rather than logical analysis like most other mages. This also gives her the ability to learn the magic of others by empathizing with and understanding their emotions and true nature.

She is heavily implied to be responsible for a series of murders during her time as a third-class mage and was disqualified from her second-class exam for killing one of the first-class proctors responsible for one of the tests.

name: Yor Forger
about:
Age: 27

Yor Forger is one of three main characters of the Spy x Family series. She works as a clerk at Berlint City Hall, but is secretly a skilled assassin who acts under the codename Thorn Princess. Yor possesses impressive strength and endurance for her slim frame, capable of easily piercing the skull of a human with her weapons and destroying a pumpkin with the sheer thrust of her bare hand. 

She agrees in pretending to be Loid's wife and Anya's mother in order to serve as cover so she can continue with her assassin work. Yor is consistently bad at cooking and usually leaves the cooking to Loid.

name: Loid Forger
name_kanji: ロイド・フォージャー
about:
Agent Name: Twilight
Occupation: Intelligence Agent, Psychiatrist (False Front)
Known Alias: Loid, Robert
Height: 187 cm
Weight: 70-90 kg
Skills: Genius-level intellect, Espionage, Peak physical attributes, Expert marksmanship, Skilled hand-to-hand combatant, Master of disguise, Observation, Tennis skills
Hair color: Blond
Eye color: Blue
Address: 128 Park Ave. West Berlint

Codename "Twilight", he is an undercover spy and was tasked with the mission to create a fake family in order to infiltrate a politician by the name of Donovan Desmond. He thus in seven days was able to adopt a daughter called Anya Forger and marry a woman named Yor Briar.
