It is unknown as to what his real name or age is, as he was a war orphan. He became a spy in order to make a "world where children wouldn't cry."

name: Anya Forger
name_kanji: アーニャ・フォージャー
about: Anya is a young girl who can read other people's thoughts and is the only one who knows of her family's secrets. She is 5 years old, but claims to be 6. Originally an experimental human test subject dubbed "Subject 007," she escaped and moved from one orphanage to another before being adopted by Loid. She likes spy anime and thinks anything involving "secrets" and "missions" are exciting.

name: Aquarist
about: Appears in episode 12.

name: Becky Blackbell
name_kanji: ベッキ・ブラックベル
about:
Age: 6
Gender: Female
Hair Color: Brown
Eye Color: Light Brown
Occupation: Student

She is the daughter of CEO Blackbell, a major military manufacturer. She attends Eden Academy as part of Cecile House, Group 3, and becomes Anya Forger's close friend.

name: Bondman's Boss
name_kanji: ボンドマーンの司令官
about: He is the headman of Bondman's organization.

name: Yuri Briar
about:
Age: 20
Height: 179 cm (5′10")
Hair color: black
Eye color: red

Yuri Briar is Yor Forger's younger brother and a twenty-year-old man who works in the State Security Service. He keeps his job at the SSS a secret from his sister and instead pretends to be a normal civil servant at the foreign ministry.

Yuri is popular with girls due to his face, but they leave when they discover his personality.


(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Camilla
about:
Camilla is one of Yor Forger's three co-workers at Berlint City Hall. Camilla is initially shown to be snobbish and mean, inviting Yor to a party simply to make fun of her being single and attempting to spill hot gratin on Yor. Despite her thorny exterior, she has a soft side and accedes to patiently teach Yor cooking when she pleads, despite her initial frustration.

Camilla appears to live alone and seems fairly wealthy, having a two-story house large enough to hold a party in.

She seems to be a good cook, being able to recreate Yor and Yuri's childhood stew from just their memories. She is also knowledgeable about cooking variations from other parts of Ostania as she adjusts the recipe after asking about Yor's hometown.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Donovan Desmond
name_kanji: ドノバン・デズモンド
about: Donovan Desmond is the President of the Nation Unity Party and Twilight's current target.

name: Damian Desmond
name_kanji: ダミアン・デズモンド
about:
Damian Desmond is the second son of Donovan Desmond and attends Eden Academy as part of Cecile Hall, Group 3. Due to his upbringing as a child of an important and powerful man, Damian gained a highly respected status among his peers by default, making him grow incredibly arrogant, assuming Anya gained a crush on him when she stared at him. He is shown to prefer being called Lord Damian when spoken to.


Later, it is hinted that a possible reason for Damian's behavior can be attributed to his brother's success as an Imperial Scholar and his father having set a high expectation for him to strive and become part of the Imperial Scholars. His father's influence and lack of attention to his life motivated him even further to meet his expectations, causing him to look down on people beneath his social class, for if they are not a benefit to him, they are only slowing him down to becoming an Imperial Scholar and in turn slowing his progress in getting his father's attention.

name: Eden Academy Gutter Student
about:
Manga Debut: Chapter 4
Anime Debut: Episode 4

An Eden Academy student who was involved in the entrance exam. In order to obtain extra credit, he reluctantly pretended to be stuck in a gutter as a test for the applicants. He felt guilty when he believed the Forgers would fail because of him.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Ewen Egeburg
name_kanji: ユーイン・エッジバーグ
about:
Ewen Egeburg is one of Damian Desmond's followers at Eden Academy and a student of Cecile Hall. Ewen quickly become friends with Damian Desmond and Emile Elman, praising Damian and commenting that he will become Imperial Scholar in no time. He often suggests Damian needs to work on his vocabulary or grammar.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Emile Elman
about:
Emile Elman is the heir to the Elman Family and one of Damian Desmond's followers at Eden Academy. As one of Damian's followers, he is frequently praising Damian's abilities and making fun of Anya and Becky. It is his dream to eat a lot of candy. 

Emile quickly become friends with Damian Desmond and Ewen Egeburg, praising Damian and commenting that he will become Imperial Scholar in no time.



(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Bond Forger
name_kanji: ボンド・フォージャー
about:
Bond Forger is the pet of the Forger Family. Formerly known as Subject 8, Bond has been used for experiments that resulted in him gaining precognition abilities.

Bond is shown to be a very kind dog, as he uses his precognition abilities to rescue a child from being hit by a falling board. He also helps Anya Forger to retrieve her favorite pair of gloves from a fierce dog by intimidating him.




(Source: Spy X Family Wiki)

name: Franky Franklin
name_kanji: フランキー・フランクリン
about:
Franky Franklin is an informant who seemingly works at a tobacco store and presumably works for Loid Forger's agency. He gets information regarding Eden Academy's exam and Anya Forger's past records for Loid Forger.

Franky is a kind person willing to help Loid out when he's in a pinch even though the danger is high. He frequently warns Loid Forger not to get too close to other people in their line of work.
He frequently falls in love with other women but his love life typically fails due to lack of mutual interest or they are already with someone else.
He's rather money-driven as he is willing to perform favors for Loid as long as Loid promises to give him material goods, even though he was previously reluctant to do so or even if the situation is extremely dangerous.



(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Henry Henderson
name_kanji: ヘンリー・ヘンダーソン
about:
Henry Henderson is a history teacher and the housemaster of dormitory 3, Cecile Hall at Eden Academy. Henry is a mature and noble person, who places a high importance on "elegance". To him, elegance seems to be the way a person conducts themselves, and is not afraid to correct inelegant behavior in others.


When teaching, he observes and assesses the "elegance" of the students, although he understands that children occasionally need to frolic too.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Millie
about:
Millie is one of Yor Forger's three co-workers at Berlint City Hall. Millie is shown to be lively and mischievous, suggesting to Yor that they put snot in the Chief's coffee as a joke and most often seen smiling or giggling. Even though she breaks up with her boyfriend, she doesn't seem bothered and remains cheerful, even asking Yor to introduce her to Yuri.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Minister of Finance
about: Appears in episode 4.

name: Old Woman
about: Appears in episode 3.

name: Orphanage Owner
about:
An inebriated middle-aged man who is the owner of the orphanage where Anya Forger is adopted by Loid Forger. He is apathetic about his orphanage, as shown by the neglected state of the children and his indifference to Loid's given background. He thinks of Anya as a "creepy little brat", attempting to give her away to Loid upon hearing he wants a literate child.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Pool Instructor #1
about: Appears in episode 11.

name: Sylvia Sherwood
name_kanji: シルヴィア・シャーウッド
about:
Main contact of Twilight (Loid Forger) at WISE and previously involved in war between West and East. Not much has been to shown to get an understanding of her personality but from what's been shown, it's that she is similar to Twilight in which she is dedicated, skilled and logical with her approach to ideas but still is a somewhat impatient person. It can be assumed that she doesn't really understand kids, as seen when she told Loid to just bribe Anya with candy.



(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Shopkeeper
about:
He is Yor's employer.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: SSS Lieutenant
about:
A scarred man who is a lieutenant and a higher position than Yuri Briar in the SSS. He seems to be fairly close to Yuri and is aware of his drinking habits and sister complex, advising Yuri to get over his sister and focus on his work.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Bill Watkins
about:
Bill is a young boy who is incredibly tall and muscular for his age. He wears glasses and has short brown hair.

(Source: Spy x Family Wiki)

name: Fiona Frost
about: Fiona is a WISE spy who acts under the codename Nightfall. She was placed in Berlint General Hospital to support Loid Forger's cover story and provide Twilight with mission details in the disguise of some documents.

name: Kayo Fujikawa
about:
The composer of the SNS Club. She works part-time as a waitress at a family restaurant.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Tamaki Honda
about:
The main heroine, who becomes the illustrator of the SNS Club. As a fan of hard-boiled shōnen manga, her art-style tends to have a focus on gruff-looking men. She is very fond of her father.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Shiina Murakami
about:
The president of the SNS Club who serves as the programmer. She is often soft-spoken and pessimistic.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Ayame Seki
about:
The scenario writer of the SNS Club. She has a history of writing adult stories that she is somewhat embarrassed about.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yumine Fuda
about:
Tamaki's best friend who is a member of the school's Illustration Club. She is a fujoshi who likes to draw boy's love art.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Teru Hyakutake
about: Former illustrator and previous president of the SNS Club who is currently in college.

name: Marika Shimizu
about: A classmate of Tamaki Honda's.

name: Kamome Kushima
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: April 4
Height: 158 cm
Weight: 43 kg
Hair color: indigo
Eye color: gold
Relations: Sagi Kushima (Mother)
Hobby: ships in bottles
Likes: triangular shaped sweets with a secret

Kamome Kushima is a mysterious girl the protagonist meets at the island. She always drags a large suitcase around with her. She would never ever tell what is inside. Just like Takahara Hairi, she only stays on the island until the end of summer. With an old map, she wanders around the island looking for something. She said that is a treasure map.

"Let's go. To where the pirate ship dwells."

(Source: Summer Pockets Wiki, edited)

name: Shiroha Naruse
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: June 8
Height: 155 cm
Weight: 39 kg
Hair color: white
Eye color: blue
Relations: Kobato Naruse (Grandfather), Hitomi Naruse (Mother)
Hobby: cooking
Likes: watermelon ice-candy
Dislikes: nosey people
Status: active

Shiroha Naruse is an islander. While she is anxious around strangers, she is also well-composed. Other than her blood-related grandfather, she has nobody who can be even called a friend. Living alone for a very long time, she doesn't know how to associate with people. Sometimes, she would even say that she hardly ever thinks about other people's thought. She frequently gazes over the sea on that isolated island.

"It's better that you don't get involved with me."

(Source: Summer Pockets Wiki, edited)

name: Ao Sorakado
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: September 20
Height: 160 cm
Weight: 46 kg
Hair color: sky blue
Eye color: magenta
Relations: Ai Sorakado (Elder Twin Sister)
Hobby: afternoon naps
likes: kakigori
Status: active

Ao Sorakado is an islander who is friendly to and loved by all, regardless of age or gender. She works at a Japanese sweets shop on the island. She is accompanied by a wild fox(?). She has been known to be found sleeping at various places around the island, but it is something normal to the islanders.

"In any case, leave me alone when I'm asleep."

(Source: Summer Pockets Wiki)

name: Hairi Takahara
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: May 21
Height: 172 cm
Weight: 60 kg
Hair color: brown
Eye color: brown
Relations: Unnamed Mother, Kyoko Misaki (Aunt)
Dislikes: water
Status: active

Hairi Takahara grew up in an urban setting, but after an unpleasant incident, he uses the recent death of his grandmother as an excuse to come to the island to take care of her estate sale.

(Source: Summer Pockets Wiki)

name: Tsumugi Wenders
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: August 31
Height: 152 cm
Weight: 38 kg
Bust-Waist-Hips: 78-56-80 cm
Hair color: strawberry blonde
Eye color: green
Hobby: collecting knitted toys
Likes: cotton candy
Status: active

Tsumugi Wenders hangs out by the island's lighthouse. She is a diligent and honest half-German. She is utilizing her summer vacation to find the one she wants to do. She has been cleaning up the trashes that drifts into the sea, taking good care of the things that can still be used. Whenever she is troubled or at a loss for words, she tends to let out a cute-like yelp. Often, she hums an old foreign country's song.

"I'm still searching. Because I still don't know what to do."

(Source: Summer Pockets Wiki)

name: Tenzen Kano
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: October 10
Height: 178 cm
Weight: 69 kg
Hair color: black
Eye color: hazel

On the outside, Tenzen Kanou looks very serious and cool. However, he has dedicated too much of his time to table tennis, so his speech and manners are often very unusual. He brought a ping pong table to his and Ryoichi's secret base and trains rigorously every day.

(Source: Namuwiki)

name: Umi Katou
about:
Age: 12
Birthday: September 1
Height: 130 cm
Weight: 29 kg
Hair color: violet
Eye color: black
Hobby: cooking

Umi Katou is a second cousin of Hairi Takahara who is visiting Torishirojima during the summer and living alongside him at his aunt's home.

name: Kyoko Misaki
about:
Birthday: October 18
Height: 162 cm
Weight: 50 kg
Hair color: brown
Eye color: amber
Relations: Hairi Takahara (Nephew)
Hobby: collecting antiques
Likes: archaeology

When Hairi's maternal grandmother, Grandma Kato, passed away, Kyoko Misaki took over the management of the Kato family and the arrangement of belongings. Afterwards, she sends a letter to Hyrie asking for help in organizing her warehouse, which motivates Hairi to come to the island. Hairy's second cousin, Umi Kato, who came here first, and the three of them stay at the Kato family during summer vacation. According to Umi, he seems to have sent a letter to Umi as well.

(Source: Namuwiki)

name: Ryouichi Mitani
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: February 9
Height: 175 cm
Weight: 65 kg
Hair color: brown
Eye color: violet

Ryouichi Mitani is a boy who lives on the island. Has the tendency to always take off his clothes.

(Source: Namuwiki)

name: Shizuku Mizuori
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: April 29
Height: 164 cm
Weight: 54 kg
Hair color: violet
Eye color: violet

Shizuku Mizuori is the student council president at the heroines' school on the mainland. During summer vacation, she travels to the island to meet with Tsumugi.

(Source: Summer Pockets Wiki)

name: Miki Nomura
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: February 2
Height: 148 cm
Weight: 38 kg
Hair color: green
Eye color: pink
Likes: water fights
Dislikes: exhibitionists
Physical: information

Miki Nomura is a girl who lives on the island who is a member of the Torishirojima Public Order Executives, protecting the island's morals daily. She's also in charge of radio broadcasts across the island, and she will keep look out for troublemakers from atop the radio tower. She carries her own customized water gun called the "Hydro Gladiator Kai" in order to mercilessly punish evildoers.

(Source: Summer Pockets Wiki)

name: Shii Eniwa
about:
Shii is a petite young girl who dreams of having her own coffee shop when she grows up and studies to learn how to be a barista.

(Source: Super Cub Wiki)

name: Koguma
about:
Koguma is a taciturn young girl that gains friends, self-confidence, and the thrill of adventure after purchasing her Super Cub.

(Source: Super Cub Wiki)

She lives off scholarship money.

name: Reiko
about:
Reiko is a scooter bike otaku, she has an extensive amount of knowledge on scooters of all makes and models.

(Source: Super Cub Wiki)

name: Kazuto Kirigaya
about:
Birthday: October 7, 2008
Age: 14 (Beginning of Aincrad arc), 16 (End of Aincrad arc, Fairy Dance arc), 17 (Phantom Bullet arc) 18 (Mother's Rosario) 18 (Alicilization)
Height: 172 cm
Weight: 59 kg
Blood type: AB
Weapon(s) of choice: Anneal Blade (1st Level), Queen's Knightblade (9th Level), Elucidator (50th level), Dark Repulser (forged by Lisbeth), and Holy Sword Excalibur (obtained from the "Calibur Quest").

Kirito is the protagonist of Sword Art Online. He is a "solo" player, a player who hasn't joined a guild and usually works alone. He is also one of the very few people to have had the privilege to play in the beta testing period of Sword Art Online. His game alias, Kirito, is created by taking the syllables of the first and last Kanji of his real last and first names respectively: (Kirigaya Kazuto). In the real world, he lives with his aunt and younger cousin in a family of 3.

When Kayaba announced the start of the death game, he is surprised, but unlike everyone else, he quickly gets over it and accepts it to an extent. He invited his friend Klein to go with him but Klein had to find his friends in the game. He was invited to join them but he declined as he couldn't take the pressure of protecting them even with his beta testing knowledge of the game.

Kirito tends to use a single handed straight sword. The blade that he uses most often is the Elucidator. Later on, he acquires a second blade called Dark Repulser that was made by his blacksmith friend, Lisbeth.

name: Suguha Kirigaya
about: Suguha is Kazuto's adoptive sister in the real world, although later revealed to be his cousin. She is an accomplished kendo practitioner, having practiced for 8 years, following her grandfather's wishes. In ALO her avatar name is Leafa.

name: Asuna Yuuki
name_kanji: 結城 明日奈 / アスナ
about:
Birthdate: September 30, 2007
Age: 15 (Beginning of Aincrad arc); 17 (End of Aincrad arc, Fairy Dance arc); 18 (Phantom Bullet arc, 19 (Alicization Arc)
Height: 168 cm
Weight: 55 kg
Three Sizes (BWH): 82-60-83
Weapons of choice: Wind Fleuret (1st Floor), Lambent Light (Forged by Lisbeth)

Asuna is a friend of Kirito and is a sub-leader of the guild Knights of the Blood (KoB), a medium-sized guild of about thirty players, also called the strongest guild in Aincrad. Being one of the few girls that are in SAO, and even more so that she's extremely pretty, she receives many invitations and proposals. She is a skilled player earning the title "Flash" for her extraordinary sword skill that is lightning fast. Her game alias is the same as her real world name.

name: Alicia Rue
about:
Alicia Rue is the leader of the Cait Sith. She was elected by popular vote. She is also training her dark magic capable of using Moonlight Mirror. She forms an alliance with the Sylphs to finish the Conquer the World Tree Quest.


(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Argo
about: Argo "The Rat" serves as an information broker and courier in the Sword Art Online death game. Kirito and Argo suspect each-other to be a fellow beta testers but each refuse to ever confirm the topic. As a broker, she is known to sell any information for any price, including the story of her mysterious trademark whiskers. While she sells information to some at occasionally hefty prices, she is also known to be the author of free guide books situated in most town shops to help beginners.

name: Keiko Ayano
name_kanji: 綾野 珪子 / シリカ
about:
Game: Infinity Moment
Family: Ayano Tetsuhiko (Father)
Birthdate: October 4, 2010

She is 13 years old and a middle level dagger user. She is a very cheerful and sweet girl.

She is one of the very rare "Beast Tamers" in SAO. She has a very rare familiar a "feathery dragon" that she named Pina after her cat in the real world. She treasured Pina a lot and was the reason she survived in the game. Aside from being a female player, she is also a Beast Tamer and thus perceived as an idol amongst the middle level players. She received endless invitations from parties and guilds who wanted an idol player to join them to get more fame.

Because of the attention she got, she became overly proud of herself and left a party one time after a misunderstanding. She got surrounded by monsters and lost Pina in the end. She was then rescued by Kirito who was passing by and helped her to resurrect the dead familiar.

name: Vassago Casals
about:
PoH is the leader and founder of the red guild "Laughing Coffin," known for his large knife and catchphrase "It's show time."

His guild was later destroyed by other players in SAO, but his whereabouts are missing. He is presumed to be alive because he wasn't listed as one of the dead players.



(Source: Sword Art Online Wiki)

name: Caynz
about: A player who was killed inside a city, which is said to be impossible as there is a protection code preventing players to lose HP inside the city area.

name: Diabel
about:
A player with green-blue hair, sports a kite shield and proclaims himself to be a knight. 

He was the one who organized the first meeting of players to form a raid party to take on the first floor boss. He organized the participating players well into groups according to their specialty and displayed great leadership to motivate and lead the raid party.

name: Ducker
about:
Ducker was the member of the «Black Cats of the Full Moon», a small guild in «Sword Art Online». He is a dagger user. He was killed along with most of his guild when a trap was triggered that called multiple monsters and prevented the use of crystals.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Eugene
about:
General Eugene is the head of the Salamander armed forces.


(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Ginn
about: Ginn is Sasha's protege living with her and other youngest players in Town of Beginnings on the 1st level of Aincrad. He is one of the three oldest children, who hunt monsters to be able to pay the rent and buy food for the whole group.

name: Godfrey
about:
He was one of the 10,000 players who got trapped in the death game Sword Art Online. He was part of the guild Knights of the Blood. 


(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Grimlock
about:
Grimlock is a player in Sword Art Online and a former member of the guild Golden Apple. 


(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Heathcliff
about:
He is the owner of the unique skill "Holy Sword" and is considered to be strongest player in-game. He wields the one-handed sword and a tower shield collectively called as Liberator. He also was able to hold off the boss of the fiftieth level for ten minutes by himself, which earned him the title "Man of Legend". It is also rumored in SAO that Heathcliff's health has never gone into the yellow zone.


(Source: swordartonline.wikia)

name: Atsushi Kanamoto
name_kanji: 金本 敦 / ジョニー ブラック
about:
Johnny Black was a survivor of Sword Art Online. He's a member of the infamous red guild Laughing Coffin and is partnered with Xaxa. He is well known for using poisons and such in battles.


(Source: Sword Art Online Wiki)

name: Akihiko Kayaba
about: Akihiko Kayaba is the Director and Creator of the Nerve Gear and Sword Art Online. He traps all the players within Sword Art Online by using the Nerve Gear to cease sending signals to the users' body. Any attempt at removal, loss of power for a certain period, or if the user dies in the game will also kill the user. His motivation is to observe what happens after he traps them.

name: Keita
about: He is the leader of the guild Black Cats of the Full Moon he and the other members (not including Kirito) are actually computer research club members from the same high school in the real world.

name: Kibaou
about:
One of the participating players in the first raid party to defeat the first floor boss. He openly spoke out in the first meeting and called out the beta testers hiding in the meeting. He wanted to have them apologize to all the players of SAO for not sharing their knowledge in the game and monopolizing the efficient hunting grounds.


He was mentioned in volume 2 that he was one of the leaders of <The  Army> along with Sinker.


His name is in katakana but if read in kanji, it means "Fang King".

name: Midori Kirigaya
about:
Kirito and Suguha's mother in the real world. After Kazuto got trapped she went to the hospital two months prior to lean by Kazuto's side, eyes brimming with tears and smile bright with gladness that he was still alive. 


She works as a editor for a computer systems magazine and always works in the morning.

name: Kuradeel
about: A member of the guild Knights of the Blood assigned to protect Asuna.

name: Andrew Gilbert Mills
name_kanji: アンドリュー・ギルバート・ミルズ
about:
A merchant stationed at city Algate, located at the 50th floor of Aincrad. His shop motto is "Buy cheap and sell cheap." He is 180cm tall, has dark complexion and has a rare hairstyle which is bald. He is also a very strong axe-wielding warrior in the frontlines.

Kirito sometimes stays in his shop as sort of a disaster shelter, which he gets annoyed with but later ignores as Asuna also visits, which results in some publicity for his shop.

name: Shinichi Nagata
about:
He is Leafa's friend and mentor in ALfheim Online. He is skilled in concealment and high level dark magic.

He harbors a crush on Suguha, being her classmate in real life. He is key in investigating the Salamander's infiltration of the Sylph, and uncovering Sigurd's plot. He later rejoins Kirito and Leafa at Aarun, and urges Lyfa to leave and return to Sylvain, after he finds her upset. Later he confesses to her and ends up getting punched. After Leafa returns from meeting Kirito again, she informs them they are attacking the World Tree.


(Source: swordartonline.wikia)

name: Namekuji
about: Slug avatar researchers from episode 21.

name: Nishida
about:
Nishida is one of the oldest players in Sword Art Online. In the game, he is a fisherman, but in reality, he works for the Tohto Broadband Connection, a network operator company that runs SAO. He was in charge of maintaining the network connection before being trapped in the game. 

(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Pina
about:
Pina is Silica's Feathered Little Dragon and the first known monster to be tamed in Sword Art Online. It understands Silica's commands and will protect her in any way it can, as it is her Tamed Monster. It is also present in ALfheim Online as her Cait Sith familiar.

(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Rosalia
about:
Rosalia is the leader of the orange guild Titan's Hand, she was caught by Kirito and sent to the prison managed by The Army.

As the leader of the guild, and in order to maintain her "green" status, she looks for victims and lures the players to a place where the other members of the guild attack and loot the player, while she maintains her «green cursor» to avoid suspicion.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Sachi
about: A member of the guild «Black Cats of the Full Moon». All the members are actually computer research club members from the same high school in the real world except Kirito. She uses a two-handed long spear and her level is rather low compared to the rest of the guild members. She never intended to leave the Starting City but she did, knowing that she probably would die because she is afraid of monsters. According to Kirito, she and him are a lot alike and are both socially awkward, wall themselves in from people but fear loneliness.

name: Sakuya
about:
Leader of the Sylph race and an exceptional swordswoman. She was elected as the leader of the Sylph race by popular vote (80% voice of the vote). Her statistics are not very high due to her status as a Lord not allowing her to do much training. Despite her low stats, she is a formidable opponent in the Sylph dueling tournaments.


(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Sasamaru
about:
Sasamaru was the member of the «Black Cats of the Full Moon», a small guild in «Sword Art Online». He was killed along with most of his guild when a trap was triggered that called multiple monsters and prevented the use of crystals.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Sasha
about:
She resides in the first floor and takes care of the younger players. She lives with them in a church, where they hide from the members of the Army. 

(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Schmitt
about: Schmitt is a lancer of the Divine Dragon Alliance and a former member of the Golden Apple.

name: Shouichi Shinkawa
about:
Shinkawa was one of the top members in the red guild «Laughing Coffin». He was a master of the «Estoc Thorn Sword» that was bathed in the color of red. He holds a grudge against Kirito and the clearers that defeated Laughing Coffin in the anti-PK raid. He was also partners with Johnny Black, and together served as a combination where they poisoned and killed.


(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Rika Shinozaki
name_kanji: 篠崎 里香 / リズベット
about:
Birthdate: May 18, 2007

A mace wielder that runs a blacksmith shop in Aincrad on the 48th floor. She made Asuna's rapier "Lament Light" and one day got a request from Kirito to make him a sword with similar or better quality than his one handed long sword "Elucidator" that he got from a monster drop. She told him that if she had the right materials she could make weapons that would break any sword, so they formed a party and went on a journey to find the material she needed. Because of that journey she came to the conclusion that she felt lonely and yearned for warmth.

In ALO, she is Leprechaun race blacksmith.

name: Nobuyuki Sugou
about:
Originally selected by Asuna's father to marry Asuna, he was adopted into her family on her father's wishes. He attended the same school with Kayaba Akihiko, who he viewed as a rival. During the Sword Art Online incident, he took advantage of the chaos to steal test subjects for research along with Asuna. In ALfheim Online he adopts the persona of Fairy King Oberon.

As the Fairy King Oberon, he keeps Asuna locked up in a bird cage at the top of the World Tree. In the real world, he confronts the powerless Kazuto by voicing his intentions of wedding the unconscious Asuna. While keeping Asuna locked up in ALO, he constantly visited her just to fool around with her. From his actions, one could say that he is a pervert.


(Source: swordartonline.wikia)

name: The Gleam Eyes
name_kanji: ザ・グリーム・アイズ
about:
The Gleam Eyes is a demon-type boss from the 74th Floor in Sword Art Online.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Thinker
about:
He is trapped in the dungeon under the Black Iron Castle by a faction leader named Kibaou. He is later rescued by Kirito and Asuna in during the Morning Dew Girl arc events after he was thrown into a hidden dungeon.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Ryoutarou Tsuboi
about:
A friendly player that meets Kirito at the start of the game and quickly befriends and learns from him. He and Kirito later separate because he has friends who were also new to the game so he couldn't leave them. He survives for the past two years and managed to protect his friends the whole time, something Kirito regretted not doing. He is a katana user and the leader of the small guild Fuurinkazan who participates in the boss battles.

As one of the few people close to Kirito, he always keeps him in check and wants Kirito to survive the game.

He chose the Salamader race in Alfheim Online.

name: Yolko
about:
Appears in volume 8.
A close friend of Caynz and the one who first screamed when the inside area incident occurred.

name: Yui
about: A young and cheerful girl with long black hair who looks no older than 10 years old. Kirito and Asuna found her in a forest in the 22nd floor of Aincrad. After taking care of her, she appears to have lost her memory. She calls Kirito and Asuna "Papa" and "Mama" due to having trouble pronouncing their names which is a side effect of the memory loss. They decided that they would go and search for her friends in the Starting City.

name: Yulier
about:
Yulier is a silver haired whip user who is part of the Aincrad Liberation Force. She is devoted to aiding Thinker with his duties. 

She seeks the aid of Asuna and Kirito after she heard that two strong players from higher floors had come to the first floor. Thinker had been trapped by Kibaou in a hidden high-level dungeon that had recently opened up below the first floor. After journeying with Kirito and Asuna to the center of the floor, she grabs Thinker and is told by Kirito to escape with a teleport crystal.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Shino Asada
about:
Gender: Female
Age: 16 (Phantom Bullet arc)
Birthdate: August 21, 2009
Height: 161 cm
Three sizes: 80-61-81

Shino is a skilled VRMMO player. She goes by the name Sinon in Gun Gale Online and ALfheim Online. She is nicknamed Hecate, after her gun «PGM Ultima Ratio Hecate II», a .50 caliber anti-materiel and rare sniper rifle. She is one of the main characters of volumes five and six and first female player that Kirito meets in GGO. She plays GGO to overcome her trauma concerning guns.

Calm and cool are two words that best describe Sinon's personality. In battle and most of the time in the game, she keeps a cool head that actually makes other female players admire her; however, Sinon has a violent temper once angered—something that is best seen with her interactions with Kirito. It is actually said that Kirito is the first one to make her extremely angry. Despite all this, Sinon, while may be hard to approach, is generally a friendly person and doesn't mind helping others.


(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Yuuki Konno
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: May 23

Yuuki Konno is a new player who appears in ALfeim Online in volume 7. She leads the Sleeping Knights guild and quickly becomes known as one of the strongest in the game winning 67 straight matches, earning her the title of "Absolute Sword."

name: Natsuki Aki
about:
She is the nurse who would watch over Kirito whenever he went into GGO.

She was also the one who helped Kirito in rehab after SAO.

name: Si-eun An
name_kanji: 安 施恩; シウネー
about:
A support-class member and the sub-leader of the Sleeping Knights guild.

(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Behemoth
about:
A high-ranked mercenary player in the VRMMO, Gun Gale Online, who is usually hired as a bodyguard for player groups with money but no perseverance. Behemoth uses a heavy GE M134 Minigun as his weapon of choice.

(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Jun
about:
Close-range tank-build swordsman member of the Sleeping Knights guild.

(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Seijirou Kikuoka
about: Kikuoka Seijirou is a member of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications, Technology, Second Separated Advanced Network Division, or "Virtual Division." He uses the handle Chrysheight in ALfheim Online.

name: Pale Rider
about:
Display Name: ペイルライダー (Peiru Raida)
In-Game Name: Pale Rider
Gender: Male

Pale Rider was one of the participants of the third Bullet of Bullets(BoB) tournament in the Gun Gale Online. Pale Rider was a STR-type player, who had three dimensional mobility.

Pale Rider was a tall, skinny male who wore blue and white camouflage clothing. Due to his black helmet, his face could not be seen. Pale Rider used an ArmaLite AR17 Shotgun.


(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Tamotsu Shigemura
name_kanji: 茂村 保 / ゼクシード
about: XeXeeD was the winner of the «2nd Bullet of Bullets» tournament, which he won due to obtaining an extremely rare gun, the XM29 assault rifle. Another factor that contributed to his win was that, right before the tournament, he spread misinformation about stat allocation to other players, specifically about AGI being the best build, while, later on in the game, a STR-VIT build proved to be better. He also opted to take a life sized model of a GGO gun as his prize for winning the BoB instead of in-game currency. This eventually caused him to become one of Death Gun's targets.

name: Kyouji Shinkawa
about:
Kyouji is a player of the American produced VRMMORPG Gun Gale Online. He uses the AGI powered character Spiegel. He is Asada Shino's friend and the one introduced her to GGO. 


(Source: SAO Wiki)

name: Tecchi
about:
A close-range, tank-build member of the Sleeping Knights.

(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Thrym
about:
Thyrm is the boss located on the 4th (last) floor of the inverted ice pyramid dungeon known as Thrymheim in ALfheim Online as well as the boss required to be killed for The Holy Sword of the Ice Palace quest. Unlike the bosses of New Aincrad, Thrym's 3 large HP bars are visible to players.

(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Verdandi
about:
Verdandi is sister of Urd and Skuld and is one of the NPCs part of «The Holy Sword of the Ice Palace» quest.


(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Yamikaze
about:
A AGI-type player in Gun Gale Online and a participant in the 2nd and 3rd Bullet of Bullets.

(Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

name: Kyouko Yuuki
about: She is Asuna's mother. She hates FullDive programs after her daughter was trapped in one for two years. She is strict with Asuna as she decides her daughter's future and gets angry very fast.

name: Tamahiko Shima
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: September 1, 1905

Tamahiko Shima is a young man born into a wealthy family in Meiji 38. A year before the manga starts, he was in a car accident that resulted in his mother dying and the loss of complete use of his right arm. He was given his family's mansion in Chiba, and a bride was purchased to assist him for ¥200,000.

name: Yuzuki Tachibana
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: December 31

Yuzuki is Tamahiko's bride who was purchased for ¥200,000 (¥10,000 in the one-shot) by Tamahiko's father.

name: Ryou Atsumi
about:
Age: 18
Height: 5' (151 cm)
Birthday: July 17

Ryou was born in Meiji 38. She is an caring older sister to three young brothers.

name: Tamasuke Manabe
about:
Age: 39
Height: 5'7" (175cm)

Manabe is Tamahiko's uncle and a doctor. Tamasuke is the youngest of seven siblings. Tamahiko's father is the oldest. According to Tamahiko's father, Manabe adopted his bride's name and ran away to a different house.

His last name was formally Shima.

name: Tamao Shima
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: August 10, 1908
Height: 5'6" (169cm)

Tamahiko's younger brother. He was born in Meiji 41.

name: Tamako Shima
about: Tamahiko's 12-year-old little sister.

name: Tamayoshi Shima
about: He sent Tamahiko to his family's mansion in Chiba and purchased a bride for him for ¥200,000.

name: Hakaru Shiratori
about:
Age: 19
Birthdate: July 7, 1905
Height 5'7" (170cm)

Born in Meji 38. The twin brother of Kotori Shiratori.

name: Kotori Shiratori
about: A famous singer.

name: Mother Tachibana
about: Yuzuki's mother.

name: Shizuka Kuze
about:
Age: 9

Shizuka Kuze loves her pet dog, Chappy. She is the one who finds Takopi and is the victim of Marina's bullying.
Her parents are divorced. Her father left when she was little and her mother works as an escort so she is always all alone. 
Her schooldays are nothing but harassment and bullying from Marina because Shizuka's mother is having an affair with Marina's dad, causing Marina's family to get destroyed so Marina takes her anger out on Shizuka.

name: Junya Azuma
about: Naoki's older brother.

name: Shiori Asagiri
about:
Height: 151 cm (4'11")
Birthday: April 2
Blood type: A

Shiori is one of Tamako's classmates and a member of the badminton club. She is a knowledgeable and resourceful girl, with a serious, cool personality.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Tamako Kitashirakawa
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: December 31
Height: 156 cm (5'1")
Blood type: O

Tamako is a high school student whose family runs a mochi shop in their town's shopping district called Tama-ya. She enjoys her high school life and the baton club with her friends Kanna and Midori. She helps her family run the shop and invent new kinds of mochi.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kanna Makino
about:
Height: 153 cm (5')
Birthday: June 7
Blood type: O

Kanna is a high school student in the same year as her friends, Tamako and Midori, and is a member of the baton club. She is the daughter of a carpenter who works in the same shopping district as Tamako and her family. A relaxed and laid back girl, Kanna does not care what anyone else thinks and is not easily swayed, however she does have a fear of heights.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mochizou Ooji
about:
Age: 16
Birthdate: October 10 (Mochi Day)
Height: 175 cm (5'9")
Blood type: B

Mochizou is Tamako's childhood friend whose family runs Ouji-ya, a mochi shop located across from Tama-ya. Though their fathers are not on good terms due to business competition, he and Tamako are good friends. He is in love with Tamako.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Midori Tokiwa
about:
Height: 160 cm (5'3")
Birthday: August 19
Blood type: B

Midori is Tamako's classmate, childhood friend, and baton club member. Her grandparents, whom she lives with, own and run a toy shop in the town's shopping district. Midori feels the need to "take care" of Tamako, so much that she feels she may be in love with her.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kaoru Hanase
name_kanji: 花瀬 かおる / フローリストプリンセス
about:
Kaoru is a florist at a flower shop in the Usagi-yama shopping district.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Inuyama
about: Mochizou's friend.

name: Anko Kitashirakawa
about:
Anko is Tamako's younger sister who is in fourth grade. She is less practical than her older sister, and is a more fashion-conscious girl.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Fuku Kitashirakawa
about:
Tamako's grandfather who lives with her family and helps run the mochi shop.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mamedai Kitashirakawa
about: Tamako's father who runs the family's mochi shop.

name: Dera Mochimazzi
name_kanji: デラ・モチマッヅィ; 鳥
about:
Dera Mochimazzi is a bird that speaks in Japanese, with a little bossy tone. It seems that he is a noble bird that came from a tropical place. He later stays at Tamako's house.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Choi Mochimazzi
name_kanji: チョイ・モチマッヅィ / お付き
about:
A fortune teller from the tropical place that Dera comes from who is sent to stay with Tamako to check up on Dera.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mecha Mochimazzi
name_kanji: メチャ・モチマッヅィ
about: The prince of the southern island Dera journeyed from.

name: Momotarou
about: Mochizou's friend.

name: Michiko Ooji
about:
Mochizou's mother who helps run the Oujiya shop.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Nobuhiko Tokiwa
about: Gender: Male

name: Yuuko Kisaragi
about: Appears in episode 10.

name: Tatsuya
about: Anko's classmate. Appears in episode 4.

name: Yuzuki
about: Anko's classmate. Appears in episode 4.

name: Yuuko Kanoe
about:
Age:15 years old 
Height: 168 cm
Weight: 56.2 kg

A young girl who was left to die alone in the old school building of Seikyou Private Academy long ago. She has no recollection of how she died and is currently searching for clues together with Teiichi Niiya. As a ghost, she is normally invisible to the people in the school, with the exceptions of Teiichi and Kirie Kanoe, a blood relative who can also see her. 

Apparently, she has grown fond of Teiichi and has expressed her desire to be by his side forever. 

Okonogi is the only member of the club that can't see Yuuko and is not aware that she is the'absentee' president for the paranormal investigation club.

"Meanwhile, the surname "Kanoe" is derived from the 7th sign of the Chinese calendar, which originally meant "evening star" and also means "a person's age".

In the anime series, Yuuko is attributed to autumn leaves and the sky during sunset, which both share the same fiery hues. "

name: Kirie Kanoe
about:
Age: 14
Height: 156.5 cm
Weight: 43.5 kg

In her first appearance, she warns Niiya about Yuuko.

name: Teiichi Niiya
about:
Age: 14
Height: 153.2 cm
Weight: 42.8 kg

Teiichi is a pupil in the school where Yuuko died about 50 years ago. He once heard rumors about a spirit in the school who was left to die alone. Teiichi is able to see her and wants to help Yuuko to find out why she died.

name: Momoe Okonogi
about:
The most enthusiastic member of the Paranormal Investigations Club, Momoe is a year older than Niiya and begins to develop feelings for him after seeing his dedication to solving the Seven Mysteries. Like most people, she is not able to see Yuuko.  Momoe also becomes close friends with Kirie by the time of the school festival. Officially, Momoe is a member of the school's Third Newspaper Club, but she is able to participate in the activities of both clubs due to the unofficial nature of the Paranormal Investigations Club.

She is also someone who easily believes in any urban legend she comes across.

name: Yukariko Kanoe
about:
Yukariko is Kirie's grandmother and one of the school directors. She is Yuuko's younger sister.

Voiced by:
Young (ep. 10) - Satomi Satou
Old (ep. 11) - Gara Takashima

name: Yuuko Kirishima
about: A second year student who shares the same first name with the ghost in the school's stories. Because of this, she becomes the target of unwanted attention from the other students around her.

name: Sonchou
about: He was the village chief 60 years ago.

name: Miria Akagi
about:
Age: 11
Height: 140 cm
Weight: 36 kg
Birthday: April 14
Blood type: AB
B-W-H: 75-55-78
Hobbies: Chatting

name: Nina Ichihara
about:
Age: 9
Height: 129 cm
Weight: 30 kg
Birthday: February 8
Blood Type: B
B-W-H: 62-58-67
Hobbies: Collecting Costumes

A costume loving costume idol. Has a peculiar way of speech.

name: Koharu Koga
about:
Age: 12
Height: 140 cm
Weight: 35 kg
Birthday: April 1
Blood type: O
B-W-H: 72-54-77
Hobbies: Playing with Hyou, helping at home

In the tie in Cinderella Girls Theater skits, Koharu is shown to be a sweet girl who owns an iguana named Hyou. She wishes to be a princess, and seems to be good at giving compliments. Koharu likes Twister, and hopes to play with the Producer someday. She is the fifth idol to join the "Little Marching Band Girls" unit, and uses a set of hand bells. During her talk battle, she tells about the boys in her class swinging sculpting knives around dangerously. She does homework with Arisu Tachibana and Mary Cochran.

(Source: Project iM@S)

name: Risa Matoba
about:
Age: 12
Height: 143 cm
Weight: 38 kg
Birthday: November 19th
Blood type: B
B-W-H: 71-58-73
Hobbies: Dancing, Dates with Dad

A bold and prideful daddy's girl, Risa aims to be the cutest and most successful idol in the world. Having a great relationship with her father, she loves to spend time with him and values his opinion over anyone else's. She enjoys fashion, dancing, and has a soft spot for animals. Through her prideful nature, she has a tendency to come across as arrogant, but despite her confident exterior, she's actually insecure most times.

Since she has such a strong personality, Risa isn't afraid to speak her opinion on something. When she first meets the producer, she is very strict and constantly criticizing him, making sure he knows how serious she is about practice and work. As time passes, she comes to respect the producer more. She is good friends with Haru Yuuki, forming a unit called Beat Shooter.

(Source: Project iM@S wiki)

name: Producer
about:
The producer responsible for the child idols in the Third Entertainment Section. Despite his childish appearance, he is indeed an adult. He is self-conscious about his small height and childish appearance. He prefers mature idols, but he does his best to help and produce the idols at the Third Entertainment Section. He is voiced by Yuuki Yonai in a drama CDs, and was thus nicknamed YonaiP.

(Source: Comic Vine)

name: Kaoru Ryuuzaki
about:
Age: 9
Height: 132cm
Weight: 32kg
Birthday: July 20
Blood type: O
B-W-H: 65-51-70
Hobbies: Cooking

name: Momoka Sakurai
about:
Age: 12
Height: 145 cm
Weight: 39 kg
Birthday: April 8
Blood type: A
B-W-H: 72-53-75
Hobbies: Tea Time 


Momoka is a young, elegant girl from a wealthy family. Due to her princess-like demeanor, she has a lady-like aura surrounding her. While Momoka tries to act older than she is, she is still a just a young girl and enjoys things others her age enjoy. Despite insisting she be treated like a lady, she uses the childish honorific "-chama" when addressing the Producer. Momoka enjoys tea parties and takes them very seriously, inviting many of the idols to partake in them with her, especially when it comes to similarly elegant ladies such as Otoha and Yukino. Her favorite tea and drink is Rose Hip tea. She even has a flowery, rose motif, wearing many frilly flowery casual and stage outfits.

She enjoys teasing Nao, as she notes Nao chooses her clothes and costumes with the Producer in mind. Momoka also really likes the glasses Haruna gave her and enjoys selecting kimonos with friends. She holds the Producer in very high regard and shows that she will put herself on the line in order to show him that she cares about him.

Momoka is close friends with Arisu, starting from the Near to You event commu in Starlight Stage. Being the twelve-year-old Hyougo idols, both of them view each other as rivals, duking out who's the leader for the song (which belongs to Sanae instead). After a numerous battle lessons, during the festival, Momoka thinks that Arisu is not just as a worthy rival, but also a comrade and a dear friend with the same vision of becoming a better person. Ever since the Near to You event commu concluded, Momoka will occasionally be seen with Arisu, both encouraging Nina face to face in order to come back as an idol after her father's departure, as well as going to the party to meet Fumika in the ending of the Illusionista! event commu.

(Source: Project iM@S)

name: Chie Sasaki
about:
Age: 11
Height: 139 cm
Weight: 33 kg
Birthday: June 7
Blood type: A
B-W-H: 73-49-73
Hobbies: Sewing

Chie is an elementary school student who acts shy upon meeting new people but later becomes very mature around Producer. Chie is very easily scared of people she doesn’t know, and in fact, was actually terrified of Producer at first. However, once she begins to trust others, Chie becomes very level-headed and mature, even flirty, after idol work. She admits that she doesn’t trust in her idol skills, and has been found out to have developed a crush on Producer by the time she receives her first idol form.

In the tie-in Cinderella Girls Theater skits, Chie shows that she still believes that theme park mascots are real. She likes to wear kimonos and has fun with Seika Suzumiya at the band event. She plays the pianica at her school and hopes to be able to play in a marching band someday. When told she would lead her fellow idols in a marching band unit, she immediately got nervous and begins to hope Producer will march right beside her. Chie partakes in singing lessons with Chika Yokoyama and Mai Fukuyama, with Arisa Mochida leading them. She admits that she doesn’t have any special skills, although she can play the whistle. She is also very proud of her ice and flower arrangement, made from a bucket.

(Source: Project iM@S)

name: Arisu Tachibana
about:
Age: 12 years old
Blood type: A
Birthday: July 31
Sign: Leo
Height: 141cm
Weight: 34kg
Three size: 68/52/67
Birthplace: Hyogo prefecture
Hobby: Game / reading (mystery)

Arisu is a serious and smart girl who likes mystery novels also good at arguing. Her trademark is her big blue ribbon and tablet pc. 
She likes strawberry, like it so much that she even made a strawberry pasta.
She dislikes being called Arisu (which is Alice in english) because it sounds like a fairy tale and childish.

She isn't interested in idols work that much, but she wanted to work in singing and music. 
In the main Cinderella Girls anime, she's part of the Project Krone unit.

name: Haru Yuuki
about:
Age: 12
Height: 140 cm
Weight: 37 kg

Blood type: A
B-W-H: 74-55-78

Haru is a former rival idol who enjoys soccer. She has a harsh, no holds barred personality. Considered to be a tomboy and delinquent, Haru uses the pronoun "ore," which is barely used by females. She doesn't like cute clothes and shows extreme displeasure when forced into a bunny costume for an event. Haru has been shown performing with Hiromi Seki and Yuu Oota during lives.

In the tie in Cinderella Girls Gekijou skits, Haru is initially introduced by Cathy Graham. She is very annoyed at becoming an idol, and her first event is a bunny girl live. She immediately protests upon learning that she will have to wear the costume, and only puts it on due to it being her job. Haru is quick to dismantle the silly fun other idols have, but sometimes allows it when in certain situations, notably when with Yuki Himekawa and Nene Kurihara. She has been a participant in "free running" with the Producer, and promotes it with Yuriko Oonishi.

When asked about it, she says her dream changed to caring much more about being an idol since she was scouted. She also admits that she'd like to experience many new things.

(Source: Project-iM@S)

name: Nana Abe
about:
A strange idol that came from the planet Usamin. Works part-time as a maid.

(Source: Square Enix)

name: Kei Aoki
about:
Age: 19
Height: 157 cm
Weight: 45 kg
Birthday: March 10
Blood type: B

Hobbies: Gyms

name: Karin Doumyouji
about:
Age: 17

The daughter of a shrine priest, who has been educated since birth in the Shinto faith and works part-time as a shrine maiden. Her whole character is based around this, from her birthdate (January 1, very significant for religious Japanese) to her hometown (Nara, well known for its shrines). In the anime she's one of 346 idols.

name: Kanade Hayami
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: July 1
Height: 162 cm
Weight: 43 kg
Blood type: O
Measurements: B86-W55-H84
Hobby: Watching Movies
Horoscope: Cancer
Hometown: Tokyo

Kanade is an incredibly flirtatious and mysterious girl. She often flat-out asks the Producer to kiss her. Despite that it's very hard to tell what she's thinking, or if she's joking or not. Though she seems to be a very open person at first glance, she actually remains distant.

(Sourse: Idolm@ster Wiki)

name: Mio Honda
about:
Age: 15

Height: 161 cm
Weight: 46 kg
Blood type: B
Three sizes: B84-W58-H87
Hobbies: shopping

Honda Mio is able to easily break the ice in any situation with her outgoing personality and her inherent energy, which pull others into her pace. She has a habit of giving nicknames to the other idols around her.

name: Shiki Ichinose
about:
Shiki is a curious girl who can be described only as "a mad scientist." She loves experiments and is motivated by finding new things to hold her attention; if it's not interesting, she's not interested. Rather than being scouted by Producer, she chose him as part of one of her experiments. She sniffed the Producer and his smell convinced her that he was the right one for the experiment. She became an idol for this reason.

(Source: iDOLM@STER Wikia)

name: Mika Jougasaki
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: November 12
Height: 162 cm
Weight: 43 kg
Blood type: A
Three sizes: B80-W56-H82

An upbeat girl from Saitama who likes karaoke and fashion. She's Rika's older sister, and in the anime, she has a solid career as a solo artist.

name: Sanae Katagiri
about:
Sanae is a former police officer who quit the force to become an idol, largely because the Producer convinced her. She is very flirtatious to the Producer and uses a lot of police terminology when talking. She wishes to be seen by other idols as an older sister and be called Onee-sama, despite the fact that she is shorter than idols who are half her age. Sanae has a black belt in Aikido, Judo, and Karate. She also tends to get upset if other mention she is single, and is very easily susceptible to drinking to drown her sorrows.

She is in the upper tier for bust size, which is further enhanced because she's rather short. Her cards often reference that she wants to put the Producer in handcuffs, lock him up, and do an interrogation as a teasing double entendre.

In the tie in Cinderella Girls Gekijou skits, Sanae is a former police officer. She sees herself as an older sister to her fellow idols and will go to great lengths to help promote this. She leads training lessons for Nagisa Aino, Erika Akanishi, Makino Yagami, and Yuriko Ohnishi. While she finds it extremely difficult, Sanae continues to do so because she wants to be considered reliable. She puts other's wants before hers, and can sometimes wind up looking like a fool because of it. She is nervous when it comes to Yukino Aihara's high-class tea and ceramics.

Sanae has a habit of getting drunk, and often drags other idols into it as well. She has found drinking buddies in Kaede Takagaki, Shino Hiiragi, Rei Shinohara, and Rena Hyodo and made friends with Kiyora Yanagi. Sanae earned a movie role of an evil mahjong player, and in turn became one of Atsumi Munakata's ogling victims. Her sense of style seems to mostly include extremely short dresses that show a lot of cleavage. She is said to be stunning in a bathing suit, although she has put on a child's swimsuit in order to gain attention.

(Source: Project-iM@S)

name: Mizuki Kawashima
about:
Age: 28
Height: 159 cm
Weight: 44 kg
Birthday: November 25
Blood type: A
Three sizes: B87-W57-H85
Hobbies: Cleaning, laundry

Previously a newscaster, Mizuki decided instead to pursue the path of becoming an idol. She's nearing her 30's and is a bit self conscious about that, taking very good care of her appearance, and eagerly competing with her younger comrades. Her insecurity about her age stretches into not having a boyfriend or husband.

She acts like a role model for some of the idols. For example, she taught Karin Domyoji how to speak more clearly and smoothly. She is very mature and hard working, and often tells the Producer that he can rely on her whenever he wants. Her hobbies are cleaning and doing laundry, and she even offers to clean up the Producer's room in one of her SR card comments.

name: Tsukasa Kiryuu
about:
Age: 18
Height: 164 cm
Weight: 45 kg
Birthday: February 24th
Blood type: A
Three sizes: 83-55-82
Handedness: Right
Hobbies: Inter-industry Exchange, Hot Yoga, Looking After Nukadoko

Tsukasa is the successful Chief Executive Officer of a national corporation who mysteriously wants to become an idol. She is believed to have hired the Producer, rather than been scouted by him. She earned vast amounts of wealth through stock trade, and simply wants to have a professional singing career.

In the tie in Cinderella Girls Theater skits, Tsukasa is introduced by Meiko Namiki. She is both a CEO and an idol, and often uses business terms to describe events.

(Source: project-imas.com Wiki)

name: Sachiko Koshimizu
about:
Age: 14
Height: 142 cm
Weight: 37 kg
Birthday: November 25
Blood type: B
B-W-H: 74-52-75
Hobbies: Making clean copies of notes

A narcissistic teenager who's obsessed with being the cutest. She has a sadist strike, and likes to show her superiority towards others in pretty aggressive ways.

In the anime, she's in an unit with Sae and Yuki called KBYD.

name: Miyu Mifune
about:
Age: 26
Height: 165 cm / 5'5
Hometown: Iwate

name: Frederica Miyamoto
about:
Age: 19

A flirtatous girl who has a Japanese father and a French mother. She was born in Paris, but has lived most of her life in Japan, and doesn't speak any French.

In the anime, she's part of the Project Krone unit.

name: Shin Satou
about:
Shin is a quirky girl with a cute personality who likes making her own idol costumes. Her surname means "sugar," while her given name is written with the character for "heart," and she loves to point out her cuteness and sweetness. She also enjoys being called "Sweetie." She is depicted as literally throwing hearts to the audience in two of her cards. Shin is 26, but looks like a teenager. This is mostly explained because her cute idol outfits make her look younger. While her outfits are indeed cute and always are largely pink, if you look closer you can notice some details are held together with tape.

(Source: Project-iM@S)

name: Rin Shibuya
about:
Card type: Cool Idol
Age: 15
Birthday: August 10
Zodiac sign: Leo
Hometown: Tokyo
Height: 165 cm
Weight: 44 kg
Blood type: B
BWH: 80-56-81
Hobbies: walking dogs

With her sleek black hair and her imposing school uniform, Shibuya Rin is a cool and trendy schoolgirl. She lives in a flower shop, where she’ll occasionally help her parents over the counter. Though her aloof demeanor makes her seem like the type of person that’s hard to approach, Rin shows a more honest side once she’s more trusting of others.

Her rise in popularity and her being the first one to go from a tutorial idol to getting a CD debut has earned quite a bit of popularity, becoming sort of the poster girl for the Cinderella Girls.

Rin tends to be the “straight man” in joke sequences, and is sometimes overly serious to a comedic point. While she tends to be cool and harsh, she does have a sweet side that she occasionally shows others. She is self-conscious that her default expression comes off as unfriendly. Her cool, level-headed demeanor is put to the test when she's stuck in the same room as Ranko Kanzaki, Kaede Takagaki and Riina Tada.

(Source: iDOLM@STER Wikia)

name: Uzuki Shimamura
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: April 24
Height: 159 cm
Weight: 45 kg
BWH: 83-59-87
Blood type: O
Hobbies: long phone calls with friends

Her ordinary personality is her defining trait. She's so average in fact that it's almost bizarre, counting such feats as consistently scoring right in the middle of her school's exam rankings, or always running around the middle of the pack in sporting events, or having never drawn any fortune but the average Good Luck over the course of 17 New Year's celebrations.

name: Shuuko Shiomi
about:
Age: 18

A pale-skinned girl from Kyoto whose parents kicked her out of her house after a heated argument and is in a situation of almost poverty. In the game, the Producer scouts her after meeting her during her job at a tea house. She loves Japanese sweets, since her parents own a Japanese sweets shop.

In the anime, she's part of Project Krone.

name: Kaede Takagaki
about:
Age: 25

Blood type: AB

A 25-year-old from Wakayama Prefecture, Kaede is mature, with keen observational skills. She is very tall, with a mole under her left eye, and heterochromia, with her right eye being green, and her left eye blue.

name: Aiko Takamori
about:
Age: 16
Height: 155 cm
Weight: 42 kg
Birthday: July 25
Blood type: O
Three sizes: B74-W60-H79

Writing hand: Right

An easygoing girl, with a positive and calm personality. Aiko enjoys photography and does not like competition because of her 'soft sister' personality. She often sports various flower hairpieces and a section of her hair in a bun or a high ponytail. Due to her calming aura, people who talk to her usually lose track of time and drift off into a serene oblivion.

(Source: Project-iM@S)

name: Mikoto Misaka
about:
Age: 13–14
Height: 161 cm
Birthday: May 2
Blood Type: AB
Hair color: light brown
Eye color: light brown
Classification: Esper
School: Tokiwadai Middle School
Level: 5
Ability: Railgun (level 5 version of the Electromaster ability)
Known Relatives: Misaka Misuzu (Mother), Misaka Tabigake (Father) 
Mikoto Misaka is one of the series' main heroines in Toaru Majutsu no Index series and the protagonist of her side story, Toaru Kagaku no Railgun. A psychic user of Academy City, her powers are ranked Level 5, the highest rank for the most powerful psychic users, and she ranks as third-strongest out of the seven people who hold this rank in Academy City.

She attends Tokiwadai Middle School, a famous girls' school for the rich and elite psychics and one of the five elite schools of Academy City. To most people, she is considered a proper lady, but in reality, she has a short-tempered, prideful, and improper attitude with some tomboyish tendencies and insecurities, a fact few other characters know. She is fond of cute, childish things, such as flowery pajamas and Gekota, the popular frog mascot franchise. She has a strong sense of morals and hates injustice, contrary to what she claims. Her power is to generate electricity; she is powerful enough to cause a blackout in the city, make instant railguns by using coins as projectiles, and use electricity to magnetically attract iron particles around her into a chain-sword whip. She can also manipulate electrical objects such as networks and security systems. She has a one-sided rivalry with Touma, who nicknames her "Biribiri" (ビリビリ, relating to the sound of an electric shock), ever since their first meeting before the events of the first novel when he first dissipated her electricity. Since that incident, she is always trying to have a proper match with Touma and defeat him despite his many attempts to avoid conflict with her.



(Source: Wikipedia, edited)

name: Ruiko Saten
about:
Age: 12–13 
Height: 160 cm
Classification: Esper
School: Sakugawa Middle School
Level: 0

A Level 0, classmate and friend of Uiharu. She wears a flower on the left side of her hair. She is cheerful and friendly, and is a little shameless as she sometimes flips Uiharu's skirt in public.

She first appears in the Toaru Kagaku no Railgun manga and its anime series and makes a cameo appearance in the Toaru Majutsu no Index light novel series and the opening of the anime.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kuroko Shirai
about:
Age: 12–13
Height: 152 cm
Classification: Esper
School: Tokiwadai Middle School
Affliation: Judgment
Ability: Teleport
Level: 4

Mikoto's junior in Tokiwadai Middle School and a protagonist in Toaru Kagaku no Railgun and main character in the eighth volume of the Toaru Majutsu no Index light novels.

A Level 4 ESPer, she is a member of Judgment, a special public committee group whose duty is to maintain peace and order in Academy City. She has an unhealthy obsession with Mikoto, who she calls "Onee-sama" (big sister); she is on the constant lookout for a chance to get physically intimate with Mikoto (and getting called a pervert in the process), and tends to get jealous if someone else gets her attention; this unfortunately happens to be Tōma since he has caught the attention of Mikoto for various reasons. However, it's been shown on few occasions that she is genuinely in love with Mikoto, even allowing herself to get severely hurt (see Tree Remnant arc) in order to help Mikoto. She is classified as Mikoto Misaka's best friend. Her power is instant teleportation, which allows her to teleport herself and anything in her possession as long it weighs under around 130-137 kilograms to anywhere in a radius of around 81-85 meters. She generally carries a strap of needles around her leg that she can teleport to pin down enemies. One disadvantage of her power is that she has to concentrate on where she, the object(s), and/or person she holds would be teleported to, for any disturbance in her concentration will make her powers useless.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kazari Uiharu
about:
Shirai's friend and colleague in Judgment and another protagonist in Toaru Kagaku no Railgun. Shy and humble, she goes to Sakugawa Junior High, different from Shirai's, and is known for wearing a headband made of flowers on her head, and sometimes a surgical mask as she constantly suffers the flu. She has a sweet tooth but is often called for Judgment duties before she can enjoy her sweets. She displays various skills with the use of the computer, such as repelling hackers and information gathering.

She makes a cameo appearance in the opening of the Index anime and appears as a supporting character in the second season. She has small parts in the novels, larger ones in the Railgun SS novels.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Maaya Awatsuki
about: Maaya is a first year student at Tokiwadai Middle School, and is Kuroko's classmate. She is a member of the Swimming Club, same as Kinuho.

name: Banri Edasaki
about:
She is a victim in Kiyama's experiment.

A one and only friend of Haruue when they were still in the orphanage.

name: Erii Haruue
about: Eri is a transfer student that got transferred in episode 20 to be Uiharu's roommate. She has a pendant that is precious to her and is of cute as well as shy nature. She is a 2nd year student.

name: Heaven Canceller
about: Often mentioned as "the Frog-Faced Doctor" by Touma, he is an exceptionally gifted and benevolent physician who can cure any illness and heal any injury, even if it is terminal. He is only unable to heal specific brain-related injuries, such as the "Imagine-Breaker Boy's" damaged memories and Accelerator's computation ability. However, in the latter case he was able to configure Accelerator to control his powers with support from the Misaka Network. This medical genius also manages the life extension devices for the ruler of the Academy City, Aleister Crowley, while also supporting the foundation of the city itself.

name: Aisa Himegami
about:
Height: 160 cm
Hair color: black purple
Eye color: purple
Classification: Esper (Gemstone)

Aisa Himegami is a quiet young girl with a rather blunt personality who wears Miko attire.

name: Index Librorum Prohibitorum
about:
Age: 14-15
Height: 148 cm
Classification: Magician

Index, also known by her full name Index Librorum Prohibitorum (禁書目録, "List of Prohibited Books"), is one of the main heroines and the titular character of the series. She is a young nun from Necessarius (必要悪の教会, Hitsuyouaku no Kyoukai, "Church of Necessary Evil"), a branch of the Church of England. Index is small in stature and has a petite build. About 14 or 15 years old, she has thigh-length, silvery-blue hair with very white skin and large green eyes. She also wears a white robe with golden embroidery sewed onto every edge of it, the Walking Church, that prevents any injury on her, but it is later destroyed by Touma when he touched it with his right hand, which is why her uniform is stitched with golden pins. Her mind has been implanted with the 103,000 magical texts of the Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum as she possesses Photographic memory, which makes magicians wonder if she really is human because just one grimoire is poisonous to the mind, and one is more than enough to kill a person without the proper preparative.


When she is being invaded by outsiders or injured, her self-protection system personality, Johann's Pen (自動書記〈ヨハネのペン〉, "Automatic Writing"), will be activated to allow her to use magic to cast high-class magic attacks such as St. George's Sanctuary (聖ジョージの聖域) and Dragon's Breath (竜王の殺息〈ドラゴンブレス〉, "Killing Breath of the Dragon King"). Her self-protection system will use the Feather of Light (光の羽, Hikari no Hane) to force a reset on Index's own memory should a manual reset fail to be performed. Although she does not know that she has magical powers, she can easily identify the types of magic by seeing it or somebody describing it to her and know how to counter them. Her vast knowledge of the Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum within her mind makes her to be one of the most powerful characters so far and becomes very helpful to her friends in various situations using skills like Spell Intercept (強制詠唱〈スペルインターセプト〉, "Force Chant"), and Sheol Fear (魔滅の声〈シェオールフィア〉, "Voice of Destruction of Evil") and makes her a target of interest for many.

She is often elated by a variety of things and is slightly ignorant and curious of modern technology. She usually is gentle and polite with people and has a kind nature, but she is also easily irritated especially by Tōma who usually ends making her mad in some way as consequence of his bad luck which ends with her biting him. She also has an large appetite and uses any excuse to get food from anyone and likes watching an anime series called Magical Powered Kanamin.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Miho Juufuku
about:
Ability: Dummy Check, Level 2

She appears in episode 3. She is a 2nd year student in Sekisho Middle School. She becomes a "terror" against girls who study in Tokiwadai Middle school due to her boyfriend on forsaking her for another girl who studies in Tokiwadai Middle school because her eyebrows are weird.

She has a re-appearance in episode 14.

name: Hatsuya Kaitabi
about: Kaitabi Hatsuya is a character from the Toaru Kagaku no Railgun side-story. He&#039;s registered in Academy City&#039;s databank as a level 2.

name: Touma Kamijou
nicknames: Kami-yan|Imagine Breaker|God of Pestilence|The One who Purifies God and Slays Demons
about:
Age: 15-16
Height: 168 cm
Classification: Esper
Ability: Imagine Breaker (unique non-esper, non-magic ability)
Level: 0
Famous Quote: It's my dream to go back home smiling, without having lost anything.

He is the series' protagonist. He has the lowest psychic rank possible at Level 0—largely because the people testing psychic abilities cannot detect or classify his abilities. His power is Imagine Breaker (幻想殺し, "Illusion/Fantasy Killer"), a power which negates all magic, psychic, or divine powers but also his own good luck. Due to the nature of his power, the founder of Academy City considers him neither a Psychic nor a Magician but rather a normal person with a unique ability.

He tends to stay away from trouble but possesses a strong sense of justice, albeit somewhat shallow and dogmatic. He is a smart student and knowledgeable about certain subjects yet is a failure in his esper studies. While he is an idealist for the hopes of other people, ironically he is cynical about himself possibly because of his powers.




(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Gensei Kihara
about:
Kihara Gensei  is an enigmatic character appearing in Toaru Kagaku no Railgun. A member of the Kihara family, he is a man obsessed with Level 6. And he has made several attempts to achieve it.

As the creator of the Ability Body Crystal, his actions would influence the beginning of Toaru Kagaku no Railgun, and several characters in the later part of Toaru Majutsu no Index. For those reasons, he can be arguably considered the main antagonist of the Railgun side story.

(Source: Toaru Majutsu no Index Wikia)

name: Therestina Kihara Lifeline
name_kanji: テレスティーナ・木原・ライフライン
about: She's part of the MAR (Multi Active Rescue) squad and is responsible for assuring everyone's safety during the poltergeist problem, which causes earthquakes in episode 20.

name: Harumi Kiyama
about:
A scientist employed within Academy City. She has poor common sense, which is demonstrated as she often strips in front of others without thinking about it, a result of her years being a researcher. 

 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mitsuko Kongou
about:
Mitsuko is a second year transfer student at Tokiwadai Middle School, and is a Level 4 esper.  Her ability, Aero Hand, allows her to control airflows.

Shirai knows her but is not too comfortable with her.

She has an arrogant personality and tends to look down on others, however she is usually willing to help those in need, especially when it comes to her friends.

name: Mii Konori
about: Kuroko and Kazari's superior at Judgment Branch 177. She's currently a Level 3 with the ability of "Clairvoyance", similar to x-ray vision that lets her see things in concealed areas.

name: Wataru Kurozuma
about: The true leader of the Big Spider whom someone believe that he died from the explosion two years ago from the incident of saving his comrades that has been captured alone. In the present, Mikoto and Kuroko encountered him on the place where skill-out is gathered. He's strong physically and mentally, and Mii Konori's crush since. He often said, "When it comes to a milk, it's definitely Musashino", a brand of a milk he most favors.

name: Ryoukan
about: The girl's dormitory advisor for Tokiwadai Middle School. She's in charge of the dorm Misaka and Shirai stays in.

name: Tsuzuri Tessou
about: Tsuzuri Tessou is a teacher at the 7th School District.  Driven by her sense of mission to protect the students, she is also a member of Antiskill, in which Aiho is a colleague of hers.

name: Maika Tsuchimikado
about:
Maika is Motoharu's younger stepsister. She wears a maid attire as she goes to a Maid School to learn to become a maid and rides on top of a cleaning bot. Maika has a friendly relationship with Touma and knows that he has a girl living with him but keeps it a secret except to Tōma himself. Even though Maika lives in her school's dormitory, she sometimes go to live at her brother's apartment.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Komoe Tsukuyomi
about:
Despite her childish and very short (135 cm) appearance, she is actually an adult and one of Tōma's teachers. This is proven by her apartment being littered with beer cans and cigarettes. She also contradicts her age by acting childish to her students, having a child-like crush on Tōma, and ending her sentences with desu, something a child usually does. This irony means that she is often regarded as one of the seven great mysteries of Academy City. She has major interest in studying pyrokinesis and performs magic once, when Index requires her to participate in a magical ritual to heal her wounds. The fact that she is able to do so indicates she has no esper abilities of her own.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kinuho Wannai
about: Kinuho is a first year student at Tokiwadai Middle School, and is Kuroko's classmate. She has the ability to manipulate water currents, and is a member of the Swimming Club.

name: Aiho Yomikawa
about:
Yomikawa Aiho is a teacher at Touma's school and a friend of Komoe. She is beautiful, has glamorous proportions, and is always seen with a green jersey and often ends her sentences with "-jan." Despite having a glamorous figure, she acts in a tomboyish manner and regularly joins her colleague Tsukuyomi Komoe in drinking sessions after their work. She is always teasing Komoe.

She is a member of Anti-Skill and cares deeply for her students (in spite of having a "spartan" approach in teaching according to Komoe), and is an active peacekeeper within Academy City. Due to her habit of ramming delinquents with protective items like shields or helmets to resolve incidents, saying it's alright to do so since those are protective items, she's known as "the woman who uses comedy-like methods to solve problems that could end up as a tragedy."

As a favor to her old friend, Yomikawa is asked by Yoshikawa Kikyou to take care of Accelerator and Last Order after they are released from the hospital.

name: Accelerator
name_kanji: 一方通行 / アクセラレータ
about:
Age: 15-16
Height: 168 cm
Hair color: white
Eye color: red
Classification: Esper
Affiliation: GROUP (Former operative)
Occupation: Nagatenjouki Academy
Level: 5
Partner: Last Order
Ability: Vector Manipulation
Quote: "Just because I've gotten weaker, it doesn't mean that you got stronger, right?"
Theme Song: "Saikyou no Nanori"

Accelerator is the most powerful Psychic in Academy City and the main protagonist of Toaru Kagaku no Accelerator. His real name is unknown, though Accelerator recalls his surname was composed of two characters and his given name consisted of three characters. First appearing as an antagonist of the third light novel, he later becomes a main character and the lead of the science side in the Toaru Majutsu no Index series, especially in volumes 5, 8, 12, 13, SS1, SS2, 15, 14, 19, and 20.

A sadistic boy about the same age as Touma, he has an ability called "Vector Change," a form of telekinesis allowing him to change the vector values of anything he touches due in part of having a thin coat of AIM fields surrounding his body.
