Erica was motivated into becoming an Auto-Memories Doll due to a certain novelist’s influence, which made her wish she could write texts that resonated with people's hearts.

(Source: Violet Evergarden Wikia)

name: Mother Cannary
about: Iris Cannary's mother

name: Iris Cannary
about:
Iris Cannary is an automated memory doll at CH postal company. She is an anime-original character.

(Source: Official site, edited)

name: Tiffany Evergarden
name_kanji: ティファニー・エヴァーガーデン
about: An old woman who wants to take in Violet after being contacted by Gilbert. She has lost her son during the war.

name: Mother Field
about: Aiden Field's mother.

name: Aiden Field
name_kanji: エイデン・フィールド

name: Claudia Hodgins
name_kanji: クラウディア・ホッジンズ
about:
Claudia is a former army commander. He founded the CH postal company and serves as president.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Clara Magnolia
name_kanji: クラーラ・マグノリア

name: Male Client
about: Appears in anime episode 2.

name: Spencer Marlborough
name_kanji: スペンサー・モールバラ

name: Luculia Marlborough
name_kanji: ルクリア・モールバラ

name: Nerine
about: She works as a receptionist at the CH postal company.

name: Roland
about: Roland is a postman at CH Postal.

name: Leon Stephanotis
name_kanji: リオン・ステファノティス

name: Subordinate Person
about: Appears in anime episode 2.

name: Olivia Webster
name_kanji: オリビア・ウェブスター

name: Oscar Webster
name_kanji: オスカー・ウェブスター

name: Taylor Bartlett
name_kanji: テイラー・バートレット
about: Taylor Bartlett is the adoptive younger sister of Amy Bartlett who, after Amy takes on the name of Isabella York, is taken to an orphanage.

name: Isabella York
about: Isabella York  is the heiress of the prestigious York family who attends an all-girls academy, and Violet is hired to be her private tutor while posing as her handmaiden.

name: Daisy Magnolia
name_kanji: デイジー・マグノリア
about: Daisy is the granddaughter of Ann Magnolia, the little girl Violet met when she was writing letters for her ill mother, Clara. She finds the 50 letters Clara sent her daughter after Ann's death, and decides to trace Violet to Ecarte island.

name: Yuris
about: Yuris is a boy at the hospital with a serious illness. He hires Violet to write a letter to his parents and younger brother for when he dies.

name: Irma Felice
name_kanji: イルマ・フェリーチェ
about: Irma Felice is a character in the Violet Evergarden series and the protagonist of the fourteenth episode. She is an opera singer who entrusts Violet to write a love-letter lyrics to her biggest performance.

name: Noa Himesaka
about:
Hana and Hinata's classmate who moves next door to Miyako and Hinata. She constantly sees herself as cute, often becoming downhearted when someone else, usually Hana, is said to be cuter.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Hinata Hoshino
about:
Miyako's younger sister and Hana's classmate. She is particularly fond of her sister.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Miyako Hoshino
about:
Miyako is a college student who is shy around strangers, she has a hard time talking to people she doesn't know, and usually avoids eye contact. She doesn't consider herself "pretty," and doesn't care much about her appearance or how she dresses.

Miyako gets nervous easily, and is also a very lazy girl. At first glance she looks like a hikikomori and NEET, but despite that, she usually goes to study at the college. She falls for Hana Shirosaki that she starts making sweets in exchange for Hana to cosplay in outfits Miyako makes.

(Source: fandom)

name: Hana Shirosaki
about:
An elementary school student who is classmates with Hinata. She is often disturbed by Miyako's behavior but puts up with it in order to eat her snacks.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Chizuru Hoshino
about: Mother of Miyako and Hinata Hoshino.

name: Kanon Konomori
about:
Another class representative in Hana's class and Koyori's best friend. She is kind and often seen as very reliable, much to Koyori's chagrin.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kouko Matsumoto
about:
A girl who was in a club with Miyako during high school. While Miyako hardly remembers her, she has been obsessively fixated on her, acting like a stalker.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Koyori Tanemura
about:
A class representative in Hana's class. She aspires to be someone that everyone can rely on, but is often unreliable herself.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yuu Koito
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: April 5th
Height: 150 cm

Yuu is a first year high school student who doesn't know what it's like to have a crush. She joins the student council, where she meets Nanami. Her family owns a bookstore and lives above it.

name: Touko Nanami
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: February 19th
Height 163 cm

A member of the student council who later becomes the student council president. She is a second year high school student. Yuu is her love interest. She hides her true personality and insecurities from everyone but Yuu. Her best friend is Sayaka Saeki.

name: Suguru Doujima
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: May 21

Doujima is a first-year high school boy and a member of the student council.

name: Akari Hyuuga
about: Akari Hyuuga is a high school freshman and Yuu's friend. She is an avid basketball player.

name: Koyomi Kanou
about: A close friend of Koito Yuu who enjoys reading. She has the ambition of becoming a novelist.

name: Miyako Kodama
about:
Miyako Kodama is the manager of a café that the student council regularly visits.

She is in a live-in relationship with Riko Hakozaki, though the latter prefers that this be kept a secret. The couple have known each other since college.

Miyako is laid-back, friendly and relaxed, in contrast to the somewhat more serious Riko. She is also compassionate and mature, such as when she gives Sayaka Saeki guidance and reassurance with her own relationship issues.

(Source: Yagate Kimi ni Naru Wiki)

name: Rei Koito
about: Yuu's older sister.

name: Seiji Maki
about: Seiji Maki is a first-year high school student and member of the Student Council.

name: Sayaka Saeki
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: July 29th
Height: 163 cm

She is the student council vice president and Touko's best friend.

name: Natsuki Sonomura
about: Natsuki Sonomura is Yuu Koito's friend from middle school who were on the softball team together.

name: Hachiman Hikigaya
about:
Age: 17
Birthdate: August 8
Hair color: Black
Eye color: Grey
Blood type: A
Occupation: high school student, member of Service Club
Affiliation: Sobu High School

Hachiman is the story's main protagonist, an isolated, friendless boy who is pragmatic to a fault. His most prominent feature is his set of "dead fish-eyes." He firmly believes that "youth" is simply an illusion created by hypocrites, for hypocrites, born from the ashes of past failures. In this state of apparent corruption, he is coerced into joining the Service Club by his futures advisor in the hopes that exposing him to the world will change his personality, and ultimately make him a "better person." He is called "Hikki" affectionately by Yui.

(Source: Vistrans, Yahari Wikia)

name: Yui Yuigahama
about:
Birthday: June 18
Blood type: O

Yui Yuigahama is Hachiman Hikigaya's classmate from Sōbu High School, as well as being the first person helped by the Volunteer Service Club who would later become the third member.

Yui is seen most of the time as a very cheerful, outgoing and friendly girl, in addition to having almost most of the time, a smile which denotes a clear and noticeable joy on her face, whether even when she is sad or upset.

Abilties:
Yui's social skills are excellent, but she is also good, though not particularly outstanding, at academics, intellectuals, and athletics. Other characters always comment on her intelligence and social awareness. She is exceptionally skilled at deducing the mood of others and can make others feel comfortable just by being there. Although some people say that she is dumb, probably due to her naive and somewhat stupid nature, Yui reminds people that she passed high academic standards to get into Sōbu.

She has the ability to sing well and enjoys karaoke. She is a good coordinator and hard worker, able to follow through and give directions when needed (Athletics/Cultural Festivals).

Although she isn't very good at cooking, she tries her best and vows to improve.

name: Yukino Yukinoshita
about:
Birthday: January 3
Blood type: B

Yukino is the leader of the Service Club, of which she is the sole member until Hachiman joins her. She is smart, beautiful, and is nicknamed the "Ice-cold Beauty" for her icy demeanor. She has a twisted sense of "noblesse oblige," and believes that it is the duty of the exceptional (in other words, herself) to help the "lost lambs" of the world. Her personality often leads her to be disgusted at the naivety of others, particularly Yui's, and she does not hesitate to show it. Despite this, Yui still affectionately calls her "Yukinon."



(Source: Vistrans)

name: Atsugi
about:
Atsugi is a physical education teacher in Sōbu High School.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Hina Ebina
about: Hina is a classmate of Yui and Hachiman, who is a quiet girl and hangs around Yumiko. She is a fujoshi, which is why other boys from her class are always avoiding her.

name: Haruka
about: One of Minami Sagami's best friends.

name: Hayato Hayama
about: Hayato is a popular guy in the same class as Hachiman and Yui.

name: Komachi Hikigaya
about: She is Hachiman's younger sister. She is really different from her brother; she is cheerful and lively and is part of their school's student council.

name: Shizuka Hiratsuka
about:
Shizuka is Hachiman's language teacher who also serves as his futures advisor/counselor. She is aware of Hachiman's supposed "problems," and takes steps to ensure he is freed from them, her first move being to force him into joining the Service Club. However, she appears to have some quirks of her own: she is a young smoker, she is very sensitive about her age, and she is often prone to quoting or copying scenes from popular shounen manga. She also never remembers to knock before entering the Service Club's classroom, much to Yukino's chagrin.

(Source: Vistrans)

name: Hitomi
about: First appearance: episode 7

name: Saki Kawasaki
about:
Saki is Hachiman's classmate who seems like a delinquent, but wants to make friends deep down. She cares deeply for her brother as she hid her name and age to work in night-shift part-time jobs in order to pay school fees and reduce her family's load. After her brother asked help from the service club, the service club eventually followed her to her workplace and found out her motives behind working night-shifts, she stopped working after the service club suggested her to aim for a scholarship instead.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yumiko Miura
about:
She is Hikki and Yui's classmate who is very popular in their class. She holds herself with such high esteem that she manipulates anyone who admires her, most especially Yui whom she treats badly.

(Source: Otaku-streamer)

name: Minami Sagami
about:
Minami is the leader of the second most influential clique in class 2F, and holds a grudge towards Yui, who she was friendly with in their first high school year, for being in the superior clique. She volunteered to be event organizer for the cultural festival in order to promote her worth without the actual ability to do such job, and thus requested help from the service club. 


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Meguri Shiromeguri
about:
Meguri is a third year student and the president of Sōbu High School's student council. Although she is not a reliable leader herself, her personality has brought her immense support from the councilors and thus she is able to unite the student council.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kakeru Tobe
about:
Kakeru is one of Hayato's friends. He is in the football club. He has feelings for Hina and is the only guy in class who often supports Hina's scripts.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Saika Totsuka
about: Saika is a member of the tennis club who has a feminine appearance, but prefers others to not mistake his gender. He is called "The Prince" by his female classmates. On their first meeting, Saika asks help from Hachiman to join the tennis club, which was brushed off by Yukino. Saika then asked the service club to help him improve his tennis skills. He eventually became one of the few people in class 2F who would talk to Hachiman, and often hangs out with Hachiman.

name: Rumi Tsurumi
about:
Rumi is a lonely primary school student who is openly despised by her peers. Hayato at first tried to resolve the situation through talking to her in front of her classmates, which instead attracted more hateful attention to her. After much discussion, Hachiman and company decided that the only way out is to destroy the trust between her peers, through having Hayato and Kakeru acting as bullies threatening Rumi's group-mates during treasure hunt and exposing their selfish nature to each other, thus preventing further organized acts of teasing on Rumi. However, in exchange, she would hardly have any friends after this.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yuka
about: First appearance: episode 7

name: Haruno Yukinoshita
about:
Age: 20
Birthday: July 7

Haruno is Yukino's elder sister who is even more outstanding than Yukino. However, unlike Yukino, she shows a good attitude towards other people, even if she has to lie about her true feelings most of the time.

name: Yukko
about: One of Minami Sagami's best friends.

name: Yoshiteru Zaimokuza
about: Hachiman's former associate and schoolmate. He suffers from chuunibyou and is an aspiring light novel author, though his writing sucks.

name: Hatano
about: Member of the Game Club.

name: Iroha Isshiki
about:
Birthday: April 16

Isshiki Iroha is a first-year student of class 1-C in Subu High school, first introduced in volume 7.5. Hachiman sees her as a "not cute Komachi" or a "better version of Sagami." She acts in front of anyone to maintain her "cute appearance", but she showed her true colors just to Hachiman.

name: Kaori Orimoto
about: Hikigaya Hachiman and Kaori both went to the same junior school. Hikigaya Hachiman also used to like her and asked her out before.

name: Tamanawa
about: Tamanawa is the head of the planning committee for the Christmas festival. He really likes synergy.

name: Mother Yukinoshita
about: The mother of Haruno Yukinoshita and Yukino Yukinoshita.

name: Sawako Fujisawa
about:
Sawako Fujisawa is a 2nd year and the Secretary of the Sobu Student Council.

(Source: Oregairu Wiki)

name: Akari Inuyama
about: The little sister of Aoi Inuyama.

name: Sakura Kagamihara
about: Nadeshiko's older sister. She likes driving, and often often ends up driving Nadeshiko around begrudgingly.

name: Seki
about: A clerk at Caribou.

name: Hajime Shinshirou
about: Rin's grandfather, who passed his passion for camping on to his granddaughter.

name: Wataru Shima
about: Wataru is Rin's father and Saki's husband. He enjoys riding motorbikes and traveled a lot when he was younger. He usually commutes to work on a moped.

name: Ayano Toki
about: Childhood friend of Nadeshiko Kagamihara.

name: Akari Akaza
about:
Age: 13
Birthday: July 24
Blood type: A

Akari is a polite red-haired girl who is supposedly the main protagonist of the series. However, due to her rather small presence and plain personality, she is often forgotten about or pushed into the background. One of her few features is hair dumplings which sometimes come off strangely. She is often thought of as having the ability to fire her hair dumplings and turn invisible whilst shouting "Akkari~n!". Kyōko and Yui are her childhood friends, while Chinatsu, Sakurako and Himawari are her classmates. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yui Funami
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: April 22
Blood type: O

 A cool-headed girl with dark hair who often acts as the voice of reason, Yui is the childhood friend of Akari and Kyouko. She enjoys video games and is shown to be a good cook, leaving Chinatsu obsessed with her food. She is a reliable friend and lives alone in an apartment complex, and although she won't admit it, she tends to feel lonely when others, particularly Kyouko, aren't around. Although generally quiet, she will sometimes burst into stifled laughter upon hearing Ayano's puns.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kyouko Toshinou
about:
Age: 14
Height: 156 cm
Birthday: March 28
Blood type: B

Toshinou Kyouko is the founder of the amusement club. Goes so wild that no one can keep up with her, but it's not as if anyone even tries in the first place, so it's ultimately no big deal. She is actually an otaku who creates her own doujinshi of Mirakurun, an anime character in Yuru Yuri. Her favorite ice cream is rum raisin.

name: Chinatsu Yoshikawa
about:
Age: 13
Birthday: November 6
Blood type: AB

Akari's pink-haired classmate who originally wanted to join the Tea Ceremony Club, but ended up joining the Amusement Club as the Tea Ceremony Club was already abolished. She is often chased after by Kyōko due to her resemblance to the anime character Mirakurun, though she herself has a passionate crush on Yui, whom she often fantasizes about. While generally cute, benevolent and fun-loving, especially in the presence of Yui, she tends to be selfish and occasionally shows dark thoughts. She also has a terrifying lack of artistic skills, frequently leaving others in shock.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mari Funami
about: The daughter of one of Yui's relatives who often visits Yui. She is a fan of Mirakurun, though does not take kindly to Chinatsu after learning her personality doesn't match her image. Her favorite food is sea urchin and she is very smart for her age.

name: Himawari Furutani
about:
Age: 13 
Birthday: June 16 
Blood type: A 

A candidate for the student council vice-president. She has blue hair and large breasts. She always speaks in feminine and polite speech.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kaede Furutani
about: Himawari's sister.

name: Chizuru Ikeda
about:
Age: 14

Chitose's twin sister. Her personality is pretty much the opposite of Chitose's nice and ditsy nature. When she takes her glass off her yuri goggles activate and she starts drooling. She seems to be fond of the Ayano/Chitose pairing. She has a love for Chitose while she dislikes Kyōko as she constantly tries to play pranks on her and is seemingly a barrier against her fantasies.

name: Chitose Ikeda
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: March 10

Ikeda Chitose is a member of the student council. She is a helpful character whose extreme yuri fantasies make the yuri quotient of the story rise dramatically. While fantasizing, she removes her glasses to block her vision so she can concentrate. She is really fond of the Ayano x Kyouko pairing. She speaks in soft Kansai dialect and likes tsukemono (pickled things).

name: Rise Matsumoto
about:
Age: 15
Birthday: May 23
Blood group: O

The current student council president who has very little presence and often speaks in a whispery quiet voice that only a few people such as Nana can understand.

name: Mirakurun
about: The character in a manga that Kyoko likes. She is known to always battle Rivalrun.

name: Nana Nishigaki
about: Nana Nishigaki is a science teacher who loves to invent things and explosions. She has a close relationship with Rise Matsumoto and is the only one who can understand her.

name: Sakurako Oomuro
about:
Age: 13
Born: September 7
Height: 153cm
Blood type: B

A cheerful candidate for the Student Council vice-president next year. She has light brown hair and a petite build, which she often has a complex about. She and Himawari are constantly arguing as they are both aiming to become vice-president, though they do seem to hold feelings for each other.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Rivarun
about: The antagonist of the fictional anime Miracalun, she is an alien invader who plans to conquer earth, and Miracalun's mentor and friend.

name: Ayano Sugiura
about:
Age: 14
Birthday: January 20

Sugiura Ayano is the vice president of the student council. Gallant and filled with a powerful sense of justice, she happens to be popular with other female students. She's always thinking about Toshino Kyouko... or, to put it more bluntly, she's a pure-hearted maiden who is falling in love. Altough Ayano is often not too honest with her feelings, she is constantly doing her best to know more about Kyouko. As the series progresses, they get closer, and despite Kyoko being clueless about Ayano's feelings, she is always happy and has fun when going on "dates" with her. Ayano's best friend, Chitose Ikeda, will help Ayano get closer to Kyouko whenever she sees a chance. Despite her Tsundere nature, she is very supportive and always will be doing what she can to help. Also, she frequently make puns which always succeed in making Yui Funami laugh.

name: Tomoko Yoshikawa
about:
Age: 19

Chinatsu's older sister. She a friend of Akane Akaza who she is also in love with.

name: Akane Akaza
about:
Age: 19

Akari's big sister. Akane has a huge obsession with her little sister, but Akari herself knows nothing about that. She collects anything related to Akari, in a result leaving Kyouko extremely shocked when she stumbled across Akane's room.

name: Hanako Oomuro
about:
Age: 8
Birthday: August 7

Sakurako's younger sister who is an elementary school student.

name: Nadeshiko Oomuro
about:
Age: 18
Birthday: January 21

Sakurako's older sister. She's always quiet and has a cool demeanor.

name: Shihoko Azuma
about: Arts teacher.

name: Hatsumi Kitamiya
about: Home Economy Class teacher.

name: Tsubasa Minamino
about: Physical Education teacher. In episode 10, she personally requests Yui to join the Running Club, although Yui refuses in order to stay with the Amusement Club.

name: Fuu Inubouzaki
about:
A third-year in middle school and the president of the Hero Club. She is the older sister of Itsuki, who she has been looking after following the death of their parents.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Itsuki Inubouzaki
about:
Birthday: December 6

A first-year in middle school and member of the Hero Club. She is Fuu's younger sister and respects her dearly.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Karin Miyoshi
about:
Fifth member of the Hero Club.

An experienced, but somewhat stubborn hero who transfers into Yuuna and Mimori's class and joins the Hero Club to supervise the other heroes.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mimori Tougou
name_kanji: 東郷 美森 / 鷲尾 須美
about:
Yuuna's best friend and fellow classmate and club member who lives next door to her and often prefers to be called by her family name. Mimori takes pride in her national heritage and is always ready to defend her country and protect its people. She had lost the use of her legs, along with some of her memories, allegedly due to a car accident.


Sumi Washio

name: Yuuna Yuuki
about:
Birthday: March 21
Flower motif: sakura or cherry blossom

A second-year in middle school and member of the Hero Club. She prides herself on being a hero, helping out others in needs and always remaining optimistic.


(Source: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru)

name: Sonoko Nogi
about: Sumi and Gin's classmate and fellow hero. She uses a large spear in her hero form that can also be used as a shield. She's kind and thoughtful, but appears to have her head in the clouds often. In reality, despite her laziness and lightheartedness, she is very smart and has natural talent as both a hero and a leader, surpassing Sumi.

name: Chikage Koori
about: Koori Chikage is one of the main characters of Nogi Wakaba Is a Hero. She is a part of the first Hero team.

name: Wakaba Nogi
about:
Nogi Wakaba is, along with five other girls, is a part of the first Hero Team. She is also the ancestor of Nogi Sonoko. Wakaba is a serious, strong-willed girl that believes in rewarding favors. She seeks revenge on the Vertexes and is willing to take risks to get it.

(Source: Yuuki Yuuna Wiki)

name: Hinata Uesato
about:
One of the members of the very first Hero team, and also a Miko. She cares deeply for her friends, and she feels that one of the most important things is seeing them smile. However, she is not afraid to speak her mind, especially if it involves what's right.

(Source: Yuuki Yuuna Wiki)

name: Gin Minowa
about: Sumi and Sonoko's classmate and fellow hero. She uses a pair of large blades in her hero form.

name: Yukari Hinata
about: Yukari Hinata is a member of the Data Processing Club, along with Yuzuko and Yui. She is kind of an airhead, and she will often copy Yuzuko's antics if she finds them amusing.

name: Yui Ichii
about: Yui Ichii is a member of the Data Processing Club. Yui is generally shy, and she is often the target of Yuzuko and Yukari's antics since they like to tease her.

name: Yuzuko Nonohara
about: Yuzuko Nonohara is a member of the Data Processing Club. She seems to have an innocent personality, but she will sometimes break out in random bouts of outrageous behaviour. Despite her appearance and outbreaks, she is actually smart.

name: Chiho Aikawa
about: A relatively shy girl who wants to befriend Yui and her friends.

name: Fumi Hasegawa
about: Fumi is a calm girl who tends to do weird things to tease her friends, especially Kei. She's laid back, doesn't seem very energetic, and has her own way of expressing herself.

name: Yoriko Matsumoto
about: The girls' homeroom teacher and advisor of the Data Processing Club. She is often called "Mom" (お母さん Okaa-san) by her students due to her generally kind nature. Yui, Yuzuko and Yukari in the Data Processing Club are fascinated by her large breasts and like to play tricks on her. She is always very polite about it and never seems to mind too much.

name: Kei Okano
about: Kei is quite a moody and awkward character who is very good friends with Chiho and Fumi. She is reluctant to befriend Yui, Yukari and Yukuzo because she doesn't understand their random humour and is protective over Chiho because she doesn't want anyone stealing her.

name: Lily Hoshikawa
about:
Born: October 6, 1999
Died: November 30, 2011 (age 12)
Height/Weight: 130cm (4'3") / 31kg (68 lbs)
B/W/H: 59/54/56cm (23/21/22 in)

A legendary child actress who took primetime networks by storm with her breakout period piece performance. She acts sweet and innocent on the surface, but every now and then, she shows flashes of more sinister intentions.

name: Junko Konno
about:
Born: September 2, 1964
Died: December 6, 1983 (age 19)
Height/Weight: 155cm (5'1") / 40kg (88 lbs)
B/W/H: 80(B)/55/84cm (31/20/33 in)

A legendary idol from the Showa era who pioneered the industry in the 1980s. A product of her time, she is more used to solo performances than in a group, and has difficulty interacting with other people.

name: Sakura Minamoto
about:
Born: April 2, 1991
Died: April 7, 2008 (age 17)
Height/Weight: 158cm (5'2") / 46kg
B/W/H: 88(F)/59/90cm

A high school student and aspiring idol singer who got fatally hit by a truck at the start of her second year in 2008. She is the first zombie to regain her human mind, but is also the only one who can't remember anything about her life.

name: Ai Mizuno
about:
Born: March 7, 1992
Died: August 4, 2008 (age 16)
Height: 160 cm
Weight: 42 kg
Three sizes: B81-W56-H80

The legendary lead singer of Iron Frill, the top idol group of the 2000s, which Sakura idolized in life. She's incredibly strong-willed and not afraid to say what's on her mind, making her the most vociferous critic of Kotaro's plan among the group.

name: Saki Nikaidou
about:
Born: May 15, 1979
Died: August 30, 1997 (age 18)
Height/Weight: 153cm (5'0") / 48kg
B/W/H: 77(C)/54/82cm

The legendary boss of "Dorami," Kyushu's most infamous biker gang. A coarse, violent rebel through and through, she only respects those with "guts." She also has a fondness for Tamagotchi.

name: Koutarou Tatsumi
about:
The mysterious idol producer.

Always seen wearing a black jacket on his back, a red vest with a tentacle from the Kojima food industry sticking out, and black sunglasses that never fall off. An arrogant man who won't let common sense get in his way, he was the one that resurrected the seven "legendary" zombies. He plans to enlist the zombie idols to save the Saga prefecture, the so-called "Zombie Land Saga Project", although no one knows the true details of his plans. 

(Source: Zombieland Saga Wiki)

name: Tae Yamada
about:
Born: Unknown
Died: Unknown (age 29)
Height/Weight: 170cm (5'6") / 50kg (110 lbs)
B/W/H: 91(F)/59/89cm (35/23/35 in)

A young woman who is legendary... just because. She is also the only zombie who doesn't break out of her typical undead behavior, often trying to gnaw on the closest thing in sight.

name: Yuugiri
about:
Born: November 23, 1863
Died: December 28, 1882 (age 19)
Height/Weight: 165cm (5'4") / 48kg (105 lbs)
B/W/H: 94(I)/62/89cm (37/24/35 in)

A legendary courtesan who saw the birth of the Meiji Restoration in the mid-19th century. Despite living in an entirely different time period, she chooses not to let it faze her and welcomes every chance to learn something new.

name: Death Metal Fan A
about:
First fan(A) of Franchouchou.

He was a friend of Hyoudo Eikichi, mc of the spin off manga.

name: Death Metal Fan B
about:
First fan(B) of Franchouchou.

He was a friend of Hyoudo Eikichi, mc of the spin off manga.

name: Takeo Go
about: Takeo Go is the father of Lily Hoshikawa.

name: Shiori
about: Current member and center of Iron Frill.

name: Maimai Yuzuriha
about:
Birthdate: August 24
Age: 16-17
Height: 156cm (5'1")
Gender: Female

She makes her official debut in "Maimai Revolution SAGA" as the only living temporary seventh member of the undead idol group before resigning by the end of the episode. She claims to be Sakura's biggest fan.

(Source: Zombieland Saga Wiki)

name: Shizuku Ariyama
about: Shizuku is a childhood friend of Haruka and acts as his older sister when they're at school. She enjoys teasing Haruka and Akiho, but has a deep affection toward Haruka due to the time they've spent together. She's extremely conscious about her small breasts and often gets mad when other people make fun of them.

name: Akiho Kousaka
about: Akiho Kousaka is the main female protagonist and Haruka's girlfriend. She is the class representative and does her jobs well. She has a very perverted personality and constantly makes sexual jokes, mainly toward Haruka.

name: Haruka Shinozaki
about: Main protagonist and Akiho's boyfriend. Acts as the "straight man" among his group of friends.

name: Misaki Aikawa
about: Misaki is a classmate of Kanata and has a pure heart. However, she's frequently caught in awkward situations that usually result in her slipping up and cause people to think she's a pervert.

name: Seiya Hoshikawa
about: Seiya is an attractive boy who's very popular at school. He becomes friends with Haruka and accompanies his friends on various trips and vacations. Like Rina, Seiya is into boys and constantly makes joke about BL, much to Kousaka's annoyance.

name: Saori Igarashi
about: The representative of Class 5. Igarashi is a serious character who seeks to maintain pureness and platonic relationship between students, but like other characters, she's always caught in awkward and lewd situations, that sometimes cause her inner side to slip out.

name: Fuyumi Kousaka
about: Kousaka Akiho's mother. She has the same lewd mind as her daughter.

name: Rina Saijou
about: The young lady of the Saijou family, Rina joined Shinozaki and Kousaka's school in order to integrate herself with the commoners' life and make new friends. Coming from a Girls' Academy, Rina is into girls and often causes chaos among her friends due to her lack of common sense on how the world works.

name: Kanata Shinozaki
about: Haruka's one year younger sister who has a brother complex.

name: Sayo Shizumori
about: The representative of Class 4. Like Kousaka, Shizumori has a strong perverted personality, although she's more into peeping tom rather than participating in the act.

name: Kyoutarou Ichikawa
about:
Birthday: March 26
Blood type: B
Height: 156.5 cm

A middle school boy who has chuunibyou tendencies. He loves spending time reading books in the library, where he and Anna first met. Initially, Kyotaro had delusions of killing Anna and making her corpse his alone, but they were replaced by romantic affection as he spends more time around her. He can be quite perceptive in social situations but often fails to pick up on other social problems due to his lack of communication skills and low self-esteem. Aside from his macabre interests, he's also a fan of manga and anime such as Baki, Beastars and Re:Zero. In the latter case he keeps the character Rem as the profile image for his Line account. Prior to middle school, he won a number of first-place awards for essays, a poster drawing, an independent research project, etc.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Anna Yamada
about:
Birthday: September 10
Blood type: AB
Height: 171.9 cm

A tall middle school girl who is a magazine model and actress, active under the name Anna Akino (秋野 杏奈). She is very popular with both boys and girls but has a clumsy side to her. Anna frequently brings snacks and candy to eat in private at the library, much to Kyotaro's dismay. She’s very considerate of others, such as eating snacks by herself due to her friend Chii having allergies. This consideration is tied to something of a guilt complex, which leads to bouts of anxiety where she feels she’s inconvenienced other people to the point of tears. She is also shown to be very jealous to the point of obsession whenever Kyotaro interacts with other girls.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Yurine Hanzawa
about: Hanzawa becomes Ichikawa and Yamada's classmate in their third year, in Class 3-1. She stumbles upon them hiding behind a curtain in the library.

name: Honoka Hara
about: She is in the same class as Kyoutarou Ichikawa and Anna Yamada. She sometimes gets insecure about her weight. She is also one of the smartest students in her class.

name: Kana Ichikawa
about: Kyoutarou Ichikawa's big sister.

name: Kenta Kanzaki
about: He is in the same class as Kyoutarou Ichikawa and Anna Yamada. Kenta likes curvy girls and has crush on Honoka Hara.

name: Chihiro Kobayashi
about: Yamada's best friend. She is also in the same class as Yamada.

name: Nico Kouda
about: She is a model that is admired by Yamada Anna.

name: Moeko Sekine
about: One of Yamada's friends. She is always complaining how she wants a boyfriend, or why no one is hitting on her.

name: Yuuki Suwa
about: He is Yamada's modeling manager.

name: Sanae Yamada
about: She is Anna Yamada's mother.

name: Yuuki Yamada
about: Yamada's father, a giant of a man who works as a professional chef at a French restaurant. While he seems tense at first glance to others, he is actually a kind father who likes playing video games.

name: Serina Yoshida
about: She is one of Yamada's female friends.

name: Yuu Akeuchi
about: A girl who claimed to be an alien and lost her memory on the trip to the Earth; has the supernatural ability to conduct telepathy with her forehead.

name: Umika Konohoshi
about:
A girl who could not communicate smoothly with others.

Umika believed that she could not find her habitat on the Earth; as a result, she wanted to make friends with aliens.

name: Matataki Raimon
about: The classmate of Yuu and Umika; a skilled mechanic; first refused to join Umika's team, but later recognized Umika's determination.

name: Haruno Takaragi
about: The classmate of Yuu and Umika; good at communication; also interested in Umika and Yuu's plan to build a rocket.

name: Honami Konohoshi
about: Umika's younger sister.

name: Majima
about: Majima is the primary antagonist of Lycoris Recoil.

name: Haruno Akiyama
about:
A woman who sold Satsuki her camera. While currently living in her family's candy shop, Haruno draws a 4-panel comic starring high school girls

(Source: Mono wiki)

name: Kako Komada
about:
Haruno's former classmate. Kako is a motorcyclist who is into "motovlogging," often recording her scenic rides for people to watch on the Internet.

(Source: Mono wiki)

name: Pursena Adoldia
name_kanji: プルセナ・アドルディア
about:
Together with Rinia Dedorudia, they are the two troublemakers in Ranoa Magic Academy. She likes eating meat, and when it comes to fulfilling her dreams of becoming the Village Chief, she does her best.



(Source: Mushoku Tensei Wiki)

name: Badigadi
about: Engaged to the Great Demon Emperor Kishirika Kishirisu, it is said that he is the demon lord who grants wisdom to those who deserve it. He has an immortal body, being able to regenerate injuries and body parts instantly.

name: Rinia Dedoldia
name_kanji: リニア・デドルディア
about:
Rinia is the elder daughter of Gyes, the warrior chief of the Dorudia Tribe. Due to her stupidity, her grandfather Gustav sent her to the Magic Ranoa Academy in order to gain knowledge; however, because of her linage as a royalty of the Beast Race, Rinia was treated with great care and became pampered. Rinia, along with Pursena, became arrogant and acted like delinquents.



(Source: Mushoku Tensei Wiki)

name: Elise
about: She is the elder sister of a young girl Rudeus healed when helping a village clear some snow.

name: Nina Farion
about:
The eldest daughter of the current Sword God Gull Farion. Nina was a proud young woman who had idealistic and naive expectations about life. She slowly changed after meeting and losing to Eris Greyrat, and her later encounter with Rudeus Greyrat. She realized and learned more about the true meaning of strength and the Sword God Style.



(Source: Mushoku Tensei Wiki)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Cliff Grimoire
about: The grandson of the Pope, he is impudent and cocky. However, he possesses a high sense of duty and eventually grows to become more caring.

name: Soldat Heckler
name_kanji: ゾルダート・ヘッケラー
about: An S-Ranked adventurer and the leader of the Stepped Ladder party. He attempted on many occasions to recruit Rudeus to join his party as a permanent member.

name: Juliette
about:
She is a young female dwarf slave that Rudeus and Zanoba purchased from a slave market to help them in making dolls.


(Source: Mushoku Tensei Wiki)

name: Sara
about: She is an adventurer and member of Counter Arrow.

name: Panty Anarchy
name_kanji: アナーキー・パンティ
about:
Height: 164 cm
Weight: 47 kg
Sizes: 84-58-88

Panty is Stocking's sister. She is an angel forced to kill evil spirits in order to earn her way back into Heaven. She is obsessed with sex and as such, spends a lot of her free time in love hotels with random men. She speaks with a traditional Tokyo dialect and bad girl's dialect. Her name is also the source of her power as she is able to transform her panties into a diamond handgun named Back Lace, that has amazingly destructive power against spirits but can't even bruise humans.

name: Stocking Anarchy
name_kanji: ストッキング・アナーキー
about:
Height: 1.52m
Weight: 43 kg
Sizes: 98-61-84

Stocking is a main character in the Panty and Stocking with Garterbelt series. She is a gothic female angel, with long violet/pink hair and teal eyes. Stocking is the younger of the Anarchy sisters. Like Panty, her name derives from the object she is able to weaponize. 

She is a level-headed and intelligent girl, though, she can be rude if provoked, especially towards her older sister, Panty. Stocking enjoys eating various desserts and sugary food, but doesn't seem to gain weight (she assures all the fat goes towards her breasts anyway). However, she becomes enraged and sensitive whenever someone calls her fat.

Stocking is often considered to be the personification of the deadly sin, Gluttony, due to her obsession with sweets. She does not share Panty's obsession with sex, even though she does display some masochistic tendencies, such as bondage, vore and electrocution, which is ironic considering she constantly insults the demon sisters and Corset affinity for similar fetishes by calling them 'BDSM loving freaks'. Stocking does claim she has very special standards in men, and prefers love over lust. She strings men along (not wanting them to believe she is 'easy'), and would never cheat on someone she truly loves. However, she has been shown to have a very strange and twisted vision of what she finds attractive. 

Stocking hates spicy food, just as much as Panty hates sweet food. Stocking is sometimes overshadowed by Panty when in larger audiences due to the latter's more sensuous and exhibitionist behavior, such as in "Sex and the Daten City" and "1 Angry Ghost." She is almost always seen carrying around a plush cat, Honekoneko, whose expressions often match Stocking's mood.

Abilities
To prepare for battle, Stocking removes her stockings. Her ability is being able to transform her stockings into a pair of katanas, known as Stripes I & II, which can be attached at the base of the hilt. It's safe to assume she can form other blades as well, considering the range of weaponry at Panty's disposal.

name: Garterbelt
about:
Garterbelt's serves as the handler for Panty and Stocking and looks after their general well-being. He is also is the reverend of Daten City.

Though he's a priest, he too takes part in events of questionable morality.

Garterbelt is constantly annoyed and bewildered by Panty and Stocking's erratic behavior and lack of commitment to the task at hand. He is the one who gives the Anarchy sisters most of their missions, which are sent to him through Chuck, in the form of small notes.

name: Briefers Rock
name_kanji: ブリーファス・ロック
about:
A self-proclaimed occult maniac and geek attending Daten City High School. He spends his days being bossed around by the angel sisters but feels happy just being able to be near Panty, whom he loves. He has an extremely masochistic personality. It is said that he has something incredible hidden in his crotch...

(Source: Official website)

name: Chuck
about: Chuck is the hyperactive pet of Panty and Stocking. The creators highly based this character on GIR from Invader ZIM.

name: Corset
about:
The mayor of Daten City and the boss of the demon sisters. His true form is a demon with pale blue skin, bony features and a conical hairstyle; when appearing in public he appears with more flesh and slicks his hair back, though his demonic features remain. He wears a rather tight corset and is constantly scratching his back. He also wears hooks to stretch his mouth and buckles on most of his body, and is seen often tightening them. He appears to be into self punishment and a fetish for bondage like Stocking. This evident from the buckles on his body, mouth stretchers and his namesake, the corset. He has an extreme interest with Hell's Monkey, a mystical key possessed by Brief, which has the power to unleash the forces of Hell on Earth. He is also Garterbelts counterpart and seem to have known each other prior to the story. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kneesocks Demon
about:
The younger of the Demon Sisters. She is completely inflexible and always acts according to the books. She is actually a little bit dorky and blushes easily, even if she has red skin. She is an intellectual that uses elaborate traps and trickery to fight against angel sisters Panty & Stocking. She is able to transform her knee socks into the demonic scythes Double Gold Spandex. 

(Source: Gainax Profile Page)

name: Scanty Demon
about:
The older of the Demon Sisters. She places rules and etiquette above everything else. She is an extremely polite high-class lady, but she actually enjoys bringing pain and humiliation to others. She uses demonic artifacts to obstruct angel sisters Panty & Stocking. She is able to transform her scanties into the demonic guns Double Gold Lacytanga.

(Source: Gainax Profile Page)

name: Fastener
about: Scanty and Kneesock's version of Chuck.

name: Misaki Hotori
about:
A girl who has barely any presence and has a complex over her body, so people easily forget her. However because she was born on Seiran Island, she doesn't care about people staring at her chest during conversations. Also a resident badass, riding all kinds of vehicles from bicycles to fighter jets.

(Source: VNDB, Steam)

name: Nanase Katagiri
about:
A gal famous on Seiran Island as the strongest bitch in history. In reality she is still a virgin. Using her appearance, she escapes from dirty sex. She is good at all kinds of housework, and sometimes acts as a guardian for Junnosuke and his friends.

(Source: Nukiani)

name: Junnosuke Tachibana
about:
Birthday: December 31

A proud virgin who believes that there can't be sex without love. As he stays on Seiran Island and dodges the "SS" committee, he launches the "NLNS (No Love, No Sex)" campaign in order to rebel against the island's deranged laws and customs.

(Source: VNDB)

name: Asane Tachibana
about:
Junnosuke's younger sister is a reclusive, foul-mouthed, and frequently difficult individual.
She develops spy items and controls the Ariadne Protocol escape assistance program.
However, she seems dissatisfied with her brother's recent activities...

(Source: Steam)

name: Hinami Watarai
about:
She is a senior to Junnosuke and the others , and no one pays her any attention because of her young appearance, and she is still a virgin. She is short and cannot reach high places, so she always carries a metal chair with her. She is a genuine kind hearted person, and is also easily persuaded.

(Source: Nukiani)

name: Ran Hanamaru
about:
Hands down the biggest problem child of them all.
Already ruthlessly ambitious, in the parallel world, she's now a devotee of a certain local god and does as she pleases upon receiving a divine revelation.
As the prideful "SHO Special Auditor's Aide," she is obsessed with bringing down Touka and alt-world Junnosuke, though it doesn't usually go as planned.

(Source: Steam)

name: Fumino Kotoyose
about:
A young woman believed to be the key to abolishing the old island order. She serves as a sniper for the group, keeping Junnosuke out of harm’s way at a distance.

(Source: Steam)

name: Ikuko Onabuta
about:
Commander of the First Squad, possessing the highest actual combat capability in Minotsuki Academy’s FS. One of the strongest fighters in direct combat, she’s also a diehard battle fanatic who resents the existence of anyone stronger than she is, and has no qualms about making it known to anyone within shouting distance. Always a maverick, her arrival in the parallel world reveals a side to her that catches Junnosuke by surprise.

(Source: Steam)

name: Touka Reizeiin
about:
FS representative and student council president of Minotsuki Academy. A girl with perfect looks and charisma—who leads her peers in the parallel world as well. Capable of overseeing everything from normal operations to strategic planning to direct combat and more, she is a major contender for Seiran’s strongest islander.

Outside of work, however, she is even clumsier and sloppier than Asane—and that’s putting it mildly. Although she and Junnosuke are incompatible with each other due to their history, he has no choice but to look out for her here as she can barely take care of herself.

(Source: Steam)

name: Rei Tadasugawa
about:
De facto second-in-charge as president of Minotsuki Academy’s disciplinary committee.
Her skills range from miscellaneous duties to battlefield command, though as a dedicated worker, she ends up being pushed around by Touka in her daily life. She is a bit depressed when she comes to the parallel world, but her cheerful antics still win out. She is very close to Junnosuke and helps him in any way she can.

(Source: Steam)

name: Kouzou Akizuki
about:
The male protagonist of the anime, who lust for his step daughters and best friends.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

The elder step-daughter of Kouzou and eldest child of Kayoko.
She has a French father.

In Fukubiki! Triangle animation, Airi is a good friend of Futaba.

Seiyuu Visual Novel Credits:

name: Ayane Shirakawa
about:
Height: 159 cm
Cup Size: F-cup
Favorite food: Pudding

Chilhood friend of Kazushi Sudou and the older sister of Kotone Shirakawa.

The older sister of the Shirakawa sisters. The type who is highly conscious of beauty and is busy polishing herself, such as saving pocket money to purchase beautiful skin bath salts. She tends to reflexively take a twitchy attitude towards Kazushi, but the truth is, she is worried and can't be honest with herself.

(Source: Overflow anime website, translated)

name: Kotone Shirakawa
about:
Height: 153 cm
Bust: 90 cm (H-cup)
Waist: 58 cm
Hips: 85 cm
Favorite food: Cream stew

Ayane's sister and Kazushi's childhood friend.

She is the younger sister of the Shirakawa sisters. The little devil type who looks quiet but actually does bold things. Along with Ayane, she adores her childhood friend Kazushi like a big brother. Recently, she's worried that her clothes won't fit her because her breasts started to grow big again. 

(Source: Overflow anime website, translated)

name: Kazushi Sudou
about:
A university student living in an apartment near the Shirakawa family. Although he has no blood connection with the Shirakawa sisters, they grew up like brother and sister since he was a child, so he loves them like a real sister. 

(Source: Overflow anime website, translated)

name: Yori Asanagi
about:
Birthday: November 26th 
Blood type: A

A third year high school student who sings and plays guitar, often on the school rooftop. She loves collecting cat merchandise. She is the current guitar-vocalist of SSGIRLS. 

(Source: Whisper Me A Love Song Wiki)

name: Himari Kino
about:
Birthday: July 18th 
Blood type: O

The main protagonist of the series. She is a first-year high school student. Himari is a very joyous, cheerful girl and quite oblivious when it comes to love. She always wants the best for her friends and cheers them on in whatever they pursue.


(Source: Whisper Me A Love Song Wiki)

name: Hajime Amasawa
about:
Birthday: December 25th 
Blood type: A

A third-year high school student and Laureley's drummer.


(Source: Whisper Me A Love Song Wiki)

name: Shiho Izumi
about:
Birthday: October 16th 
Blood type: AB

A second-year and former vocalist and guitarist of SSGIRLS. She now fronts Lorelei, while also acting as a ghost member for the Culinary Research Club. 

Leaving SSGIRLS 

Forming Lorelei

(Source: Whisper Me A Love Song Wiki)

name: Aki Mizuguchi
about:
Birthday: April 12th 
Blood type: B

A third-year high school student and the bassist of the band SSGIRLS. She is Yori's best friend. Aki is a peppy girl with a carefree attitude. She always manages to keep her band in a positive mindset and enjoys teasing them. Although, on the inside, she is quite self-conscious about her past and current relationships. Aki desperately does not want to lose anyone like she had lost Shiho, but she keeps these feelings bottled up, and only rants to Yori when requested. She cares about her friends deeply and is the one who selflessly got Himari to hook up with Yori despite her feelings for the latter.

(Source: Whisper Me a Love Song Wiki)

name: Miki Mizuguchi
about:
Birthday: August 7th 
Blood type: B

She is part of the wind instrument club which indirectly helps Himari and Yori's relationship by collecting information.

(Source: Whisper Me a Love Song Wiki)

name: Momoka Satomiya
about:
Birthday: March 3
Blood type: O

A second-year high school student and is the president of the Cooking Club. She is also the bassist of Laureley.


(Source: Whisper Me A Love Song Wiki)

name: Kaori Tachibana
about:
Birthday: January 27th 
Blood type: O

A third year high school student and the keyboardist of SSGIRLS. She is childhood friends with Mari.

(Source: Whisper Me A Love Song Wiki)

about:

A third-year high school student and the drummer of the band SSGIRLS.

about:
Birthday: May 24

A girl who lives in Miyazaki but is originally from Tohoku. Her mother died in the 2011 Tohoku Earthquake.

name: Souta Munakata
about:
A young man who travels across Japan searching for open doors that bring disaster upon its surroundings. He encounters Suzume while headed for a certain ruin containing a door.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Chika Amabe
about: Suzume meets a high school student of the same age when she visits Ehime. She has a friendly and cheerful personality and can easily get along with Suzume. Her parents run an inn called the Amabe Inn and she and her younger brother help out with the buisness.

name: Daijin
about: Former Keystone of the Ever-after.

name: Tsubame Iwato
about:
Tsubame Iwato was born on March 10, 1977 and was six years older than her sister Tamaki Iwato. As a single mother, Tsubame gave birth to Suzume and raised her on her own in Akamae, Iwate. On May 24, 2010, she crafted a wooden chair as a birthday gift to her daughter.

(Source: Makoto Shinkai Wiki)

name: Miki
about: Girl working in a bar in Kobe.

name: Euphyllia Magenta
name_kanji: ユフィリア・マゼンタ
about:
Euphyllia is the daughter of a duke and former betrothed to the crown prince of the kingdom. She is taken in by Anisphia after the crown prince breaks off their engagement publicly and becomes her research asssistant.

Euphyllia is a person blessed by the spirits and possesses affinity for all magical spirits which allows her to use magic of any element.

name: Anisphia Wynn Palettia
name_kanji: アニスフィア・ウィン・パレッティア
about:
The first princess of the Kingdom of Palettia. She was reincarnated from her previous life with all her memories of modern technology, making her a keen inventor in her current life. While considered odd and only interested in her inventions, she actually thinks of her country more than anyone else. Because of her conspicuous eccentricities, she uses the name of Princess Strange Violent as she pleases. She has memories of being Japanese in her previous life and has a strong admiration for magic.

(Source: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei Wikia)

name: Moritz Chartreuse
name_kanji: モーリッツ・シャルトルーズ

name: Tilty Claret
name_kanji: ティルティ・クラーレット
about: Tilty is Anisphia's research partner and the daughter of the influential Claret family who was exiled from the main house.

name: Ilia Coral
about:
Anisphia's personal maid. Although a servant, she watches over Anisphia like an older sister. She was saved by Anisphia in the past and is deeply loyal to her.



(Source: Tenten Kakumei Wiki)

name: Lainie Cyan
about:
The daughter of a commoner elevated to the rank of Baron. Despite her humble origins, she has succeeded in attracting the attention of the sons of several influential nobles at the aristocratic academy.

(Source: Tenten Kakumei Wiki)

name: Sylphine Maise Palletia
name_kanji: シルフィーヌ・メイズ・パレッティア

name: Orphans II Palletia
name_kanji: オルファンス・イル・パレッティア

name_kanji: リュミエル・レネ・パレッティア

name: Algard von Palletia
name_kanji: アルガルド・ボナ・パレッティア

name: Renako Amaori
about:
Birthday: March 3
Blood type: A
Height: 158cm

Amaori Renako is a shut-in who has difficulties communicating with people, however during her Highschool debut she approaches the most popular girl in the school, Mai Oozuka, and joins her group. One day later Mai confesses her love for Amaori, yet Amaori insists on staying "just friends".

name: Mai Ouzuka
about:
Birthday: August 31
Blood type: AB
Height: 167 cm

Mai is a super beautiful girl, top student and young model. She is expected to behave as a top class daughter and this causes tension on her that often needs to be relieved leading her to say harsh words or make others feel as she wants, a queen alike. However, she is aware of all the privileges she has and normally is a cold minded girl. Due to this duality, she likes a lot that someone else realizes that she is like another girl with defects that has just a different look and feel. 

When her tension releases, it goes strong on her feelings causing hard interactions with other girls like Satsuki, altough it seems she teases most of the time. Nevertheless, she is still young and doesn't handle her emotions as well as she handles her toughts, especially with Renako who teases and cuddles her whenever there is a chance but thanks to Mai bold atitude Renako and the rest of the girls accepts her even if they have different ideas and behaviors.

name: Emily Himesaka
about:
Emily Himesaka is a secondary character of the Watashi ni Tenshi ga Maiorita! series. She is the mother of Noa Himesaka.

Emily has short blonde hair and green eyes. She usually wears a long green dress, with flowing sleeves, a black top underneat, and a black belt.

(Source: Watashi ni Tenshi ga Maiorita! Wiki)

name: Sumika Chibana
about: Sumika plays a cool and collected senpai in the café. However, outside of work, she is considered a gyaru. Sumika becomes more involved with Kanoko once she begins to believe that Kanoko may harbor unrequited feelings for Hime.

name: Kanoko Mamiya
about: A shy girl who has been Hime's friend since middle school and actually knows Hime's true personality. Kanoko comes to work at the café after following Hime there. Kanoko is secretly in love with Hime to the point where she is obsessed with her.

name: Hime Shiraki
about: Hime dreams of marrying rich and living an easy life of wealth. To achieve her dream she always presents a charming persona to endear herself to others, leaving few to know her true character.

name: Mitsuki Yano
about: A beautiful and graceful girl who plays the role of a kind senpai at the salon. She very quickly comes to dislike Hime.

name: Mahiru Kouzuki
about:
Artist in the group JELEE, she created the avatar of JELEE and draws the images that make up the music videos. 

In her childhood, Mahiru loved drawing but stopped altogether after some of her friends made fun of a mural art she had made. She came back to drawing thanks to Kano Yamanouchi who loved her art and wanted her to create art for her songs. Together they created the group JELEE which was then joined by Kiui Watase and Mei Takanashi.

name: Kim Anouk Mei Takanashi
name_kanji: 高梨・キム・アヌーク・めい
about:
Member of the JELEE, she composes music for the group.

She became a fan of Kano Yamanouchi during her idol days after meeting her after an event. She found her thanks to a video of her playing the guitar ended up online and then joined JELEE.

name: Kiui Watase
about:
Quit school and became a vtuber. She live streams under a super hero avatar. 
Her best friend is Mahiru Kouzuki who made her join the group JELEE. She edits and animates the music videos for the group.

name: Kano Yamanouchi
about:
A former pop idol who was forced into retirement after a scandal, now performing under the name JELEE.

She is a determined girl who wishes to prove her worth.

name: Shizue Baba
about: An underground idol who goes by the name "Miiko." Shizue aims to be a successful idol despite her unconventional background and age.

name: Mion Hayakawa
about: Kano's older sister, with whom she shares the room.

name: Akira Amatsume
about:
Height: 153 cm
Blood Type: A
Birthdate: August 3
Horoscope: Leo

Daughter of a devout family, the ever cheerful Akira lives alone on the property of a small yet sacred Shinto shrine. Akira's energetic liveliness is contagious to those around her, with an innocent personality that makes befriending the girl second nature. Due to her residence, Akira spends much of her time practicing the habits and traditions of a miko shrine maiden, including performance of requisite ceremonies and holiday festivals.

name: Haruka Kasugano
about:
Age: 16-17
Birthday: February 5
Gender: Male
Astrological sign: Aquarius
Height: 170 cm
Hair color: silver
Eye color: light grey
Blood type: O
Known relatives: Kasugano Sora

The protagonist of the series. With a gentle appearance and slim profile, in many ways Haruka is the splitting image of his fraternal twin sister Sora. Personable and honest, he forges lasting friendships with remarkable ease. Haruka copes with the loss of his parents with a stout heart, burdened with the knowledge that the future of his delicate sister depends on him. As a result, he has a tendency to dote on his sister and worry about her constantly. He cannot swim either. The Kasugano siblings are well regarded around the village, as their grandfather was once a doctor there.

name: Sora Kasugano
about:
Birthdate: February 5
Age: 16-17
Gender: Female
Height: 152 cm
Zodiac: Aquarius
Hair color: Silver
Eye color: Light Gray
Blood type: O
Known relatives: Kasugano Haruka (twin brother)

She is a quiet, fragile and reclusive girl, and fraternal twin sister to the main protagonist. Cursed with illness and frailty since birth, Sora was denied the sort of independent life that many take for granted. Yet beneath Sora's angelic doll-like appearance lies a troublesome personality that’s prone to withdrawn laziness and demonstrates a rather severe lack of social graces. In all honesty, Sora doesn't care for anyone else, and would much rather just surf the Internet and eat instant food, for as long as Haruka is always by her side. It's implied that her strong bond with Haruka, strengthened as a result of the tragic loss of their parents, may be leading her towards fantasies of incest between twins. She hates Nao, although it is implied that they were once good friends. She is often seen carrying a rabbit doll, which she received as a present before she and Haruka left the village.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kazuha Migiwa
about:
Height: 164 cm
Blood Type: A
Birthdate: August 3

The stunning daughter of an influential magnate, Kazuha lives a cultured life that some might compare to modern princesses. Sharp minded and attentive to detail, as a result of her parent’s constant travels and long distance liaisons, she learned self sufficient independence from a young age. Nonetheless Kazuha does not consider herself superior to others, with a modest nature that’s ever ready to take a subordinate role in teamwork and friendship.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Nao Yorihime
about:
Height: 163 cm
Blood Type: AB
Birthdate: October 7

Beautiful, intellectual and an amazing swimmer, Nao has an open attraction towards Haruka. As a close and trusted childhood friend, Nao was sincerely devastated when it seemed she would never see the two siblings again. Nao’s compassion and maturity projects an ambiance of sisterly love unto others, though for Haruka there is an intimately deeper and sensual emotion. Sora harbors great resentment towards the popular student, never taking an effort to explain the reasons why.

name: Yahiro Ifukube
about:
Height: 165 cm
Blood Type: B
Birthdate: January 10

She is the best friend of Motoka Nogisaka, and the proprietor of a family owned candy store. The rough looking Yahiro would rather prefer spending her time sleeping and drinking than doing anything else. The ill tempered and sardonic mannerisms that she often displays hide Yahiro's true personality; a woman whose past is a field littered with the shattered glass of lost dreams, forgotten promises, and broken romances.

name: Kozue Kuranaga
about:
Height: 158 cm
Blood type: A
Birthdate: June 1

The president of Haruka, Ryouhei, Kazuha, and Akira's class, often nicknamed by "class rep." She falls in love at first sight when she sees Haruka due to his gentle profile and appearance.

name: Ryouhei Nakazato
about:
Height: 175 cm
Blood Type: B
Birthdate: September 25

For all his faults and freakish behavior, Ryouhei is the kind of person you can always count on. Carefree and spontaneous, he brands himself as the ultimate ladies man, applying cheesy pickup lines whenever a pretty face draws near. Yet when the situation call for it, Ryouhei can offer profoundly sound advice, with an eye that quickly identifies the root of a problem.

name: Motoka Nogisaka
about:
Height: 160 cm
Blood Type: O
Birthdate: December 23

Motoka is a college student struggling to make ends meet, working as a maid in the Migiwa Household to pay the expenses of tuition. While not ideally suited for household chores, her warm compassion and captivating personality offset these deficiencies. She is best friends with Ifukube Yahiro, a notorious drinker, which makes Motoka’s low tolerance to alcohol a particularly hazardous social issue. Especially since she has a particular fondness for the taste of sake.

name: Yuzu Aihara
about:
The self-proclaimed Gyaru and only child, Yuzu transfers to an all-girls school after her mother is remarried. Yuzu is outspoken, daring, and shameless to some extent. She is often seen wearing her uniform that runs against the rules thus far. Unfortunately for her, she is bothered by the Student Council President's dress code enforcement. Yuzu eventually comes home to hear that she is now the older sister of the Student Council President, Aihara Mei.

Despite showing irritation towards Mei, she becomes concerned for her in which transitions into infatuation and deep care. Though she is rebellious in school, she means well and is often acting on behalf of Mei in a sense of protection. Also, her closest friend in school is Harumin.

name: Mei Aihara
about:
Age: 16
Birthday: 13th September
Zodiac sign: Virgo

Mei is an honor student, the chairman's granddaughter, and student council president. She is stern, cold, and often calm and composed, but she can be rather sensitive and mature to some extent. At first, there is little to know about her and a bad impression of Mei washes over Yuzu, which causes Yuzu to take interest on Mei later on. Though Mei seems to be hard to approach, she is rather sensitive and lonely which makes Yuzu want to care for Mei more.

name: Shou Aihara
about: Mei's father. Due to his job, Mei referred to him as 'sensei' when she was younger.

name: Mineko Fuji
about:
Mineko Fuji is a teacher of Aihara Academy. She is feared by the students due to confiscating their items and giving them sermons whenever they break the school's regulations. The room where these sermons take place is known as "Mineko's Room".

"Mineko's Room" is a reference to "Tetsuko's Room", a popular Talk Show hosted by Tetsuko Kuroyanagi. Mineko's name appears to be a reference to Tetsuko.

Mineko's name might also be a reference to Fujiko Mine from Lupin the Third. 

In the manga, she is commonly drawn in a chibi-like style, while in the anime she is drawn in a more realistic style, possibly to better blend with the other characters.

(Source: Citrus Wiki)

name: Kayo Maruta
about:
Kayo Maruta is a supporting character and ex-vice-president of the student council. She is best friends with Mitsuko, who she affectionately calls Micchan. Kayo is one of the few people who dares to talk to Mitsuko casually and lives to see another day; she also is seen at Micchan's side for much of the latter half of the manga. Glasses-senpai talks formally with everybody else. While on the student council at Aihara Academy, Maruta was dedicated and very diligent at making sure people are rule-followers, even chastising Yuzu while it's her first day there. Eventually, the brunette lightens up later on and shows her softer side for Micchan and the readers, as well as the group that went on the summer trip in volume 8. During the extra in volume four of the manga, she reveals her surname and her past position in the council.

Appearance

She has a dark brown sharp bob and large D-shaped glasses in the beginning of the manga, which you can not see her light-blue eyes through most of the time; yet she eventually stops wearing glasses in volume 10 onward. Kayo also eventually grows out the bob into a softer, yet only slightly longer hair style with more definition. She is often seen holding her black handbook with her arms crossed over it. In the anime, she has light black hair and oval shaped clear glasses, as well as tapered bangs as opposed to her early-manga rectangular, flat bangs.

Outfits

She is seen in a few outfits, namely her school uniform with her student council armband in almost every volume.
 
Her other outfits include:

her summer trip outfit - Volume 8 - (boater hat with a black stripe, plain t shirt tucked into tied, cute dotted, frilly shorts and a striped handbag)
her hot-springs outfit - Volume 8 - (naked)
[u]her light outfit[/] - Volume 9 - (wide collared button up and white bottoms(not fully shown). this is the last appearance of her glasses in the main series.)
her casual outfit - Volume 10 - (white shirt with thin black stripes, long-sleeved denim jacket, and black bottoms(not fully shown))


Statistics

In the manga, Kayo is seen visually a total of 85 times.

Five of those appearances are flashbacks, two are as a text bubble head, and the other 78 are full drawn appearances.

(Source: Citrus manga)

name: Matsuri Mizusawa
about:
Matsuri is a second-year in middle school and Yuzu's childhood friend who lived close to her before she moved to the Aihara residence.

Matsuri makes her first appearance in chapter 9. She is a pretty girl who is always seen with a pair of headphones around her neck. being very sly and fake toward an unidentified friend. She comes across Yuzu and Harumin at an arcade and invites them out to karaoke. Harumin is appears to be quite wary and suspicious of her. Upon deducing the nature of Yuzu's feelings toward Mei, Matsuri professes a romantic interest in Yuzu and kisses her in front of Mei. She sells masturbation videos she finds on the Internet to old men through a phone app, and tells them they are hers, as a means of income. She considers men to be dense and believes that all can be manipulated easily.


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Himeko Momokino
about:
Himeko is the Student Council vice-president and Mei's childhood friend.

She has a rather stuck-up and stubborn personality and despises people who don't follow the school regulations. Despite her taste of sticking to the rules, she seems to enjoy lolita fashion, as she is usually seen wearing that kind of clothes when not in school.

Himeko gets extremely jealous and overprotective of Mei and absolutely abhors Yuzu's close relationship with her. It is popularly believed that she harbors intense romantic feelings for Mei, and often emphasizes her relationship with Mei by continuously referring to the fact that they were both childhood friends. Despite her seemingly yandere-like personality, she does have Mei's best interests at heart as she begrudgingly accepts Yuzu's attraction towards Mei. However, that does not stop her from frequently complaining about Yuzu's terrible behavior.

(Source: Citrus Wikia)

name: Nene Nomura
about:
Nene Nomura is a big fan of Yuzu Aihara and a new student at the Aihara Academy.

(Source: Citrus Wikia)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Suzuran Shiraho
about:
Suzuran has a odd appearance. She has narrow eyes, and long black hair that reaches her back. She is usually seen wearing her school uniform, she wears dark gloves reaching past her elbows and dark knee socks. All of this gives her a sinister appearance.

Suzuran is very observant, discovering many things about people just from observing, though she also got info about Yuzu from the student id card she dropped.

She grew up without a family and lied out of fear of being alone, making her popular with the girls in her village. Lynn learns combat very quickly. Besides the sword Gram she uses a small axe.
