name: Sakura Adachi
about:
Sakura Adachi is a first-year high school student. She tends to skip class and that's why the rest of the students see her as a delinquent, but she just doesn't like to be around people. One day, Hougetsu Shimamura, a girl from her class, finds her on the second floor of the gym with the intention of skipping class too. Strangely, Sakura becomes really attached to Hougetsu and wants to be the closest person to her.

Adachi had an extremely introverted personality. Before meeting Shimamura, she never had someone whom she can call a friend. Adachi was said to be cold toward other people and didn't attempt to make friends with other people in the past.

She is also a generally very jealous person towards Shimamura when she is together with her friends and as a consequence usually ends up running away.

She is left-handed.

(Source: Adachi to Shimamura Wiki)

name: Hougetsu Shimamura
about:
Shimamura Hougetsu is a high school student. She met Adachi while skipping class on the second floor of the gym in her school when Adachi accidentally walks in on her one day. The two instantly took a liking for each other and began to hang out together all the time.

In both manga adaptations, it was Shimamura who walked in on Adachi in the gym when they first met instead of the reverse.

Shimamura is a bit of an airhead who loves sleeping and can do so for as long as she wants. Contrary to Adachi, she has grown up on much better terms with her family and as such manages to be much more sociable even if she doesn’t see herself as a particularly kind person. She tends to think about her relationship with Adachi as that of an older sister or a mother. She also enjoys teasing Adachi quite a bit.

(Source: Adachi to Shimamura Wiki)

name: Yashiro Chikama
about:
Yashiro Chikama is a friend of Akira Hino, whom she met while they were fishing. Like Hino, Chikama makes their own sound effects, the most notable being the "breathing" sound for their spacesuit. In their introduction, they explain that they have come to Earth to find their brethren.

(Source: Adachi to Shimamura Wiki)

name: Akira Hino
about: Hino Akira is a high school student and Shimamura's friend. She is introduced in Chapter 2 of the novel with her closest friend Nagafuji. Hino has a bubbly personality and is known to add in sound effects, whether they're needed or not. She also enjoys fishing, though she often complains about not having any school fishing friends.

name: Taeko Nagafuji
about:
Nagafuji Taeko is a high school student and Shimamura's friend. She is introduced in Chapter 2 of the light novel, along with her close friend Hino Akira. Nagafuji has a very laid back personality and sometimes just seems to be out of it. 

(Source: Adachi to Shimamura Wiki)

name: Tarumi
about:
Shimamura's childhood friend. Tarumi comes across Shimamura again at Nagafuji's meat store after high school classes. To Shimamura, Tarumi looked more like a delinquent than she did, even though that's not reflected in her personality. Tarumi attempts to reconnect with Shimamura after all these years, asking her to hang out constantly, expecting the Shima-chan of her past.

In the anime, Tarumi is voiced by Ai Kayano, who has work in other yuri anime like Bloom Into You (Yagate Kimi ni Naru) as the character Sayaka. 

(Source: Adachi to Shimamura Wiki)

name: Miki Noda
about:
A student in the GA-1 class. Cute and small, Noda often gets mistaken for a grade school girl. As a result, she wears her high school uniform with pride. Nozaki calls her "Hime" (princess) because she acts spoiled at times. She gets easily bored and often comes up with interesting ideas to spice things up. For instance, she turned a normal lunch into a game where everyone drew lottery and had to follow the rule written on there. Nicknamed "Alchemist," she also enjoys mixing a variety of things, including drinks. Extremely talented and motivated in her studies, she is also shown to be very moody, which does seem to affect her work. Her hobby is fashion and she spends an average of eight minutes on each page in a fashion magazine. Noda is usually seen with a different hairstyle every time, indicative of her love for fashion. She is able to have an "insight" into what a person is wearing and immediately able to tell its origins. She has a sister in the third year.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Namiko Nozaki
about:
The onee-san of the group. Takes care of people.

(Source: Volume 1)

name: Miyabi Oomichi
about:
A student in the GA-1 class. Nicknamed Kyouju (professor) due to her intelligence, she is a mysterious person who never smiles and somehow manages to store everything in her jacket. Despite her stoic mannerisms, she is still quite playful and likes to help out her friends. She addresses everyone in a very samurai-formal, but awkward (in the modern Japanese context) manner by attaching "-dono" in place of "-san". Since she likes the color black, she'll use it in all of her artworks.

(From Wikipedia)

name: Tomokane
about:
Hot-blooded with a screw loose. Uses physical strength to solve everything.

(Source: Volume 1)

name: Kisaragi Yamaguchi
about:
Ordinary, plain, sometimes a tennen. Tries her best at everything.

(Source: Volume 1)

name: Chikako Awara
about:
Chikako is a female third-year GA student. She is head of the fine arts club and Mizubuchi and Mitsui call her "Aa-san".

Chikako speaks in Chuubu dialect. She has a boisterous personality and often does things before she talks about them. She respects the previous club head Nozaki and has a very strong attachment to the fine arts club.

(Adapted from ja.wikipedia.org)

name: Haruto Fuwa
about:
Haruto is another novelist who debuted around the same time as Itsuki. He is 22 years old and often drinks alcohol with Itsuki. Despite his cool appearance, he loves maid characters and owns a lot of adult games and figurines. Haruto has a "persona" in his social media to gain fans for his novel series' popularity. He has a younger sister whom puts on a tsundere persona around him. 


(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Itsuki Hashima
about:
Itsuki is the 20-year-old protagonist of the series who has an obsession towards younger sisters. He is a novelist who debuted when he was in high school; all of his novels feature younger sisters as the heroine. In the span of five years, he has published 20 books, some of which have ranked in the top 10 weekly rankings for light novels on Oricon. Despite his success, his irrational personality and writing style has led to mediocre success compared to his fellow writers.



(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Chihiro Hashima
about: Chihiro appears as Itsuki's 16 year old younger stepbrother. Chihiro is a dependable person who looks after everyone and attends high school.

name: Nayuta Kani
about:
Nayuta is a genius novelist who is in love with Itsuki. She is 18 years old. She debuted as a novelist after she won a newcomer prize. Nayuta Kani is her pseudonym and even Itsuki does not know her real name. She cannot write if she is not naked. Starting in junior high school, she refused to go to school after getting bullied.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Miyako Shirakawa
about: Itsuki's former college classmate. Although she is not attempting to be a professional author like Itsuki is, she enjoys reading his works. She supports him, and Kani's work. Her birthday is April 29th and she is 21 years old.

name: Setsuna Ena
about: A 16 year old illustrator who used to do the art for Itsuki's novels until he was told to stop, as Itsuki didn’t believe his series was worthy of Setsuna's art just yet. He is very easygoing and spontaneous.

name: Kaiko Mikuniyama
about: The girl who is in charge of adapting Itsuki's light novel series, Mahou Gakuen, (Imouto no Subete in the novel) into a manga. She is highly talented and looks up to Itsuki, as she also has a little sister fetish. She has an underwear fetish as well, and even goes as far as to wear panties in the shape of a bow on her head. When writing, she takes off the panty bow and puts the panties on her face.

name: Ayane Mitahora
about: The daughter of the housekeeperlady who worked for Hashima family.

name: Ashley Oono
about:
Ashley is a 32-year-old tax accountant who wears a red lolita style dress. She is reliable but very sadistic; she makes her clients reveal their fetishes through their expenses, but raises their tax return in exchange. 



(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kenjirou Toki
about: Itsuki's editor at GF Bunko. He and Itsuki seem like they don’t get along well at first, but they are actually very close. He's normally seen nagging Itsuki and/or Setsuna about their deadlines.

name: Teru Hayama
about: Braid, glasses and class representative. Looks calm but has a dark personality.

name: Youko Nishikawa
about: Used to be the daughter of a rich family, but her father's business broke down and now she is very poor.

name: Futaba Odagiri
about: Very active and hungry girl, who moved to the school where Teru and Youko are and became a classmate of Teru.

name: Kou Hayama
about: Teru's big sister.

name: Celia Claire
about: A teacher who finds Rio in the slums.

name: Latifa
about: An assassin sent to kill Rio after he leaves the kingdom.

name: Rio
name_kanji: リオ / 天川 春人
about:
Rio is a boy living in the slums who wants revenge for his mother who was murdered in front of him when he was five years old.

He has inherited the memories of his last life as Haruto Amakawa.

name: Aishia
about: Rio's spirit. She's always helped Rio.

name: Miharu Ayase
about: Haruto's childhood friend.

name: Flora Beltrum
about: The second princess of the Beltrum Kingdom and younger sister of Christina Beltrum. She’s kind by nature, thus loved by the people. She enrolled in the Royal Institute 1 year below Rio.

name: Christina Beltrum
name_kanji: クリスティーナ＝ベルトラム
about:
Christina is the first princess of the Beltram Kingdom. She is also the older sister of Flora Beltram.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Liselotte Cretia
name_kanji: リーゼロッテ＝クレティア
about:
Liselotte Cretia is the youngest child and the only daughter of Duke Cretia Family, a prominent Noble household on Galwark Kingdom. She is the top most sought noble daughter in the whole country.

She graduated from the royal academy by skipping grade several times, build a business that grow into an international enterprises famous in neighboring countries, become a governor and develop a city that she got from her parents into one of the most prosperous city in the kingdom, all while she still just 15 years old.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Dominic
about:
One of the three spirit folk's village's head elders, during Rio's second year in the village he would learn from him all his dwarven knowledge, how to craft magic tools and artifacts and some notions of construction, before Rio's left towards Yagumo he and his disciples made his sword and black armor for him.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Dryas
about:
A high level mid class spirit specialized in earth spirit arts whose principal body it's the enormous world tree located near the spirit folk's village, since they settled there more than one thousand years ago the spirit people has deified, held annually in her honor the spirit festival, hidden her main body from the rest of the world with several layers of barriers and attended to her, in exchange she gives her blessing to the village's inhabitants when they reach a certain age, something that raises slightly their total quantity of magic power and their aptitude for spirit arts and lets them to use the world tree's sap as an ingredient for the spirit liquor, elixirs and panaceas.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Roanna Fontaine
name_kanji: ロアナ＝フォンティーヌ

name: Shizuku Karasuki
about:
Current queen of the Karasuki kingdom, Ayame's mother and Rio's grandmother, how Zen and Ayame had to leave the kingdom has always weighted down her mind until she heard from Rio how Zen and Ayame were able of being happy together after leaving the kingdom and that he never saw regret or sadness on his mother's face, she wasn't able of avoiding to begin to weep when she heard the story of Ayame's death, unconscious if her husband's attempt of making Rio to live closer to them by making him fight Gouki she was the most happy one about Rio's victory.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Ruri
about:
She is Zen's older brother's eldest daughter, when she was a child her mother and little brother died from starvation after an epidemic and a bad harvest, at that time her father was already dead too but it was never specified the cause, the most likely in a war somewhere, since then she was raised alone by Yuba, she's equally close to everyone in the village with the exception of Sayo and Shin as they were the ones who spent more time with her in her childhood when they were learning spirit arts together from Yuba and that as fellow orphans they hung out a lot too.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Hayate Saga
about:
Gouki and Kayoko's first son before another two little brothers and Komomo, he learned swordcraft in his house with Gouki as his demonic instructor, after reaching adulthood he would begin to work as tax collector, a very prestigious job because it's said to just be given to those most honorable, trustworthy, smart and strong in the kingdom, because they need the strength to protect their load that it's the taxes paid to them in the form of the villages' harvests, the calculation ability for knowing how much it must be paid or not to the country, the honorableness' of not stealing and a good personality that won't allow them to use their authority for abusing of others.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Sayo
about:
A girl living in Yuba's village with her parents and her older brother Shin, when she was still a child her parents would die after an epidemic and She and Shin would become orphans and would be raised with a little of help of all of their neighbours, due to them being born with capacity of using spirit arts the same as Ruri they would begin to learn them together with her from Yuba that would treat her almost as siblings and that way she would become Ruri's childhood friend.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Aki Sendou
about:
Haruto's half sister, after the divorce she and her mother left the house where they used to live with Haruto and her supposed father and moved to another place. They lived alone for several years until her mother got married again with Takahisa and Masato's father. Several years later, after her first day at the middle school when she was going back home with her siblings, along with Miharu and Masato, she got dragged into Satsuki and Takahisa's hero summoning.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Masato Sendou
about:
The second son of the man who got married with Haruto's and Aki's mother after the divorce, Takahisa's little brother, Haruto's and Aki's little step-brother, due to mentioning Haruto in front of Aki being taboo he was never told that Haruto was his older step brother living away with his own father, the first day of his sixth year at the elementary school he got dragged into Takahisa's and Satsuki's hero summoning.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Aria Gavaness
about: Liselotte Cretia's most trusted aide and chief vassal, she serves her as her great chamberlain and personal escort, the strongest of all of her retainers.

name: Natalie
about: One of Lizelotte's maids, chamberlains and personal guards, when fighting together with Cosette often deemed as the second strongest of Lizelotte's maids, she was already working for Lizelotte when Rio was framed but it's unknown when she was hired exactly.

name: Takahisa Sendou
about:
Sendou Takahisa is the hero affiliated with Centostella kingdom, he got summoned to another world together with his senior Sumeragi Satsuki that becoming the hero of neighbouring kingdom and dragging with them 3 other people, 2 of his siblings, Sendou Aki and Masato, and his friend Ayase Miharu.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Satsuki Sumeragi
about:
Satsuki Sumeragi is a 17 Year old Japanese high school student that got summoned to another world as a Hero, She descended in Galwark Kingdom and sheltered by the kingdom, though at first she refused to act as a hero, she later agreed to do it as long as the kingdom agreed in helping her find a way for her to return home to Japan.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Agnes Tachyon
about:
A super genius horse girl who's one of the smartest horse girls of her time. Because of her great intellect, she's never had to reveal her maximum ability.

(Source: Uma Musume Wiki)

name: Manhattan Cafe
about:
A beautiful horse girl with long, jet-black hair. At first she may seems a bit eerie and ghostlike, but the truth is that trainers greatly appreciate her earnest disposition. She wants nothing more than to have fun participating in the race. According to her, "Humans are boring; If I hadn't been born a horse girl, I would have taken up a life of crime." She's also an active actress.

(Source: Uma Musume Wiki)

name: Yukino Bijin
about:
A rustic bishoujo who came to Tokyo from far in the countryside. With a resilient heart, she's a hard worker who perseveres to follow through on everything no matter what. Though she can speak standard Japanese, sometimes her hometown dialect slips out. She's determined to make her debut in the Twinkle Series no matter what in order to benefit her hometown!

(Source: MyWaifuList)

name: Yumeji Fujiwara
about:
Birthday: July 7th
Age: 15
Height: 168 cm
Weight: 53 kg

Yumeji is the main protagonist of Yumekui Merry. Student in high school, he received 10 years ago the ability to perceive the aura of people's dreams, which allows him to predict what kind of dreams they are going to have

Personality
He is a lazy, yet strong-willed and determined person with a heart of gold, who is always ready to help others. He is also a member of a writing club at his high school, and is a big fan of the superhero called Guricho. He meets Merry when she falls on top of him as he comes back from his errands, and together, they enter a daydream - basically, a dream that occurs in full daylight. He has firmly decided to help Merry to come back in the Dreamworld, even if she is not convinced at the beginning, but they soon end up becoming very good friends.

(Source: Yumekui Merry Wikia)

name: Merry Nightmare
about:
Birthday: Unknown
Height: 147 cm
Three sizes: B73 W54 H77
Things she likes: Donuts, video games

Her design motif is a sheep. The name's origin comes from the song that everyone knows. (Source: Translated Manga)

Merry is a girl from the Dreamworld searching for a door back home. Unlike the other dream demons coming into the human world, she doesn't need a vessel, instead she has a physical human-like body, she is stronger and faster than a normal human even in the real world.

She can't drink soda or eat spicy foods.

name: Takateru Akiyanagi
about:
Another friend of Yumeji, and member of the writing club. He loves writing poems and is often seen with a pen and a piece of paper to write on it.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Albireo
about: One of John Doe's helper cat girls.

name: John Doe
about:
The cat dream demon who originally wanted to take over Yumeji as his vessel. He had an army of cats roaming inside his field.
John has an enigmatic personality. He called himself Chaser, one who chases truth, and has great interest in irregulars like Yumeji and Merry. Sometimes, he even helps Yumeji who often got into trouble.

name: Chris Evergreen
name_kanji: クリス・エヴァーグリーン
about: A resident of the dream world. He contacts Hoshino Mei through her mobile phone.

name: Pharos Hercules
name_kanji: ファロス エルクレス
about: Pharos Hercules is a dream demon and main antagonist of the series.

name: Chizuru Kawanami
about: Chizuru is a mysterious transfer student who Isana tries to make friends with. Having been orphaned at a young age, Chizuru had cast away her emotions and become the vessel of the dream demon, Leon. However, she has started to open up towards Isana and wants to protect her from Mystletainn after she is forced to become a vessel and is targeted.

name: Saki Kirishima
about: Another friend of Yumeji, and member of the writing club. Quite tomboyish, she's fascinated by Yumeji's ability to see the aura of dreams.

name: Minato Kisaragi
about: A young girl that has trouble making friends. She often refers to herself in third person. She seems to have nightmares a lot, which seems to be caused by a dream demon named Ichima, that is trying to take over her body, to make as their vessel.

name: Yui Kounagi
about: Yui is a young girl whom Yumeji meets in a supermarket. She has a strong interest in puppets, and can't help collecting them. Her family owns a hospital.

name: Father Tachibana
about: Isana's father who runs the Tachibana family restaurant, which is also home to both Yumeji and, more recently, Merry. He tends to have some rather perverted hobbies, but always acts cool and collected.

name: Isana Tachibana
about: Isana is Yumeji's close friend. She knows about Yumeji's strange ability to see colored auras. However, does not know about Merry's goals nor about the dream world.

name: Engi Threepiece
name_kanji: 双月花 エンギ・スリーピース
about:
Dream demon who live together peacefully with her vessel instead of taking over. 
She came to human world looking for Pharos Elcres who killed her twin sister and killed every dream demon she met. Her field is a garden which became deserted after her sister died. Strong and had very good swordsmanship.

name: Pati Threepiece
about:
Dream demon, who is Engi's twin sister. Before she was sent to reality, she thought it was a really great place.
However, soon she was killed by another Dream Demon.

name: Mistilteinn Treesea
about:
An evil dream demon who appears in the anime. She has the power to force dream demons into human vessels, later targeting and killing them, resulting in the vessel losing all ambition in their goals. She is extremely strong, as it is noted that she is acknowledged by Pharos Hercules for her power. 

Source: Wikipedia

name: Ryou Machiko
about:
Birthday: August 14

Ryou Machiko is the main character of Koufuku Graffiti, a second year middle school student who lives by herself and is in love with cooking.

name: Kirin Morino
about: Ryou's second cousin, who stays with Ryo on the weekends to attend cram school.

name: Shiina
about:
Shiina is Ryou's friend from middle school. She is one of the students of the art prep school both Ryou and Kirin also attend and lives with an old family in the metropolitan area. She is physically fragile, but is a beautiful girl who is cool and has mysterious atmosphere. She meets Ryou because they are in the same class together, and she knows Kirin from flower viewing in the park. She is accepted to the same high school as Rin and Kirin. Thanks to her cooking skill, she builds up a circle of friends besides Kirin and Ryou.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Akira Machiko
about: Ryou's aunt. She's shown to be very busy with her work and only occasionally sees Ryou. She's bubbly and energetic, but can also be forgetful.

name: Tsuyuko
about: Tsuyuko works for Shiina's family as a maid. She takes her work seriously, but also has a mysterious air about her. At first, Kirin mistakes her for Shiina's mother since she and Shiina have a similar personality and appearance. She is also shown to have experience with cooking.

name: Yuki Uchiki
about: Ryou's downstairs neighbour.  She's shy and has trouble expressing her thoughts.
